T04sanssr_pu:4: yasyāśraveṇa narakādi mahāprapātadāhādiduṣkham anubhūtam abhūd bhavadbhiḥ
T04sanssr_pu:5: | tīvraṃ punaḥ punar annantam aśāntacittais tac chrotum ādaram udārataraṃ
T04sanssr_pu:7: śrutvā ... pāpaṃ annuddhatātmā pūrvārjitaṃ ca vipulaṃ kṣapayaty aśeṣam |
T04sanssr_pu:8: aprāptapūrvam api saukhyam avāpnuvanti hāniṃ sukhāc ca na kadācid api prayānti ||
T04sanssr_pu:9: sambodhisatvasukham uttamam akṣaya ... apy asamasaṃpadam āpnuvanti |
T04sanssr_pu:10: tad dharmaratnam atidurlabham apy alabdhaṃ labdhakṣaṇāḥ śṛṇvata sādaram ucyamānam ||
T04sanssr_pu:11: āyāntu ca tribhuvanaikahitasya vākyaṃ śrotuṃ prasannamanasaḥ suranāgasatvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:13: sugatān sasutān sadharmakāyān praṇipatyādarato 'khilāṃś ca vandyān |
T04sanssr_pu:15: na ca kiñcid apūrvam atra vācyaṃ na ca saṃgranthanakauśalaṃ mamāsti |
T04sanssr_pu:16: ata eva na me parārthayatnaḥ svamano bhāvayituṃ mamedam iṣṭam ||
T04sanssr_pu:17: mama tāvad anena yāti vṛddhiṃ kuśalaṃ bhāvayituṃ prasādavegaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:18: yadi matsamadhātur eva paśyed aparo 'py enam ato 'pi sārthako 'yam ||
T04sanssr_pu:20: yadi nātra vicintyate hitaṃ punar apy eṣa samāgamaḥ kutaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:23: durlabhāṣṭākṣaṇanirvṛttir durlabho manuṣyapratilambho durlabhā kṣaṇasaṃpadviśuddhir durlabho buddhotpādo |
T04sanssr_pu:30: durlabhaḥ saddharme tadanukūlaḥ prayatno manuṣyalokae iti
T04sanssr_pu:31: tad evaṃvidhaṃ samāgamam āsādya saṃvṛtiparamārthataḥ suviditasaṃsāraduṣkhasyopaśamanasukhābhilāṣiṇo buddhagotrānubhāvāt tu yasya mahāsatvasyaivaṃ pratyavekṣotpadyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:32: yadā mama pareṣāṃ ca bhayaṃ duṣkhaṃ ca na priyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:33: tadātmanaḥ ko viśeṣo yat taṃ rakṣāmi netaram |
T04sanssr_pu:36: śraddhāmūlaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bodhau kāryā matir dṛḍhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:38: śraddhayamānu jinān jinadharmmān śraddhayate cari buddhasutānām |
T04sanssr_pu:39: bodhi anuttara śraddhayamāno jāyati cittaṃ mahāpuruṣāṇām ||
T04sanssr_pu:44: śraddha nidhānadhanaṃ caraṇāgraṃ pāṇi yathā śubhasaṃgrahamūlam ||
T04sanssr_pu:61: te tu na śīla na śikṣa tyajanti |
T04sanssr_pu:62: ye tu na śīla na śikṣa tyajantī |
T04sanssr_pu:70: ye avivarttika saṃghaprasannās te avivarttika śraddhabalātaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:81: ye sadādhiṣṭhita sarvajinebhis teṣūpapadyati bodhayi cittam |
T04sanssr_pu:82: yeṣūpapadyati bodhayi cittaṃ te abhiyukta maharṣiguṇeṣu ||
T04sanssr_pu:84: jātaya buddhakule anujātās te samayoga ayogavimuktāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:87: āśayu yeṣa prasādaviśuddhaḥ teṣa adhyāśayu uttamaśreṣṭhaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:88: yeṣa adhyāśayu uttamaśreṣṭhas te sada pāramitāsu caranti ||
T04sanssr_pu:89: ye sada pāramitāsu carantī te pratipanna iho mahayāne |
T04sanssr_pu:90: ye pratipanna iho mahayāne te pratipattitu pūjayi buddhān ||
T04sanssr_pu:91: ye pratipattitu pūjayi buddhān teṣu anusmṛti buddha abhedyā |
T04sanssr_pu:95: teṣa na jātu na tiṣṭhati buddhaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:96: yeṣa na jātu na tiṣṭhati buddhaḥ teṣa na jātu rahāyati dharmmaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:97: yeṣa na jātu rahāyati dharmaḥ te sada dhiṣṭhita sarvajinebhir |
T04sanssr_pu:102: ye tu śubhopacitāḥ kṛtapuṇyās te imi śraddadhi hetubalena ||
T04sanssr_pu:104: nota tu tādṛśu puṇyaviśeṣo yādṛśa śraddadhato imi dharmmān ||
T04sanssr_pu:107: śraddhā hi paramaṃ yānaṃ yena niryānti nāyakāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:109: aśrāddhasya manuṣyasya śuklo dharmo na rohati |
T04sanssr_pu:113: śraddhāyām ānanda yogaḥ karaṇīya idaṃ tathāgato vijñapayatīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:118: śraddhāmūlaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ kartavyaṃ sarvapuṇyasaṃgrahatvāt tad yathāryasiṃhaparipṛcchāyāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:122: priyaś ca bhoti satvānāṃ yatra yatropapadyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:125: eṣa saṃgraha dharmāṇāṃ bhavate tena ca priyaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:144: iti hi kulaputra bodhicittam ebhiś cānyaiś cāpramāṇair guṇaviśeṣaiḥ samanvāgatam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:152: ratnakaraṇḍasūtrāc ca pṛthagjano 'pi bodhisatva iti jñāyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:154: tad yathāpi nāma mañjuśrīḥ aṇḍakoṣaprakṣipto 'pi kalaviṅkapoto
T04sanssr_pu:155: | asaṃbhinnāṇḍa aniśkrāntaḥ koṣāt kalaviṅkarutam eva muñcati ||
T04sanssr_pu:157: asaṃbhinnātmadṛṣṭir aniṣkrāntas traidhātukād buddharutam eva muñcati |
T04sanssr_pu:160: jayamateś ca bodhisatvasya pṛthivī vidāram adāt |
T04sanssr_pu:162: sa hi śūnyatāṃ nādhimuktavān śūnyatāvādini ca pratighaṃ kṛtavān ||
T04sanssr_pu:166: kaścit puruṣaḥ pañcabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn abhikramitukāmaḥ syāt |
T04sanssr_pu:167: sa paśuratham abhiruhya mārgaṃ pratipadyate sa cireṇa dīrgheṇādhvanā yojanaśataṃ gacchet |
T04sanssr_pu:168: sa tatra mahatyā vātamaṇḍalyā paścāt khalu punar aśītiṃ yojanasahasrāṇi pratyākṛṣya pratyudāvartyeti
T04sanssr_pu:169: tat kiṃ śaknuyāt sa puruṣas tān lokadhātūn paśurathenātikramitum |
T04sanssr_pu:170: yāvad annabhilāpyānabhilāpyair api kalpair ekam api lokadhātum atikramitum |
T04sanssr_pu:174: evam eva mañjuśrīḥ yaḥ kaścid bodhicittam utpādya mahāyānaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:179: śrāvakayānaṃ ca paṭhati svādhyāyati mīmāṃsate paribudhyate 'rthāṃś ca pāṭhayati yāvad bodhayati
T04sanssr_pu:180: sa tena dhanvaprajño bhavati so 'nnuttarajñānamārgāt pratyākṛṣyate pratyudāvarttyate |
T04sanssr_pu:181: yad api tasya bodhisatvasya bodhibhāvanātaḥ prajñendriyaṃ prajñācakṣuḥ tad api tasya dhanvīkriyate pratihanyate |
T04sanssr_pu:183: tad evam eṣā śūnyatānadhimuktir mahāyānānabhiratiś cāsaṃpūrṇādhimukticittacaryasyāpi prāyo na saṃdṛśyate |
T04sanssr_pu:189: kasmād anye bodhicittotpādakā asyāṃ bhūmau neṣyante |
T04sanssr_pu:190: na cātrecchayā kiñcid viśeṣacihnaṃ nītārthaṃ karttuṃ labhyate |
T04sanssr_pu:211: yathā na te tathāgataśāsane pravrajitā yeṣāṃ nāsti tyāga iti |
T04sanssr_pu:212: evam ihānyabodhicittanindā draṣṭavyā na tu bodhicittam anyathā notpadyatae eva
T04sanssr_pu:214: iha kulaputra bodhisatvo gotrasthaḥ sann annutpāditabodhicittaḥ tathāgatena vā tathāgataśrāvakeṇa vā saṃcodyamānaḥ saṃvedyamānaḥ samādāpyamāno 'nnuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau bodhicittam utpādayatīdaṃ prathamaṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhicittotpādāya |
T04sanssr_pu:215: saṃbodher vā bodhicittasya vā varṇaṃ bhāṣyamāṇaṃ śrutvānnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayatīdaṃ dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:216: sa satvā ... naśaraṇān advīpān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyacittam upasthāpya yāvad annuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittam utpādayatīdaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhicittotpādāya |
T04sanssr_pu:217: sa tathāgatasya sarvākāraparipūrṇatāṃ dṛṣṭvā prītim utpādya annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayatīdaṃ caturthaṃ kāraṇam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:218: tac ca bodhicittaṃ dvividhaṃ bodhipraṇidhicittaṃ ca bodhiprasthāna cittaṃ ca |
T04sanssr_pu:220: durlabhāḥ kulaputra te satvāḥ sarvaloke ye 'nnuttarasyāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:225: mayā buddhena bhavitavyam iti cittaṃ praṇidhānād utpannaṃ bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:228: kaḥ punar vādaḥ kiñcid eva kuśalaṃ kṛtvā |
T04sanssr_pu:230: ghoṣadatto nāma tathāgato yatra nakṣatrarājena tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ tāmbūlapatraṃ dattvā gopālakabhūtena |
T04sanssr_pu:231: evaṃ vidyutpradīpo nāma tathāgato yatra yaśasā tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ daśikāṃ dattvā tantravāyabhūtena |
T04sanssr_pu:232: evam anantaprabho nāma tathāgato yatrārciṣmatā tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ tṛṇapradīpaṃ dattvā nagarāvalambakabhūtena |
T04sanssr_pu:233: evaṃ dṛḍhavikramo nāma tathāgato yatra duṣpradharṣeṇa tathāgatena prathamaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ dattakāṣṭhaṃ dattvā kāṣṭhahārakabhūtenety ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:237: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputra cittam api vajraratnaṃ sarvaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāram abhibhavati
T04sanssr_pu:240: evam eva kulaputrāśayapratipattibhinnam api sarvajñatācittotpādavajraratnaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaguṇasuvarṇālaṃkāram abhibhavati bodhisattvanāma ca na vijahāti |
T04sanssr_pu:242: itaś ca vināpi caryayā bodhicittam upakārakam iti jñātavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:244: yasmāc ca tvaṃ mahārāja bahukṛtyo bahukaraṇīyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:245: asahaḥ sarveṇa sarvaḥ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadā dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣituṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:247: tasmāt tarhi tvaṃ mahārāja evam eva samyaksambodhichandaṃ śraddhāṃ tra ... praṇidhiṃ ca gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi jāgrad api bhuñjāno 'pi |
T04sanssr_pu:251: sarvabuddhabodhisatvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakapṛthagj anānām ātmanaś cātītānāgatapratyutpannāni sarvakuśalamūlāny abhisaṃkṣipya tulayitvā piṇḍayitvānumodasvāgrayā anumodanayā yāvad ākāśasamatayā nirvāṇasamatayānumodasvānumodya ca sarvabuddhabodhisatvapratyekabuddhāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ pūjākarmaṇe niryātaya |
T04sanssr_pu:253: tataḥ sarvasatvānāṃ yāvat sarvajñātapratilambhāya sarvabuddhadharmaparipūraṇāya dine dine traikālyam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmaya evaṃ khalu tvaṃ mahārāja pratipannaḥ san rājyaṃ kārayiṣyasi rājyakṛtyāni ca na hāyayiṣyasi bodhisaṃbhārāṃś ca paripūrayiṣyasīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:255: sa khalu punas tvaṃ mahārāja tasya samyaksaṃbodhicittakuśalamūlakarmaṇo vipākenānnekaśatakṛtvo
T04sanssr_pu:258: sarvāsu ca devamanuṣyopapattiṣv ādhipatyam eva kārayasi |
T04sanssr_pu:259: na ca tāvat tava mahārāja tasya samyaksaṃbodhicittasya kuśalakarmaṇa ūnatvaṃ vāpūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate |
T04sanssr_pu:260: api ca mahārāja ekam api samyaksaṃbodhicittaṃ sarvasattvottāraṇārambaṇatvāt sarvasatvāmocanārambaṇatvāt sarvasatvasamāśvāsanārambaṇatvāt sarvasatvaparinirvāṇārambaṇatvād aprameyāsaṃkhyeyakuśalopacayam kaḥ punar vādo ya evaṃ bahulīkarotīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:264: idaṃ tu vaktavyaṃ kim abhūmipraviṣṭhasyāpi bodhisatvasamvarādhikāro 'sti na veti |
T04sanssr_pu:267: na ca kañcit satkārāṃ kasyacit sakāśāt pratikāṃkṣaty anyatra mayaivaiṣāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ sarvopakaraṇabāhulyam upanāmayitavyam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:269: pramuditāyāṃ bodhisatvabhūmau suvyavasthito bhavaty acalanayoge ... ti |
T04sanssr_pu:273: śrāvakayānam evāsya na bhavati prāg eva mahāyānam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:280: evam ādi sūtreṣu bhūmipraviṣṭasyāpi śikṣāprajñaptir dṛśyate |
T04sanssr_pu:281: yatra vāsāmānyena bodhisatvam adhikṛtyopadeśas tatrābhyāsayogyatayā pratiṣedhavākyena vādikarmikabodhisatvena na śikṣitavyaṃ bhaved etat |
T04sanssr_pu:286: na cātra śithilena bhavitavyaṃ na ca śeṣāsu na samudāgacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:288: ayaṃ ca saṃvaraḥ strīṇām api mṛdukleśānāṃ bodhyabhilāṣacittānāṃ labhyate |
T04sanssr_pu:290: caturbhiḥ śāriputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ bodhisatvāḥ satyavādino bhavantīty ārabhyāha |
T04sanssr_pu:291: iha śāriputra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vānnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādyārabdhavīryo viharati kuśaladharmaparyeṣaṇāyety ārabhya sarva upadeśaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:293: evaṃ hy asya śikṣātikrame tīvram apatrāpyaṃ guruvisaṃvādanabhayaṃ cotpadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:294: tatra cānnābhogataḥ premagauravasiddhir ity eṣa sāmānyasaṃvaradharmaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:295: ata eva bodhisatvāḥ tathāgatānāṃ purataḥ śikṣāṇām anyatamaśikṣāniṣpattikāmāḥ samādānaṃ kurvanti
T04sanssr_pu:296: tasya ca kalyāṇamitrasyābhāve daśadigavasthitabuddhabodhisatvābhimukhībhāvabhāvanayā saṃvaro grāhyaḥ saṃvaram ātmabalaṃ ca tulayitvā |
T04sanssr_pu:297: anyathā tu sarvabuddhabodhisatvāḥ sadevakaś ca loko visaṃvāditaḥ syāt |
T04sanssr_pu:298: saddharmasmṛtyupasthānasūtre hi kiñcin mātraṃ cintayitvāpy adadataḥ pretagatir uktā pratijñātaṃ cādadato narakagatiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:299: kiṃ punar annuttaram artham akhilasya jagataḥ pratijñāyāsaṃpādayataḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:303: tatra kulaputra katamat satyaṃ yad bodhisatvo
T04sanssr_pu:304: 'nnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya tac cittaṃ jīvitahetor api na parityajati na satveṣu vipratipadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:306: yat punar bodhisatvo 'nnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādya paścāt tac cittaṃ parityajati satveṣu vipratipadyate 'yaṃ bodhisatvasya pratikṛṣṭo mṛṣāvāda iti |
T04sanssr_pu:308: syād yathāpi nāma sāgaramate rājā vā rājamātro vā sarvaṃ nāgarakaṃ janaṃ śvo bhaktenopanimantryopekṣako bhaven nānnapānaṃ samudānayet satyaṃ sarvajanakāyaṃ visaṃvādayet |
T04sanssr_pu:310: evam eva sāgaramate yo bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvān āśvāsyātīrṇatāraṇāyāmuktamocanāyānnāśvastāśvāsanāya yāvan na bāhuśrutye
T04sanssr_pu:313: evaṃ ca taṃ pūrvabuddhadarśinyo devatā uccagghanti vivādayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:314: durlabhās te yajñasvāmino ye mahāyajñaṃ pratijñāyottārayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:315: tasmāt tarhi sāgaramate na sā bodhisatvena vāg bhāṣitavyā yayā sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ visaṃvādayet
T04sanssr_pu:316: punar aparaṃ sāgaramate bodhisatvaḥ kenacid evādhīṣṭo bhavati dharmeṣv arthakaraṇīyeṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:317: tatra bodhisatvena vāg bhāṣitā bhavati yāvad ātmaparityāgo 'pi bodhisatvena kartavyo bhavet tatra na punaḥ sa satvo visaṃvādayitavya iti |
T04sanssr_pu:318: tasmāt svabalānurūpeṇaikam api kuśalamūlaṃ samādāya rakṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:321: na punar yo 'ntaśa ekam api yāvajjīvaṃ kuśalaṃ karmapathaṃ na rakṣati atha ca punar evaṃ vadati
T04sanssr_pu:324: sa pudgalaḥ paramakuhako mahāmṛṣāvādikaḥ sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ purato visaṃvādako lokasyocchedavādī sa mūḍhaḥ kālaṃ kurute vinipātagāmī bhavatīti |
T04sanssr_pu:325: yāvat kālaṃ ca śaknoti tāvat kālaṃ kuśalaṃ samādāya vartitavyaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:327: yas tu mahāsatva evaṃ śrutvāpi bodhisatvacaryāduṣkaratām api prajñayāvagāhyotsahatae eva sakaladuṣkhitajanaparitrāṇadhuram avavoḍhuṃ tena vandanapūjanapāpadeśanapuṇyānumodanabuddhādhyeṣaṇayācanabodhipariṇāmanaṃ kṛtvā kalyāṇamitram abhyetya taduktānuvādena svayaṃ vā vaktavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:329: yathāryamañjuśrībuddhakṣetraguṇavyūhālaṅkārasūtre bhagavatā mañjuśriyā pūrvajanmāvadāne caryopetaṃ bodhicittam utpāditaṃ tathotpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:334: nimantraye jagat sarvaṃ dāridryān mocitāsmi tat ||
T04sanssr_pu:336: adyāgre na kariṣyāmi bodhiṃ prāpsyāmi yāvatā |
T04sanssr_pu:342: nāmadheyaṃ kariṣyāmi daśa dikṣu ca viśrutaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:346: na cātra sārvakālikāt saṃvaragrahaṇāj janmāntarāpattiśaṅkā kartavyātraiva sūtre 'kṣobhyapraṇidhānānujñānād evaṃ hy uktaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:347: yathā tenākṣobhyeṇa tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisatvabhūtenaivaṃ vāg bhāṣitā |
T04sanssr_pu:348: visaṃvāditā me buddhā bhagavanto bhaveyur yadi sarvasyāṃ jātau na pravrajeyam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:350: anyās tu jātīr ābodheḥ saiva saṃśodhayiṣyatīty ukteḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:351: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena akṣobhyasya tathāgatasya anuśikṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:352: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasyāṃ jātau pravrajaty utpādād vā tathāgatānām annutpādād vāvaśyaṃ gṛhāvāsān niṣkrāmati |
T04sanssr_pu:354: paramo hy ayaṃ śāriputra lābho yad uta gṛhāvāsān niṣkramaṇam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:357: yathā janmāntareṣv ayaṃ doṣo na bhavati tathātraiva vakṣyamāṇam ity āstāṃ tāvad etat ||
T04sanssr_pu:358: tad evaṃ samāttasaṃvarasya sāmānyam āpattilakṣaṇam ucyate |
T04sanssr_pu:359: yenāpattilakṣaṇena yuktaṃ vastu svayam apy utprekṣya pariharen na cāpattipratirūpakeṣv annāpattipratirūpakeṣu ca saṃmuhyeta |
T04sanssr_pu:360: bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ varttamānānāgatasarvaduṣkhadaurmanasyopaśamāya varttamānānāgatasukhasaumanasyotpādāya ca niḥśāṭhyataḥ kāyavāṅmanaḥparākramaiḥ prayatnaṃ karoti |
T04sanssr_pu:361: yadi tu tatpratyayasāmagrīṃ nānveṣate tadannantarāya pratikārāya na ghaṭate alpaduṣkhadaurmanasyaṃ bahuduṣkhadaurmanasyapratikārabhūtaṃ notpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:362: mahārthasiddhyarthaṃ cālpārthahāniṃ na karoti kṣaṇam apy upekṣate |
T04sanssr_pu:364: saṃkṣepato 'nnāpattiḥ svaśaktyaviśayeṣu kāryeṣu tatra niṣphalatayā śikṣyāprajñaptyabhāvāt
T04sanssr_pu:366: yatra svaśaktyagocare 'pi tyāgasāmarthyād āpattiḥ syāt tan na cintyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:367: sāmānyapāpadeśanā na ... vāt tu tato muktiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:373: nirūpya yathārham atikrāmaty antaśaś caṇḍāladāsenāpi coditaḥ sāpattiko bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:376: api tu maitreya caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ sarvabuddhabhāṣi ... bhiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:382: yasya kasyacin maitreya ebhiś caturbhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pratibhānaṃ pratibhāti pratibhāsyati vā |
T04sanssr_pu:383: tatra śrāddhaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhir vā buddhasaṃjñotpādayitavyā śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā
T04sanssr_pu:386: yat kiñcin maitreya subhāṣitaṃ sarvaṃ tad buddhabhāṣitaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:387: tatra maitreya ya imāni pratibhānāni pratikṣipen naitāni buddhabhāṣitānīti |
T04sanssr_pu:388: teṣu cāgauravam utpādayet pudgalavidveṣeṇa tena sarvabuddhabhāṣitaṃ pratibhānaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:390: yaḥ punar etad abhyāsārthaṃ vyutpāditam icchati |
T04sanssr_pu:391: tenātra śikṣāsamuccaye tāvac caryāmukhamātraśikṣaṇārtham abhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ śikṣārambhasyaiva mahāphalatvāt |
T04sanssr_pu:393: yaś ca mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamebhyo buddhebhyaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvebhyo gaṃgānadīvālikāsamāni
T04sanssr_pu:394: vaśirājamahāmaṇiratnapratipūrṇāni kṛtvā dahyād evaṃ dadaṅ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān dānaṃ dadyād |
T04sanssr_pu:395: yo vānyo mañjuśrīr bodhisatva imān evaṃrūpān dharmān śrutvā ekāntena gatvā cittenābhinirūpayed imeṣv evaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣiṣyāmīti |
T04sanssr_pu:396: so 'śikṣito 'pi mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo 'syāṃ śikṣyāyāṃ chandiko vatataraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati
T04sanssr_pu:397: na tv eva tad dānam ayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastv iti |
T04sanssr_pu:398: tasmād evam anuśaṃsadarśinā bodhisatvena na kathaṃcin nivarttitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:400: tatra mañjuśrīr ye trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ satvas teṣām ekaikaḥ satvo rājā bhavej jambūdvīpādhipatis te sarvae evaṃ ghoṣayeyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:401: yo mahāyānam udgrahiṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravarttayiṣyati tasya nakhachedena māsaṃ pañcapalikena divasenāvatārayiṣyāmaḥ taṃ caitenāpakrameṇa jīvitād vyaparopayiṣyāma iti sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisatva evam ucyamāno no trasyati na saṃtrāsam āpsyate
T04sanssr_pu:402: 'ntaśa ekacittotpādenāpi na bibheti na viṣīdati na vicikitsate |
T04sanssr_pu:403: uttari ca saddharmmaparigrahārtham abhiyujyate pāṭhasvādhyāyābhimukto viharati |
T04sanssr_pu:404: ayaṃ mañjuśrīr bodhisatvaś cittaśūro dānaśūraḥ śīlaśūraḥ kṣāntiśūraḥ vīryaśūraḥ dhyānaśūraḥ prajñāśūraḥ samādhiśūraḥ iti vaktavyaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:405: sacen mañjuśrīr bodhisatvaḥ teṣāṃ vadhakapuruṣāṇāṃ na kupyati na ruṣyati na khila doṣacittam utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:406: sa mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo brahmasama indrasamo 'kampya iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:420: kathaṃ ca kulaputra bodhisatvā bodhisatvaśikṣāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtā bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:422: na prātimokṣasaṃvaramātrakeṇa mayā śakyam annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:423: kiṃ tarhi yānīmāni tathāgatena teṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu bodhisatvasamudācārā |
T04sanssr_pu:424: bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni prajñaptāni teṣu teṣu mayā śikṣitavyam iti vistaraḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:425: tasmād asmadvidhena mandabuddhinā durvijñeyo vistaroktatvād bodhisatvasya saṃvaraḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:428: katamāni ca tāni marmasthānāni yāni hi sūtrānteṣu mahāyānābhiratānām arthāyoktāni |
T04sanssr_pu:436: yo bodhisatvena mārgaḥ parigṛhītaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtena duṣkham upagāmī |
T04sanssr_pu:437: saced bodhisatvasya taṃ mārgaṃ parigṛhyāvasthitasyāpi kalpakoṭer atyayenaikaṃ sukhacittam utpadyetāntaśo niṣadya cittam api |
T04sanssr_pu:438: tatra bodhisatvenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ sarvasatvānām ātyayikaṃ parigṛhyaitad api me varjayan niṣīdāmīti |
T04sanssr_pu:441: pañcemāni devaputrānantaryāṇi yair ānantaryaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvāḥ kṣipram annuttarāsamyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate |
T04sanssr_pu:443: yadā devaputra bodhisatvo 'dhyāśayaty annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam
T04sanssr_pu:444: utpādya nāntarā śravakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittam utpādayatīdaṃ devaputra prathamam ānantaryaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:445: sarvasvaparityāgitāyāṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā mātsaryacittena sārddhaṃ sa nyasatīdaṃ devaputra dvitīyam ānantaryam |
T04sanssr_pu:446: sarvasatvā mayā trātavyā ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā sīdatīdaṃ devaputra tṛtīyam ānantaryam
T04sanssr_pu:447: annutpannāniruddhān sarvadharmān avabhotsyae ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā dṛṣṭigateṣu prapatatīdaṃ devaputra caturtham ānantaryam |
T04sanssr_pu:448: ekakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvadharmān avabhotsyae ity evaṃ cittam utpādya nāntarā tiṣṭhati na viṣṭhīvati aprāptāyāṃ sarvajñatāyām idaṃ devaputra pañcamam ānantaryam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:449: tasmād evam ātmabhāvabhogapuṇyānām aviratam utsargarakṣāśuddhivṛddhayo yathāyogaṃ bhāvanīyāḥ
T04sanssr_pu:450: tatra tāvad utsargārthaṃ parigrahadoṣabhāvanādvāreṇa vairāgyam utpādayet tyāgānuśaṃsāṃś ca bhāvayet |
T04sanssr_pu:452: adhyavasitā ye bālāḥ kāye 'smin pūtike samyag |
T04sanssr_pu:459: ye kecit satvā na bhavanti vigrahāḥ parigrahas tatra nidānamūlam |
T04sanssr_pu:463: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu parakīyasaṃjñām utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:468: yad dattaṃ tan na bhūyo rakṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:472: yad dattaṃ tad aparigrahaṃ yad gṛhe tat saparigrahaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:473: yad dattaṃ tad abhayaṃ yad gṛhe tat sabhayam |
T04sanssr_pu:478: yad dattaṃ tataḥ sukham yad gṛhe tadārabhya duṣkhaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:489: yāvat sacet punar asya putre 'tiriktataraṃ premotpadyate tathānyeṣu satveṣu tena tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:491: samyakprayuktasya samacittasya bodhisatvasya bodhir na viṣamacittasya bodhir na mithyāprayuktasya
T04sanssr_pu:493: ābhis tisṛbhiḥ paribhāṣaṇābhiḥ svacittaṃ paribhāṣyānyatre 'mitrasaṃjñotpādayitavyāmitraṃ hy etan mama |
T04sanssr_pu:498: tena tathā tathā cittam utpādayitavyaṃ yathā yathāsya sarvasatveṣu putrapremānugatā maitry utpadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:505: neha saṃvidyate kaścit kasyacit ... paro vā |
T04sanssr_pu:507: gṛhiṇā bodhisatvena na kasmiṃścid vastuni mamatvaṃ parigraho vā kartavyaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:510: sacet punar gṛhapate gṛhiṇaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yācanaka upasaṃkramya kiñcid eva vastu yāceta
T04sanssr_pu:513: yady aham etad vastu parityajeyaṃ yadi vā na parityajeyam avaśyaṃ mamaitena vastunā vinābhāvo bhaviṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:515: etac ca vastu māṃ tyakṣyati ahaṃ cainaṃ tyakṣyāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:516: etac ca vastu parityajyāhaṃ āttasāraḥ kālaṃ kariṣyāmi etac ca parityaktaṃ na me maraṇakāle cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati |
T04sanssr_pu:517: etac ca me maraṇakāle prītiṃ prāmodyam avipratisāritāṃ ca janayiṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:518: sacet punar evam api samanvāharan śaknuyāt tad vastu parityaktum |
T04sanssr_pu:519: tena sa yācanakaś catasṛbhiḥ saṃjñaptibhiḥ saṃjñapayitavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:527: mā paritāpsīs tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye |
T04sanssr_pu:529: yathainaṃ ca tavābhiprāyaṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi sarvasatvānāṃ ceti |
T04sanssr_pu:533: mā bhūd bodhisatvasya tatra aprasādo bodhisatve vā yācanakasyeti |
T04sanssr_pu:534: na tu mātsaryam evaṃ annavadyaṃ bhavati kutsitaṃ cedaṃ bhagavatā bodhisatvānāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:536: catvāra ime śāriputra dharmā bodhisatvānāṃ na saṃvidyante |
T04sanssr_pu:543: yasyeme śāriputra catvāro dharmāḥ saṃvidyante sa paṇḍita.ir jñātavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:547: saṃkleśadharmo vatāyaṃ lokāmiṣaguruko vatāyaṃ bhaktacoḍakaparamo vatāyam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:548: tathā cittaśūrāḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvā bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:565: na tad vastūpādātavyaṃ yasmin vastuni nāsya tyāgacittam utpadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:567: na sa parigrahaḥ parigrahītavyo yasmin parigrahe notsarjanacittam utpādayen na sa parivāra upādātavyo yasmin yācanakair yācyamānasya parigrahabuddhir utpadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:568: na tad rājyam upādātavyaṃ na te bhogā na tad ratnam upādātavyaṃ yāvan na tat kiñcid vastūpādātavyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:570: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:572: prāg eva bāhyāni vastūni yasya yasya satvasya yena yena yad yat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati tasmai tasmai tad dāsyāmi satsaṃvidyamānaṃ hastaṃ hastārthikebhyo dāsyāmi pādaṃ pādārthikebhyo netraṃ netrārthikebhyo dāsyāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:573: māṃsaṃ māṃsārthikebhyaḥ śoṇitaṃ śoṇitārthikebhyo majjānaṃ majjārthikebhyo 'ṅgapratyaṅgāny aṅgapratyaṅgārthikebhyaḥ śiraḥ śirorthikebhyaḥ parityakṣyāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:574: kaḥ punar vādo bāhyeṣu vastuṣu yad uta dhanadhānyajātarūparajataratnābharaṇahayagajarathavāhanagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīpattanadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaputraduhitṛparivāreṣu api tu khalu punar yasya yasya yena yena yad yat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyati tasmai tasmai satvāya tat tad deyaṃ saṃvidyamānaṃ dāsyāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:576: annapekṣo dāsyāmi satvānugrahāya satvakāruṇyena satvānukampayā teṣām eva satvānāṃ saṃgrahāya
T04sanssr_pu:577: | yathā me 'mī satvāḥ saṃgṛhītā bodhiprāptasya dharmajānakāḥ syur iti |
T04sanssr_pu:579: tad yathāpi nāma kulaputra bhaiṣajyavṛkṣasya mūlato vā hriyamāṇasya gaṇḍataḥ śākhātaḥ tvaktaḥ patrato vā hriyamāṇasya puṣpataḥ phalataḥ sārato vā hriyamāṇasya naivaṃ bhavati vikalpo |
T04sanssr_pu:580: mūlato me hriyate yāvat sārato me hriyatae iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:581: api tu khalu punar avikalpa eva hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭānāṃ satvānāṃ vyādhīn apanayati |
T04sanssr_pu:582: evam eva kulaputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenāsmiṃś cāturmahābhautike ātmabhāve bhaiṣajyasaṃjñotpādayitavyā yeṣāṃ yeṣāṃ satvānāṃ yena yenārthaḥ tat tad eva me harantu hastaṃ hastārthinaḥ pādaṃ pādārthina iti pūrvavat ||
T04sanssr_pu:584: ayam eva mayā kāyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kiṃkaraṇīyeṣu kṣapayitavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:585: tad yathāpi nāmemāni bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātuś ca nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānārambaṇair nānopakaraṇair nānāparibhogaiḥ satvānāṃ nānopabhogaṃ gacchanti |
T04sanssr_pu:586: evam evāham imaṃ kāyaṃ caturmahābhūtasamucchrayaṃ nānāsukhair nānāparyāyair nānārambaṇair nānopakaraṇair nānāparibhogair vistareṇa sarvasatvānām upabhogyaṃ kariṣyāmīti |
T04sanssr_pu:587: sa imam arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan kāyaduṣkhatāṃ ca pratyavekṣate kāyaduṣkhatayā ca na parikhidyate satvāvekṣayeti ||
T04sanssr_pu:589: iti hi bodhisatva ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu niryātayan sarvakuśalamūlopakāritvena sarvasatvānāṃ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāharan pradīpasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣūpanayan sukhasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣv adhitiṣṭhan |
T04sanssr_pu:590: dharmakukṣisamam ātmānaṃ sarvajagati saṃdhārayan ālokasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣv anugacchan jagatpratiṣṭhāpanasamam ātmānaṃ saṃpaśyan
T04sanssr_pu:592: mitrasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu niyojayamāno 'nnuttarasukhamārgasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu saṃdarśayamānaḥ annuttarasukhopadhānasamam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu pariśodhamānaḥ sūryasamam ātmānaṃ sarvajagati samīkurvāṇaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:594: yathākāmakaraṇīyavaśyam ātmānaṃ sarvaloke saṃpaśyann agracaityā bhaviṣyāmaḥ ...
T04sanssr_pu:599: sarvajagato dānapatim ātmānam adhimucyamānaḥ sarvalokajñānasamam ātmānaṃ kurvāṇaḥ bodhisatvacaryāprayuktam ātmānaṃ saṃjanayamānaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:603: pratipattau cātmānaṃ sthāpayamāno bodhisatvatyāgacittatāṃ manasi kurvāṇa udyānabhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvasatveṣu saṃpaśyan |
T04sanssr_pu:604: dharmaratibhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvalokeṣv ādarśayamānaḥ saumanasyadātāram ātmānaṃ sarvasatvānām adhitiṣṭhan |
T04sanssr_pu:605: annantaprītisaṃjananam ātmānaṃ sarvajagato niryātayamānaḥ sarvaśukladharmāya dvārabhūtam ātmānaṃ sarvaloke saṃdhārayamānaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:609: iti hi bodhisatva ātmānam upasthāyakatvāya dadānaḥ yācanakeṣu nīcamanasikāracitto bhūmyāstaraṇādhiṣṭhānacetā dharaṇisamasarvaduṣkhasahanamanasikārapravṛttaḥ sarvasatvopasthānāklāntamānasaprayukto bālajanaduṣkṛtasthiraḥ sthāvarādhivāsanajātyaḥ asthitaḥ kuśalamūlābhiyuktaḥ aprayuktasarvalokadhātūpasthānaḥ karṇo nāsā saṃparityajan yācanakebhya upasaṃkrāntebhyo bodhisatvacaryopāttatathāgatakulakulīnasaṃbhūtacittaḥ sarvabodhisatvānusmaraṇavihāraprasṛto 'sārāt sarvatrailokyāt sa ...
T04sanssr_pu:610: tyavekṣamāṇaḥ svaśarīrānadhyavasitasantānaḥ aniketasarvabuddhadharmānusmṛtivihāry asārāc charīrāt sārādānābhiprāya iti hi bodhisatvo jihvāṃ yācitaḥ samāno ma ... vātā premaṇīyayā maitryopacāravitatayā bhadre siṃhāsane rājārhe niṣādya taṃ yācanakam abhibhāṣate dṛṣṭaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:611: ariṣṭacitto bhūtvākṣatacitto 'nnupahatacitto mahātman salā ... citto buddhavaṃśasaṃbhūtacitto
T04sanssr_pu:613: jānumaṇḍalapraṣṭhitakāyo bhūtvā svakān mukhāj jihvā ... yācanakasya sarvaśarīram adhīnaṃ kṛtvā vācaṃ pramuñcan snigdhāṃ mṛdvīṃ premaṇīyāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:615: gṛhāṇa tvaṃ mama jihvāṃ yathā kāmakaraṇīyāṃ kuru |
T04sanssr_pu:616: tathā kuru yathā tvaṃ prīto bhavasi prītamānasa ātmanā pramudito hṛṣṭaḥ prītisaumanasyajāta iti sa śiraḥ parityajan sarvadharmāgraśiraḥ paramajñānam avataran sarvasatvaparitrāṇaśirobodhi ... gacchan sarvajagadagryaśiraḥ annupamajñānam abhilaṣan sarvadikchiraḥ prāptuṃ
T04sanssr_pu:619: iti hi bodhisatvo hastapādān parityajan yācanakebhyaḥ śraddhāhastaprayuktenānugrahacāritreṇa bodhisatvasiṃhavikramatyāgapratatapāṇinā vyavasargābhiratena hastapādaparityāgena mahāpratiṣṭhānakramatalavyatihāreṇa bodhisatvacaryādhyavasāyena vedanānupahatatayā dānaprasādaśaktyā
T04sanssr_pu:620: vimalacittotpādasaṃvaro niṣparyavasthānajñānadharmaśarīrāchinnābhinnāluptakāyasaṃjñaḥ anīcacittaḥ sarvamārakarmākalyāṇamitropastabdhavṛṃhitacetāḥ sarvabodhisatvasaṃvarṇitaikatyāganiryāṇa iti hi bodhisatvaḥ svaśarīram ākṣipya rudhiram anuprayacchan yācanakebhyaḥ praharṣitabodhicitto bodhisatvacaryābhilaṣitacitto 'paryāttaveditacittaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:621: sarvayācanakābhilaṣitacittaḥ sarvapratigrāhakāvidviṣṭacittaḥ sarvabodhisatvatyāgapratipatpratipanno 'nivarttyayā prītiprasrabdhyā svaśarīrānapekṣacittaḥ svaśarīrād rudhiram anuprayacchan jñānāyatanamahāyānaprasṛtacetā mahāyānāvinaṣṭamanā iṣṭamanās tuṣṭamanāḥ prītamanāḥ muditamanā maitrymanāḥ sukhamanāḥ prasannamanāḥ
T04sanssr_pu:622: pramuditaprītisaumanasyajāto majjāmāṃsaṃ svaśarīrāt parityajan yācanakebhyaḥ kalyāṇatyāgayā
T04sanssr_pu:624: gṛhṇantu bhavanto mama śarīrān majjāmāṃsaṃ yathā kāmakaruṇāyā tulyaprītivivarddhanena tyāgacittena
T04sanssr_pu:626: sarvabodhisatvasamatopāttair mahādānārambhair manasākāṅkṣitaiḥ sarvayācakair annanutāpyacittair dānavastubhiḥ apratyavekṣitena karmavipākapratyayena sarvalokadhātvavimukhayā sarvabuddhakṣetrālaṃkāravyūhapūjayā sarvajagadabhimukhayā karuṇāparitrāṇatayā |
T04sanssr_pu:631: lokābhimukhenāparāntakoṭīgatakalpavyavasāyena bodhisatvapraṇidhānenāparitrasyanābhimukhenākhedacittotpādena bodhisatvaḥ svahṛdayaṃ parityajan yācanakebhyo dānavaśaśikṣitacittaḥ pāramitāniṣpādanacittaḥ sarvabodhisatvadānānuddhatasupratiṣṭhitacittaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:634: sarvajagatparipācananidānaṃ mahāpraṇidhānaṃ pratipadyamāno bodhisatvacaryāyāṃ saṃvasamānaḥ sarvajñatāsaṃbhāraṃ saṃbharamāṇaḥ praṇidhim ariñcan so 'tra yakṛdbukkāphupphuṣaṃ yācakebhyaḥ parityajan
T04sanssr_pu:635: yācanakābhiprasannayā dṛṣṭyā prasannaprītyākārair netrair bodhisatvaniryātena premṇāvyutthitamanasikāreṇa tyāgenāsārāt kāyāt supratyavekṣitena sārādānacittena śmaśānaparyantena kāyānusmṛtimanasikāreṇa vṛkaśṛgālaśvabhakṣyaṃ śarīraṃ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ parabhaktimanasikṛtayā |
T04sanssr_pu:636: śarīrānityatayāpaviddhaśarīreṇa parabhaktacetanena evaṃ dharmamanasikāraprayukto bodhisatvas tān yācanakān animiṣaṃ prekṣamāṇa evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:637: yadi cāham etadyācanakasya etaccharīrād antraṃ yakṛdbukkāphuṣphuṣaṃ dadyāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:640: sa evaṃ manasikārasaṃtoṣitena santānenaivaṃ dharmajñānenāśayena kalyāṇamitrasaṃjñādhiṣṭhitena yācanakadarśanenāsārāt kāyāt sāram ādātukāmo dharmakāmatayā svamāṃsān nakhaṃ parityajann eva tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayatīty ātmabhāvotsargaṃ kṛtvā ||
T04sanssr_pu:642: iti hi bodhisatvo nānādakṣiṇīyapratigrāhakeṣv anyānyapudgaladigāgateṣv aprameyakṛpaṇavanīpakeṣu bodhisatvaśravāgateṣu bodhisatvaśabdaṃ śrutvāgateṣu bodhisatvapratyayāvakāśagateṣu bodhisatvadānapūrvaṃ praṇidhānaśruteṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:645: mayaiva tatra diśaṃ gatvā yūyaṃ pratimānayitavyā abhaviṣyata yena yuṣmākam āgamanaklamo na syāt |
T04sanssr_pu:646: evaṃ samṛddhapraṇipātena kṣamayati sarvayācanakān kṣamayitvā snāpayitvā viśrāmitaśarīrān kṛtvā tebhyo yadṛcchayopakaraṇaṃ pratipādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:647: yad idaṃ maṇirathān jambudvīpakalyāṇakanyāratnaparipūrṇān yad idaṃ suvarṇarathān janapadaviśuddhakanyāratnaparipūrṇān
T04sanssr_pu:650: tathātraiva deśitaṃ maṇirathān vā dadānaḥ sarvaratnajālasaṃchannān ājāneyahastyupetān |
T04sanssr_pu:652: candanarathān dadāno ratnacakrarathyaprayuktān ratnasiṃhāsanapratiṣṭhitān yāvan nānāratnachatrasaṃchannavyūhān ratnavitānavitatasaṃchannān dhvajapatākālaṃkṛtacaturdikkān nānāgandhavidhūpita ... sāragandhānulepānuliptān sarvapuṣpavyūhāvakīrṇān kanyāśatasahasraratnasūtraprakarṣitān abhrāntagamanān abhrāntasamavāhanaprayuktān
T04sanssr_pu:656: ātmānaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niryātayann upasthānaṃ vā sarvabuddhānām upādadāno rājyaṃ vā parityajan paṭabhedakaṃ vā nagararājadhānīṃ sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāṃ yathārhaṃ vā yācanakeṣu sarvaparivāraṃ parityajan putraduhitṛbhāryāṃ vā dadāno yācanakebhyaḥ sarvagṛhaṃ vāpasṛjan |
T04sanssr_pu:658: evaṃ pānadānaṃ rasadānam api bodhisatvo dadāno vividhān kalyāṇān udārān viśuddhān avikalāṃs tiktāṃl lavaṇān kaṭakān kaṣāyān nānārasāgropetān susnigdhān vividharasavidhinopetān dhātukṣobhaṇasamatāsthāpanān cittaśarīrabalopastambhanān prītiprasādaprāmodyakalpatājananān |
T04sanssr_pu:660: evaṃ vastradānaṃ puṣpadānaṃ gandhadānaṃ vilepanadānaṃ mālyadānaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:662: glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān bodhisatvo 'nuprayacchan yāvan nānābhājanāni vividhasaṃbhārāṇy annekakāṃsyapātrīr aprameyasaṃbhāropacitā hiraṇyasuvarṇarūpyacūrṇaparipūrṇās tāni buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyo dadāno 'cintyadakṣiṇīyādhimuktacetā bodhisatvaratnebhyo vā dadānaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:666: guruśuśrūṣopasthānacittatayā ācāryagurudakṣiṇīyebhyo vā dadānas tatra tatra gurusaṃbhārāvavādaśikṣaṇaprayuktaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:670: iti hi bodhisatvo hastyājāneyān dadānaḥ saptāṅgasupratiṣṭhitān |
T04sanssr_pu:671: ṣaṣṭihāyanān ṣaḍgantropetān padmavarṇān mukhaviśuddhān suvarṇālaṃkārān hemajālapraticchannaśarīrān nānāratnavicitrālaṃkārajālaśuṇḍaprakṣiptavyūhān suvarṇakalyāṇān kalyāṇacārudarśanān |
T04sanssr_pu:674: sa tān dadānaḥ parityajan gauraveṇa gurujanebhyaḥ kalyāṇamitramātāpitṛbhyaḥ kṛpaṇavanīpakayācanakebhyaḥ sarvajagatpratigrāhakabhyo muktacittayā dadāno |
T04sanssr_pu:675: nāgṛhītacittatayāvasṛjan mahākaruṇāparisphuṭena santānena mahātyāgaparimāṇabodhisatvaguneṣu pratipadyamāno 'bhijātabodhisatvādhyāśayān pariśodhayamāno yāvad iti hi bodhisatva āsanadānaṃ dadānaḥ parityajan rājabhadrāsanāni vaiḍūryapādakāni siṃhapratiṣṭhitāni suvarṇasūtraratnajālavitānāny annekacīvarasparśopetaprajñaptāni sarvasāragandhavāsitopacārāṇi vicitramaṇirājasamucchritadhvajāny annekaratnakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrālaṃkāravyūhāni hemajālavitānavitatāni
T04sanssr_pu:678: evaṃ yāvad iti hi bodhisatvaś chatrāṇi dadānaḥ parityajan mahāratnavyūhapratimaṇḍitāni ratnadaṇḍāni kiṅkiṇījālasaṃchannāni |
T04sanssr_pu:679: ratnasūtrakarṇakaṇṭhāvalīvināmitavaiḍūryamaṇihārābhipralambitāni nandīghoṣamanojñaśabdopacārāṇi hemajālābhyantaraviśuddhachadanāni ratnaśalākālaṃkāraśatasahasravitatāni ratnakoṣasandhāritāny agurucandanāny ekasāravaragandhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasravidhūpitavāsitopacārāṇi jāmbunadaprabhāsvaraśuddhāni tādṛśānāṃ chatrāṇām annekakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrālaṃkārāṇāṃ tadatiriktāni cāsaṃkhyeyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrālaṃkārāṇy annapekṣacitto dadānaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:680: parityajann avasṛjann anuprayacchan saṃmukhībhūtebhyo vā satvasārebhyo nirvṛtānāṃ vā tathāgatānāṃ caityālaṃkārāya |
T04sanssr_pu:681: dharmaparyeṣṭaye bodhisatvakalyāṇamitrebhyo vābhijātabodhisatvadharmabhāṇakebhyo vā mātāpitṛbhyāṃ vā saṃgharatne vā sarvabuddhaśāsane vā yāvat sarvapratigrāhakebhyaḥ sa evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati ||
T04sanssr_pu:682: yathā tāvat prathamāyām eva pariṇāmanāyāṃ sarvakuśalamūlaprastāveṣūpadiṣṭaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:684: katham etāni kuśalamūlāni sarvajagadupajīvyāny upakāribhūtāni bhaveyur viśuddhadharmaparyavasānāni yena sarvasatvānām etaiḥ kuśalamūlair narakāpāyapratiprasrabdhir bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:686: sa tāni kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayann evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati |
T04sanssr_pu:687: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena sarvasatvānāṃ nayanaṃ bhaveyaṃ sarvaduṣkhaskandhavinivarttanāya |
T04sanssr_pu:704: maitracittaḥ premacittaḥ anugrahacitto hitacittaḥ sukhacittaḥ pariṇāmayati |
T04sanssr_pu:706: idaṃ mama kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasatvānāṃ gativiśuddhaye saṃvarteta |
T04sanssr_pu:716: anena me kuśalamūlena te sarvasatvāḥ sarvabuddhān ārāgayeyur ārāgayitvā ca mā virāgayeyuḥ
T04sanssr_pu:717: teṣu ca buddheṣu bhagavatsu prasādam abhedyaṃ pratilabheran |
T04sanssr_pu:718: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antike dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇuyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:725: mahatsu ca kuśalamūleṣv ātmānaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayeyur atyantaṃ ca dāridryaṃ vinivarttayeyuḥ sapta dhanapratilambhāṃś ca paripūrayeyuḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ cānuśikṣayeyuḥ kalyāṇendriyapratilambhaṃ cādhigaccheyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:733: yena ca sukhopadhānena sarvabuddhāḥ samanvāgatās tatsukhopadhānapratilabdhāḥ sarvasatvā bhaveyur iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:741: sarvasatvāḥ sarvarasāgrajihvā bhavantu rasanimittā grahītāraḥ sarvabuddhadharmacittanaprayuktāḥ avipannayānā agrayānā uttamayānāḥ śīghrayānā mahāyānāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:756: sarvasatvā bodhisatvapariṇāmanāvāsitā bhavantu sarvasatvāḥ sarvaśukladharmavāsitā bhavantu sarvākuśaladharmaprahīṇāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:764: sarvasatvā annantālokā bhavantu sarvabuddhadharmeṣu sarvasatvā apratihatāvabhāsā bhavantu sarvadharmadhātvekaspharaṇāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:774: sarvasatvā apramāṇabhājanā bhavantv ākāśadhātuvipulāḥ smṛtīndriyopetāḥ sarvalaukikalokottarabhāṣasaṃgrahaṇād grahaṇasmṛtyasaṃpramūḍhāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:784: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvāḥ kalyāṇamitrātyāgacittānutsṛṣṭā bhavantu kṛtajñāḥ kṛtānupālanatayā
T04sanssr_pu:796: mā bhūt tan mama kuśalamūlaṃ dharmajñānakauśalyaṃ vā yan na sarvasattvopajīvyaṃ syād iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:798: kuśalānāṃ ca cittacaitasikānānām anusmṛtir anusmṛtya ca bodhipariṇāmanā |
T04sanssr_pu:801: ye me utpatsyante kuśalāś cittotpādās tān annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmiṣyāmīti idam annāgatakauśalyaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:802: tad evaṃ caitasikenābhyāsena sarvatyāgādhimuktiṃ paripūrye tyāgacittavegāpannena kāyaprayogeṇotsṛṣṭasarvaparigrahaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:803: sarvaparigrahamūlād bhavaduṣkhād vimukto mukta ity ucyate |
T04sanssr_pu:804: annuttarāṃś cāprameyāsaṃkhyeyān kalpān nānākārānantān laukikalokottarān sukhasaṃpatpravarṣān anubhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:806: vaḍiṣāmiṣeneva svayam annabhigatopabhogenāpy ākṛṣya parān api tārayati ||
T04sanssr_pu:812: evam eṣām ātmabhāvādīnām utsṛṣṭānām api rakṣā kāryā |
T04sanssr_pu:821: evaṃrūpayā śāriputra hitaiṣikatayā samanvāgato bodhisatvo jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karotīti
T04sanssr_pu:823: śakaṭam iva bhārodvahanārthaṃ kevalaṃ dharmabuddhinā vāḍhavyam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:829: kalyāṇamitrasandhāritāḥ kulaputra bodhisatvā na patanti durgatiṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:831: kalyāṇamitrapraticchannā abhyudgatā bhavanti lokāt kalyāṇamitraparyupāsitā bodhisatvā asaṃpramoṣacāriṇo bhavanti sarvabodhisatvacaryāsu |
T04sanssr_pu:835: tasmāt tarhi kulaputra evaṃ manasikārāt pratipraśrabdhena kalyāṇamitrāṇy upasaṃkramitavyāni
T04sanssr_pu:853: kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīpratipannasya kulaputra bodhisatvasya buddhā bhagavanto 'bhirāddhacittā bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:857: ata evāryasudhanaḥ sāradhvajasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandyānnekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkrṭya sāradhvajaṃ bhikṣum avalokya praṇipatya punaḥ punar avalokayan niyataṃ praṇipatan namasyann avanaman manasi kurvan cintayan bhāvayan paribhāvayann udānam udānayan hākkāraṃ kurvan |
T04sanssr_pu:858: guṇān abhimukhīkurvan nigamayann atra sann anusmaran dṛḍhīkurvann avijahan manasāgamayann upanibadhnan praṇidhiṃ samavasaran darśanam abhilaṣan svaranimittam udgṛhṇan yāvat tasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:859: tathā kalyāṇamitrāgataṃ sarvajñatāṃ saṃpaśyann aśrumukho rudan yāvan meghasya dramitasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:861: iha śāriputra bodhisatvo dharmakāmatayā nāsti tal loke ratnaṃ yan na parityajati |
T04sanssr_pu:862: nāsti tat kāyopasthānaṃ yan na karoti |
T04sanssr_pu:864: nāsti tad vākkarma yan notsahate ācāryopādhyāyagauravatayā ||
T04sanssr_pu:868: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyacchedāyaiṣa dharmaḥ saṃvartatae iti ratnacittam utpādya bhaiṣajyacittam utpādya |
T04sanssr_pu:870: eṣṭavyaś cāsmābhiḥ sarvasatvānāṃ glānyavyupaśamāyaivaṃrūpo dharma iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:872: sacet punar gṛhapate pāṭhasvādhyāyārthiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid antikāc catuṣpādikāṃ gāthāṃ śṛṇuyād uddiśed vā udgṛhṇīyād dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāsaṃprayuktāṃ bodhisatvasaṃbhāropacayaṃ vā tena tasminn ācārye dharmagauravaṃ karaṇīyaṃ yāvadbhir nāmapadavyañjana ... gāthoddiṣṭā yadi tāvata evaṃ kalpāṃs tasyācāryasyopasthānaparicaryāṃ kuryād aśaṭhatayā sarvalābhasatkārapūjayā adyāpi gṛhapate na pratipūritam ācāryasyācāryagauravaṃ bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:875: kalyāṇamitreṣu ca tvayā kulaputra tīvraṃ gauravam utpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:877: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatva evaṃrūpair guṇair gauravamanasikārair gacchann anupūrveṇānyatamanagaram anuprāptas |
T04sanssr_pu:879: yan nv aham imam ātmabhāvaṃ vikrīyānena mūlyena dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya satkāraṃ kuryāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:880: dīrgharātraṃ hi mamātmabhāvasahasrāṇi bhagnāni kṣīṇāni vikrītāni punar aparimāṇe saṃsāre 'parimāṇāni yāni mayā kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānam anubhūtāni na punar evaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśa evaṃrūpāṇāṃ vā satvānāṃ satkārāya ||
T04sanssr_pu:881: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'ntarāyaṇamadhyagataḥ śabdam udīrayām āsa ghoṣam anuśrāvayām āsa |
T04sanssr_pu:882: kaḥ puruṣeṇārthikaḥ kaḥ puruṣeṇārthika iti peyālaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:883: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyān brāhmaṇagṛhapatikāṃs tathā samupasthāpayām āsa yathā taṃ ghoṣaṃ nāśrauṣuḥ
T04sanssr_pu:884: yadātmanaḥ krāyakaṃ na labhate tadaikāntaṃ gatvā prārodīd aśrūṇi ca prāvarttayad evaṃ cāvadad
T04sanssr_pu:885: | aho vatāsmākaṃ durlabhā lābhā ye vayam ātmabhāvasyāpi kretāraṃ na
T04sanssr_pu:887: atha khalu śakro devānām indro māṇavakarūpeṇa yāvat sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad avocat |
T04sanssr_pu:888: kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra dīnamanā utkaṇṭhitamānaso 'śrūṇi pravarttayamānaḥ sthitaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:890: ahaṃ māṇavaka dharmakāmatayā imam ātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya dharmapūjāṃ karttukāmaḥ so 'ham asya krāyakaṃ na labhe |
T04sanssr_pu:892: atha khalu sa māṇavakaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad avocat
T04sanssr_pu:893: | na mama kulaputra puruṣeṇa kṛtyam api tu khalu punaḥ pitur me yajño
T04sanssr_pu:895: tatra me puruṣasya hṛdayena kṛtyaṃ lohitena ca asthimajjayā ca
T04sanssr_pu:898: lābhā me sulabdhāḥ pariniṣpannaṃ cātmānaṃ jāne prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyeṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:899: yan mayātmanaḥ krāyako labdho hṛdaysya rudhirasya cāsthimajjāyāś ca ||
T04sanssr_pu:900: sa hṛṣṭacittaḥ kalyacittaḥ pramuditacittas taṃ māṇavakam etad avocat |
T04sanssr_pu:901: dāsyāmi māṇavaka yena te ita ātmabhāvād arthaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:902: yāvat sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ nisrāvayati sma dakṣiṇaṃ coruṃ viddhvā nirmāṃsaṃ ca kṛtvāsthi
T04sanssr_pu:904: atha khalv anyatarā śreṣṭhidārikopariprāsādatalagatādrākṣīt sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yāvat sā śreṣṭhidārikā yena sadāprarudito bodhisatvas tenopasaṃkramyaitad avocat |
T04sanssr_pu:905: kiṃ nu khalu tvaṃ kulaputraivaṃrūpām ātmanaḥ kāraṇāṃ kārayāsīti |
T04sanssr_pu:906: yāvat sā dārikā pūjāprayojanaṃ śrutvā punar āha |
T04sanssr_pu:907: kā punas te kulaputra tato guṇajātir niṣpatsyate |
T04sanssr_pu:909: sa dārike kulaputro mama prajñāpāramitām upāyakauśalyaṃ copadekṣayti |
T04sanssr_pu:910: tatra vayaṃ śikṣiṣyāmas tatra vayaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvasatvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:912: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvam etad avocat |
T04sanssr_pu:914: yāvad udārāḥ praṇītāś cāmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrttitāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:915: ekaikasyāpi kulaputraivaṃrūpasya dharmasyārthāya gaṅgānadīvālikopamān api kalpān evam ātmabhāvāḥ parityaktavyā bhaveyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:916: tathodārāḥ praṇītāś cāmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrttitāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:917: api tu khalu kulaputra yena yena kṛtyaṃ tat te dāsyāmi suvarṇaṃ vā maṇiṃ vā muktāṃ vā vaiḍūryaṃ vā yāvad yena tvaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisatvaṃ satkariṣyasi |
T04sanssr_pu:918: yāvad vistareṇa tayā dārikayā pañcaśataparivārayā sārddhaṃ tasya dharmodgatasya saṃkramaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:919: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ utthāyāsanāt svakaṃ gṛhaṃ prāvikṣat |
T04sanssr_pu:921: sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sapta varṣāṇi na kāmavitarkam utpādayām āsa |
T04sanssr_pu:922: na vyāpādavitarkaṃ na vihiṃsāvitarkam utpādayām āsa |
T04sanssr_pu:924: kadā nāma dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vyutthāsyati |
T04sanssr_pu:925: yad vayaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmāsanaṃ prajñāpayiṣyāmo yatrāsau kulaputro niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati taṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaṃ siktaṃ saṃmṛṣṭaṃ ca kariṣyāmo nānāpuṣpābhikīrṇaṃ iti cintayām āsa ||
T04sanssr_pu:926: tāny api śreṣṭhidārikā pramukhāṇi pañcadārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisatvasyānuśikṣamāṇāni dvābhyām everyāpathābhyāṃ kālam atināmayām āsuḥ
T04sanssr_pu:927: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo divyaṃ nirghoṣam aśrauṣīd itaḥ saptame divase dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'smāt samādher vyutthāya madhye nagarasya niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti |
T04sanssr_pu:928: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātas taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ śodhayām āsa sārddhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhaiḥ pañcabhir dārikāśatair dharmāsanaṃ prajñapayām āsa
T04sanssr_pu:930: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ sektukāmaś ca |
T04sanssr_pu:933: yathāpi nāma māreṇa pāpīyasā tat sarvam udakam antardhāpitaṃ apy eva nāmāsyodakam alabhamānasya cittaṃ duṣkhitaṃ syād daurmanasyaṃ ca bhavec cittasya vānyathātvaṃ bhaved yenāsya
T04sanssr_pu:934: kuśalamūlāntardhānaṃ bhaven na vā bhrājeran kuśalamūlāni |
T04sanssr_pu:935: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyaitad abhūt |
T04sanssr_pu:936: yan nv aham ātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhvā imaṃ pradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:939: mā rajodhātur ito dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya kāye nipatatu |
T04sanssr_pu:941: varaṃ khalu punar mamāyaṃ kāya evaṃrūpayā kriyayā vinaśyatu na ca niḥsāmarthyakriyayā |
T04sanssr_pu:942: kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bahūni me ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi punaḥ punar aparimāṇe saṃsāre saṃsarato bhinnāni |
T04sanssr_pu:943: yadi punar bhidyante kāmam evaṃrūpeṣv iva dharmasthāneṣu bhidyantāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:944: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatva iti pratisaṃkhyāya tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svakāyaṃ samantato viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svarudhireṇa sarvam asiñcat |
T04sanssr_pu:946: na ca sadāprarudito bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya tāsāṃ vā sarvāsāṃ dārikāṇāṃ cittasyānyathātvam abhūt |
T04sanssr_pu:949: kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣavo bodhisatvena mahāsatvena yāvajjīvaṃ na parityaktavyam api jīvitahetor iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:950: tad evaṃ kalyāṇamitrānutsargād ātmabhāvādīnāṃ rakṣādikaṃ kāryaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:951: sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadekṣaṇād bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni hi prāyaḥ sūtreṣv eva dṛśyante |
T04sanssr_pu:952: teṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu bodhisatvasamudācārā bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni prajñaptānīti vacanāt |
T04sanssr_pu:953: tasmāt tadannīkṣaṇe mā bhūd āpattim āpannasyāpy ajñānād aviratir iti sadā sūtradarśanāyādaraḥ kāryaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:954: tad anena kalyāṇamitrānutsargeṇa sūtrāntadarśanena ca sarvaḥ saddharmaparigraha ukto bhavati
T04sanssr_pu:957: dharmaḥ sūcyate tāsām akṣaraniruktīnāṃ yadā dhāraṇaṃ deśanā yāvad |
T04sanssr_pu:959: punar aparaṃ kulaputra ye te dharmabhāṇakā eṣām evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ deśayitāraḥ pratipattisārāś ca teṣām api dharmabhāṇakānāṃ yat sevanaṃ bhajanaṃ paryupāsanam utthānam upasthānaṃ gauravaṃ citrīkāraḥ śuśrūṣā ārakṣā parigrahaś cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāradānaṃ sādhukāradānaṃ svāmyārakṣā kuśalapakṣarakṣā varṇabhāṣaṇam avarṇapraticchādanatā |
T04sanssr_pu:963: adharme dharmavādināṃ ca pudgalānāṃ saha dharmeṇa nigrahaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:965: punar aparaṃ kulaputrāpratihatasantānasya sarvasatvapramokṣabuddher nirāmiṣacittasya parebhyo dharmadānam ayam api saddharmaparigrahaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:966: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yo dharmaśravaṇahetuko vā dharmadeśanāhetuko vāntaśa ekakramavyatihāro 'ntaśa ekocchvāsapraśvāso vā |
T04sanssr_pu:970: tasya yā nivāraṇā parirakṣā ekāgrībhāvo damaḥ śama upaśamo vinayo 'yam ucyate saddharmaparigrahaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:972: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yena dharmeṇa yo 'dharmaḥ pravartate tasya dharmasyāparigraho 'nnupādānam ayam api saddharmaparigraha ity ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:977: na śuddhir na vṛddhis [doubtful] tataś ca so 'pi na bodhisatva ity
T04sanssr_pu:980: yāny apīmāni bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni bodhisatvapraṇidhānāni tāny ekasmin mahāpraṇidhāne upanikṣiptāny antargatāny anupratiṣṭhāni yad uta saddharmaparigrahe |
T04sanssr_pu:983: syād yathāpi nāma devi mahābalavato 'pi puruṣasyālpo 'pi
T04sanssr_pu:986: evam eva devi mārasya pāpīyasaḥ parītto 'pi saddharmaparigraho vedhanīyo bhavati śokāvahaḥ paridevakaraś ca bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:987: nāhaṃ devi anyam ekam api dharmaṃ kuśalaṃ samanupaśyāmi mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ vedhanīyaṃ śokāvahaṃ paridevakaraṃ ca
T04sanssr_pu:990: syād yathāpi nāma devi sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvān kulaparvatān abhibhavann abhirocate ca samabhirocate coccatvena vipulatvena ca |
T04sanssr_pu:991: evam eva devi mahāyānikasya kāyajīvitanirapekṣasya na ca gṛhītacittasya saddharmaparigraho navayānasaṃprasthitānām api kāyajīvitasāpekṣāṇāṃ mahāyānikānāṃ sarvān kuśalān dharmān abhibhavatīty ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:993: parigṛhīto bhavatī jinebhir devebhi nāgebhi ca kinnarebhiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:996: sa śūnyakṣetreṣu na jātu jāyate sarvatra jātau ca jinaṃ sa paśyati |
T04sanssr_pu:997: dṛṣṭvā ca tasmiṃl labhate prasādaṃ saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām ||
T04sanssr_pu:998: jātismaro bhavati mahātmadharmā pravrajyalābhī bhavate punaḥ punaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1001: lābhī ca bhotī vidudhāraṇīye na naśyate kalpaśatebhi yacchubham |
T04sanssr_pu:1003: śakro 'tha brahmā tatha lokapālo manuṣyarājā bhuvi cakravarttī |
T04sanssr_pu:1004: sukhena saukhyena sa bodhi budhyate saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām ||
T04sanssr_pu:1005: dvātriṃśa kāye 'sya bhavanti lakṣaṇāḥ aninditāṅgo bhavate vicakṣaṇaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1006: na tasya tṛptiṃ labhi prekṣamāṇāḥ saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām ||
T04sanssr_pu:1007: na tasya saṃmuhyati bodhi cittaṃ na coddhuraḥ pāramitā carīṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:1008: asaṃgṛhītaḥ kuśalaḥ śatebhiḥ saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:1015: tatreti saddharmaparigrahe varttamānasyātmabhāvarakṣā cintyate yathā parān na nāśayet |
T04sanssr_pu:1016: idaṃ ca annarthavivarjanam āryagaganagañjasūtre saddharmadhāraṇodyatair bodhisatvair bhāṣitaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:1023: uccagghanāṃ tarjanāṃ ca avarṇam ayaśāṃsi ca |
T04sanssr_pu:1024: sarvāṃs tān marṣayiṣyāmo dhārayanta imaṃ nayam || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:1030: maitrīṃ teṣu kariṣyāmo ye dharmeṣv apratiṣṭhitāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1031: kāruṇyaṃ ca kariṣyāmo dhārayanta imaṃ nayam ||
T04sanssr_pu:1035: dūrato maitram eṣyāmo mā no ruṣyeta eva hi ||
T04sanssr_pu:1038: dānais tathāpi satkāraiḥ paripācyeha tān narān |
T04sanssr_pu:1042: dāntāḥ śāntāś ca muktāś ca grāme 'sminn avatīrya ca |
T04sanssr_pu:1044: sudūram api yāsyāmo dharmakāmān niśamya ca |
T04sanssr_pu:1046: saṃmukhaṃ tatra saṃdṛśya satvānāṃ skhalitaṃ pṛthu |
T04sanssr_pu:1048: asatkṛtāḥ satkṛtā vā merukalpāḥ prabhūya ca |
T04sanssr_pu:1052: badhakān yojayiṣyanti dharmeṣv eṣu hi vartatāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1053: ete dharmā na cāsmākaṃ saṃvidyante kathañcana ||
T04sanssr_pu:1054: asmākaṃ śramaṇānāṃ hi na ca śrāmaṇakā guṇāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1055: bhūtāṃ codana saṃśrutya idaṃ sūtraṃ pratikṣipan ||
T04sanssr_pu:1057: codanāṃ bhūtataḥ śrutvā saddharmaṃ te kṣipanti tam ||
T04sanssr_pu:1059: ceṣṭiṣyante tathā teṣāṃ kaścid dharmam imaṃ śṛṇot ||
T04sanssr_pu:1062: tasmin kāle vayaṃ kaṣṭe tyaktvā kāyaṃ sajīvitaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1068: ye cāpi rājñāṃ puruṣāḥ kuryāt te hi na saṃstavaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1070: adhimānīn na seveta [doubtful] vinayec cāgame sthitān |
T04sanssr_pu:1074: strīpaṇḍakāś ca ye satvāḥ saṃstavaṃ tair vivarjayet |
T04sanssr_pu:1075: kuleṣu cāpi vadhukāḥ kumāryaś ca vivarjayet ||
T04sanssr_pu:1076: na tāḥ saṃmodayej jātu kauśalyaṃ sādhu pṛcchitṛṃ [doubtful] |
T04sanssr_pu:1078: strīpoṣakāś ca ye satvā varjayet tehi saṃstavaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1079: naṭair jhallakamallebhir ye cānye tādṛśā janāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1080: vāramukhyān na seveta ye cānye bhogavṛttinaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1082: yadā ca dharmaṃ deśeyā mātṛgrāmasya paṇḍito |
T04sanssr_pu:1083: na caikaḥ praviśet tatra nāpi hāsyasthito bhaved iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:1084: ayaṃ cāparo 'nnartho bhaved yad idaṃ mārakarmoktaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1085: māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tasya bodhisatvasyāciraṃ yānasaṃprasthitasyāntike balavattaram udyogam āpatsyate
T04sanssr_pu:1087: punar aparam ānanda yasmin samaye bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bodhisatvasya viheṭhanam upasaṃharanti bhayaṃ saṃjanayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1089: apy eva nāmāyaṃ bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'vanīyeta vā romaharṣo vāsya bhaved iti |
T04sanssr_pu:1091: punar aparam anyavijñānasaṃjñino likhiṣyanti yāvat paryavāpsyanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1092: na vayam atrāsvādaṃ labhāmahe ity utthāyāsanāt prakramiṣyanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1093: evaṃ vijṛmbhamāṇā uccagghanto yāvat paryavāpsyantīti mārakarma |
T04sanssr_pu:1098: punar aparaṃ dharmabhāṇakaś chandiko bhaviṣyati imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lekhayituṃ
T04sanssr_pu:1101: dharmabhāṇakaś ca deśāntaraṃ gantukāmo bhaviṣyati dhārmaśravaṇikāś ca neti neyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1104: saṃkṣepād dharmabhāṇakadhārmaśravaṇikayor yā kācid vidhuratā sarvaṃ tan mārakarmety uktaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:1109: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisatva āraṇyako bhavati prāntaśayyāsanābhirato 'lpecchuḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ pravivikto 'saṃsṛṣṭo
T04sanssr_pu:1111: so 'lpārthatayālpakṛtyatayā ca sukhaṃ viharati na ca bāhaśrutyaparyeṣṭāv abhiyukto bhavati na satvaparipākāya na ca
T04sanssr_pu:1112: dharmaśravaṇe vā dharmasāṃkathhye vārthaviniścayakathāyāṃ vā vartamānāyāṃ saṃkramitavyaṃ manyate
T04sanssr_pu:1115: tasyāraṇyavāsena caikārāmaratitayā ca kleśā na samudācaranti |
T04sanssr_pu:1118: sa tatra nātmārthāya pratipanno bhavati na parārthāya |
T04sanssr_pu:1119: ayaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvasyāraṇyavāsapratisaṃyuktaḥ saptamo mārāṅkuśa iti || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:1120: punar aparaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ kalyāṇamitrapratirūpakāṇi pāpamitrāṇi sevate bhajate paryupāste
T04sanssr_pu:1121: ye hy enaṃ saṃgrahavastubhyo vicchandya puṇyasaṃbhārāt saddharmaparigrahād vicchandya praviveke niyojayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1124: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vivekavāsena mahāyāne 'bhyudgacchet tasmin samaye taṃ bodhisatvaṃ vaiyāvṛtyapalibodhe niyojayanti vaiyāvṛtyaṃ bodhisatvenāvaśyaṃ karaṇīyaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1125: yasmiṃś ca samaye bodhisatvo vaiyāvṛtye saṃniyojayitavyas tasmin samaye viveke niyojayanti
T04sanssr_pu:1128: sacet tvam aṣṭābhir navabhir vā kalpair annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ nābhisaṃbhotsyase |
T04sanssr_pu:1129: na bhūyaḥ śakyasy annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum |
T04sanssr_pu:1132: vīryeṇa sthānaṃ khalu punar etad vidyate yan nirvāṇaphalaṃ prāpnuyād |
T04sanssr_pu:1135: ye 'pi tato 'nye bodhisatvayānīyāḥ pudgalā mārāṅkuśāviddhāḥ pratyaveteṣu dharmeṣu caranti taiḥ sārddhaṃ ratiṃ vindati |
T04sanssr_pu:1136: tathā hi tadanuvarttakā bhavanti sa hīnasevī viśeṣam annadhigato hīnagatiṃ gacchati yad uta dhanvagatiṃ jaḍaiḍamūkagatiṃ yāvad ekādaśo mārāṅkuśa iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:1137: yena caivaṃ saṃtatyārabdhavīryasya nirvedāt sarvathā bodhisatvabhāva eva bhavaty ata eva ratnameghe 'bhihitaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1139: tathā cārabhate yathā na kāyakhedaṃ saṃjanayati |
T04sanssr_pu:1146: 'tivelāyāṃ vāparipakvādhimukter vā duṣkarakarmārambhas tad yathā svamāṃsadānādiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1149: | anyathā hi teṣām eva satvānāṃ bodhisatvakhedena bodhicittavījanāśān mahataḥ phalarāśer nāśaḥ syāt ||
T04sanssr_pu:1152: nāpy akāla ity ātmabhāvatyāgacittam eva notpādyābhyāsānārambhād dhi na kadācid dadyāt |
T04sanssr_pu:1153: tasmād evaṃ smṛtim upāsthāpya bodhicittaparipācanavirodhibhyo mohāt svārthaghātibhyaḥ piśitāśanebhyaḥ karmakāribhyaś cātmabhāvo rakṣitavyaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1158: kathaṃ ca kulaputrātra bodhisatvo mārakarmaparihāropāyakuśalo bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:1160: apratirūpadeśavāsaṃ lokāyatamantrasevanabhāvanāṃ lābhasatkārapūjopasthānabahumānaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayati |
T04sanssr_pu:1161: ye cānye upakleśā bodhipakṣyamārgāntarāyikās tān sarveṇa sarvaṃ parivarjayati |
T04sanssr_pu:1171: tena ca kulaputraitāni sthānāni parivarjayatā na teṣāṃ pudgalānām antike duṣṭacittam utpādayitavyaṃ na pratighacittaṃ nāvamanyanācittam utpādayitavyam |
T04sanssr_pu:1173: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā dhātuśaḥ satvāḥ kāmādidhātuṃ āsravanti jāyante saṃsyandante saṃsargāc ca vinaśyanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1175: bodhicittasaṃpramoṣo 'py annarthaḥ tasya ca hetur ukto ratnakūṭe |
T04sanssr_pu:1176: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya bodhicittaṃ muhyati |
T04sanssr_pu:1179: mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ ca satvānām avarṇāyaśo 'kīrtyalokaniścāraṇatayā māyāśāṭhyena ca param upacarati nādhyāyāśayeneti asya vivarjanam atroktaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1180: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasya sarvāsu jātiṣu jātamātrasya bodhicittam āmukhībhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:1183: yad uta jīvitahetor api saṃprajānan mṛṣāvādaṃ na prabhāṣate |
T04sanssr_pu:1185: adhyāśayena ca sarvasatvānām antike tiṣṭhaty apagatamāyāśāṭhyatayā sarvabodhisatveṣu ca śāstṛsaṃjñām utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:1187: yāṃś ca satvān paripācayati tān sarvān annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayati |
T04sanssr_pu:1191: na jātu dharmadānasya antarāyaṃ karoti yaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1195: bodhicittaṃ na riñcati tena sarvāsu jātiṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:1200: samādāyeti bodhāya tena cittaṃ na riñcati ||
T04sanssr_pu:1202: caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvaḥ praṇidhānān na calati || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:1203: nihatamānaś ca bhavatīrṣyamātsaryaparivarjakaś ca bhavati parasaṃpadaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā āttamanā bhavatīti |
T04sanssr_pu:1204: idam eva pātrabodhicittasya sphuṭataram asaṃpramoṣakāraṇaṃ yat tatraiva ratnakūṭe 'bhihitam
T04sanssr_pu:1208: ārocayāmi prativedayāmi vo yathā yathā bahulu vitarkayen naraḥ tathā tathā bhavati tannimnacittaḥ tehī vitarkehi tanniśritehīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:1209: avasādo 'py annartha etadvarjanaṃ ca ratnameghe dṛṣṭaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1212: idaṃ ca me vīryaṃ parīttaṃ ca kusīdo 'haṃ bodhiś cādīptaśiraścailopamena bahūn
T04sanssr_pu:1215: tan nāham utsahae īdṛśaṃ bhāram udvoḍhuṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1218: 'bhisaṃbuddhās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ye cābhisaṃbuddhyante ye
T04sanssr_pu:1222: aham api tathā tathā ghaṭiṣye tathā tathā vyāyaṃsye sarvasatvasādhāraṇena vīryeṇa sarvasatvārambaṇena vīryeṇa yathāham annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyae iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:1224: aparipāciteṣu satveṣu viśvāso bodhisatvasya skhalitaṃ abhājanībhūteṣu satveṣūdārabuddhadharmasaṃprakāśanāt bodhisatvasya skhalitaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1225: udārādhimuktikeṣu satveṣu hīnayānasaṃprakāśanād bodhisatvasya skhalitam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:1226: samyaksmṛtyupasthiteṣu śīlavatsu kalyāṇadharmeṣu prativimānanā duḥśīlapāpadharmasaṃgrahā bodhisatvasya skhalitam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:1229: yasya adhimukti na vidyati buddhadharmagaṇe ca na tasya dhimuktiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1230: śikṣavrateṣu na tasya dhimuktiḥ pāpamates tirapāyamukhasya ||
T04sanssr_pu:1231: sa itaś cyuto manujeṣu karmavaśād abudho hi vimūḍhaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1232: narakeṣv atha tiryagatīṣu pretagatīṣu ca vindati duṣkham ||
T04sanssr_pu:1235: tatra tathāgata eva sākṣīti kṛtvā na pratikṣipati |
T04sanssr_pu:1238: annantā buddhabodhir nānādhimuktikatayā tathāgatānāṃ satveṣu dharmadeśanā pravarttatae iti
T04sanssr_pu:1241: tathāgatapūjāyāṃ ca vaiyāvṛtyam upadiṣṭaṃ tatra yā vṛttiḥ sā ratnarāśisūtrād āgatā |
T04sanssr_pu:1242: tatra vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā sarvabhikṣusaṃghasya cittam abhirādhayitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1243: tatra ye bhikṣava āraṇyakāḥ prāntaśayyāsanikās teṣāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1244: vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā sarveṇa sarvaṃ na karmasamutthānaṃ dātavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1245: yadi punar āraṇyakasya bhikṣoḥ saṃghaparyāpannaṃ śaikṣakaṃ karma prāpnuyāt |
T04sanssr_pu:1247: anyataro vā bhikṣur adhyeṣyo na punaḥ sa āraṇyako bhikṣur utpīḍayitavyas tatra yo bhikṣuḥ piṇḍacāriko bhavati tasya tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā praṇītabhojaneṣu saṃvibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ tatra kāśyapa yo bhikṣur yogācārī bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:1248: tasya tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇānulomikāny upakaraṇāny upasaṃhartavyāni glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāś ca |
T04sanssr_pu:1249: yasmiṃś ca pradeśe sa yogācārī bhikṣuḥ prativasati tasmin pradeśe na uccaśabdaḥ kartavyaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:1252: praṇītāni ca saṃpriyāṇi yogācārabhūmyanukūlāni khādanīyabhojanīyāny upanāmayitavyāni || pe
T04sanssr_pu:1253: ye bhikṣavo bāhuśrutye 'bhiyuktā bhavanti teṣām utsāho dātavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1258: sāṃkathyamaṇḍalaṃ viśodhayitavyaṃ yāvat sādhukārabahulena cāsya bhavitavyaṃ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:1260: kiyat parīttam api kāryaṃ saṃghamatena kartavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1261: na svamatena yāvan na sāṃghikaś cāturdiśasāṃghikena saṃsṛṣṭaḥ kartavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1263: yadi cāturdiśe saṃghe vaikalyaṃ bhavet sāṃghikaś ca lābha utsado bhavet tena vaiyāvṛtyakareṇa bhikṣuṇā bhikṣusaṃgham ekamānasaṃ kṛtvā |
T04sanssr_pu:1265: evaṃ stūpe 'pi pralugne 'yam eva vidhir dāyakān dānapatīn vā samādāpya pratisaṃskartavya ity ājñā |
T04sanssr_pu:1266: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa kiyad bahur api staupiko lābho bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:1267: sa vaiyākṛtyakareṇa na saṃghena cāturdiśasaṃghe upanāmayitavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1269: yā staupikā antaśa ekadaśāpi śrāddhaiḥ prasādabahulair niryātitā bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:1271: kaḥ punar vādo ratnaṃ vā ratnasaṃmataṃ vā yac ca stūpe cīvaraṃ niryātitaṃ bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:1272: tat tatraiva tathāgatacaitye vātātapavṛṣṭibhiḥ parikṣayaṃ gacchatu |
T04sanssr_pu:1273: na punaḥ staupikaṃ cīvaraṃ hiraṇyamūlyena parivartayitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1274: na hi staupikasya kaścid argho nāpi stūpasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ yo hi kaścit kāśyapa vaiyāvṛtyakaro bhikṣū ruṣṭacittaḥ śīlavatāṃ dakṣiṇīyānām [doubtful] aiśvaryād ājñaptiṃ dadāti sa tenākuśalena karmaṇā
T04sanssr_pu:1276: yadi manuṣyalokam āgacchati dāso bhavati parakarmakaro lābhī ca bhavati khaṭacapeṭapracaṇḍaprahārāṇāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:1278: daṇḍakarmabhayatarjitaṃ bhikṣuṃ karoty akālapreṣaṇam akālajñaptiṃ dadāti |
T04sanssr_pu:1279: sa tenākuśalena karmaṇā bahuśaṅkur nāma pratyekanarakas tatrāsyopapattir bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:1285: tasya tatra jihvendriye bahūni śaṅkuśatasahasrāṇi ādīptāni ayomayāni nikhātāni bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1286: yo hi kaścit kāśyapa vaiyavṛtyakaro bhikṣur āgatāgataṃ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ sannidhiṃ karoti na kālānukālaṃ dadāti |
T04sanssr_pu:1289: sa tenākuśalamūlena jaṅghā nāma gūthamṛtikāpretayonis tatrāsyopapattir bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:1291: sa udvaśyamānas tadbhojanam animiṣābhyāṃ netrābhyāṃ paśyamānaḥ kṣutpipāsāparigato duṣkhāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:1292: vedanāṃ vetti na ca varṣasahasreṇāpi tasya bhojanasya lābhī bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:1293: yad api kadācit karhicid bhojanaṃ labdhaṃ bhavati tad uccāraṃ bhavati pūyaśoṇitaṃ veti ||
T04sanssr_pu:1295: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ kuḍyākārāṃs te bhikṣava āsan |
T04sanssr_pu:1298: yāṃs tvaṃ saṃgharakṣita satvān adrākṣīḥ stambhākārāṃs te bhikṣava āsan |
T04sanssr_pu:1301: yāṃs tvaṃ satvān adrākṣīr vṛkṣākārān patrākārān phalākārān te 'pi bhikṣava āsan |
T04sanssr_pu:1302: tair api sāṃghikāni vṛkṣapatrapus.paphalāni paudgalikaparibhogena paribhuktāni tena te vṛkṣapatrapuṣpaphalākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1303: yāṃs tvaṃ satvān adrākṣī rajjvākārān saṃmārjanyākārāṃs te bhikṣava āsan |
T04sanssr_pu:1304: taiḥ sāṃghikā rajjusammārjanyaḥ paudgalikaparibhogena paribhuktās tena rajjvākārāḥ sammārjanyākārāś ca saṃvṛttāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1305: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīs taṭṭākāraṃ sa śrāmaṇeraka āsīt |
T04sanssr_pu:1308: tair asau dṛṣṭaś ca pṛṣṭaś ca śrāmaṇeraka kim ayaṃ saṃghasya pānakaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:1310: kiṃ na paśyatha taṭṭukaṃ nirmāditaṃ pītaṃ pānakam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:1311: te vṛttā veleti nairāśyam āpannā hīnadīnavadanāḥ prakrāntāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1312: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena taṭṭukākāraḥ saṃvṛttāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1313: yaṃ tvam satvam adrākṣīr udūkhalākāraṃ so 'pi bhikṣur āsīt |
T04sanssr_pu:1316: sa tenoktaḥ śrāmaṇeraka dadasva me khalistākaṃ kuṭṭayitveti |
T04sanssr_pu:1318: sthavira tiṣṭha tāvan muhūrtaṃ vyagro 'smi paścāt kuṭṭayitvā dāsyāmīti |
T04sanssr_pu:1320: śrāmaṇeraka yadi mama kalpate udūkhalaṃ spraṣṭuṃ tvām evāham udūkhale prakṣipya kuṭṭayeyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:1324: yady aham asmai prativacanaṃ dāsyāmi bhūyasyā mātrayā prakopam āpatsyatīti tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:1329: jāne tvāṃ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravrajitaṃ śrāmaṇerakaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1332: yady apy evaṃ tathāpi tu yan mayā pravrajitena karaṇīyaṃ tat kṛtaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1337: apy eva nāma etat karmaparikṣayaṃ tanutvaṃ paryādānaṃ gacched iti |
T04sanssr_pu:1338: tenātyayam atyayato na deśitaṃ tena karmaṇodūkhalākāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1341: te bhaiṣajyāni kvāthayanto bhikṣubhir apriyam uktāḥ taiś cittaṃ pradūṣya sthālyo bhinnāḥ tena sthālyākārāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1342: yaṃ tvaṃ satvam adrākṣīr madhye chinnaṃ tantunā dhāryamāṇaṃ so 'pi bhikṣur āsīl lābhī grāhikaḥ tena mātsaryābhibhūtena lābhaḥ saṃparivartitaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1344: yas tu haimantikaḥ sa vārṣikaḥ pariṇāmitaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1345: tasya karmaṇo vipākena madhye chinnas tantunā dhāryamāṇo gacchati ||
T04sanssr_pu:1351: yābhir mūlāpattibhiḥ kṣatriyo mūrddhābhiṣiktaḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhāṣayati
T04sanssr_pu:1355: yaḥ kulaputra mūrddhābhiṣiktaṃ staupikaṃ vastv apaharati sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā niryātitaṃ vā
T04sanssr_pu:1358: yaḥ punar dharmaṃ pratikṣipati śrāvakaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratyekabuddhaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā mahāyānaniryāṇabhāṣitaṃ vā pratikṣipati pratiṣedhayatīyaṃ dvitīyā mūlāpattiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1359: yaḥ punar mām uddiśya śirastuṇḍamuṇḍakāṣāyavastraprāvṛtaḥ śikṣādhārī vā śikṣādhārī vā tasya duḥśīlasya vā śīlavato vā kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy apaharati apaharāyati |
T04sanssr_pu:1360: gṛhasthaṃ vā karoti kāye daṇḍaiḥ praharati cārake vā prakṣipati jīvitena vā viyojayatīyaṃ tṛtīyā mūlāpattiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1361: yaḥ punaḥ kṣatriyaḥ saṃcintya mātaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati pitaram arhantaṃ bhagavacchrāvakaṃ vā jīvitād vyaparopayati samagraṃ vā saṃghaṃ bhinatti tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya saṃcintya duṣṭacitto rudhiram utpādayati ||
T04sanssr_pu:1362: ebhiḥ pañcabhir ānantaryair karmabhir anyatarānyataraṃ karmotpādayatīyaṃ caturthī mūlāpattiḥ
T04sanssr_pu:1364: daśākuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate 'nyāṃś ca bahūn satvān daśasv akuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayati vinayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayatīyaṃ pañcamī
T04sanssr_pu:1366: yaḥ punar grāmabhedaṃ janapadabhedaṃ nagarabhedaṃ rāṣṭrabhedaṃ karotīyaṃ mūlāpattiḥ || pe
T04sanssr_pu:1367: ādikarmiṇāṃ mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vāṣṭau mūlāpattayo |
T04sanssr_pu:1368: yābhir mūlāpattibhiḥ skhalitā ādikarmikā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ sarvāṇi pūrvāvaropitāni kuśalamūlāni jhāṣayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1369: vastupatitāḥ parājitā devamanuṣyamahāyānamukhād apāyagāmino bhavanti ciraṃ ca saṃsāre sīdanti kalyāṇamitravirahitāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1371: ye satvāḥ pūrvaduścaritahetunāsmin kliṣṭe pañcakaṣāye loke upapannās tae itvarakuśalamūlāḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃniḥśrityedaṃ paramaṃ gambhīraṃ mahāyānaṃ śṛṇvanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1372: te ca parīttabuddhayo 'pi kulaputrā annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1373: teṣāṃ ādikarmikā ye ca bodhisatvā idaṃ paramagambhīraṃ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śṛṇvanti uddiśanti paṭhanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1374: te yathāśrutaṃ yathāparyavāptaṃ pareṣāṃ pūrvabuddhisadṛśānāṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ vistareṇāgrataḥ smārayanti prakāśayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1375: te hy akṛtaśamā bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śṛṇvanta uttrasyanti saṃtrasyanti saṃtrāsam āpadyante |
T04sanssr_pu:1376: te saṃtrāsena vivarttayanty annuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheś cittaṃ śrāvakayāne cittaṃ praṇidadhati
T04sanssr_pu:1378: yayā mūlāpattyā sa kulaputraḥ sarvaṃ pūrvāvaropitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ jhāṣayati |
T04sanssr_pu:1381: tasmād bodhisatvena mahāsatvena parapudgalānām āśayānuśayaṃ prathamaṃ jñātvā yathāśayānāṃ satvānām anupūrveṇa dharmadeśanā kartavyā |
T04sanssr_pu:1384: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid eva vakṣyati ||
T04sanssr_pu:1385: na tvaṃ śakyasi ṣaṭpāramitāsu caryāṃ cartuṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1386: na tvaṃ śakyasy annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1387: śīghraṃ tvaṃ śrāvakayāne pratyekabuddhayāne vā cittam utpādaya |
T04sanssr_pu:1389: yāvad yathāpūrvoktam iyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya dvidyā mūlāpattiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1390: punar aparam ādikarmiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid evaṃ vakṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:1392: śīlena surakṣitena śīghraṃ tvam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayasva |
T04sanssr_pu:1394: yat te kiñcit kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kleśapratyayād akuśalaṃ karma samudānītaṃ tena pāṭhena śuddhir bhavaty avipākaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1395: yāvad yathāpūrvoktam ayam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya tṛtīyā mūlāpattiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1396: punar aparaṃ kulaputra keṣāñcid ādikarmiko bodhisatva evaṃ vakṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:1398: mā śṛṇuta mā paṭhata mā pareṣām upadiśata |
T04sanssr_pu:1400: na yūyaṃ tasmāt mahat phalaṃ prāpsyatha |
T04sanssr_pu:1401: na yūyaṃ tato nidānāc chaktāḥ kleśāntaṃ kartuṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1403: śṛṇuta mahāyānaṃ paṭhata mahāyānaṃ pareṣāṃ copadiśata |
T04sanssr_pu:1406: yadi te tasya vacanakāriṇo bhavantīdṛśaṃ dṛṣṭigatam upagṛhṇīyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1407: ubhayor api mūlāpatir bhavatīyam ādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya caturthī mūlāpattiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1408: punar aparam ādikarmikā bodhisatvā dvijihvikā bhavanti anyathā nidarśayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1409: idaṃ ca mahāyānaṃ kīrtiśabdaślokārthaṃ lābhasatkārahetoḥ paṭhanti svādhyāyanti dhārayanti vācayanti deśayanti pareṣāṃ ca śrutamātram upadiśanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1412: te pareṣām īrṣyāyanti lābhasatkārahetor yatas te labhante upabhogaparibhogān parebhyas tatpratyayāt te prakupyanti teṣāṃ cāvarṇaṃ niścārayanti kutsanti paṃsayanti vijugupsanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1414: atas te īrṣyahetunā cottarimanuṣyadharmair ātmānaṃ vijñapayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1415: tatas te tena vastunā patitāḥ parājitā mahāyānasukhād etāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante yayāpāyagāmino bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1416: yathā kaścit puruṣo ratnadvīpaṃ gacched gantuṃ nāvā samudram avatarate sa mahāsamudre svayam eva tāṃ nāvaṃ bhindyāt tatraiva maraṇaṃ nigacched |
T04sanssr_pu:1417: evam eva ye ādikarmikā bodhisatvā mahāguṇasāgaram avatartukāmā īrṣyāhetos tad vadanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1418: tatpratyayāt te śraddhānāvaṃ bhittvā prajñājīvitena viyogaṃ prāpnuvanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1419: evaṃ te bālā ādikarmikā bodhisatvā īrṣyāhetor annṛtapratyayā mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante
T04sanssr_pu:1421: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bhaviṣyanty annāgate 'dhvani gṛhasthapravrajitā ādikarmikā bodhisatvā ye te gambhīrāḥ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ sūtrāntādhāraṇīkṣāntisamādhibhūmisvalaṃkṛtamahāvidvatpuruṣāṇāṃ kṛtaśramāṇāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ gocarās tān mahāyānasūtrāntān dhārayanti
T04sanssr_pu:1422: paṭhanti svādhyāyanti pareṣāṃ ca vistareṇa vācayitvā prakāśayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1423: ahaṃ cemān dharmān svabuddhyā buddhvaivaṃ ca punar ahaṃ kāruṇyahetos tavopadiśāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:1424: tvayā vā punas tathā bhāvayitavyaṃ yathā tvam atra gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu pratyakṣo bhaviṣyasi
T04sanssr_pu:1425: evaṃ te jñānadarśanaṃ bhaviṣyati yathā mama |
T04sanssr_pu:1426: etarhi na punar eva dadāti paṭhitamātreṇāham imān evaṃrūpān dharmān gambhīragambhīrān upadiśāmi na sākṣātkriyayā ||
T04sanssr_pu:1428: tatpratyayāt sarvatryadhvagatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhisatvānām āryapudgalānāṃ ca purataḥ sāparādhiko bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:1434: tad yathā kaścit puruṣo mahāṭavīṃ prasthitaḥ kṣuttarṣaprapīḍitaḥ sa tatra mahāphalavṛkṣe pratiṣṭhitaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:1435: āhārārthaṃ sa udāraphalavṛkṣam apahāya gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam annāsvādya viṣavṛkṣam abhiruhya viṣaphalāni bhuñjīta bhuktvā ca kālaṃ kuryāt |
T04sanssr_pu:1437: ye durlabhaṃ manuṣyalābhaṃ labdhvā kalyāṇamitraṃ sanniśritya mahāyānam avatartukāmā lābhasatkārayaśohetor ātmānam upadarśayanti parān paṃsayanti evaṃrūpāṃ mahāgurukām āpattim āpadyante yayā gurukayāpattyā sarvavijñānāṃ paramajugupsitā bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1438: apāyagāminas tathārūpāś ca pudgalā na sevanīyāḥ sarvakṣatriyabrāhmaṇaviṭśūdrāṇāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1439: yaś ca tān sevate sa sātisāro bhavati sarvavijñānāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1441: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bhaviṣyanty annāgate 'dhvani kṣatriyāṇāṃ purohitacaṇḍālā amātyacaṇḍālā bhaṭacaṇḍālā mūrkhāḥ paṇḍitamānino mahādhanā mahābhogāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1442: bahuvidheṣu dānamayapuṇyakriyāvastuṣu saṃdṛśyante te tyāgamadamattā mānamadadarpeṇa kṣatriyaṃ vibhedayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1446: tenopadraveṇa te bhikṣavaḥ paudgalikaṃ vā sāṃghikaṃ vā cāturdiśasāṃghikaṃ vā staupikaṃ vā śramaṇair apahṛtya teṣāṃ prāhṛtaṃ pradāpyante |
T04sanssr_pu:1449: ye kṣatriyacaṇḍālāḥ śramaṇaiḥ sārddhaṃ praduṣyanti tathārūpaṃ ca te dharmaṃ prajñapayiṣyanti
T04sanssr_pu:1452: mahākaruṇānetrīprajñāpāramitaśikṣopāyakauśalyaśikṣāḥ yāś cāpareṣu sūtreṣu śikṣā upadiṣṭās tā apahāya |
T04sanssr_pu:1453: tathārūpāṃ dharmayuktiṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ viheṭhanārthapūrvakaṃ kriyākāraṃ prajñapayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1457: tena ca hetunā bhikṣūṇām apy upaśāntāḥ kleśā nopaśamyanti na tanūbhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1458: tatkāle punas te bhikṣava āśayavipannā bhavanti śīlavipannāś ca bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1459: ācāravipannā bhavanti dṛṣṭivipannā bhavanti taddhetoḥ śaithilikā bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1463: te bhūyasyā mātrayā saparicārasya kṣatriyasya satkṛtā bhavanti mānitāḥ pūjitā bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1464: te ca prahāṇābhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ gṛhastheṣv avarṇaṃ niścārayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1465: sa ca kṣatriyaḥ saparivāraḥ prahāṇābhiyuktānāṃ bhikṣūṇām antike praduṣyati avadhyāyati |
T04sanssr_pu:1466: yas tatra prahāṇikānāṃ bhikṣūṇām upabhogaparibhogas taṃ svādhyāyābhiratānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ niryātayanti
T04sanssr_pu:1477: yadi te bodhisatvā ākāśagarbhasya bodhisatvasya nāma śrutvā darśanam asyākāṅkṣeran |
T04sanssr_pu:1479: yadi te ākāśagarbhaṃ bodhisatvaṃ namaḥkuryuḥ nāma cāsya parikīrttayeyus teṣāṃ sa kulaputro yathā bhāgyatayā svarūpeṇāgratas tiṣṭhati brāhmaṇarūpeṇa yāvad dārikārūpeṇa purataḥ
T04sanssr_pu:1481: tasyādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya yathā samutthitās tā āpattīḥ pratideśayati |
T04sanssr_pu:1484: yadi teṣāṃ saṃmukhaṃ darśanaṃ na dadāti |
T04sanssr_pu:1486: tenādikarmikeṇa bodhisatvena sāparādhena paścime yāme utthāyāsanāt prāṅmukhena sthitvā dhūpaṃ dhūpayitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1489: aruṇa aruṇa mahākṛpa mahābhāga mahoditas tvaṃ jambudvīpe māṃ karuṇayāchādayasva |
T04sanssr_pu:1490: śīghram ākāśagarbhaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ mama vacanena bodhaya |
T04sanssr_pu:1491: mama svapnāntare tam upāyam upadarśaya yenāham upāyenāpattiṃ pratideśayāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:1493: tena tatkālaṃ śayyāyāṃ nidrāpayitavyaṃ sahodgate 'ruṇe iha jambudvīpe ākāśagarbhasya bodhisatvasyeha samāgamo bhavati svarūpeṇa ca |
T04sanssr_pu:1494: tasyādikarmikasya bodhisatvasya svapnāntare purataḥ sthitvā tāṃ mūlāpattiṃ deśayati mahāyānopāyena
T04sanssr_pu:1496: yenopāyakauśalyena sa ādikarmiko bodhisatvas tatraiva bodhicittāsaṃpramoṣaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate sudṛḍhavyavasthitaś ca bhavati mahāyānae ity ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:1497: atha vā yo 'tra sūtre 'dhyeṣaṇamantraḥ pūrvam uktaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1500: araṇye upavane 'bhyavakāśe vāgaraṃ vā tagaraṃ vā kālānusāri vā dhūpayitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1501: prāñjalinā ca bhūtvā samantato digvidikṣu ca pañcamaṇḍalakena vanditvā ime mantrapadāḥ pravartayitavyāḥ
T04sanssr_pu:1510: murara vegadhāri namucame bhujayata kāruṇika cintāmaṇi pūraya kāruṇika sarvāśāṃ me sthāpaya
T04sanssr_pu:1518: yadi kṣatriyādayo 'pi bodhisatvāḥ katham eṣām āpattiniyamo 'nyeṣāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:1522: kathaṃ vā taddoṣāt sāmvarikā api gṛhyante |
T04sanssr_pu:1524: yeṣāṃ yatra bahulaṃ saṃbhavaḥ te tatrākoṭitāḥ svanāmagrahaṇadarśanād bhayotpādanārthaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1525: paraḥparatas tu sarvaiḥ sarvā āpattayaḥ parihartavyāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1526: yena vā prakṛtimahāsāvadyatayāsamādāno 'py abhavyo bhavaty ucchinnakuśalamūlaś ca sutarāṃ tena sāmvarikā ity alam anayā cintayā ||
T04sanssr_pu:1528: kiṃ vāpi kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ prātimokṣaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ kalpaśatasahasram api mūlaphalabhakṣaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:1530: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiś ca manasikārair vihared iyaṃ bodhisatvasya gurukā mūlāpattiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1531: tad yathā kulaputra śrāvakayānīyo mūlāpattim āpannaḥ so 'bhavyas tair eva skandhaiḥ parinirvātum
T04sanssr_pu:1532: evam eva kulaputro 'pratideśyaitām āpattim aniḥsṛjya tān
T04sanssr_pu:1534: āsāṃ ca mūlāpattīnāṃ sukhagrahaṇadhāraṇārtham ekīyamatānāṃ ca saṃgrahakārikā ucyante ||
T04sanssr_pu:1548: daṇḍāpayed vā śramaṇān dadyād vā śaraṇatrayāt ||
T04sanssr_pu:1549: gṛhṇīyād dīyamānaṃ vā śamathe tyājanāt punaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1559: yo mahābrahman mamoddiśya pravrajito duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣur anubhūtaḥ kaśambakajāto 'śramaṇaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:1562: atha ca punaḥ sa duḥśīlapāpasamācāro bhikṣur adyāpi sarvadevānāṃ yāvat sarvamanuṣyāṇāṃ yāvat puṇyanidhīnāṃ darśayitā bhavati kalyāṇamitraṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1563: kiṃ cāpi sa apātrībhūtaḥ tena ca punaḥ śirastuṇḍamuṇḍena kāṣāyavastraprāvaraṇeryāpathena darśanahetunāpi bahūnāṃ satvānāṃ vividhakuśalamūlopastambhanakaraḥ sugatimārgadarśako bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:1564: tasmād yo mamoddiśya pravrajitaḥ śīlavān duḥśīlo vā tasya nānujānāmi cakravarttir ājñām api yan mamoddiśya pravrajitasya sahadharmeṇāpi kāye daṇḍaprahāraṃ vā dātuṃ cārake vā prakṣeptuṃ aṅgam aṅgaṃ vikarttanaṃ vā kartuṃ jīvitād vā vyaparopaṇaṃ kartuṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1567: atha ca punaḥ sa pudgalo gorocanakastūrikāsadṛśa iti |
T04sanssr_pu:1569: ye mamoddiśya pravrajitān yānabhūtān pātrabhūtān vā viheṭhayiṣyanti te sarveṣāṃ tryadhvagatānāṃ buddhānām atīva sāparādhā bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1575: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bahūni śrāvakaniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni ca bodhisatvaniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bhagavato 'ntike evaṃrūpaṃ pūrvakṛtaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ pratideśayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1576: vayam api bhadanta bhagavan bahūnāṃ pūrvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pravacane pātrabhūtān pātrabhūtāṃś ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakayānīyān pudgalāñ jugupsitavantaḥ paṃsitavanto roṣitavanto 'varṇāyaśaḥkathāś ca niścāritavantaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1577: tena vayaṃ karmāvaraṇena triṣv apāyeṣu vividhāṃ tīvrāṃ pracaṇḍāṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhūtavantaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:1581: vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakān vacanais tarjitavantaḥ paribhāṣitavantaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1583: vayaṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakān apātrabhūtān patrābhūtāṃś ca praharitavantaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1589: vayaṃ bhagavantam uddiśya pravrajitān gṛhasthān kāritavantaḥ tata asthānaṃ sāditāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1591: asmābhir bhagavan buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakā apatrabhūtāḥ pātrabhūtāś ca sāparādhikāś cārake prakṣiptās tena vayaṃ karmāvaraṇena bahūn kalpāṃs tṛṣv apāyeṣu vividhāṃ tīvrāṃ pracaṇḍāṃ duṣkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratyanubhūtavantaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1593: tad vayam etarhi karmāvaraṇaśeṣāṃ bhagavato 'ntike pratideśayāmaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1596: uddharatu bhagavān asmān annantapāpebhya iti vistaraḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1598: caturbhir mahānāman dharmaiḥ samanvāgato gṛhī akṣaṇaprāpto bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:1599: jātyandhaś ca jaḍaś cājihvakaś ca caṇḍālaś ca jātu sukhito bhavaty abhyākhyānabahulaś ca ṣaṇḍakaś ca paṇḍakaś ca nityadāsaś ca |
T04sanssr_pu:1600: strī ca bhavati śvā ca śūkaraś ca gardabhaś coṣṭraś ca āśīviṣaś ca bhavati tatra tatra jātau
T04sanssr_pu:1602: iha mahānāman gṛhī pūrvajinakrṭādhikārāṇāṃ satvānāṃ naiṣkramyacittasya pravrajyācittasyāryamārgacittasyāntarāyaṃ karoti |
T04sanssr_pu:1604: punar aparaṃ gṛhī dhanalaulyena putralaulyena karmavipākam aśraddadhat putrasya vā duhitur vā bhāryāyā vā jñātisaṃghasyaiśvaryasthāne vartamāne pravrajyāntarāyaṃ karoti |
T04sanssr_pu:1613: tad yathāgniśikhācarā nāma pakṣiṇo ye 'gniśikṣāmadhyagatā na dahyante saṃhṛṣṭatarāś ca nārakeyāṇāṃ kapālaṃ bhittvā rudhiraṃ pibanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1614: kapālāntaracarā nāma pakṣiṇo ye mastakaṃ bhittvā jvalitamastakaluṅgān pibanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1615: jihvāmiṣabhujo nāma pakṣiṇo ye jihvāṃ vidāryābhito 'bhitaḥ prabhakṣayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1616: sāpi jihvā bhuktā punar api saṃjāyate padmadalakomalatarā |
T04sanssr_pu:1617: evam arthānurūpasaṃjñā dantotpāṭakā nāma kaṇṭhanāḍyapakarṣakā nāma |
T04sanssr_pu:1623: marmaguhyakā nāma pakṣiṇo ye sarvāṇi marmavivarāṇi bhittvā marmāṇi kṛntayitvā vivarāṇi praviśya majjāmaṇḍaṃ pibanti krandamānānāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1624: sūcīchidrā nāma pakṣiṇo ye sūcīsadṛśatuṇḍā raktaṃ pibanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1627: | keśoṇḍukā nāma pakṣiṇo ye keśamūlāny utpāṭayanti ||
T04sanssr_pu:1628: sa evam avīcipradeśas trīṇi yojanaśatasahasrāṇi pakṣibhairavapakṣo nāma |
T04sanssr_pu:1629: tatra tair anyair nārakeyaiḥ sahānnekāni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi bhakṣyate saṃbhavati ca |
T04sanssr_pu:1630: sa kathañcid api tasmān muktaḥ sarvasmād duṣkhajālaparivṛtaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1631: śvabhraprapāto nāma dvitīyaḥ pradeśas tatra gacchati
T04sanssr_pu:1632: | trāṇānveṣī śaraṇānveṣī paritrāṇānveṣī samantata ekādaśabhir arciskandhair āvṛto niḥsahāyaḥ karmapāśabandhanabaddhaḥ samantataḥ śatrubhir āvṛtaḥ kāntāram anuprapannaḥ sarvasmān narakapuñjād adhikataraṃ vyasanam abhiprapannas taṃ śvabhraprapātaṃ nāma pradeśam anudhāvati |
T04sanssr_pu:1635: sukumārataraḥ ślakṣṇataraḥ kharābhis tīvrābhir vedanābhir abhibhūtaḥ |
