T04sanssr_pu:1636: tasyaivaṃ bhayaviklavavadanasya karacaraṇasarvāṅgapratyaṅgapravilīyamānasya sa pradeśaḥ śvabhraprapāto nāma prādurbhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:1637: sa tasmin deśe nipatati patitaḥ śvabhre prapatati trīṇi yojanasahasrāṇi |
T04sanssr_pu:1640: yāvat tasyaivam utkṣipyamānasya ca prapatataś cānnekāni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi gacchanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1641: kathañcid api tasmān muktaḥ paribhrāmitaś cakrāṅkaṃ vivaraṃ nāma pradeśam anudhāvati |
T04sanssr_pu:1642: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe sahasrārāṇi cakrāṇi prādurbhavanti vajranābhīni tīkṣṇajvālāni śīghrabhramāṇi tasya sahagamanād eva tāni cakrāṇi śarīraṃ prāpya bhramanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1644: pratyekaṃ sarvāṅgāni pramathnanto dahanti pādatale cāsya śaṅkubhir bhidyete |
T04sanssr_pu:1647: bhukto bhuktaḥ punar api saṃjāyate sukumārataraḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1652: sa eṣa duṣkṛtakarmāntacārī ālātacakranirmāṇagandharvanagaramṛgatṛṣṇikāsadṛśaṃ mahad arthajātaṃ paśyati ratnavastradhanadhānyanikarabhūtaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1655: sa evaṃ mohitaḥ pāpakārī prajvalitāṅgārakarṣūr laṅghayitvā taddraviṇam anudhāvati |
T04sanssr_pu:1656: sa karmakṛtair yamapuruṣair gṛhyate śastrajālamadhyagataḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaśaḥ pāṭyate viśasyate dahyate 'sthyavaśeṣaḥ kriyate |
T04sanssr_pu:1657: na cāsyānnādikālapravṛttaḥ sa lobhas tām apy avasthāṃ gatasya parihīyatae iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:1659: eṣa sa pāpakartā tasmāc chastrasaṅkaṭān muktaḥ kathamapy aṅgārakarṣūr laṅghayitvā karmaṇā bhrāmitaḥ pradeśam anyaṃ prapadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:1660: vitathadarśanaṃ nāma tatra karmakṛtāṃ striyaṃ paśyati yā tena pūrvaṃ naṣṭasmṛtinā dṛṣṭā |
T04sanssr_pu:1662: sa tena dhāvati yena tā striyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1665: gṛhītvā cauṣṭhāt prabhṛti tathā bhujyate yathāsya sarṣapaphalamātrapramāṇam api nāvaśiṣṭaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:1669: sa kaṭukāṃ kharāṃ vedanām anubhavaṃs tasmād rāgāgner na nivartate |
T04sanssr_pu:1670: yena tā striyas tena bhūyaḥ saḥ saṃdhāvati
T04sanssr_pu:1671: | na cāsya tatpīḍā tathā bādhate yathā rāgāgniḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1672: atha tā striyo bhūyo vajramayāyomayaprajvalitagātrās taṃ manuṣyam ādāya jvālāmālākulasarvaśarīrās taṃ nārakeyaṃ siktāmuṣṭivad bhindanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1675: strīvidheyā narā ye tu kutas teṣāṃ bhavet sukham || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:1677: strī vināśo vināśānām iha loke paratra ca |
T04sanssr_pu:1678: tasmāt striyo vivarjyāḥ syur yadīcchet sukham ātmana iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:1680: sa tair yamapuruṣair gṛhyate gṛhītvā ca tanmukhaṃ vidārayanti tasmāj jihvām apakarṣayanti
T04sanssr_pu:1681: sā ca jihvā karmavaśāt pañcayojanaśatapramāṇā bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:1682: tasya mṛṣāvādasya balena tasyāś ca sahanirgamanakāle te yamapuruṣā bhūmāv ānāhayanti pradīptāyomayyāṃ

T04sanssr_pu:1690: sa bhayavihvalavadano yena vā tena vā niḥpalāyate

T04sanssr_pu:1694: paiśunyavipākas tu yathaiva mṛṣāvādasya trīṇi yojanaśatāni jihveti viśeṣas tu |

T04sanssr_pu:1697: paramakaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ prativedayate sa krandati vikrośaty avyaktākṣaraṃ jihvāvirahita ity ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:1699: te tāṃ jihvām āsyaṃ vidārya gṛhṇanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1700: gṛhītvā niśitadhāraiḥ śastraiś chittvā tasya bhūya eva khādanīyārthena mukhe prakṣipanti |
T04sanssr_pu:1701: sa ca jighansārditaḥ kṣutkṣāmavadanaḥ svarudhiralālāparisrutāṃ tām eva svajihvāṃ bhakṣayati

T04sanssr_pu:1703: atha sa bhūmau vedanārttaḥ parivartate viceṣṭate krandate |
T04sanssr_pu:1704: tasyaivaṃ vedanārttasya parivṛttanayanatārakasya duṣkhārttasya dīnasyāsahāyasyaikākinaḥ svakṛtam upabhuñjānasya yamapuruṣā anuśāsanīgāthāṃ bhāṣante ||
T04sanssr_pu:1705: jihvādhanor vinirmuktas tīkṣṇo vāg viśikhas tvayā |
T04sanssr_pu:1706: pāruṣyam iti yad dṛṣṭaṃ tasyaitat phalam āgatam ||
T04sanssr_pu:1709: tasya tat prajvalitaṃ tāmradravalohitaṃ jihvāṃ dahati |
T04sanssr_pu:1711: kaṇṭhaṃ dagdhvā hṛdayaṃ dahati hṛdayaṃ dagdhvāntrāṇi dahati |
T04sanssr_pu:1716: abaddhaṃ yat tvayā proktaṃ tasyaitat phalam āgataṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1717: yā na [doubtful] satyavatī nityaṃ na cādhyayanatatparā |
T04sanssr_pu:1718: na sā jihvā budhair dṛṣṭā kevalaṃ māṃsakhaṇḍikā |
T04sanssr_pu:1721: atha paśyati riktaṃ tuccham asārakaṃ karmakṛtaṃ bahudraviṇaṃ paraparigṛhītaṃ tasya karmacoditavyāmohitasyaivaṃ bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:1723: tataḥ sa nārakas tenaiva dhāvati yena tad dravyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1724: tasyābhidhyākhyamānasasyākuśalasyāsevitabhāvitabahulīkṛtasya tatphalaṃ yad asau narake viparītaṃ paśyati |

T04sanssr_pu:1727: sa taiḥ saha śastreṇa yudhyate yāvat tathā kartyate yathā sarṣapaphalamātram api na bhavati māṃsam asya śarīre tathāsthikaṅkālāvaśeṣaḥ kriyate || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:1728: pareṣāṃ sampa ... mama syād iti cintitaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1732: etebhyo bhayabhīto yena vā tena vā niḥpalāyate |

T04sanssr_pu:1735: gṛhītvā ca pūrvaṃ tāvan mastakād bhujyate yāvat pārśvataḥ sarpair viṣadaṃṣṭraiḥ saṃdaśya saṃdaśya bhakṣyate |

T04sanssr_pu:1747: tatra te nārakā ayovarṣeṇa sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaśaś cūrṇyante 'ṅgāravarṣeṇa ca pacyante dahyantae ity ādi |
T04sanssr_pu:1748: evaṃ paurāṇakāmāsvādanasmaraṇāt padumo nāma narakaḥ paṭhyate svapnāntabhūtasmaraṇāc ca |

T04sanssr_pu:1753: tasyāṃ nadyāṃ yāny asthīni te pāṣāṇāḥ |

T04sanssr_pu:1758: evaṃ puruṣasya puruṣeṇa saha maithunavipratipatteḥ aprameyā akāraṇā viśeṣāḥ paṭhyante |

T04sanssr_pu:1763: evaṃ govaḍavājaiḍakādiṣu prakṛtisāvadyaḥ kāmamithyācāraḥ kharataravipākaḥ paṭhyate |
T04sanssr_pu:1764: tāsām eva govaḍavādīnāṃ taptāyomayīnāṃ akuśalanirmitānāṃ yonimārgeṇa sa tiryakkāmasevī praviśati |
T04sanssr_pu:1765: sa tāsām udare pradīptāṅgāranikaraparipūrṇe svidyate pacyate bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇīti vistareṇa draṣṭavyaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1766: evam anyanāśitāsv api bhikṣuṇīṣu vipratipannānāṃ mahānarakapātanāḥ paṭhyante |
T04sanssr_pu:1768: evaṃ prasahyānītāsv api parastrīṣu labdhāsu ca kanyāsu |
T04sanssr_pu:1769: evam upavāsasthāsu evaṃ gurūṇāṃ patnīṣu jñātiśabdamānitāsu ca vipratipatteḥ tīvrāś cāparimāṇāś ca mahānarakapātanāḥ paṭhyante ||
T04sanssr_pu:1771: iha brāhmaṇa ekatyo brahmacāriṇam ātmānaṃ pratijāṇīte |
T04sanssr_pu:1772: sa nehaiva mātṛgrāmeṇa sārddhaṃ dvayaṃ samāpadyate
T04sanssr_pu:1773: 'pi tu mātṛgrāmaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ nidhyāyan paśyati |
T04sanssr_pu:1774: sa tadā svādayati adhyavasyati adhyavasāya tiṣṭhati |
T04sanssr_pu:1775: ayam ucyate brāhmaṇa brahmacārī saṃyukto maithunena dharmeṇa na visaṃyuktaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1777: evaṃ mātṛgrāmeṇa sārddhaṃ saṃkrīḍataḥ saṃkilikilāyamānasya āsvādayataḥ apariśuddhaṃ brahmacaryam uktaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1779: evaṃ tiraḥkuḍyagatasya tiroduṣyagatasya vā mātṛgrāmasya nṛttagītādiśabdam āsvādayato maithunasaṃyogam ity uktam |
T04sanssr_pu:1781: evaṃ devādisthāneṣu brahmacaryapariṇāmanāt saṃyukto maithunena dharmeṇa na visaṃyukta iti
T04sanssr_pu:1782: yataś caite kāmā evaṃ smaraṇaprārthanāviṣayam api gatā evam annarthakarās tenaiva kāmāpavādakasūtre 'bhihitam |
T04sanssr_pu:1784: sabhayaś caiṣa mārgaḥ sapratibhayaḥ sakaṇṭakaḥ sagahanaḥ unmārgaḥ kumārgo vedanāpathaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1791: rogo bhikṣavaḥ kāmā gaṇḍaḥ śalyamadyamadyamūlam āmiṣavaḍisaṃ mṛtyur anityāḥ kāmās tucchāḥ mṛṣāmoṣadharmiṇaḥ svapnopamāḥ kāmāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1793: yathā mṛgāṇāṃ bandhanāya kūṭaṃ dvijānāṃ bandhanāya jālaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1797: kāmaparyeṣaṇāṃ carato dīrgharātraṃ siṃhānāṃ mukhe parivartitasyānto na prajñāyate |

T04sanssr_pu:1801: pāradārikāḥ pāripanthikā grāmaghātakā janapadaghātakā yāvad granthimocakā iti kṛtvā gṛhītānāṃ śiraśchinnānām anto na prajñāyate |
T04sanssr_pu:1802: duṣkhaṃ tīvraṃ kharaṃ kaṭukam anubhūtaṃ rudhiraṃ prasyanditaṃ pragharitaṃ yac caturṣu mahāsamudreṣūdakāt prabhūtataraṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1805: asthisaṃghātaḥ snāyusaṃbaddho māṃsenānuliptaḥ carmaṇā paryavanaddhaḥ chavyā praticchannaḥ chidravicchidraḥ kṛmisaṃghaniṣevitaḥ satvānām annarthakaḥ kleśakarmaṇāṃ vastu ||
T04sanssr_pu:1807: tad yathā cakṣūrogaḥ śrotrarogo yāvad arśāṃsi piṭako bhagandaraḥ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:1811: indriyāṇāṃ pāripākaḥ paribhedaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ purāṇībhāvo jarjarībhāvaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1812: yāvan nārhasy evam udgharantaṃ pragharantaṃ jugupsanīyaṃ kāyaṃ pratiṣevituṃ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:1815: kathaṃ ca tvaṃ prāhito mūrchito 'dhyavasito 'dhyavasānam āpannaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1818: tvaṃ ca kāmān pratisevya vinipātagato bhaviṣyasi |
T04sanssr_pu:1825: tena kāmamithyācārāt prativiratena bhavitavyaṃ svadārasaṃtuṣṭena paradārānabhilāṣiṇāraktanetraprekṣiṇā nirviṇṇamanasā |
T04sanssr_pu:1833: tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā saṃkalpair api kāmān na paribhokṣye |
T04sanssr_pu:1834: kaḥ punar vādo dvīndriyasamāpattyā vānaṅgavijñaptyā veti ||

T04sanssr_pu:1847: kāyaṃ mamekṣadhvam imaṃ manojñaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ jvalanaprakāśam |

T04sanssr_pu:1850: ṣaḍindriyaiḥ saṃvarasaṃvṛtāś ca ye brahmacaryaṃ ca caranti śubham ||
T04sanssr_pu:1851: dṛṣṭvā ca dārān hi parasya ye vai kurvanti mātābhaginīti saṃjñāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1852: prāsādikās te hi sudarśanīyā bhavanti nityaṃ paramaṃ manojñāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1853: sphuṭām imāṃ vettha purīṃ samantād yo romakūpān mama cātigandhaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1854: na rāgacittena mayārjito 'yam phalaṃ tu dānasya damasya cedam ||

T04sanssr_pu:1856: sākṣī mamāyaṃ purato munīndraḥ satyaṃ yathā vedmi na jātu mithyā ||
T04sanssr_pu:1859: bhrātā svasā cāpi pitā babhūva ko rāgacittaṃ janayej jananyāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1866: na nirvṛtiṃ yānti ca raktacittā rāgo hi tasmāt parivarjanīyaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1869: kumbhāṇḍayakṣā asurāḥ piśācā bhavanti ye rāgaparīttacittāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1870: kāṇāś ca khañjāś ca vijihvakāś ca |
T04sanssr_pu:1872: bhavanti nānāvidhadoṣabhājāś caranti ye kāmacarīṃ jaghanyām ||
T04sanssr_pu:1875: brahmāṇa īśā [doubtful] vaśavarttinaś ca tad brahmacaryaṃ vipulaṃ caritvā

T04sanssr_pu:1881: kabhallitāpān atha dhūmagārān bandhāṃs tathā tāḍanatarjjanāṃś ca |
T04sanssr_pu:1891: strīṣu saktās tathā mūḍhā amedhya iva vāyasāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1892: mārasya gocaro hy eṣa prasthitā yena durgatiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1894: kīṭakumbho yathā citro yatra yatraiva dṛśyate |

T04sanssr_pu:1899: gaṇḍabhūto hy ayaṃ kāyaḥ kutsito hy āmagandhikaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1901: evam eva hy ayaṃ kāyo viṣṭhādyaśucibhājanam ||
T04sanssr_pu:1905: aha bālā na paśyanti mohajālena āvṛtāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1907: bālā nimittaṃ gṛhṇanti vacane darśane 'pi ca ||
T04sanssr_pu:1908: uktāḥ paścān na jānanti yo deśaḥ sarvakutsitaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1911: kakṣāsv āgharate svedo gandho vāyati kutsitaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1912: kurvanti duṣkṛtaṃ karma yena gacchanti durgatim |
T04sanssr_pu:1913: hīnān kāmān niṣevanto hīnān dharmān niṣevya ca ||
T04sanssr_pu:1914: gatvā avīciṃ duṣprajñāḥ duṣkhāṃ vindanti vedanāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1915: uccāra iva durgandhāḥ striyo buddhaiḥ prakīrtitāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:1916: tasmād dhīnasya hīnābhiḥ strībhir bhavati saṅgatiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1918: yādṛśaṃ kurute karma tādṛśaṃ labhate phalam ||

T04sanssr_pu:1922: tenaiva strīpremṇā tasyā eva poṣaṇāya na śaknuvanti dānaṃ dātuṃ śīlaṃ ca samādātuṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:1923: sa tatra raktaḥ samānaḥ strīparibhāṣitāni sahate tarjanāvalokananirbhartsanām api sahate |
T04sanssr_pu:1924: sa mātṛgrāmeṇa tarjitaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃsīdati viṣīdati sukhaṃ cāsyā avalokayati |
T04sanssr_pu:1926: ayaṃ mahārāja kāmalolupasya puruṣasyoccārasukhaparamasyāśucau ratasyāsaṃprajanyācāriṇo doṣaḥ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:1927: śrutvedṛśaṃ tu saṃvegaṃ na teṣāṃ bhavati nirvṛtiḥ |

T04sanssr_pu:1931: strīgataṃ cāsya tac cittaṃ viḍālasyeva mūṣike ||
T04sanssr_pu:1936: dṛṣṭvā vai atha uccāraṃ gṛddhatāṃ janayaty asau ||

T04sanssr_pu:1939: raktāḥ pramattāḥ kāmeṣu kṛtvā karma supāpakam |

T04sanssr_pu:1949: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā jāmbūdvīpakān sarvasatvāñ jīvitād vyaparopya sarvasvaṃ haret |

T04sanssr_pu:1953: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ parakuleṣu bodhisatvasyerṣyāmātsaryaṃ kuryāt tasya tasmin samaye tato nidānaṃ [doubtful] trīṇi bhayāni pratikāṅkṣitavyāni |
T04sanssr_pu:1957: yas tasya kuryāt puruṣo 'priyaṃ vā bhūtaṃ hy abhūtaṃ ca vaded avarṇaṃ |

T04sanssr_pu:1966: lāṅgalānāṃ ca vahanty asya vācaṃ bhāṣitva pāpikām ||
T04sanssr_pu:1969: tiryagyoniḥ sanarakā na teṣāṃ bhoti durlabhā |
T04sanssr_pu:1971: tataḥ cyutā ghoraviṣā bhonti sarpāḥ sudāruṇāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:1979: manuṣyebhyaś cyutaś cāpi punar gacchati durgatim |
T04sanssr_pu:1982: yāvanti mañjuśrīr bodhisatvo bodhisatvasyāntike pratighacittāny utpādayaty avamanyanācittāni vā |

T04sanssr_pu:2299: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa triḥkṛtvo rātreḥ triḥkṛtvo divasya bodhisatvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ na namasyema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:2300: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇāsya vratasamādānasya kṛtaśo rājyapratilambhaṃ vā dhanapratilambhaṃ vā kāyajīvitaṃ vā na parityajema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:2301: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā pudgalam avamanyema
T04sanssr_pu:2302: vayaṃ viśiṣṭatarā naite iti visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet |saced vayaṃ bhagavan nīcacittāś caṇḍālasadṛśacittā na viharema visaṃvādito 'smābhis
T04sanssr_pu:2304: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇātmānam utkarṣayema paraṃ vā paṃsayema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:2305: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa vyāpādavigrahabhayād yojanaṃ vā yojanaśataṃ vā na palāyema īritāḥ samānā visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:2306: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa śīlavantam ātmānaṃ pratijānīma bahuśrutaṃ vā dhutaguṇinaṃ vānyatarānyatareṇa vā guṇenātmānam udbhāvayema visaṃvādito
T04sanssr_pu:2308: saced vayaṃ bhagavann adyāgreṇa praticchannakalyāṇā vivṛtapāpā na viharema visaṃvādito 'smābhis tathāgato bhaved arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:2309: tatra bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam āmantrayate sma |
T04sanssr_pu:2310: karmāvaraṇaṃ maitreya kṣapayitukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ samādānaṃ kartavyaṃ yathā ebhiḥ kulaputraiḥ kṛtam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:2326: tair na dvitīyasya bodhisatvasya sarvacaryāsu vipratipattavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2330: idaṃ ca khalu kulaputrārthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyaṃs tathāgata evaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati |
T04sanssr_pu:2332: ahaṃ vā pudgalaṃ pramiṇuyāṃ yo vā syān mādṛśaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:2333: yaḥ kulaputrātmānaṃ rakṣitukāmas tena na kasyacic caryā vivecayitavyā |
T04sanssr_pu:2338: atha tāvad eva bahūni śatasahasrāṇi vidvāṃsaḥ satvā utthāyāsanād yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamyaivam āhuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2339: vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavataḥ purata evaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kurmaḥ yāvac ciraṃ vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan saṃsāre saṃsarema tāvan mātra pratilabdhakṣāntikāmā rājasthānaṃ pratilabhema |
T04sanssr_pu:2349: mā kuṭumbijyeṣṭhasthānaṃ yāvat sarvaśo vayaṃ mā satvānām adhipatisthānaṃ pratilabhema yāvan na kṣāntipratilabdhāḥ syāma |
T04sanssr_pu:2350: yato nidānaṃ vayam evaṃrūpam atigāḍhaṃ karma buddhānāṃ śāsanam ākṣipema |
T04sanssr_pu:2353: nāsti pāpam akartavyaṃ kumārā teṣu bheṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:2354: mā tehi saṃstavaṃ sārddhaṃ kuryāḥ tvaṃ kāli paścime ||
T04sanssr_pu:2357: varṣāgraṃ paripṛcchitvā yas te vṛddhataro bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:2359: na teṣāṃ skhalitaṃ paśyed bodhimaṇḍaṃ vipaśyatāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2360: pratighātaṃ na janayet maitracittaḥ sadā bhavet ||
T04sanssr_pu:2361: yady eṣāṃ skhalitaṃ paśyed doṣāṃs teṣāṃ na kīrtayet |
T04sanssr_pu:2362: yādṛśaṃ kāhiti karma tādṛśaṃ lapsyate phalaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:2364: pūrvābhāṣī bhaven nityaṃ hatamānaś ca sarvataḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:2365: cīvaraiḥ piṇḍapātaiś ca kuryāt teṣām anugrahaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2366: evaṃ cittaṃ pradadhyās tvaṃ sarve bheṣyanti nāyakā |
T04sanssr_pu:2368: yasya ca bodhicittotpādike gauravaṃ prasādaś ca notpadyete |
T04sanssr_pu:2369: tena svadurgatiprapātabhayarakṣārthaṃ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaprāmodyānubhavanārthaṃ svacittakaluṣaprasādanārthaṃ cittakalyatācittakarmaṇyatāpratilābhārthaṃ ca yathāryagaṇḍavyūhe bodhicittotpādikaguṇā bhagavadāryamaitreyeṇācāryasudhanam adhikṛtyodbhāvitās tathā bhāvayitavyāḥ
T04sanssr_pu:2370: eṣa dṛṣṭva jaravyādhipīḍitān prāṇino duṣkhaśatair upadrutān |
T04sanssr_pu:2377: tasya kṣema diśadaiśikaḥ prabhuḥ sārthavāha jagato bhaviṣyati ||
T04sanssr_pu:2379: śūrasūta abhayasya dāyako daiśako hi jagato bhaviṣyati ||
T04sanssr_pu:2386: āśaye dṛḍhatale pratiṣṭhito bodhicarya anupūrva udgataḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2390: śuddhi vartti trimalattamo 'py ahaṃ maitrisnehasmṛtibhājanaṃ dṛḍham |
T04sanssr_pu:2393: bodhi aṅgam anupūrvasaṃbhavo buddhagarbha ayu saṃpravardhate ||
T04sanssr_pu:2403: eṣa sarvajagamokṣaṇodyato eṣa te sada viśeṣa paṇḍitaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:2405: mokṣamārgam upaneṣyate jagad yādṛśe guṇapathe pratiṣṭhitaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:2413: caturbhir maitreya dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmavipralope vartamāne 'kṣato 'nnupahataḥ svastinā parimokṣyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:2428: ādikarmikeṇa maitreya bodhisatvena prajñābalādhānaprāptena lābhasatkāraparivarjitena lābhasatkāradoṣadarśinā bhavitavyaṃ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:2434: iha maitreya bodhisatvena mahāsatvena rāgasaṃjanano lābhasatkāraḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2457: ime evaṃrūpā maitreya lābhasatkāre ādīnavā ye bodhisatvena pratyavekṣitavyāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2460: alpecchasya hi maitreya imae evaṃrūpā doṣā na bhavanti na cāsyāntarāyā bhavanti buddhadharmāṇāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:2468: spaṣṭaś ca bhavati māyāśāṭhyaprahīṇo 'pramattaś ca bhavati pañcakāmaguṇadoṣadarśī yathāvādī tathākārī bhavaty āryavaṃśe sthitaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2470: imāṃ maitreya evaṃrūpām anuśaṃsāṃ viditvā paṇḍitena bodhisatvenādhyāśayenālpecchatāyāṃ rantavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2473: vijahya rāgaṃ vijahya doṣaṃ na tiṣṭhate saṃgaṇikāsu yogī |
T04sanssr_pu:2510: cittaṃ na kāyaś ca prasanna bhoti |
T04sanssr_pu:2535: na tasya jātū dṛḍha buddhi bhotī |
T04sanssr_pu:2548: bhāṣye ramantasya ime hi doṣāḥ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:2560: tasmād dhi bhāṣye tu ratiṃ vihāya |
T04sanssr_pu:2572: viheṭhayante ca vane vasantaṃ yasmāna middhe 'bhiratiṃ prayāti ||
T04sanssr_pu:2574: dharme ca chando na hi bhoti tasya |
T04sanssr_pu:2575: adharmakāyaś ca sa bhoti bhūyo yasmāna middhe 'bhiratiṃ prayāti ||
T04sanssr_pu:2583: ātmā tu jñātvā ca kusīdaprāptaḥ īrṣyāyate vīryabalair upetān |
T04sanssr_pu:2584: vīryānvitānāṃ ca avarṇa bhāṣate yasmāna middhe 'bhiratiṃ prayāti || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:2607: bhakte ca coḍe ca bhavaty abhīkṣṇaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2612: yuktaiś ca mantraiḥ sa na vindate ratiṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2615: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad avocat |
T04sanssr_pu:2616: suparīttaprajñās te bhagavan bodhisatvā bhaviṣyanti vihīnaprajñā ye
T04sanssr_pu:2618: evam ukte bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad avocat |
T04sanssr_pu:2620: evam etad yathā vadasi suparīttaprajñās te bodhisatvā bhaviṣyanti ye 'gradharmān parivarjayitvā hīnāni karmāṇy ārapsyante |
T04sanssr_pu:2621: api tv ārocayāmi te maitreya prativedayāmi te |
T04sanssr_pu:2622: na te bodhisatvās tathāgataśāsane pravrajitā yeṣāṃ nāsti yogo nāsti dhyānaṃ nāsti prahāṇaṃ nāsty adhyayanaṃ nāsti bāhuśrutyaparyeṣṭiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2623: api tu maitreya dhyānaprahāṇaprabhāvitaṃ tathāgataśāsanaṃ jñānasaṃskṛtaṃ jñānasamāhitaṃ abhiyogaprabhāvitaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:2625: ayuktayogānām etat karma saṃsārābhiratānāṃ yad uta vaiyāpṛtyaṃ laukikakṛtyapaligodhaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2627: sacen maitreya vaiyāpṛtyābhirato bodhisatvaḥ saptaratnamayaiḥ stūpair imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ pūrayet |
T04sanssr_pu:2628: nāhaṃ tenārādhito bhaveyaṃ na mānito nāpi satkṛtaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:2630: tatra jambūdvīpaḥ pūritaḥ syād vaiyāpṛtyakarair bodhisatvaiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2632: jambūdvīpapramāṇaiś coddeśasvādhyāyābhiyuktair bodhisatvair ekasya pratisaṃlayanābhiyuktasya bodhisatvasyopasthānaparicaryā kartavyā || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:2634: duṣkaram etat karma yad uta prajñākarma |
T04sanssr_pu:2635: uttaraṃ niruttaraṃ sarvatrailokyaprativiśiṣṭam abhyudgataṃ tasmāt tarhi maitreya bodhisatvena yogārthikena vīryam ārabdhukāmena prajñāyām abhiyoktavyam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:2641: doṣān imān samyag avetya paṇḍitaḥ sarvān prapañcān parivarjīta |
T04sanssr_pu:2646: na tatra vāsaṃ na niketu kuryān muhūrttamātraṃ stiya yatra kleśaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:2649: na vo 'sti kṣetraṃ na kṛṣir vaṇijyā |
T04sanssr_pu:2651: na putra dhītā na ca vo 'sti bhāryā |
T04sanssr_pu:2652: na cāsya mitraṃ na ca bandhuvargaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2653: dāsyo na dāsā na ca īśvaratvaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2662: tasmād dhi kṣāntau janayeta vīryam || pe
T04sanssr_pu:2665: dharṣeti māraṃ sacalaṃ savāhanaṃ yo dhīru tasyaiva janeti kṣāntim |
T04sanssr_pu:2668: tasmāt tarhi maitreya bodhisatvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmapralope vartamāne 'kṣatanānupahatena svastinā parimoktukāmena sarvakarmāvaraṇāni kṣapayitukāmenāsaṃsargābhiratena bhavitavyam
T04sanssr_pu:2671: tāvat piṇḍāya carati yāvad asya kāryasya prāptir bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:2672: anyatra yeṣu sthāneṣu caṇḍā vā kukkurās taruṇavatsā vā gāvaḥ prakṛtiduḥśīlā vā tiryagyonigatā
T04sanssr_pu:2673: viheṭhanābhiprāyā vā strīpuruṣadārakadārikā jugupsitāni vā sthānāni |
T04sanssr_pu:2675: anenaitad darśitaṃ bhavati yad dṛṣṭe 'pi bādhākara evaṃvidhe |
T04sanssr_pu:2677: atha yad evamādy annarthavarjanam uktaṃ kenaital labhyate sarvaniṣphalasyandavarjanāt |
T04sanssr_pu:2682: na hastalolupo bhavati na pādalolupaḥ hastapādasaṃyata iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:2684: paridhāvanaṃ laṅghanaṃ plavanam idam ucyate kāyadauṣṭhulyam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:2685: āryadharmasaṃgītisūtre tu yathā bodhisatvānāṃ parārthād anyat karma na kalpate |
T04sanssr_pu:2686: tathā spaṣṭam eva paridīpitaṃ yat kiñcid bhagavan bodhisatvānāṃ kāyakarma yat kiñcid vākkarma yat kiñcin manaḥkarma tat sarvaṃ satvāvekṣitaṃ pravartate mahākaruṇādhipateyaṃ satvahitādhiṣṭhānanimittaṃ sarvasatvahitasukhādhyāśayapravṛttaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2688: sa mayā pratipattiḥ pratipattavyayā sarvasatvānāṃ hitāvahā sukhāvahā ca || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:2692: tad yathāpi nāma chidrān mārutaḥ praviśati |
T04sanssr_pu:2693: evam eva yato yata eva cittasya chidraṃ bhavati tatas tata eva māro 'vatāraṃ labhate |
T04sanssr_pu:2695: |tatreyam achidracittatā yad idaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ śūnyatāyāḥ paripūrir
T04sanssr_pu:2703: pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayatīty atra prastāve yāni cānyāni punaḥ kānicid anyāny api cittavikṣepakarāṇi yāni samādhiskandhasya vipakṣāya saṃvartante
T04sanssr_pu:2705: yāvad ime ucyante pāpakā akuśalā dharmā iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:2716: sati satvārthe yad aṅgam annupayogi tad dṛḍhatarasmṛtyapekṣāniścalamādhyachandaparāpattīkṛtaṃ sarvadhīraceṣṭāsmṛtiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2722: yaḥ śrotā vaktavyaḥ sa yāvanmātreṇa dhvaninārthaṃ jānāti |
T04sanssr_pu:2733: ayaṃ cādaraḥ śamathamāhātmyaṃ jñātvā tātparyeṇa jāyate
T04sanssr_pu:2739: annunnahanatā acapalatā acañcalatā saumyatā guptatā karmaṇyatā ājāneyatā ekāgratā ekārāmatā saṃgaṇikāvarjanatā vivekaratiḥ kāyavivekaś cittāvibhramo 'raṇyamukhamanasikāratālpecchatā yāvad īryāpathaguptiḥ kālajñatā samayajñatā mātrajñatā muktijñatā |
T04sanssr_pu:2741: kiṃ punar asya śamasya māhātmyaṃ yathābhūtajñānajananaśaktiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2742: yasmāt samāhito yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīty avadan muniḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:2747: idaṃ mayā samādhimukhaṃ sarvadharmayathābhūtadarśanaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niṣpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2749: 'dhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣāṃ paripūryāṃ caturāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:2752: idaṃ śamathamāhātmyam ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ cānnantāpāyādiduḥkhasamatikramānantalaukikalokottarasukhasaṃpatprakarṣapāraprāptyātmakam avagamya tadabhilāṣeṇātāpo bhāvayitavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2757: yaś ca niṣphalaṃ varjayati tasyānnarthā na saṃbhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:2758: tasmād ātmabhāvaṃ rakṣitukāmena smṛtimūlam anviṣya nityam upasthitasmṛtinā bhavitavyaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:2762: atraiva ca pravrajitabodhisatvam adhikṛtyoktaṃ smṛtisaṃprajanyasyāvikṣepa iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:2764: yayā smṛtyā sarvakleśānāṃ prādurbhāvo na bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:2765: yayā smṛtyā sarvamārakarmaṇām avatāraṃ na dadāti
T04sanssr_pu:2766: | yayā smṛtyā utpathe vā kumārge vā na patati |
T04sanssr_pu:2767: yayā smṛtyā dauvārikabhūtayā sarveṣām akuśalānāṃ cittacaitasikānāṃ dharmāṇām avakāśaṃ dadātīyam ucyate samyaksmṛtir iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:2773: yathā yathā cāsyaḥ [doubtful] kāyaḥ sthito bhavati tathā tathaiva prajānāti ||
T04sanssr_pu:2775: so 'tikrāman vā pratikrāman vā saṃprajānaṃś cārī bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:2777: aśite pīte khādite nidrāklamaprativinodane āgate gate sthite niṣaṇṇe supte jāgarite bhāṣite tuṣṇībhāve pratisaṃlayane saṃprajānaṃś cārī bhavatīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:2782: ato 'vagamyate ye kecit samādhihetavaḥ prayogās te śīlāntargatā iti |
T04sanssr_pu:2784: tathā śīlārthināpi samādhau yatnaḥ kāryaḥ tatraiva sūtre vacanāt |
T04sanssr_pu:2790: etābhyāṃ ca śīlasamādhibhyām anyonyasaṃvardhanakarābhyāṃ cittakarmapariniṣpattiḥ etāvatī ceyaṃ bodhisatvaśikṣā yad uta cittaparikarma |
T04sanssr_pu:2795: api tu cittena nīyate lokaḥ cittaṃ cittaṃ na paśyati |
T04sanssr_pu:2796: cittena cīyate karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham ||
T04sanssr_pu:2801: sa evaṃ vyupaparīkṣamāṇaś citte sūpasthitasmṛtir viharati na cittasya vaśaṃ gacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:2802: ap tu cittam evāsya vaśaṃ gacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:2807: 'yaṃ dharmo dharma ity ucyate nāyaṃ dharmo deśastho na pradeśastho 'nyatra
T04sanssr_pu:2808: svacittādhīno dharmaḥ tasmān mayā svacittaṃ svārādhitaṃ svadhiṣṭhitaṃ susamārabdhaṃ sunigṛhītaṃ kartavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2812: tatra bodhisatvo doṣebhyaś cittaṃ nivārya guṇeṣu pravartayati ||
T04sanssr_pu:2815: ayaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ samādānaḥ sukhābhisaṃbodhāya saṃvartatae iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:2823: tathātraiva māyādevyadarśanākulībhūte āryasudhane ratnanetrāyā nagaradevatāyās taddarśanārtham iyam anuśāsanī |
T04sanssr_pu:2831: cittanagaravivaraṇaprayuktena te kulaputra bhavitavyaṃ ādhyātmikabāhyavastu sarvajagatsaṃprāpaṇatayā
T04sanssr_pu:2833: yāvad evaṃ cittanagaraviśuddhyabhiyuktena kulaputra bodhisatvena śakyaṃ sarvakuśalamūlasamārjanam anuprāptuṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2835: tathā hi tasya bodhisatvasyaivaṃ cittanagarapariśuddhaysa sarvāvaraṇāni purato na saṃtiṣṭhante
T04sanssr_pu:2840: śamāc ca na calec cittaṃ bāhyaceṣṭānivartanāt ||
T04sanssr_pu:2841: asaṃprajanyaparatantrasya muṣitasmṛteś ca cittaṃ calati samīhitād ālambanād anyatra nīyamānatvāt
T04sanssr_pu:2842: yadā tu smṛtisaṃprajanyena bāhyāś ceṣṭā nivartitā bhavanti tadā tadvaśatvād ekasminn ālambane nibaddhaṃ yāvad iṣyate tāvat tiṣṭhati |
T04sanssr_pu:2848: āvarjayej janaṃ bhavyam ādeyaś cāpi jāyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:2849: etad eva ca bodhisatvasya kṛtyam yad uta satvāvarjanaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2852: tathā tathā bhagavan bodhisatvena pratipattavyaṃ yat sahadarśanenaiva satvāḥ prasīdeyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2854: na bhagavan bodhisatvasyānyat karaṇīyam asty anyatra satvāvarjanāt |
T04sanssr_pu:2855: satvaparipāka eveyaṃ bhagavan bodhisatvasya dharmasaṃgītir iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:2856: evaṃ punar akriyamāṇe ko doṣa ity āha |
T04sanssr_pu:2857: annādeyaṃ tu taṃ lokaḥ paribhūya jināṅkuraṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2860: yena cāsya paribhava evam annartho ratnameghe jinenoktas tena saṃkṣepasaṃvaraḥ |yenāprasādaḥ satvānāṃ tad yatnena vivarjayed iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:2863: yāvad iha bodhisatvo nāsthāne viharati nākāle |
T04sanssr_pu:2864: nākālabhāṇī bhavati nākālajño bhavati nādeśajño bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:2865: yato nidānam asyāntike satvā aprasādaṃ prativedayeyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2867: ātmanaś ca bodhisaṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ saṃpanneryāpatho bhavati mṛdubhāṇī mandabhāṇī |
T04sanssr_pu:2872: yaḥ satvān rakṣati sa śīlaṃ rakṣatīti
T04sanssr_pu:2873: | anayā kanīyena mātṛgrāmeṇa saha raho'vasthādiṣu lokarakṣā ca kṛtā syāt |
T04sanssr_pu:2874: evaṃ bhogyeṣu jalasthaleṣu mūtrapurīṣaśleṣmapūyādīnāṃ kutsitānāṃ rahasy arahasi cotsargaṃ na kuryād devamanuṣyacittarakṣārthaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:2875: saddharmasmṛtyupasthāne ca raha utsiṣṭaṃ kṛtvānnutsiṣṭāhāreṣv adadataḥ pretagatiḥ paṭhyate
T04sanssr_pu:2877: na purato dantakāṣṭhaṃ khāditavyaṃ na purataḥ kheṭe nikṣiptavya iti |
T04sanssr_pu:2878: eṣa ca gauravalajjāvidhiḥ sarvadraṣṭavyo na brahmacāriṣv eva |
T04sanssr_pu:2879: atra tu sūtre brahmacāryadhikāraḥ teṣu gurutarāpattibhayasaṃdarśanārthaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:2883: tathā brahmaparipṛcchāyām apy uktaṃ na ca vadhasadṛśena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:2884: tathā prātimokṣād api lokāprasādakaram anveṣya varjanīyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2887: pralambapādaṃ nāsīta na bāhuṃ mardayet samam ||
T04sanssr_pu:2888: evaṃ svayam apy utprekṣya dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca lokāprasādaṃ rakṣeta |
T04sanssr_pu:2889: aprasādakaravacanavarjanaṃ tu na sukaram iti smaraṇabodhanārtham upadarśyate |
T04sanssr_pu:2904: na khalu punaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvasya vāg raktā vā duṣṭā vā mūḍhā vā kliṣṭā vā |
T04sanssr_pu:2912: yeyaṃ vāgamanojñā svasantānaparasantānavināśanī tathārūpāṃ vācaṃ prahāya |
T04sanssr_pu:2913: yeyaṃ vāk snigdhā mṛdvī manojñā madhurā priyakaraṇī manāpakaraṇī [doubtful] hitakaraṇī karṇasukhā hṛdayaṃgamā premaṇī varṇaviṣpaṣṭā vijñeyā śravaṇīyā aniśritā bahujanakāntā bahujanapriyā bahujanamanāpā [doubtful] vijñapraśastā sarvasatvahitasukhāvahā manotplāvakarī manaḥprahlādanakarī svaparasantānapramodanakarī rāgadveṣamohasarvakleśāpraśāmanī tathārūpāṃ vācaṃ niścārayati yāvad itihāsapūrvakam api vacanaṃ parihārya pariharatīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:2919: na bodhisatvenaiṣā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayāparo vyāpadyeta |
T04sanssr_pu:2920: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayāparaṃ tāpayet |
T04sanssr_pu:2921: na bodhisatvena sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yat paro jānīyāt |
T04sanssr_pu:2922: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayārthā nirarthā |
T04sanssr_pu:2923: na bodhisatvena sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yayā na vidyām utpādayet |
T04sanssr_pu:2924: na sā vāg bhāṣitavyā yā satvānāṃ na hṛdayaṃgamā na paurī na karṇasukhā na sā vāg bhāṣitavyeti
T04sanssr_pu:2926: apara eka dharmo mahāyānasaṃgrahāya saṃvartate svaskhalitapratyavekṣaṇatayā sarvasatvānurakṣeti
T04sanssr_pu:2930: asya tu granthavistarasyāyaṃ piṇḍārtho bodhisatvena manasā nityaṃ dhārayitavyaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:2934: nirmāṇam iva nirmānaṃ dhārayāmy eṣa mānasam |
T04sanssr_pu:2942: tasmāt piṇḍapātrād ekaṃ pratyaṃśaṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ sthāpayati |
T04sanssr_pu:2943: dvitīyaṃ duṣkhitānāṃ tṛtīyaṃ vinipatitānāṃ caturtham ātmanā paribhuṅkte |
T04sanssr_pu:2952: tena taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya kuśalapakṣābhimukhena bhavitavyam ity ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:2954: tena grāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caratā dharmasaṃnāhaṃ saṃnahya piṇḍāya cartavyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:2961: dāntājāneyacittena pūrvadharmamanasikāram annutsṛjatā nāmiṣaprakṣiptayā santatyā piṇḍāya cartavyaṃ sāvadānacāriṇā ca bhavitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2962: yataś ca piṇḍapāto labhyate tatrānunayo na kartavyaḥ yataś ca na labhyate tatra pratighāto notpādayitavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2963: daśakulapraveśe na caikādaśāt kulād bhikṣā na labhyate |
T04sanssr_pu:2964: tathāpi na paritaptavyaṃ evaṃ ca cittam utpādayitavyam |
T04sanssr_pu:2965: evaṃ bahukṛtyā hy ete śramaṇabrāhmaṇagṛhapatayo na tair avaśyaṃ mama dātavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2966: idaṃ tāvad āścaryaṃ yan mām ete samanvāharanti |
T04sanssr_pu:2967: kaḥ punar vādo yad bhikṣāṃ dāsyanti
T04sanssr_pu:2969: ye cāsya satvāś cakṣuṣu ābhāsam āgacchanti strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2971: tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā ye me satvāś cakṣuṣā ābhāsam āgacchanti piṇḍapātaṃ vā dāsyanti tān sugatigāminaḥ kariṣyāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:2973: tena lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā piṇḍapāta saṃgṛhya samantāc caturdiśaṃ vyavalokayitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2976: yadi daridraṃ satvaṃ paśyati tena tatpiṇḍapātāt saṃvibhāgaḥ kartavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:2977: atha na kañcit satvaṃ daridraṃ paśyati |
T04sanssr_pu:2979: santy annābhāsagatāḥ satvā ye mama cakṣuṣu ābhāsaṃ nāgacchanti |
T04sanssr_pu:2980: teṣām itaḥ piṇḍapātād agraṃ pratyaṃśaṃ niryātayāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:2982: tena tat piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā tad araṇyāyatanam abhiruhya dhautapāṇinā śobhanasamācāreṇa śramaṇacāritrakalpasamatvāgatenādhiṣṭhānādhiṣṭhitena paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā sapiṇḍapātaḥ paribhoktavyaḥ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:2988: bodhiprāptaś ca punar dharmeṇa saṃgrahaṃ kariṣyāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:2989: yadi punar asya lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhavati tenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2990: lūhāhāratayā me laghuḥ kāyo bhaviṣyati prahāṇakṣama uccāraprasrāvaniṣyandanaś ca me parītto bhaviṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:2994: yadā punar asya prabhūtaḥ piṇḍapāto bhavati tatrāpi mātrābhojinā bhavitavyaṃ utsarjanadharmiṇā ca |
T04sanssr_pu:2995: tataḥ piṇḍapātād anyatarāyāṃ śilāyām avatīryaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:2996: ye kecin mṛgapakṣisaṃgā āmiṣabhojanenārthikās te dattādānāḥ paribhuñjatām iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3006: tena naivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ |puruṣo me piṇḍapātaṃ dadti na strīḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3007: strī me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na puruṣaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3008: dārako me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na dārikā |
T04sanssr_pu:3009: dārikā me piṇḍapātaṃ dadāti na dārakaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3012: capalaṃ labhe 'haṃ na kṛcchreṇa praviṣṭamātraṃ ca māṃ samanvāhareyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3015: na hīnadaridrabhojanaṃ labhe 'haṃ pratyudgaccheyur māṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3016: ime te sarve 'kuśalā manasikārā notpādayitavyaḥ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:3017: prāyeṇa hi satvā rasagṛddhā bhojanahetoḥ pāpāni karmāṇi kṛtvā narakeṣūpapadyante |
T04sanssr_pu:3018: ye ye punaḥ saṃtuṣṭā agṛddhā alulopā rasapratiprasrabdhā jihvendriyasaṃtuṣṭāḥ kiyallūhenāpi bhojanena jñāpayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:3022: | evaṃ kāśyapa piṇḍacārikeṇa bhikṣuṇā rasatṛṣṇāṃ vinivartayitvā
T04sanssr_pu:3023: nidhyaptacittena suparipakvān kulmāṣān paribhuñjatā na paritaptavyam |
T04sanssr_pu:3025: kāyasaṃdhāraṇārthaṃ mārgasaṃdhāraṇārthaṃ mayā bhojanaṃ paribhoktavyaṃ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:3026: yadi punaḥ kāśyapa piṇḍacāriko bhikṣur meghākulavṛṣṭikālasamaye vartamāne na śaknuyāt piṇḍāyāvatartuṃ
T04sanssr_pu:3027: tena maitryāhārasaṃnaddhena dharmacintāmanasikārapratiṣṭhitena dvirātraṃ trirātraṃ vā bhaktacchadacchinnena evaṃ saṃjñotpādayitavyā |
T04sanssr_pu:3028: santi yāmalaukikāḥ pretā duṣkarakarmakāriṇo ye varṣaśatena kheṭapiṇḍam apy āhāraṃ na pratilabhante tan mayā dharmayoniśaś cintāpratiṣṭhitena kāyadaurbalyaṃ vā cittadaurbalyaṃ vā notpādayitavyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:3030: na punar āryamārgabhāvanāyāṃ vīryaṃ sraṃsayiṣyāmi || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:3031: yatra kule piṇḍapātaṃ śuciṃ kārayet tatra kule āsane niṣadya dhārmī kathā kartavyā |
T04sanssr_pu:3032: yāvan na sa piṇḍapātaḥ śucīkrṭo bhavet tena piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā utthāyāsanāt prakramitavyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:3033: piṇḍacārikeṇa kāśyapa bhikṣuṇā nāvabhāsakareṇa bhavitavyaṃ na lapanā na kuhanā kartavyā ||
T04sanssr_pu:3036: lūho me piṇḍapāto rukṣo me piṇḍapāta āsīn na ca me yāvadarthaṃ bhuktaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3042: sarvam etat piṇḍacārikeṇa bhikṣuṇā na kartavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3044: yat pātre patitaṃ lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā śubhaṃ vāśubhaṃ vā tat paribhoktavyam aparitapyamānenāśayaśuddhena dharmanidhyaptibahulena |
T04sanssr_pu:3045: kāyajāpanārtham āryamārgasyopastambhārthaṃ sa piṇḍapātaḥ paribhoktavya iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3047: yasyāś cāntike piṇḍapātaṃ paribhujya na śaknoty ātmanaḥ parasya cārthaṃ paripūrayitum anujānāmy ahaṃ tasya piṇḍacārikasya bodhisatvasya nimantraṇam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3051: māṃsaṃ sarvam abhakṣyaṃ kṛpātmāno bodhisatvasyeti vadāmi
T04sanssr_pu:3055: māṃsāni ca palāṇḍūṃś ca madyāni vividhāni ca |
T04sanssr_pu:3056: gṛñjanaṃ laśunaṃ caiva yogī nityaṃ vivarjayet ||
T04sanssr_pu:3057: mrakṣaṇaṃ varjayet tailaṃ śalyaviddheṣu na svapet |
T04sanssr_pu:3058: chidrāchidreṣu satvānāṃ yac ca sthānaṃ mahābhayam || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:3059: lābhārthaṃ hanyate prāṇī māṃsārthaṃ dīyate dhanaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3062: yo 'tikramya muner vākyaṃ māṃsaṃ bhakṣeta durmatiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3064: te yānti paramaṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ pāpakaṝiṇaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3067: acoditaṃ ca naivāsti tasmān māṃsaṃ na bhakṣyayet ||
T04sanssr_pu:3068: māṃsaṃ na bhakṣyayed yogī mayā buddhaiś ca garhitaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3071: durgandhaḥ kutsanīyaś ca utmattaś cāpi jāyate |
T04sanssr_pu:3078: buddhaiś ca bodhisatvaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca vigarhitaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3079: khādate yadi nirlajja unmatto jāyate sadā ||
T04sanssr_pu:3080: brāhmaṇeṣu ca jāyante atha vā yogināṃ kule |
T04sanssr_pu:3089: mātrayā pratikūlaṃ ca yogī piṇḍaṃ samācaret ||
T04sanssr_pu:3092: tasmān na bhakṣayen māṃsam udvejajanakaṃ nṛṇāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3094: yat tu jñānavatīparivarte māṃsabhakṣaṇaṃ paṭhyate tan mahārthasādhakatvān nirdoṣam ||
T04sanssr_pu:3101: tena asmin na maitrī śaṅkāpi nāstīty adoṣaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:3105: vinaye 'pi yad anujñātaṃ tat tu trikoṭipariśuddhabhakṣaṇe na prahāṇāntarāya iti |
T04sanssr_pu:3109: tatra tatra deśanā pāṭhe śikṣāpadānām ānupūrvīṃ bandhan niśreṇīpadavinyāsayogena |
T04sanssr_pu:3111: tatra uddiṣya krṭāni pratiṣiddhāni tato 'ntaśaḥ prakṛtimṛtāny api pratiṣiddhānīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3114: śrāvakavinaye 'pi tāvad ātmārthaṃ brahmacaryavāsārthaṃ pātracīvaram api vikrīya |
T04sanssr_pu:3116: kiṃ punar aparimitajanaparitrāṇahetor bodhisatvaśarīrasya durlabhā cedṛśī kṣaṇapratilābhotsavasampad
T04sanssr_pu:3117: iti tatpradarśanārthaṃ ca bhagavatā tatra svayaṃ bhaiṣajyopayogaḥ pradarśitaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:3119: tair yadā pracāritaṃ bhavati tadā satyāṃ velāyām asatyāṃ vā teṣām imāny evaṃrūpāṇi kāyopastambhanāny upakaraṇāni na labhyante 'bhyavahartuṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3120: yad uta sarpir vā tailaṃ vā mūlaraso vā gaṇḍaraso vā phalaraso vā |
T04sanssr_pu:3121: na cānyān abhyavaharato dṛṣṭvā pratighacittam utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:3122: yadi punaḥ khalu paścādbhaktiko bodhisatvo vā glāno bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:3123: yathārūpeṇāsya glānyena jīvitāntarāyo bhavati kuśalapakṣāntarāyo vā tena niṣkaukṛtyena bhūtvā nirvicikitsakena bhaiṣajyacittam upasthāpya pratinisevyānīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3125: hrīrapatrāpyakāpair niḥ... [doubtful] pracchādanārthaṃ tu śramaṇaliṅgasaṃdarśanārtham imāni ca kāṣāyāṇi devamānuṣāsurasya lokasya
T04sanssr_pu:3135: etāni ca kāṣāyāṇy āryamārgasaṃbhārānukūlānīti kṛtvā tathā kariṣyāmo yathā naikakṣaṇam api sakaṣāyāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi dhārayiṣyāma iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3137: ye punas te kāśyapa vaidaryā asaṃyatā itaḥ śramaṇaguṇadharmād uddhurāḥ kāye kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi dhārayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:3140: tatra kāśyapa pratyekanarake śramaṇarūpapratirūpeṇa tāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryante ādīptacailā ādīptaśīrṣā ādīptapātrā ādīptāsanā ādīptaśayanāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3141: yaḥ kaścit tatra teṣām upabhogaparibhogaḥ sa sarva ādīptaḥ saṃprajvalita ekajvālībhūtaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3142: tatra taiḥ śramaṇavarṇarūpeṇa duṣkhāṃ vedanām anubhavantīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3144: yadi bhaved abhyavakāśiko bodhisatvo glānakāyo 'pratibalakāyas tena vihārakṣitenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3146: tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā vihārasya eva kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya ghaṭiṣyāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:3147: tatra ca vihāre na gṛddhim utpādayāmi nādhyavasānaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3149: kartavyo dānapatīnām anugraho nāsmābhir ātmambharibhir bhavitavyam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3151: te śayyāṃ kalpayanto dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:3152: pādasyopari pādam ādhāya cīvaraiḥ asaṃvṛtakāyāḥ smṛtāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3155: na pārśvasukham anytra yāvad evaiṣāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ sthitaye jāpanāyai |
T04sanssr_pu:3156: ity anayā diśā sarvaparibhogāḥ satvārtham adhiṣṭhātavyāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3165: atha tasyām eva parṣadi yogācārāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dve śate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā prarudite
T04sanssr_pu:3168: na punar aprāptaphalā ekapiṇḍapātam api śraddhādeyasya paribhokṣyāmaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:3170: sādhu sādhu kulaputrā evaṃrūpair lajjābhiḥ kaukṛtyasaṃpannaiḥ paralokāvadyabhayadarśibhir idaṃ pravacanaṃ śobhate ||
T04sanssr_pu:3175: yadi bhikṣavo bhikṣur yukto yogācāro mama śikṣāyāṃ pratipannaḥ sarvasaṃskāreṣv anityadarśī
T04sanssr_pu:3176: sarvasaṃskāraduḥkhaviditaḥ sarvadharmeṣv annātmādhimuktiḥ śāntanirvāṇābhikāṅkṣī sumerumātrair ālopaiḥ śraddhādeyaṃ bhuñjīta |
T04sanssr_pu:3178: yeṣāṃ ca dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ sakāśāc chraddhādeyaṃ paribhuktaṃ tatas teṣāṃ dāyakadānapatīnāṃ maharddhikaḥ puṇyavipāko bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:3181: agram idam aupadhikānāṃ puṇyakriyāvastūnāṃ yeyaṃ maitracittasamāpattiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3182: tatra kāśyapa yo bhikṣur dāyakasya dānapater antikāc cīvarapiṇḍapātaṃ paribhujyāpramāṇaṃ cetaḥsamādhiṃ samāpadyate 'pramāṇas tasya dāyakasya dānapateḥ puṇyakriyāvipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3183: syāt kāśyapa trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāsamudrāṇāṃ kṣayo na tv eva tasya puṇyaniṣyandanasya kaścit kṣaya iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3184: tad evaṃ piṇḍapātagamanaārambhe bhojanārambhe vā triṣu sthāneṣu smṛtir upasthāpyā dāyakānugrahe
T04sanssr_pu:3189: tatrāpi tāvad imāṃ trisamayarājoktāṃ vidyāṃ maṇḍalasamayārtham uccārayet |
T04sanssr_pu:3197: athavā tathāgatahṛdayam aṣṭasahastraṃ japet salaukikalokottaramaṇḍalapraviṣṭo bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:3210: anenādikarmikā api satveṣv anantaṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti |
T04sanssr_pu:3211: ayam eva paramāṃ rakṣāṃ mārādibhyaḥ sarvaduṣṭebhyaḥ karoti |
T04sanssr_pu:3212: hastatāḍena bhasmanā sarṣapair udakena dṛṣṭyā manasā vā sīmābandhaṃ karoti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3214: vanakusumāni vā caitye pratimāyāṃ saddharmapustake vā samāhito nivedayet ||
T04sanssr_pu:3216: buddhabodhisatvālambanena sarvasatvārthābhilāṣiṇā ca cittena bhadracarividhipūrvakaṃ ca japtavyaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:3223: adhimukticaryā śikṣāpadeṣv acalasya nirvicikitsasya duḥśīlapūrvasyāpi sidhyati |
T04sanssr_pu:3226: bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ yasya niḥsaṃgā ca matir bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:3227: vicikitsā naiva kartavyā tasyedaṃ sidhyati dhruvam |
T04sanssr_pu:3229: bodhicittadṛḍhatā cātra pṛthagjanacalacittatāyā niyamārtham uktā na tu bhūmipraviṣṭam adhikṛtya
T04sanssr_pu:3234: tathā kuto mamālpapuṇyasya siddhir iti nīcacittapratiṣedhaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3235: na cātikrāntadurgater utsāhormibahulasyopacitāprameyapuṇyaskandhasya bhūmipraviṣṭasyāyaṃ pūrvokto doṣaḥ saṃbhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:3236: atra ca mantrāṇām ajñānān nādhikākṣarapāṭhe doṣo 'sti |
T04sanssr_pu:3239: kiṃtu śraddhāvegaṃ bodhicittavegaṃ sarvotsargavegaṃ ca pramāṇīkṛtyāvicārataḥ pravartitavyam avaśyaṃ buddhabodhisatvam ihaiva yatheṣṭasiddhiś ca bhavati ||
T04sanssr_pu:3251: namo 'stu te agrograśāsānānāṃ raṇa haṃ phula sphāṭa vajrottame svāhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:3254: bhojanapānaśayanāsanavasanapūjopakaraṇāni cābhimantritena jalena dṛṣṭyā manasā vā rakṣeta
T04sanssr_pu:3263: anena prathamaṃ piṇḍam aṣṭābhimantritaṃ bhuñjīta bhaiṣajyarājatāṃ buddhabodhisatvānām anusmṛtya
T04sanssr_pu:3286: ya imāṃ vidyāṃ sakṛc chṛṇoti sa sapta varṣāṇy ahinā na daśyate |
T04sanssr_pu:3288: yaś cainaṃ ahir daśati saptadhāsya sphuṭen mūrddhā arjakasyeva mañjarī ||
T04sanssr_pu:3289: ya imāṃ vidyāṃ dhārayati sa yāvajjīvam ahinā na daśyate |
T04sanssr_pu:3291: imāni ca mantrapadāni sarpasya purato na vaktavyāni yatkāraṇaṃ sarpo mriyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:3321: iti hi bhikṣavo jāṅgulyāṃ vidyāyāṃ udāhṛtāyāṃ sarvabhūtasamāgate sarvaṃ tathāvitathānanyathābhūtaṃ satyam aviparītam aviparyastaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3350: | rakṣa māṃ sarvasatvāṃś ca sarvabhayebhyaḥ sarvopāye sopasargebhyaḥ svāhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:3363: imām api vidyām annantajātismarahetuṃ mahāprabhāvāṃ saptapañcāśadakṣarāṃ vidyādharapiṭakopanibaddhāṃ sarvabhayarakṣārthaṃ prayuñjīta ||
T04sanssr_pu:3377: namo sabbasammasaṃbuddhāṇaṃ sijjhantu me mantapadāḥ svāhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:3382: tatra yadi vismṛtya paradravyam ātmabharaṇatṛṣṇayā paribhuṅkte kliṣṭāpattim āpadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:3387: satvasvāmikais tu bhogaiḥ satvasvāmika evātmabhāvaḥ saṃrakṣata ity adoṣaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3388: na hi dāsasya nityaṃ svāmikarmavyāpṛtasya svadravyam asti yena varteta
T04sanssr_pu:3391: na caikāntasvāmyarthaparasya dāsasya vyādhyādiviklavamateḥ svāminam annanujñāpyāpi bhuñjānasya kaścid doṣaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3392: nāpy evaṃ kurvāṇasya bodhisatvasyāntike kasyacid viditavṛttāntasyāpy aprasādo yujyate mātsaryatyāgacittāparijñānāt
T04sanssr_pu:3393: na cātra nyāye kaścit saṃdeho yuktaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3394: sarvotsargo hi pūrvam eva bhagavatkaṇṭhoktyā pratipāditaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3396: | tasya spaṣṭāvabodhārtham ayaṃ nyāyo 'bhiyukto na tu svārthāpekṣayeti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3399: bhogapuṇyarakṣā saptamaḥ paricchedaḥ evaṃ tāvad ātmabhāvarakṣā veditavyā |
T04sanssr_pu:3401: tatra sukṛtārambhiṇā bhāvyaṃ mātrajñena ca sarvata iti śikṣāpadād asya bhogarakṣā na duṣkarā
T04sanssr_pu:3409: alpādhamabhogenāpi kāryasiddhau satyāṃ svayam anyair vā bahūttamabhoganāśanopekṣā na kāryeti
T04sanssr_pu:3413: adhikasatvārthaśaktes tulyaśakter vā bodhisatvasyādhikatulyakuśalāntarāyakarau tyāgātyāgau na kāryāv iti siddhaṃ bhavatīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3415: yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputrābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvo bodhyaṅgair abhiyuktas tena kathaṃ dānaṃ dātavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3420: yaś ca śāriputra gṛhī bodhisatvo gaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saptaratnapratipūrṇāni kṛtvā tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhyo dānaṃ dadyād |
T04sanssr_pu:3421: yaś ca śāriputra pravrajyāparyāpanno bodhisatva ekāṃ catuṣpadikāṃ gāthāṃ prakāśayed ayam eva tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati |
T04sanssr_pu:3422: na śāriputra tathāgatena pravrajitasyāmiṣadānam anujñātaṃ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:3423: yasya khalu punaḥ śāriputra pātrāgataḥ pātraparyāpanno lābho bhaved dhārmiko dharmalabdhaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:3425: sacet punaḥ kaścid evāgatya pātraṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā yāceta
T04sanssr_pu:3428: sacet punas tasyonaṃ cīvaraṃ bhaved yan niśritya brahmacaryavāsaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3432: sacet punaḥ śāriputra bodhisatvaḥ tricīvaraṃ parityajya yācanakaguruko bhaven na tenālpecchatā āsevitā bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:3433: yas tu khalu punaḥ śāriputrābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvas tena dharma āsevitavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3435: anyathā hy ekasaṃgrahārthaṃ mahataḥ satvarāśes tasya ca satvasya bodhisatvāśayaparikarmāntarāyān mahato 'rthasya hāniḥ kṛtā syād |
T04sanssr_pu:3441: vidhir ātmany uktaḥ so 'nyasminn api bodhisatve pratipādya iti kuto gamyate |
T04sanssr_pu:3456: tathā ca dharmasaṅgītau sārthavāho bodhisatva āha |
T04sanssr_pu:3457: yo bhagavan bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ prathamataraṃ bodhim icchati nātmanaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3460: kiṃ tu satvārthahānibhayād ayogye satve subharaṃ nāropayati |
T04sanssr_pu:3461: yatra tu satvārthahāniṃ na paśyati tatra svayaṃ kṛtam anyena vā jagad dhitam ācaritam iti ko viśeṣo |
T04sanssr_pu:3462: yad ayam aparabodhisatvakuśalasiddhaye na svakuśalam utsṛjati |
T04sanssr_pu:3465: atha tadduṣkhena me bādhā nāstīty upekṣate |
T04sanssr_pu:3468: catvāra ime kāśyapa bodhisatvapratirūpakā ity ārabhyoktaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3470: tasmād ugraparipṛcchāvidhinā pūrvavad ātmā garhaṇīyaḥ eṣā tu bodhisatvaśikṣā yathāryanirārambheṇa dharmasaṅgītisūtre nirdiṣṭā |
T04sanssr_pu:3477: yan maitrīṃ ca mahākaruṇāṃ ca na tyajanti |
T04sanssr_pu:3481: yat kāyajīvitaṃ ca sarvakuśalamūlaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ niryātayanti na ca pratikāraṃ kāṅkṣanti
T04sanssr_pu:3484: yat pūrvataraṃ satvānāṃ bodhim icchanti nātmana iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3489: yena dātur mahādakṣiṇīye mahārthadānān mahāpuṇyasāgaravistaro dṛśyate |
T04sanssr_pu:3490: anyathā tu kevalam eva vighātino maraṇaṃ syāt ||
T04sanssr_pu:3492: ya eṣa te mahārāja varṣaśatasahasreṇa parivyayo 'tra praviṣṭaḥ sa sarvaḥ piṇḍīkṛtyaikasya bhikṣor yātrā bhaved evaṃ pratyekaṃ sarvabhikṣūṇāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3493: yaś coddeśasvādhyāyābhiyukto bodhisatvaḥ sagauravo dharmakamaḥ śraddhādeyam āhāraṃ parigṛhyaivaṃ cittam utpādayet |
T04sanssr_pu:3495: asya kuśalasyaiṣa deyadharmaparityāgaḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaitīti
T04sanssr_pu:3507: na rūpahetor na varṇahetor na yaśohetoḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3514: sa evaṃrūpeṇa śīlaskandhena samanvāgato bodhisatvo daśabhir dharmair na hīyate |
T04sanssr_pu:3517: tatra ca bhavaty apramatto bodhipratikāṅkṣī buddhadarśanam abhikāṅkṣate |
T04sanssr_pu:3518: evaṃ brahmatvād buddhadarśanābhedyapratilambhād dharmaśravaṇān na parihīyate |
T04sanssr_pu:3521: evaṃ śīlaskandhapratiṣṭhito bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sadā namaḥkṛto bhavati devaiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3524: sadā pūjito bhavati gandharvaiḥ sadāpacāyitaś ca bhavati nāgendrāsurendraiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3528: śāstṛsaṃmataś ca bhavati sadevakasya lokasyānukampakaś ca bhavati sarvasatvānāṃ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:3531: yad utākṣaṇagatiṃ na gacchaty anyatra satvaparipākāt |
T04sanssr_pu:3535: evaṃ pūrvotsṛṣṭasyāpi puṇyasya kleśavaśāt punar upādīyamānasya rakṣā kāryā |
T04sanssr_pu:3536: puṇyadānād api yat puṇyaṃ tato 'pi na vipākaḥ prārthanīyo 'nyatra
T04sanssr_pu:3541: dattvā ca na vipratisāracittam utpādayitavyam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3543: vipratisārāt pāpavat puṇyasyāpi kṣayaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3548: | pāpasya daurmanasyenaiva puṇyasya saumanasyenāpattiḥ satvārthaṃ nirāmiṣacittasya prakāśayataḥ
T04sanssr_pu:3549: yathā ratnameghe vaidyadṛṣṭāntena ātmotkarṣo nirdoṣa uktaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3550: punaḥ puṇyarakṣā kāmo lābhasatkārabhītaḥ syād unnatiṃ varjayet sadā |
T04sanssr_pu:3551: bodhisatvo prasannaḥ syād dharme vimatim utsṛjet ||
T04sanssr_pu:3553: caturbhiḥ kāśyapa dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya bodhisatvasyotpannotpannāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ parihīyante
T04sanssr_pu:3554: yaiḥ caturbhir muktāḥ na vardhante kuśaladharmaiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3561: paśyadhvaṃ bhikṣava etaṃ bhikṣuṃ keśanakhastūpe sarvāṅgena praṇipatya cittam abhiprasādayantam
T04sanssr_pu:3563: anena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā yāvatī bhūmir ākrāntādharaśītiyojanasahasrāṇi yāvat kāñcanacakraṃ
T04sanssr_pu:3564: atrāntare yāvantyā vālikās tāvanty anena bhikṣuṇā cakravartirājyasahasrāṇi paribhoktavyāni
T04sanssr_pu:3565: yāvad athāyuṣmān upālir yena bhagavān tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat |
T04sanssr_pu:3566: yad uktaṃ bhagavatāsya bhikṣor evaṃ mahānti kuśalamūlāni |
T04sanssr_pu:3567: kutremāni bhagavan kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti |
T04sanssr_pu:3568: nāham upāle evaṃ kṣatiṃ copahatiṃ ca samanupaśyāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:3570: atropāle imāni mahānti kuśalamūlāni tanutvaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti |
T04sanssr_pu:3571: tasmāt tarhy upāle evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yad dagdhasthūṇāyām api cittaṃ na pradūṣayiṣyāmaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3574: pratighaḥ pratigha iti kalpaśatopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ pratihanti tenocyate pratigha iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3575: āryagaṇḍavyūhasūtre ca samantasatvaparitrāṇy ojasaḥ striyā rātridevatayā pūrvāvadānaṃ kathayantyābhihitaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:3577: varṇād api balād api parihīyante smeti |
T04sanssr_pu:3578: atra ca na kadācid unnatiḥ kāryeti pradarśanārthaṃ sadety ucyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:3581: iha kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ sumerumātram api ratnarāśiṃ labhamānaḥ pratigṛhṇāti |
T04sanssr_pu:3586: taddhetoḥ tatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ mahāvāriskandhāvaṣṭabdā iva saṃsārasāgare unmajjanimajjanaṃ kurvanti |
T04sanssr_pu:3587: tad eṣāṃ bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya |
T04sanssr_pu:3591: yathā duṣkhitānāṃ ca sarvasatvānām upajīvyaṃ karoti |taṃ ca dānapatiṃ samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayatīti
T04sanssr_pu:3595: yadi punar asya taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ tannidānaṃ kīrtiśabdaśloko bhavati tatra nonnāmajāto bhavati na mānajāto na madajātaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:3597: na cireṇa kālena yasya cāyaṃ kīrtiślokaśabdaḥ samutthito yaiś ca samutthāpito yaś ca kīrtiśabdaślokas trayam apy etat sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:3598: tatra kaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo 'nityeṣu na ca sthiteṣu dharmeṣv adhruveṣv annāśvāsikeṣv anunayacittam utpādayed unnato bhaven mānadarpito vā |
T04sanssr_pu:3599: evaṃ hi bodhisatvo lābhasatkārakīrtiśabdaślokeṣu sūpasthitasmṛtir viharatīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3601: caṇḍālakumāropamāś ca loke viharanti nīcanīcena manasā |
T04sanssr_pu:3602: mānamadadarpādhigatāś ca bhavanti paiśunyasaṃjñāyāḥ satatasamitaṃ pratyupasthitatvād iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3604: iha kulaputrābhiniṣkrāntagṛhavāsaḥ pravrajito bodhisatvo mṛtakasadṛśo 'haṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitānām iti nihatamāno bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:3605: vairūpyaṃ me 'bhyudgataṃ vivarṇāni ca me vāsāṃsi prāvṛtāny anyaś ca me ākalpaḥ saṃvṛtta iti nihatamāno bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:3606: muṇḍaḥ pātrapāṇiḥ kulāt kulam upasaṃkramāmi bhikṣāhetor bhikṣānidānam iti nihatamāno bhavati
T04sanssr_pu:3607: nīcanīcena cittena caṇḍālakumārasadṛśena piṇḍāya carāmīti nihatamāno bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:3609: parapratibaddhā ca me jīviketi nihatamāno bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:3611: ārādhanīyā me ācāryagurudakṣiṇīyā iti nihatamāno bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:3613: yad uta tena tenācāragocarasamudācāreṇeti nihatamāno bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:3615: kruddhānāṃ vyāpannacittānāṃ satvānāṃ madhye kṣāntibahulo vihariṣyāmīti nihatamāno bhavatīti
T04sanssr_pu:3621: sa kiyad dhīnānām api satvānāṃ rūpavikalānām apy avanamati praṇamati dharmagrāhyatām upādāyeti
T04sanssr_pu:3623: syād yathāpi nāma bhagavan yadā mahāsāgaraḥ pratisaṃtiṣṭhate tadā nimne pṛthivīpradeśe saṃtiṣṭhate
T04sanssr_pu:3624: tasya nimnatvād alpakṛcchreṇa sarvanadyaś ca sarvapraśravaṇāni ca prapatanti |
T04sanssr_pu:3625: evam eva bhagavan nirmānasya gurudakṣiṇīyagauravasya bodhisatvasyālpakṛcchreṇa tāni gambhīrāṇi dharmasukhāni śrotendriyasyābhāsam āgacchanti |
T04sanssr_pu:3627: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan yo bodhisatvo mānonnato bhavati mānastabdhaḥ na ca gurudakṣiṇīyebhyo 'vanamati na praṇamati veditavyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:3633: dharmabhāṇakānāṃ viśiṣṭadharmādhigatānām udāradharmadeśakānāṃ mahāyānasamārūḍhānāṃ nirvāṇapathavidhijñānāṃ dhāraṇīsūtrāntarājapratilabdhānāṃ nāvanamati |
T04sanssr_pu:3637: mārakarma dharmaśravaṇasāṃkathye ca niṣaṇṇae udāradharmavege samutpanne dharmabhāṇakasya sādhukāraṃ na prayacchati mā kaścid asmin praśaṃsatīti mārakarma ||
T04sanssr_pu:3643: adhimānaṃ cotpādyājānann abudhyamāno varṇārhāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ varṇaṃ praticchādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:3648: ayaṃ dharmo 'yaṃ vinayo bhūtam idaṃ buddhavacanam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:3656: vṛddhasthavirāṇāṃ ciracaritabrahmacaryāṇāṃ na pratyupatiṣṭhate na ca pratyudgacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:3670: kiṃ kuśalaṃ kim akuśalaṃ kiṃ karaṇīyaṃ kiṃ kṛtaṃ dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya bhavati
T04sanssr_pu:3681: sa evaṃ dharmavihārī sthānam etad vidyate yasmin mithyā mahāprapātaṃ patet |
T04sanssr_pu:3682: atha ca punar bodhicittabalādhīnād aiśvaryaṃ pratilabhate |
T04sanssr_pu:3687: yāni parivarjya bodhisatvā daśa jñānakarmāṇi pratilabhante |
T04sanssr_pu:3699: satvakṣetraṃ bodhisatvasya buddhakṣetraṃ yataś ca buddhakṣetrād buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhāgamo bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:3702: sarvaṃ sucaritaṃ duścaritaṃ ca satvān niśritya pravartate |
T04sanssr_pu:3706: iha bho jinaputrāḥ prathamacittotpādiko bodhisatvaḥ ādita eva sarvasatvānām antike daśaprakāraṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:3709: hitacittatāṃ sukhacittatāṃ dāyācittatāṃ snigdhacittatāṃ priyacittatāṃ anugrahacittatāṃ ārakṣācittatāṃ samacittatāṃ ācāryacittatāṃ śāstṛcittatāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3713: parāṃś ca sarvasatvaśiṣyatvābhyupagame pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīty āśvāsaṃ pratilabhate ||
T04sanssr_pu:3719: lokaprasādānurakṣārthaṃ tv āsanapādaprakhyālanakarma kurvatāpi cetasā strīṣu vākṣaṇaprāpteṣu vā vinipatiteṣu bodhisatvena premagauravābhyāsaḥ kāryaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:3720: uktaṃ hi gaṇḍavyūhe tasya samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya tasmin mahāsiṃhāsane sarvaḥ sa janakāyo 'bhimukhaḥ prāñjalisthito 'bhūt |
T04sanssr_pu:3722: sa khalu sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo rājā teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ saha darśanenāttamanaskataro rājñānena ca trisāhasracakravartirājyapratilābhenāsīmāprāptakalpaparyavasānena |
T04sanssr_pu:3725: teṣāṃ samavadhānena mahatī prītir adhyavasānam utpatet taddarśanāvitṛptatayā |
T04sanssr_pu:3726: evam eva kulaputra rājñaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ saha darśanena mahāprītivegāḥ saṃjātāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3727: cittatuṣṭisukham avakrāntaṃ mahāṃś cittodagratāvegaḥ prādurbhūto yāvat teṣu sarvayācanakeṣu ekaputrakasaṃjñā mātāpitṛsaṃjñā dakṣiṇīyasaṃjñā kalyāṇamitrasaṃjñā varṇasaṃjñā durlabhasaṃjñā duṣkarakārakasaṃjñā bahukarasaṃjñā paramopakārisaṃjñā bodhimārgopastambhasaṃjñā ācāryaśāstṛsaṃjñotpadyeteti evam anyagatabhāve satvānām agratogamanopasthānādiprasaṅge sarvotsargaṃ smaret |
T04sanssr_pu:3731: athavā svāmyaprasādabhīteneva tatprasādārthineva tadājñāsaṃpādanā manasi kartavyā
T04sanssr_pu:3736: mā bhāya bhikṣu mā bhāya bhikṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:3738: āhara bhikṣu cīvarāṇi yāvat te dhopāmi
T04sanssr_pu:3739: | evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat |
T04sanssr_pu:3744: tena hy ānanda tvam etasya bhikṣusya cīvarāṇi dhova |
T04sanssr_pu:3746: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando tasya glānasya bhikṣusya cīvarāṇi dhovati |
T04sanssr_pu:3748: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānandas taṃ glānaṃ bhikṣuṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu cānuparigṛhya bahirdhā haritvā snāpayet |
T04sanssr_pu:3751: ca| yān ārādhya mahat tvaṃ virādhya kaṣṭāṃ vipattim āpnoti |
T04sanssr_pu:3752: prāṇaparityāgair api teṣāṃ nanu toṣaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:3753: ete te vai satvāḥ prasādya yān siddham āgatā bahavaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3755: ete cintāmaṇayo bhadraghaṭā dhenavaś ca kāmadughāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3756: guruvac ca devateva ca tasmād ārādhanīyās te ||
T04sanssr_pu:3758: satvārādhanam utsṛjya niṣkṛtiḥ kā parā bhavet ||
T04sanssr_pu:3759: śirasā dhārayām āsa purā nātho yathepsitam |
T04sanssr_pu:3761: bhindanti dehaṃ praviśanty avīcīm yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt ||
T04sanssr_pu:3762: mahāpakāriṣv api tena sarvaṃ kalyāṇam evācaraṇīyam eṣu ||
T04sanssr_pu:3763: svayaṃ mama svāmina eva tāvad yad artham ātmany api nirvyapekṣāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3764: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam ||
T04sanssr_pu:3765: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum |
T04sanssr_pu:3769: satvavyathāyām api tadvad eva na prītyupāyo 'sti mahākṛpāṇām ||
T04sanssr_pu:3772: tad adya pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yatkheditās te munayaḥ kṣamantām ||
T04sanssr_pu:3773: ārādhanāyādya tathāgatānāṃ sarvātmanā dāsyam upaimi loke |
T04sanssr_pu:3774: kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janaughāḥ nighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:3775: ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvam idaṃ jagat taiḥ kṛpātmabhir naiva hi saṃśayo 'tra |
T04sanssr_pu:3778: tathāgatārādhanam etad eva svārthasya saṃsādhanam etad eva |
T04sanssr_pu:3779: lokasya duṣkhāpaham etad eva tasmān mamāstu vratam etad eva ||
T04sanssr_pu:3782: yasmān naiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3783: tathā na durbalaṃ kaṃcid aparāddhaṃ vimānayet ||
T04sanssr_pu:3784: yasmān narakapālāś ca kṛpāvantaś ca tadbalaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3785: tasmād ārādhayet satvān bhṛtyaś caṇḍanṛpaṃ yathā ||
T04sanssr_pu:3786: kupitaḥ kiṃ nṛpaḥ kuryād yena syān narakavyathā |
T04sanssr_pu:3788: tuṣṭaḥ kiṃ nṛpatir dadyād yad buddhatvasamaṃ bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:3791: ihaiva saubhāgyayaśaḥ sausthityaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi ||
T04sanssr_pu:3794: maitrāśayaś ca yat pūjyaḥ satvamāhātmyam eva tat |
T04sanssr_pu:3795: buddhaprasādād yat puṇyaṃ buddhamāhātmyam eva tat ||
T04sanssr_pu:3796: ata eva hi candrapradīpasūtre maitrībhāvaphalam udbhāvitam |
T04sanssr_pu:3806: iha bodhisatva ekākī rahogataḥ pravivekasthito naivaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:3810: ye tv anye śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā sarve te saṃkīrṇavihāriṇaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3814: iha bodhisatvo vīryam ārabhamāṇo na tan mahad vīryam āsvādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:3818: ko hi nāma saprajñajātīyaḥ svakarmābhiyuktaḥ parāṃś codayet ||
T04sanssr_pu:3820: eṣa tu puṇyarakṣāyāḥ saṃkṣepo yad bodhipariṇāmanā ||
T04sanssr_pu:3822: na hi bodhipariṇāmitasya kuśalamūlasyāntarā kaścit parikṣayo yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāt |
T04sanssr_pu:3823: tad yathāpi nāma bhadanta śāradvatīputra mahāsamudrapatitasyodakabindor nāntarāsti kṣayo yāvan na kalpaparyavasāna |
T04sanssr_pu:3834: yāni ca tāni mahānagareṣu mahāśmaśānāni bhavanty annekaprāṇiśatasahasrākīrṇāni |
T04sanssr_pu:3835: tatrāpi sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo mahāntam ātmabhāvaṃ mṛtaṃ kālagatam upadarśayati |
T04sanssr_pu:3836: tatra te tiryagyonigatāḥ satvā yāvad arthaṃ māṃsaṃ paribhujyāyuḥparyante mṛtāḥ kālagatāḥ sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante |
T04sanssr_pu:3837: sa caiva teṣāṃ hetur bhavati yāvat parinirvāṇāya |
T04sanssr_pu:3841: ye me mṛtasya kālagatasya māṃsaṃ paribhuñjīran |
T04sanssr_pu:3842: sa eva teṣāṃ hetur bhavet svargotpattaye yāvat parinirvāṇāya tasya śīlavataḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3847: sa dharmakāyaprabhāvito darśanenāpi satvānām arthaṃ karoti |
T04sanssr_pu:3849: tad yathāpi nāma śāntamate jīvakena vaidyarājena sarvabhaiṣajyāni samudānīya bhaiṣajyatarusaṃhātam ayaṃ dārikārūpaṃ kṛtaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ sukṛtaṃ suniṣṭhitaṃ suparikarmakṛtaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3850: sāgacchati gacchati tiṣṭhati niṣīdati śayyāṃ ca kalpayati |
T04sanssr_pu:3851: tatra ye āgacchanty āturā mahātmāno rājāno vā rājamātrā vā śreṣṭhigṛhapatyamātyakoṭṭarājāno vā |
T04sanssr_pu:3852: tān sa jīvako vaidyarājas tayā bhaiṣajyadārikayā sārddhaṃ saṃyojayati |
T04sanssr_pu:3853: teṣāṃ samanantarasaṃyogam āpannānāṃ sarvavyādhayaḥ prasrabhyante 'rāgāś ca bhavanti sukhino nirvikārāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3854: paśya śāntamate jīvakasya vaidyarājasya laukikavyādhicikitsājñānaṃ yady anyeṣāṃ vaidyānāṃ saṃvidyate |
T04sanssr_pu:3855: evam eva śāntamate tasya dharmakāyaprabhāvitasya bodhisatvasya yāvantaḥ satvāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā rāgadoṣamohasaṃtaptāḥ kāyaṃ spṛśanti |
T04sanssr_pu:3856: teṣāṃ saṃspṛṣṭamātrāṇāṃ sarvakleśāḥ prasrabhyante vigatasaṃtāpaṃ ca kāyaṃ saṃjānanti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3859: kiṃ ca aśodhane doṣam āha |tṛṇachannaṃ yathā śasyaṃ rogaiḥ sīdati naidhate |
T04sanssr_pu:3860: buddhāṅkuras tathā vṛddhiṃ kleśachanno na gacchati ||
T04sanssr_pu:3867: caturbhir maitreya dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpam abhibhavati
T04sanssr_pu:3873: tatra vidūṣaṇāsamudācāro 'kuśalaṃ karmādhyacārati tatra tatraiva ca vipratisārabahulī bhavati
T04sanssr_pu:3874: tatra pratipakṣasamudācāraḥ kṛtvāpy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale karmaṇy atyarthābhiyogaṃ gataḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:3878: ebhir maitreya caturbhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ kṛtopacitaṃ pāpam abhibhavatīti
T04sanssr_pu:3882: ye ca daśadiśi loke tiṣṭhanti dvipadottamāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:3883: yac ca me pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ sudāruṇaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3886: kuśalaṃ cāprajānatā yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā ||
T04sanssr_pu:3888: tāruṇyamadamattena yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā ||
T04sanssr_pu:3890: annādīnavadarśinā yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā ||
T04sanssr_pu:3894: atṛptadhanadoṣeṇa yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā ||
T04sanssr_pu:3896: śāṭhyadāridryadoṣeṇa yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā ||
T04sanssr_pu:3898: annaiśvaryagatenāpi yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā ||
T04sanssr_pu:3900: kṣutpipāsārditenāpi yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā ||
T04sanssr_pu:3901: pānārthaṃ bhojanārthaṃ ca vastrārthaṃ strīṣu hetunā |
T04sanssr_pu:3902: vicitraiḥ kleśasaṃtāpair yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā ||
T04sanssr_pu:3904: yat kṛtam īdṛśai rūpais tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham ||
T04sanssr_pu:3905: yat tu buddheṣu dharmeṣu śrāvakeṣu tathaiva ca |
T04sanssr_pu:3906: agauravaṃ kṛtaṃ syād dhi tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham ||
T04sanssr_pu:3907: yat tu pratyekabuddheṣu bodhisatveṣu vā punaḥ |agauravaṃ kṛtaṃ syād dhi
T04sanssr_pu:3910: agauravaṃ kṛtaṃ syād dhi tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham ||
T04sanssr_pu:3911: saddharmaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ syād ajñānaṃ tena me sadā |
T04sanssr_pu:3912: mātāpitṛṣv agauravaṃ tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham ||
T04sanssr_pu:3914: rāgadveṣeṇa mohena tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham ||
T04sanssr_pu:3917: yat tu pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā kalpaśateṣu ca |
T04sanssr_pu:3921: yatra yatra cariṣyāmi na cāsti me balaṃ kvacit ||
T04sanssr_pu:3922: sarve kāruṇikā buddhāḥ sarve bhayaharā jage |
T04sanssr_pu:3923: atyayaṃ pratigṛhṇantu mocayantu ca māṃ bhayāt ||
T04sanssr_pu:3926: sarvaṃ pāpaṃ deśayāmi yat tu pūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā |
T04sanssr_pu:3927: yac ca etarhi me pāpaṃ tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham ||
T04sanssr_pu:3929: na chādayāmi tat pāpaṃ yad bhaven mama duṣkṛtam ||
T04sanssr_pu:3930: trividhaṃ kāyikaṃ karma vacasā ca caturvidham |
T04sanssr_pu:3931: manasā triprakāreṇa tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham ||
T04sanssr_pu:3933: kṛtaṃ daśavidhaṃ karma tat sarvaṃ deśayāmy aham ||
T04sanssr_pu:3934: yac ca me pāpakaṃ karma anniṣṭaphaladāyakaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3935: tat sarvaṃ deśayiṣyāmi buddhānāṃ purataḥ sthitaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:3936: bhavagatisaṃkaṭe bālabuddhinā pāpaṃ yan me kṛtaṃ sudāruṇam |
T04sanssr_pu:3937: daśabalam agrataḥ sthitaḥ tat sarvaṃ pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:3938: deśayāmi ca tat pāpaṃ yan mayā saṃcitaṃ janmasaṃkaṭe vividhaiḥ kāyapracārasaṃkaṭair bhavasaṃkaṭalokasaṃkaṭe cāpalacalacittasaṃkaṭe mūrkhabālakṛtakleśasaṃkaṭe
T04sanssr_pu:3940: bhayasaṃkaṭarāgasaṃkaṭe doṣamohatamasaṃkaṭair api kṣaṇasaṃkaṭe kālasaṃkaṭe puṇyopārjanasaṃkaṭair api |
T04sanssr_pu:3943: viśeṣatas tu bodhisatvāpattīnāṃ gurvīṇāṃ laghvīnāṃ deśanāryopāliparipṛcchāyām uktā |
T04sanssr_pu:3946: saced upāle mahāyānasaṃprasthito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo gaṅgānadīvālikopamā rāgapratisaṃyuktā āpattīr āpadyeta |
T04sanssr_pu:3947: yāṃ caikato dveṣasaṃprayuktām āpattim āpadyeta bodhisatvayānaṃ pramāṇīkṛtya ||
T04sanssr_pu:3949: iyaṃ tābhyo gurutarā āpattir yeyaṃ dveṣasaṃyuktā |
T04sanssr_pu:3955: na tatra bodhisatvasya chalaṃ na bhayaṃ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:3956: tasmāt tarhi tvām upāle yāḥ kāścana rāgapratisaṃyuktā āpattayaḥ sarvas tā annāpattaya iti vadāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:3961: tatropāle ye 'nnupāyakuśalā bodhisatvās te rāgapratisaṃyuktābhya āpattibhyo bibhyati |
T04sanssr_pu:3962: ye punar upāyakuśalā bodhisatvās te dveṣasaṃprayuktābhya āpattibhyo bibhyati na rāgapratisaṃyuktābhya iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3967: kevalayā ca kṛpayā kleśabalād acireṇa kṛpāhāniḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:3969: tad yathā kulaputra maṃtravidyādharaḥ puruṣo rājñā pañcapāśakena bandhanena baddhaḥ syāt |
T04sanssr_pu:3970: sa yadā kāṅkṣeta prakramaṇāya tadaikamantravidyābalena sarvabandhanāni chittvā prakramet |
T04sanssr_pu:3971: evam eva kulaputropāyakuśalo bodhisatvaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇai ratiṃ vindati taiś cākīrṇo viharati
T04sanssr_pu:3972: yadā ca punar ākāṅkṣate tadā prajñābalādhīnena ekena ca sarvajñatācittena sarvakāmaguṇān prabhujya cyuto brahmalokae upapadyatae iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:3976: parārthasiddhiṃ vā svārthād gurutarām adhimucyamānaḥ kopaparavattayāpi param anuśāsyānutāpapūrvakam āyatyāṃ saṃvaram utpadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:3980: yady api tasya satvasya taddhitaṃ tathāpi bodhisatvakṛpāhānyā mahataḥ satvārthānubandhasya hāniḥ syāt ||
T04sanssr_pu:3981: āryasatyake parivartte 'pi putradṛṣṭāntaḥ karuṇādhiṣṭhita eva veditavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:3982: yaś ca tatrāpi kṛpāpratiṣedhaḥ sa lokārthapāṇḍityena lokāvarjanārthaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:3983: nivāryamāṇaś ca yadi hitakāme bodhisatve pratighaṃ labheta sa bodhisatvaḥ syād ubhayor annarthaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:3995: tad yathāpi nāmānanda kaścid eva puruṣo
T04sanssr_pu:3996: 'dhastāt pādatalam ādāya yāvan murddhany ādīpto bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:3997: saṃprajvalita ekajvalībhutas taṃ kaścid eva puruṣa upasaṃkramya evaṃ vaded |
T04sanssr_pu:3998: ehi tvāṃ bhoḥ puruṣa nirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍasva ramasva paricārayasveti |
T04sanssr_pu:4000: | api tu sa puruṣo 'nirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ krīḍeta
T04sanssr_pu:4005: krīḍetānanda sa puruṣo ramet paricaret parikalpam upādāyāparinirvāpitenātmabhāvena pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūto |
T04sanssr_pu:4006: na tv evaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisatvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya satvān tribhir apāyair duṣkhitān dṛṣṭvā daridrān abhūt saumanasyaṃ vā cittaprasādo veti vistaraḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4008: paśyator mātāpitror na svasaukhyasaṃgo dṛṣṭaḥ svānurūpakṛpāvaśāt |
T04sanssr_pu:4009: pracchannas tarhi sasvāmikāsu nisvāmikāsu bāhuladharmadhvajarakṣitāsu kāmamithyācāro na syāt
T04sanssr_pu:4013: evaṃ tarhi bhikṣor apy evam āpannaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4019: upāyakauśalyasūtre jyotirmāṇavakaṃ dvācatvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrabrahmacāriṇam adhikṛtya saptame pade sthitasya kāruṇyam utpadyeta |
T04sanssr_pu:4020: kiṃ cāpy aham idaṃ vrataṃ khaṇḍayitvā nirayaparāyaṇaḥ syāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4021: tathāpy utsahe 'haṃ nairayikaṃ duṣkhaṃ prativedayitum atha ceyaṃ strī sukhitā bhavatu |
T04sanssr_pu:4023: iti hi kulaputra jyotirmāṇavakaḥ paścānmukho nivartya tāṃ striyaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇinā gṛhītvaivam āha |
T04sanssr_pu:4024: uttiṣṭha bhagini yathākāmakaraṇīyas te bhavāmīti || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4027: paśya kulaputra yad anyeṣāṃ nirayasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma |
T04sanssr_pu:4030: yadi bodhisatva ekasya satvasya kuśalamūlaṃ saṃjanayet tathārūpāṃ cāpattim āpadyeta yathārūpayāpattyāpannayā kalpaśatasahasraṃ niraye pacyeta |
T04sanssr_pu:4031: utsoḍhavyam eva bhagavan bodhisatvenāpattim āpattuṃ tac ca nairayikaṃ duṣkhaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4032: na tv eva tasyaikasay satvasya kuśalaṃ parityaktum iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4034: iha kulaputropāyakuśalo bodhisatvo yadā kadācit kasmiṃścit pāpamitravaśenāpattim āpadyeta
T04sanssr_pu:4040: yathā yathā saṃsariṣyāmi tathā tathā satvān paripācayiṣyāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:4041: api tv etāṃ cāpattiṃ yathādharmaṃ pratikariṣyāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:4043: sacet kulaputra pravrajito bodhisatvaḥ parikalpam ādāya sarvāś catasro mūlāpattīr atikramed anena copāyakauśalyena vinodayed |
T04sanssr_pu:4048: ayaṃ ca rāge guṇo yad bodhisatve rāgam utpādya sugatir labhyate |
T04sanssr_pu:4053: priyaṃkarasya praṇidheḥ punaḥ punar yā istri prekṣeta sarāgacittā |
T04sanssr_pu:4054: sā istribhāvaṃ parivarjayitvā puruṣo bhavet yādṛg udārasatvaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4057: tenaiva śūreṣu janitva rāgaṃ gacchanti svargaṃ puruṣatvam eva ca || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4061: kiṃ vā punar yaḥ tān satkareyā |
T04sanssr_pu:4063: evam anyasmin satvārthopāye sati rāgajāpattir annāpattir uktā ||
T04sanssr_pu:4064: upāyakauśalyasūtre ca gaṇikāvat kṛtārtho bodhisatvo nirapekṣas taṃ satvaṃ tyajatīti vistareṇoktam
T04sanssr_pu:4065: alabdhabhūmeś ca ṣaṭpāramitāsu caritavata iyaṃ cintā |
T04sanssr_pu:4072: tatra śāriputra prathamā āpattir daśavarge ṛjukena deśayitavyā |
T04sanssr_pu:4075: duṣṭacittāpattir ekapudgalasya dvayor vā śāriputra tāṃ gurvīṃ daśayet |
T04sanssr_pu:4076: pañcānantaryasamanvāgatāpattir bodhisatvena stryāpattir dārikāpattir hastāpattiḥ stūpāpattiḥ saṃghāpattis tathānyāś cāpattayo bodhisatvena na pañcatriṃśatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike rātriṃdivaṃ ekākinā gurvyo deśayitavyāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4118: evaṃpramukhā yāvantaḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatārhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:4119: te māṃ samanvāharantu buddhā bhagavanto yan mayāsyāṃ jātau anyāsu vā jātiṣv annavarāgre jātisaṃsāre
T04sanssr_pu:4120: [doubtful] pāpakaṃ karma kṛtaṃ syāt kāritaṃ vā kriyamāṇaṃ vānumoditaṃ bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:4121: staupikaṃ vā sāṅghikaṃ vā dravyam apahṛtaṃ syāt hāritaṃ vā hriyamāṇaṃ vānumoditaṃ bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:4122: pañcānantaryāṇi kṛtāni syuḥ kāritāni vā kriyamāṇāni vānumoditāni bhaveyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4123: daśākuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartitaṃ syāt pare vā samādāpitāḥ syur vartamānā vānumoditā bhaveyur yena karmāvaraṇenāvṛto 'haṃ nirayaṃ vā gaccheyaṃ tiryagyoniṃ vā yamaviṣayaṃ vā gaccheyaṃ pratyantajanapadeṣu mleccheṣu vā pratyājāyeyaṃ dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyeyam indriyavikalatāṃ vādhigaccheyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiṃ vopagṛhṇīyāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4125: tat sarvaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jñānabhūtānāṃ cakṣurbhūtānāṃ sākṣibhūtānāṃ pramāṇabhūtānāṃ jānatāṃ paśyatām agrataḥ pratideśayāmi āviṣkaromi na praticchādayāmy āyatyāṃ saṃvaram āpadye |
T04sanssr_pu:4126: samanvāharantu māṃ te buddhā bhagavanto yan mayāsyāṃ jātāv anyāsu vā jātiṣv annavarāgre vā jātisaṃsāre saṃsaratā dānaṃ dattaṃ bhaved antaśas tiryagyonigatāyāpy ālopaḥ śīlaṃ vā rakṣitaṃ bhaved yac ca me brahmacaryavāsakuśalamūlaṃ yac ca me satvaparipākakuśalamūlaṃ yac ca me bodhicittakuśalamūlaṃ yac ca me 'nnuttarajñānakuśalamūlaṃ tat sarvam aikadhyaṃ piṇḍayitvā tulayitvābhisaṃkṣipyānnutt arāyāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4127: samyaksaṃbodhau uttarottarayā pariṇāmanayā yathā pariṇāmitam atītair buddhair bhagavadbhir yathā pariṇāmayiṣyanty annāgatā buddhā bhagavanto yathā pariṇamanty etarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4132: ye cābhyatītās tathāpi ca ye annāgatā ye cāpi tiṣṭhanti narottamā jināḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4133: annantavarṇān guṇasāgaropamān upaimi sarvān śaraṇaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4134: ye bodhisatvāḥ karuṇabalair upetā vicarati loke satvahitāya śūrāḥ trāyantu te māṃ sadapāpakāriṇaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4136: iti hi śāriputra bodhisatvenemān pañcatriṃśato buddhān pramukhān kṛtvā sarvatathāgatānugatair manasikāraiḥ pāpaśuddhiḥ kāryā |
T04sanssr_pu:4137: tasyaivaṃ sarvapāpaviśuddhasya tatra ca buddhā bhagavanto mukhāny upadarśayanti satvavimokṣārtham eva |
T04sanssr_pu:4139: na śakyaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhanikāyair āpattikaukṛtyasthānaṃ viśodhayituṃ yad bodhisatvas teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nāmadheyadhāraṇaparikīrtanena rātriṃdivaṃ triskandhakadharmaparyāyapravartanenāpattikaukṛtyān niḥsarati samādhiṃ ca pratilabhate ||
T04sanssr_pu:4144: ye te subhūte kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imān evaṃrūpān sūtrāntān udgrahīṣyanti yāvat paryavāpsyanti
T04sanssr_pu:4147: yāni teṣāṃ satvānāṃ paurvajanmikāni karmāṇi kṛtāny apāyasaṃvartanīyāni |
T04sanssr_pu:4148: tāni tayā paribhūtatayā dṛṣṭae eva dharme kṣapayiṣyanti buddhabodhiṃ ca prāpsyantīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4150: yaḥ kāśyapa pitā ca syāt pratyekabuddhaś ca taṃ jīvitād vyaparopayed idam agraṃ prāṇātipātānāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4151: idam agram adattādānānāṃ yad uta triratnadravyāpaharaṇatā |
T04sanssr_pu:4152: idam agraṃ kāmamithyācārāṇāṃ yad uta mātā syād arhantī ca |
T04sanssr_pu:4153: idam agraṃ mṛṣāvādānāṃ yad uta tathāgatasyābhyākhyānaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4155: idam agraṃ pāruṣyāṇāṃ yad utāryāṇām avasphaṇḍanaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4156: idam agraṃ saṃbhinnapralāpānāṃ yad uta dharmakāmānāṃ vikṣepaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4158: idam agram abhidhyānāṃ yad uta samyaggatānāṃ lābhaharaṇacittatā |
T04sanssr_pu:4159: idam agraṃ mithyādṛṣṭīnāṃ yad uta gahanatādṛṣṭiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4161: sacet kāśyapa ekasatva ebhir evaṃ mahāsāvadyair daśabhir akuśalaiḥ karmapathaiḥ samanvāgato bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:4162: sa ca tathāgatasya hetupratyayasaṃyuktāṃ dharmadeśanām avataren |
T04sanssr_pu:4163: nātra kaścid ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā pudgalo vā yaḥ karoti pratisaṃvedayate iti hy akṛtām annabhisaṃskārāṃ māyādharmatām asaṃkleśadharmatāṃ prakṛtiprabhāsvaratāṃ sarvadharmāṇām avataraty ādiśuddhān sarvadharmān abhiśraddadhāty
T04sanssr_pu:4167: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīr yo bodhisatva āpattim annāpattiṃ paśyati |
T04sanssr_pu:4173: akṣiṇī nimīlya buddhabodhisatvālambanacittaḥ śatākṣaram aṣṭasahasraṃ japet
T04sanssr_pu:4174: | nimīlitākṣa eva buddhabodhisatvān paśyati vigatapāpo bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:4175: athavā caityaṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvann aṣṭasahasraṃ japec caityapratimāyāḥ saddharmapustakānāṃ caikatamaṃ puraḥkṛtyāyam eva vidhir iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4176: cundādhāraṇīṃ vā tāvaj japed yāvat pāpakṣayanimittāni paśyati svapne |
T04sanssr_pu:4177: tad yathā krandanādichardanadadhikṣīrādibhojanāt tu vigatapāpo bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:4178: vamanād vā candrasūryadarśanād ākāśagamanāj jvalitānalamahiṣakṛṣṇapuruṣaparājayād bhikṣubhikṣuṇīsaṃghadarśanāt kṣīravṛkṣagajavṛṣagirisiṃhāsanaprāsādanāvarohaṇād dharmaśravaṇāc ca pāpakṣayaḥ saṃlakṣayitavyaḥ tathāgatabimbaparivarte 'pi pratipakṣasamudācāra uktaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4179: tad yathā puruṣo mīḍhāvaliptaḥ sudhautusnānaṃ kṛtvā gandhair vilipyate |
T04sanssr_pu:4180: tasya tad daurgandhyaṃ vāntaṃ vigataṃ syād evaṃ pañcānantaryakāriṇas tat pāpaṃ vigacchati
T04sanssr_pu:4182: pratilabhya tathāgatabimbaṃ kārayet tasyāpi tat pāpaṃ na prajñāyate viśeṣato bodhicittasamanvāgatasya
T04sanssr_pu:4186: yaś ca khalu punaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitatathāgataṃ saṃmukhaṃ varṣaṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā sarvasukhopadhānair upatiṣṭhed |
T04sanssr_pu:4187: yaś ca parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya caitye bodhicittasaṃgṛhīta ekapuṣpam āropayet tathāgatapūjāyai janāñjaliṃ copanāmayej jalena vā siñcayed iṣikāpadaṃ vā dadyān nirmālyaṃ cāpanayed
T04sanssr_pu:4188: upalepanapradānaṃ vā puṣpapradānaṃ vā dīpapradānaṃ vā kuryād āttamanāḥ ekakramavyatihāraṃ vātikramya vācaṃ bhāṣate |
T04sanssr_pu:4189: namas tasmai buddhāya bhagavata itimātre 'tra siṃhavikrīḍitakāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā
T04sanssr_pu:4190: yad asau kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā durgativinipātaṃ gacchen nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyatae iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4194: ye ca bodhisatvasaṃvaraṃ caturthaṃ śataṃ śikṣāpadānāṃ dhārayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:4195: ye punar abhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsā bhikṣavaḥ pañcāśādhike dve śikṣāpadaśate dhārayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:4197: ye ca yathāparigṛhītāc chikṣāsaṃvarād anyatarāc chikṣāpadād bhraṣṭā bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:4198: sacet te durgatibhayabhītās tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyur yathāvibhavataś ca pūjāṃ kuryuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4200: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma |
T04sanssr_pu:4203: yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya guṇān varṇayāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:4204: atha te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vātra gambhīre buddhagocare ||
T04sanssr_pu:4206: na me bhadanta bhagavan kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrānteṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:4209: imau bhagavan candrasūryāv evaṃ maharddhikāv evaṃ mahānubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ patetāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4211: na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet
T04sanssr_pu:4212: kiṃtu bhadanta bhagavan santi satvāḥ śraddhendriyavikalā ye buddhagocaraṃ śrutvā na śraddadhati
T04sanssr_pu:4214: katham idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ smaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasya ettakā guṇānuśaṃsā bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:4220: asthānam ānandānnavakāśo yeṣāṃ tasya nāmadheyaṃ nipatet karṇe teṣāṃ durgatyapāyagamanaṃ bhaved iti |
T04sanssr_pu:4221: duḥśraddhānīyaś cānanda buddhānāṃ buddhagocaraḥ |yac ca tvam ānanda śraddadhāsi pattīyasi
T04sanssr_pu:4223: abhūmiś cātra śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvā ekajātipratibaddhān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4225: ye cānye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upavasanti |
T04sanssr_pu:4226: ekavārṣikaṃ vā traivārṣikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:4228: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśāyāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau upapadyema yatrāmitābhas tathāgataḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4229: yaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabhavarājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4230: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye 'ṣṭau bodhisatvā ṛddhyāgatya mārgam upadarśayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:4233: teṣāṃ tatropapannānāṃ tat pūrvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ na kṣīyate |
T04sanssr_pu:4235: te tataś cyutā iha manuṣyaloke rājāno bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:4237: annekāni satvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi daśa kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:4244: yena ca punar mātṛgrāmeṇa tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:4246: sa tasya paścimo mātṛgrāmabhāvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavya iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4250: ya eṣāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ tu dhārayet |
T04sanssr_pu:4255: prāṇātipātāt prativirato bhavati bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasatvānām abhayaṃdadaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4258: yat pūrvāntakoṭipañcagaticakrāruḍhena saṃsāranadyudyātena prāṇātipātahetunā kāyavāṅmanasā karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ dharmāvaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vā syāt kāritaṃ vānumoditaṃ syāt |
T04sanssr_pu:4259: tat sarvaṃ tena prāṇātipātavairamaṇacakreṇa sarvānarthaṃ mardayati |
T04sanssr_pu:4261: sanikāyasabhāge devamanuṣyāṇāṃ priyo bhavati nirātaṅko dīrghāyuṣka iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4262: yāvat punar aparaṃ kulaputra yo bodhisatvo yāvajjīvam adattādānāt prativirato bhavati sa sarvasatvānām abhayam dadāti anyatrāsayatnenāsaṃkṣobheṇa svalābhena saṃtuṣṭo viharati |
T04sanssr_pu:4263: adhārmikabhogānabhilāṣī sa tena kuśalamūlena yāvad adattādānahetukaṃ karmāvaraṇaṃ mardayati pramardayati yāvad aśeṣam avipākaṃ kurutae iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4265: evaṃ daśāpi kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ svavipakṣākuśalaghātakās tatra paṭhyante
T04sanssr_pu:4270: kṣapayiṣye pāpakaṃ karma yan mayā purime kṛtam |
T04sanssr_pu:4275: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gacchanti durgatiṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4276: prahāya mānuṣān kāyān divyān kāyāṃl labhanti te ||
T04sanssr_pu:4277: ity evaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ cādhikṛtya pāpakṣayaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4281: tad yathā kulaputra hāṭakaprabhāsaṃ nāma rasajātaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4283: na ca tatra tat palaṃ śakyate tena lohapalasahasreṇa paryādātuṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4285: evam evaikaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ kuśalamūlapariṇāmanājñānasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvakarmakleśāvaraṇalohāni paryādāya sarvadharmān sarvajñatāvarṇān karoti |
T04sanssr_pu:4286: na ca sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ śakyaḥ sarvakarmakleśalohaiḥ saṃkleśayituṃ paryādātuṃ vā |
T04sanssr_pu:4287: tad yathā kulaputraikaḥ pradīpo yādṛśe gṛhe vā layane vā praveśyate sa saha praveśito varṣasahasrasaṃcitam api tamondhakāraṃ vidhamayati |
T04sanssr_pu:4289: evam evaikaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpo yādṛśe satvāśaye gahane
T04sanssr_pu:4293: tad yathā kulaputra cintāmaṇirājamukuṭānāṃ mahānāgarājñāṃ nāsti paropakramabhayaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4294: evam eva bodhicittamahākaruṇācintāmaṇirājamukuṭāvabaddhānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ nāsti durgatyapāyaparopakramabhayam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4296: ihopāle mahāyānaṃ saṃprasthito bodhisatvaḥ sacet pūrvāhṇakālasamaye āpattim āpadyeta |
T04sanssr_pu:4297: madhyāhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenāvirahito vihared aparyanta eva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:4298: sacen madhyāhnakālasamaye āpattim āpadyate sāyāhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenāvirahito bhaved aparyanta eva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4300: evaṃ hy upāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4301: tatra bodhisatvena nātikaukṛtyaparyutthānam utpādyaṃ nātivipratisāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4302: sacet punaḥ śrāvakayānīyaḥ pudgalaḥ punaḥ punar āpattim āpadyeta |
T04sanssr_pu:4308: tad evam aviratapravṛttāṃ bahusukhāṃ dauḥślyotpattiṃ rakṣann evaṃ ca karmāvaraṇavibandham apanayan kleśaviśodhane prayateta ||
T04sanssr_pu:4317: tatrāpi vikṣepapraśamanānabhiyuktasya cittaṃ na samādhīyatae iti |
T04sanssr_pu:4319: samāhitasya ca na kiñcit phalam anyatra kleśaśodhanād iti |
