T04sanssr_pu:4335: yae ime ādhyātmikāḥ śokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsās tān kṣamate 'dhivāsayatīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4337: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate gṛhiṇā bodhisatvenānunayapratighāpagatena bhavitavyam aṣṭalokadharmānanuliptena
T04sanssr_pu:4338: tena bhogalābhena vā bhāryāputralābhena vā dhanadhānyavittalābhena vā nonnamitavyaṃ na praharṣitavyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4340: na durmanasā bhavitavyaṃ evaṃ cānena pratyavekṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4347: yady asty eva pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim |
T04sanssr_pu:4351: taccintayā mudhā yānti hrasvam āyur muhur muhuḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4358: duryodhanaṃ cittaṃ te dārike utpādayitavyaṃ sarvakleśanirghātāya |
T04sanssr_pu:4361: na cābhyāsasya duṣkaraṃ nāma kiñcid asti |
T04sanssr_pu:4362: tathā hi mūḍhatarāṇām api tāvad bhārahārakakaivartakarṣakādīnāṃ duṣkhābhyāsāt kṣudrataraphale 'pi vastuni saṃrūḍhakiṇāṅkitaṃ cittam avasādena na paribhūyate |
T04sanssr_pu:4364: tathā prākṛtā api kiñcid apakāriṣv ātmaduṣkṛtenaiva hateṣu svayaṃ mṛtyuṣu prahartuṃ gāḍhaprahāravedanā api saṃgrāmayanty eva |
T04sanssr_pu:4365: ki.ṃ punar drāghiṣṭhakālāpakāriṣu duṣkhopāttakuśaladhanalavastainyeṣu narakeṣu nāvadhyaghātakeṣu bhavacārakapālakeṣu niḥsaraṇadvāradiṅnāśakeṣv ānukūlye 'pi dṛḍhataravādhākareṣv annapakṛtavairiṣv annavadhikalpābaddhadṛḍhavaireṣu kleśaśatruṣu prahartum utsāho duṣkhasahanaṃ vā na bhavet viśeṣatas tribhuvanavijayayā baddhaparikarasya māraśavarapratigṛhītajagadbandimokṣāya saṃgrāmayataḥ
T04sanssr_pu:4368: tathā sarvaduṣkhotpādeṣu sukhasaṃjñā pratyupasthānābhyāsāt sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupatiṣṭhate
T04sanssr_pu:4369: etan niṣyandaphalaṃ ca sarvadharmasukhākrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate ||
T04sanssr_pu:4372: yasya samādheḥ pratilambhād bodhisatvaḥ sarvārambaṇavastuṣu sukhām eva vedanāṃ vedayate |
T04sanssr_pu:4374: tasya nairayikām api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:4375: mānuṣīm api kāraṇāṃ kāryamāṇasya hasteṣv api chidyamāneṣu pādeṣv api karṇeṣv api nāsāsv api sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:4376: vetrair api tāḍyamānasyārddhavetrair api kaśābhir api tāḍyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate bandhanāgāreṣv api praks.iptasya || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4379: naḍacippitikaṃ vā cipyamānasya tailapradyotikaṃ vādīpyamānasya sarpiḥpradyotikaṃ vā dadhipradyotikaṃ vādīpyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pratyupasthitā bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:4380: ulkāmukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya siṃhamukhaṃ vā hriyamāṇasya śuṣkavarttikāṃ vā vartyamānasya || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4381: kārṣāpaṇacchedikaṃ vā chidyamānasya piṣṭapācanikaṃ vā pācyamānasya hastibhir vā mardyamānasya sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate |
T04sanssr_pu:4382: akṣiṇyutpāṭhyamāne jīvaśūlikam api kriyamāṇasya sarvaśo vāghātaṃ nirṇīya śirasi vā prapātyamāne sukhasaṃjñaiva pravartate |
T04sanssr_pu:4386: tathā hi bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dīrgharātraṃ caryāṃ carata etat praṇidhānam abhūt |
T04sanssr_pu:4389: ye māṃ pālayeyuḥ satkuryur gurukuryur mānayeyuḥ pūjayeyuḥ sarve te upaśamasukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4390: ye 'pi mām ākrośeyur visparśeyus tāḍayeyuḥ śastreṇāchindyur yāvat sarvaśo jīvitād
T04sanssr_pu:4391: vyaparopayeyuḥ sarve te saṃbodhisukhasya lābhino bhaveyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4393: sa ebhir manaḥkāraiḥ samanvāgata etena karmaṇā |
T04sanssr_pu:4394: ebhiḥ praṇidhibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvasatvānugatāṃ sukhasaṃjñām āsevate nisevate bhāvayati bahulīkaroti |
T04sanssr_pu:4395: sa tasya karmaṇo vipākena sarvadharmasukhākrāntaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate |
T04sanssr_pu:4396: yasmin samaye bodhisatvena sarvadharmasukhākrānto nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdho bhavati tasmin samaye akṣobhyo bhavaty asaṃhāryaḥ sarvamārakarmabhir iti vistaraḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4409: cittasya prāmodyaṃ kāyasyaudbilyaṃ buddheḥ saṃpraharṣaṇaṃ manasa utplavaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4447: iti hi yā sarvendriyeṣv annavalīnendriyatā iyam ucyate muditety ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:4448: atra ca śikṣitān bodhisatvān idaṃ vacanam alaṃkaroti yad uktam āryamahāmeghe |
T04sanssr_pu:4449: nirayagaticittanityasamādhānaśīlāś ca nirayagatipriyāś ca nirayagatipattanavaṇijaś ca bhavanti
T04sanssr_pu:4450: nirayalolāś ca bhavanti nirayalobhamatsariṇaś ca nirayāgnicittapraguṇṇāḥ bhavantīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4454: annāryair duḥśīlaiḥ satvair mārair mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir mārādhiṣṭhitair vā māradūtair vā viheṭhyamānaḥ samīryamāṇaḥ kṣobhyamānas tarjyamānas tāḍyamāno na bhidyate tato |
T04sanssr_pu:4462: sa evam adhyāśayasaṃpanna eva samānaḥ sarvasatvānām antikād uccaghanāṃ sahate |
T04sanssr_pu:4463: unmananāṃ kutsanāṃ sahate sarvasatvānām ākrośaparibhāṣāṃ duruktadurāgatān vacanapathān sahate
T04sanssr_pu:4465: sarvasatvabhārāṃś ca sahate uttārayati vā na ca khidyate |
T04sanssr_pu:4480: sacet punar ete satvā yāvanto daśasu dikṣu prabhāvyamānāḥ prabhāvyante te sarve 'siśaktitomarapāliyogena māṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubadhnīyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4481: yatraiṣa pṛthivīpradeśe sthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā caṅkramyamāṇo vā śayāno vā bodhicittam utpādayiṣyati dānacittaṃ vā yāvat prajñācittaṃ vā śrutakuśalamūlacittaṃ votpādayiṣyati tatrāsya pṛthivīpradeśe śatadhābadarīpattrapramāṇaṃ kāyaṃ chetsyāmo vikariṣyāmo vidhvaṃsayiṣyāmas
T04sanssr_pu:4482: | te cet sarvasatvā mām ākrośayeyuḥ paribhāṣeran kutsayeyuḥ paṃsayeyur asatyābhir vāgbhiḥ paruṣābhir vāgbhiḥ samuccareyur adhiṣṭhitā
T04sanssr_pu:4483: annarthakarmāṇaḥ śatadhābadarīpattrapramāṇaṃ mama kāyaṃ chindhyur bhindyur vikareyur vidhvaṃsayeyuḥ
T04sanssr_pu:4484: evaṃ mayā na kasyacit satvasyāntike kṣobhacittam utpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4486: pūrvā koṭiḥ saṃsārasyāpramāṇīkṛtā yatra me 'yam ātmabhāvo narakagatasyāpi tiryagyonigatasyāpi yamalokagatasyāpi manuṣyagatasyāpi
T04sanssr_pu:4487: kāmāhārapaliguddhasya dharmān aśrutavato viṣamājīvagocarasya nirarthakajīvinaḥ aṅgapratyaṅgasya śatadhā chinno bhinno nikṛtto vividhābhiś ca kāraṇābhiḥ kārito na ca mayā tato nidānam ātmārthaṃ kṛto na parārthaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4488: sacet punar punar mamaite sarvasatvā aparāntakoṭiṃ chindyur bhindyur vikireyur vidhvaṃsayeyus tathāpi mayāparityaktaiva sarvajñatā |
T04sanssr_pu:4493: nairayikasya duṣkhasya śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamate |
T04sanssr_pu:4495: na punar mayā buddhadharmāḥ parityaktavyā na sarvasatvārambaṇā mahākaruṇā || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4501: evaṃ dharmagaṇanāviṣṭaḥ sāgaramate bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatvapīḍāṃ sahate || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4504: yat kāye chidyamāne sarvasatvān maitryā spharati |
T04sanssr_pu:4507: yat kāye chidyamāne ya evāsya kāyaṃ chindati teṣām eva pramokṣārthaṃ kṣamate |
T04sanssr_pu:4508: na ca cittena kṣaṇyate kṣāntibalaṃ copadarśayatīyam asya kṣāntipāramitā ||
T04sanssr_pu:4509: yena vīryeṇa taṃ sarvajñatāchandaṃ notsṛjati cittabalādhīnaṃ ca pratigṛhṇāti |
T04sanssr_pu:4513: yat kāye vikīryamāṇe tat sarvajñatācittotpādaratnaṃ kartuṃ na saṃmuhyati bodhim evāpekṣate śāntapraśāntam eva pratyavekṣate |
T04sanssr_pu:4515: yat kāye chidyamāne kāyasya tṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyavatpratibhāsopamatāṃ pratyavekṣate māyādharmatāṃ ca kāyasyāvatarati |
T04sanssr_pu:4516: bhūtānityatāṃ ca bhūtaduṣkhatāṃ ca bhūtānātmatāṃ ca bhūtaśāntatāṃ ca kāyasyopanidhyāyati |
T04sanssr_pu:4523: eṣa eva tāvan mayā satvaḥ pūrvataraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣādayitavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4525: īdṛśānām asmābhiḥ satvānām adāntānām aguptānām annupaśāntānām arthāya saṃnāhāḥ saṃnaddhavyāḥ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4528: sa parigaveṣamāṇo na taṃ dharmam upalabhate |
T04sanssr_pu:4535: lābhā me durlabdhā yo 'haṃ jalpite pratijalpāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:4536: yena mayā sarvasatvānāṃ saṃkramabhūtena bhavitavyaṃ so 'haṃ parasya tvam ity api vācaṃ bhāṣe
T04sanssr_pu:4540: parato duruktān durāgatān durbhāṣitān bhāṣyamāṇān vacanapathān śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nāghātayitavyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4541: pareṣām antike na mamaitat sādhu na pratirūpaṃ yo 'haṃ parasya doṣāntaraṃ saṃjanayeyam |
T04sanssr_pu:4542: etan na mama pratirūpaṃ yad ahaṃ pareṣāṃ doṣāntaram api saṃśrotavyaṃ manye |
T04sanssr_pu:4544: na mayāśayo vikopayitavyo yena mayā sarvasatvāḥ sarvasukhopadhānena sukhayitavyāḥ parinirvāpayitavyāś cānnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya tatra nāmāhaṃ vyāpadye |
T04sanssr_pu:4545: na ca mayā pareṣāṃ svaparāddhānām api vyāpattavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4549: na mayā jīvitāntarāye 'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4553: ye kruddhāḥ satvās tān āśvāsayati kṣamāpayati |
T04sanssr_pu:4563: na bāhuśrutyena sa śakyu trāyituṃ duḥśīlayena vrajamāna durgatim ||
T04sanssr_pu:4565: tathā hi kulaputrāḥ śrutavataḥ prajñāgamo bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:4568: atra ca maharṣer uttarasya jātakaṃ vistareṇa kṛtvāha |
T04sanssr_pu:4571: bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ sagauravāṇāṃ sapratīśānāṃ anyalokadhātusthitā api buddhā bhagavanto mukham upadarśayanti dharmaṃ cānuśrāvayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:4576: dharmakāmānāṃ vimalatejaḥ bodhisatvānāṃ pūrvabuddhadarśinyo devatā buddhapratibhānam upasaṃharanti || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4577: parikṣīṇāyuṣkāṇāṃ buddhā bhagavanto devatāś cāyurbalaṃ copasaṃharanti |
T04sanssr_pu:4578: buddhādhiṣṭhānena devatādhiṣṭhānena ca kāṅkṣāmāṇā varṣasahasram avatiṣṭhante || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4579: yāvat kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā yāvad vā ākāṅkṣanti dharmagauravajātānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ buddhā bhagavanto jarām apy apanayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:4588: tasmāt tarhi vimalatejaḥ śrutasaṃbhārakauśalyābhiyuktena bodhisatvena bhavitavyam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4593: chandākāram āśayākāram adhyāśayākāraṃ prayogākāraṃ nirmāṇākāram apramāṇākāraṃ kalyāṇamitrākāraṃ gauravākāraṃ pradakṣiṇākāraṃ suvacanākāraṃ paryupāsanākāram avahitaśrotrākāraṃ manaḥkārākāram avikṣepākāram avasthānākāraṃ ratnasaṃjñākāraṃ bhaiṣajyasaṃjñākāraṃ sarvavyādhiśamanākāraṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4594: smṛtibhajanākāraṃ gatibodhanākāraṃ matirocanākāraṃ buddhipraveśāk āram atṛptabuddhadharmaśravaṇākāraṃ tyāgavṛṃhaṇākāraṃ dāntājāneyākāraṃ bahuśrutasevanākāraṃ satyakṛtyaprītyanubhavanākāraṃ kāyaudbilyākāraṃ cittaprahlādanākāram aparikhedaśravaṇākāraṃ dharmaśravaṇākāraṃ pratipattiśravaṇākāraṃ paradeśanāśravaṇākāraṃ aśrutaśravaṇākāraṃ abhijñāśravaṇākāram anyayānāspṛhaṇāśravaṇākāraṃ prajñāpāramitāśravaṇākāraṃ bodhisatvapiṭakaśravaṇākāraṃ saṃgrahavastuśravaṇākāram upāyakauśalyaśravaṇākāraṃ brahmavihāraśravaṇākāraṃ smṛtisaṃprajanyaśravaṇākāraṃ gauravākāraṃ utpādakauśalyaśravaṇākāram
T04sanssr_pu:4595: annutpādakauśalyaśravaṇākāram aśubhākāraṃ maitryāḥ śravaṇākāraṃ pratītyasamutpādākāraṃ anityākāraṃ duṣkhākāram annātmākāraṃ śāntākāraṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākāraṃ annabhisaṃs kārākāraṃ kuśalābhisaṃskārākāraṃ satvādhiṣṭhānākāraṃ avipraṇāśākāraṃ svādhīnākāraṃ svacittārakṣaṇākāraṃ vīryasyāśraṃsanākāraṃ dharmanidhyaptyākāraṃ kleśavipakṣākāraṃ svapakṣaparikarṣaṇākāraṃ parapakṣakleśanigrahākāraṃ saptadhanasamavaśaraṇākāraṃ sarvadāridryopachedākāraṃ sarvavidvatpraśastākāraṃ paṇḍitābhinandanākāraṃ āryasaṃmatākāraṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4596: annāryaprasādanākāraṃ satyadarśanākāraṃ skandhadoṣavivarjanākāraṃ saṃskṛtadoṣaparitulanākāram arthapratiśaraṇākāraṃ dharmapratiśaraṇākāraṃ sarvapāpākaraṇākāraṃ ātmaparahitākāraṃ sukṛtakarmānanutapyanākāraṃ viśeṣagamanākāraṃ sarvabuddhadharmapratilābhākāram iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4598: yaś ca dharmasaṃbhārayogaḥ sa evāsya jñānasaṃbhāro bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:4599: tatra katamo dharmasaṃbhārayogo yeyam alpārthatālpakṛtyatālpabhāṣatālpapariṣkāratā pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktasya śrutārthaparitulanatā |
T04sanssr_pu:4610: aśithilaśīlatānikṣiptadhuratā viśeṣagāmitā saṃgaṇikāvivarjanam ekārāmatāraṇyābhimukhamanaḥkāratā āryavaṃśasantuṣṭiḥ dhutaguṇeṣv acalanatā dharmārāmaratiratatā laukikamantrāsmaraṇatā lokottaradharmaparyeṣṭitā smṛtyapramoṣatā |
T04sanssr_pu:4633: lokāyataśāstrāṇi daṇḍanītiśāstrāṇi kārkhedaśāstrāṇi vādavidyāśāstrāṇi kumārakrīḍāśāstrāṇi jambhakavidyāśāstrāṇi || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4634: yāny api tad anyāni kānicin mokṣapratikūlāni śāstrāṇi saṃmohāya saṃvartante tāni sarvāṇi bodhisatvayānasaṃprasthitena parivarjayitavyānīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4635: evaṃ śrutavatā cittaṃ śodhayitum araṇyam āśrayaṇīyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4636: kathaṃ punar āśayasaṃpannasyāpy ugradattaparipṛcchāyāṃ gṛham anujñātaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4645: tad evam ugradattaparipṛcchāvidhinā gṛhadoṣān bhāvayitvā śrutavatā cittaṃ śodhayitum araṇyam āśrayaṇīyam iti sthitaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4647: na jātu kāmān pratiṣevamāṇaḥ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4648: gṛhaṃ ca sevitva jugupsanīyam annuttarāṃ prāpsyati so 'grabodhim ||
T04sanssr_pu:4649: ye kāma varjenti yathāgnikarṣūṃ putreṣu dāreṣu janitva tṛṣṇāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4650: uttasta gehād abhiniṣkramanti na durlabhā teṣv iyam agrabodhiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4651: na kaści buddhaḥ purimeṇa āsīd annāgato bheṣyati yo 'vatiṣṭhate |
T04sanssr_pu:4652: yehi sthitair eva agāramadhye prāptā iyaṃ uttama agrabodhiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4653: prahāya rājyaṃ yatha kheṭapiṇḍaṃ vased araṇyeṣu vivekakāmaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4654: kleśān prahāya vinihatya mānaṃ budhyanti bodhiṃ virajām asaṃskṛtām || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4655: annehi pānehi ca cīvarehi puṣpehi gandhehi vilepanehi |
T04sanssr_pu:4656: nopasthitā bhonti narottamā jinā yatha pravrajitvā caramāṇadharmān ||
T04sanssr_pu:4657: yaś caiva bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣamāṇaḥ satvārtha nirviṇṇa kusaṃskṛtātaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4658: araṇyābhimukha sapta padāni gacched ayaṃ tataḥ puṇyaviśiṣṭa bhoti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4659: yadi punar visabhāgasatvānunayāt pariṣatkāmatayā vā lābhādikāmatayā vā vivekapraveśe vilambeta
T04sanssr_pu:4661: na vijña bālehi karonti vigrahaṃ satkṛtya bālān parivarjayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:4662: mamāntike ceti praduṣṭacittā na bāladharmehi karonti saṃstavam ||
T04sanssr_pu:4663: na vijña bālāna karoti sevanāṃ viditva bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim |
T04sanssr_pu:4664: kiyacciraṃ bālasusevitā pi puno 'pi te bhonti amitrasannibhāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4665: na vijña bāleṣv iha viśvasanti vijñāya bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim |
T04sanssr_pu:4666: svabhāvabhinnā prakṛtīya bālāḥ kuto 'sti mitraṃ hi pṛthagjanānāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4667: sahadhārmikeno vacanena uktāḥ krodhaṃ ca doṣaṃ ca apratyayaṃ ca |
T04sanssr_pu:4668: prāviṣkaronti imi bāladharmā imam artha vijñāya na viśvasanti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4669: bālā hi bālehi samaṃ samenti yathā amedhyena amedhya sārddham |
T04sanssr_pu:4670: vijñaḥ punar vijñajanena sārddhaṃ samenti sarpir yatha sarpimaṇḍe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4672: sūsukhitāḥ sada te naraloke yeṣu priyāpriya nāsti kahiṃcit |
T04sanssr_pu:4673: ye ca na kandarake 'bhiramante śrāmaṇakaṃ susukhaṃ anubhonti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4676: khaḍgasamā vicaranti mu lokaṃ gagane pavana yatheva vrajanti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4677: syuḥ sukhitā vata te naraloke yeṣu na sajjati mānasa loke |
T04sanssr_pu:4678: vāyusamaṃ sada teṣv iha cittaṃ no ca priyāpriya vidyati saṃgo ||
T04sanssr_pu:4679: apriya ye dukhitehi nivāso ye 'pi priyā dukhitehi viyogo |
T04sanssr_pu:4680: anta ubhe api tehi jahitvā te sukhitā naraye rata dharme ||
T04sanssr_pu:4682: bhavati satatam alpakṛtyayogī pṛthu guṇa doṣata sarvi varjayitvā |
T04sanssr_pu:4683: na vivadati kadāci yuktayogī imi guṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse ||
T04sanssr_pu:4684: sada bhavati niviṇṇa saṃskṛte 'sau na bhavati tasya pṛhā kahiṃci loke |
T04sanssr_pu:4685: na ca bhavati vivṛddhir āsravāṇāṃ vanavasato 'sya bhavanti ānuśaṃsāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4686: adhikaraṇa na tasya jātu bhotī sada upaśāntarato vivekacārī |
T04sanssr_pu:4687: vacaci manasi kāya saṃvṛtasyo bahuguṇa tasya bhavanty araṇyavāse ||
T04sanssr_pu:4688: bhavati anukūla tasya mokṣo laghu pratividhyati so 'dhimukti śāntām |
T04sanssr_pu:4689: vanicari dhimukti sevate 'sya imi guṇa bhonty araṇyavāsi sarve ||
T04sanssr_pu:4691: vanaṣaṇḍa sevatha vivikta sadā vijahitva grāmanagareṣu ratim |
T04sanssr_pu:4692: advitīyakhaḍgasama bhotha sadā na cireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram |
T04sanssr_pu:4696: te 'raṇye ratim āpnuvanti guṇinaḥ śāntendriyāḥ sūratāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4697: na strīsaṃbhava naiva cāpi puruṣais teṣāṃ kvacid vidyate |
T04sanssr_pu:4699: lābhair nāpi ca teṣu harṣa svamano līyanty alābhair na ca |
T04sanssr_pu:4703: satvasaṃsargo me na kartavyo na hi mayaikasatvasya kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayitavyānīty ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:4704: yadi punaḥ śrutavān imāṃ kṣaṇasaṃpadam āsādya lābhādau saktaḥ cittaṃ na śodhayet sa evaikaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:4707: tad yathā kāśyapa kaścid eva puruṣo mahatā udakārṇavenohyamāna udakatṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kuryād |
T04sanssr_pu:4708: evam eva kāśyapa ihaike śramaṇabrāhmaṇā bahūn dharmān udgṛhya paryavāpya na rāgatṛṣṇāṃ vinodayanti
T04sanssr_pu:4715: yeṣu ca sthāneṣu nātidūre piṇḍapātagocaro bhavati nātisaṃnikṛṣṭe |
T04sanssr_pu:4716: yeṣu pānīyāni bhavanty acchāni śucīni nirmalāny alpāyāsāni mukhaparibhogāni yāni ca sthānāni vṛkṣasaṃpannāni bhavanti puṣpasaṃpannāni phalasaṃpannāni pattrasaṃpannāny apagataduṣṭaśvāpadāni guhāsaṃpannāni prāgbhārasaṃpannāni sukhaparisarpyakāṇi śāntāny advitīyāni tādṛśāni sthānāny āśrayet |
T04sanssr_pu:4717: sa teṣu sthāneṣv āśrito yad anena pūrvapaṭhitaṃ bhavati tat tribhī rātrais trirdivasasya svādhyāyati nātyuccena svareṇa nātinīcena noddhatair indriyair na bahirgatena cittena prasādam upajīvan grantham upadhārayan nimittāny udgṛhṇan middham apakrāman |
T04sanssr_pu:4718: saced āraṇyakasya bhikṣo rājā vopasaṃkrāmati rājamātro vānye vā brāhmaṇakṣatriyanaigamajānapadāḥ
T04sanssr_pu:4725: tasya te mahārāja lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te bhūpradeśe śīlavanto guṇavanto bahuśrutāḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ prativasanti |
T04sanssr_pu:4727: sacet sthiro bhavati vinītaḥ praśāntendriyaḥ bhavyaś ca bhavati dharmadeśanāyāḥ tato 'sya vicitrā dharmadeśanā upasaṃhartavyā |
T04sanssr_pu:4730: sacet saṃvegānukūlāṃ na priyāyate udārodārāṇi tathāgatamāhātmyāni upadeṣṭavyāni
T04sanssr_pu:4731: | brāhmaṇakṣatriyanaigamajānapadānām apy upasaṃkrāmatāṃ yathānurūpāḥ kriyā upasaṃhartavyā
T04sanssr_pu:4732: sa evaṃ bahuśrutaḥ san pratibalo bhavati dhārmaśravaṇikānāṃ cittam ārādhayituṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4733: te ca satvās tasyāntike prītiṃ ca prasādaṃ ca prāmodyaṃ ca pratilabhantae iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4735: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇye prativasatā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4743: api tu khalu punar ahaṃ yasyārthāyāraṇye prativasāmi sa mayārthaḥ paripūrayitavyo yad uta śrāmaṇyārthaḥ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4744: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇye viharatā evam upaparīkṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4757: anitye nitya iti viparyāsabhayabhīto 'nnātmany ātmeti viparyāsabhayabhīto 'śucau śucir iti viparyāsabhayabhīto |
T04sanssr_pu:4763: dṛṣṭam iti bhayabhīto 'śrute śrutam iti bhayabhīto 'mate matam iti bhayabhīto 'vijñāte vijñātam iti bhayabhīto 'śramaṇe śramaṇamadabhayabhīto
T04sanssr_pu:4765: saṃkṣepeṇa sarvebhyo 'kuśalebhyo manasikārebhyo bhayabhī ta ebhyo hy aham
T04sanssr_pu:4767: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇyavāsasthitena bhītena vā trastena vā evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4768: yāni kānicid bhayāny utpadyante sarvāṇi tāny ātmagrāhata utpadyante || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4769: sacet punar aham araṇye prativasan nātmagrāhaṃ parityajeyaṃ nātmābhiniveśaṃ nātmaparigrahaṃ nātmanidānaṃ nātmatṛṣṇāṃ nātmasaṃjñāṃ nātmavādopādānaṃ nātmadṛṣṭiṃ nātmādhiṣṭhānaṃ nātmaparikalpanāṃ nātmarakṣāṃ parityajeyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4771: api tu khalu punar gṛhapate nāsty ātmasaṃjñino 'raṇyavāso |
T04sanssr_pu:4773: araṇyavāso nāma gṛhapate ucyate sarvadharmeṣv asaṃbhavavāsaḥ sarvadharmeṣv asaṃgavāsaḥ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4774: tad yathā gṛhapate 'raṇye tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatayaḥ prativasanto na
T04sanssr_pu:4775: bibhyati nottrasyanti na saṃtrasyanti na saṃtrāsam āpadyante |
T04sanssr_pu:4776: evam eva gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvenāraṇye viharatā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatikāṣṭhakuḍyavad ātmapratibhāsavat saṃjñā kāye utpādayitavyā |
T04sanssr_pu:4780: 'sminn uttrasyati |tena bhayabhītena vā trastena vā evaṃ yoniśaḥ kāya upaparīkṣitavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4781: nāsty atra kāye ātmā vā satvo vā jīvo vā poṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā mānavo vā |
T04sanssr_pu:4782: abhūtaparikalpa eṣa yad uta bhayaṃ nāma |
T04sanssr_pu:4784: tena yathāraṇye tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatayaḥ prativasanti amamā aparigrahāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4785: evam evāmamenāparigraheṇāraṇyam eva sarvadharmā iti jñātvā upasampadya vihartavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4789: punar aparaṃ gṛhapate pravrajitena bodhisatvena buddhānujñāto 'raṇyavāsa
T04sanssr_pu:4792: upastabdhakuśalamūlaḥ paścādgrāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣv avatīrya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4793: sacet punar gṛhapate pravrajito bodhisatva uddeśasvādhyāyārthaṃ gaṇam avatarati |
T04sanssr_pu:4794: tena tatra sagauraveṇa bhavitavyaṃ sapratīsenācāryopādhyāyeṣu sthaviramadhyanavakeṣu bhikṣuṣu pradakṣiṇabhavitavyam annalasena svayaṃkāriṇāparopatāpinā na ca tenopasthānagurukeṇa bhavitavyaṃ evaṃ cānenopaparīkṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4796: lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ pūjito dakṣiṇīyaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4797: so 'pi tāvan na kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkaroti |
T04sanssr_pu:4799: api tu vayam eva sarvasatvānām upasthāyakā bhaviṣyāmaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4800: vayam eva pareṣām upasthānaparicaryāṃ kariṣyāmo na ca punaḥ kasyacit sakāśād upasthānaparicaryāṃ svīkariṣyāmaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4802: upasthānagurukasya hi gṛhapate bhikṣor guṇadharmānugraho naśyati |
T04sanssr_pu:4803: yeṣāṃ ca saṃgrahaṃ karoti teṣām evaṃ bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:4806: sacet punar gṛhapate āraṇyako bodhisatvo dharmaśravaṇārthika ācāryopādhyāyadarśanārthiko vā glānaparipṛcchako vā grāmāntikaṃ śayanāsanam āgacchet tena sāyam āgamanāya prakramaṇāya ca cittam utpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4807: sacet punar asya parapratibaddha uddeśaḥ svādhyāyo vā tena vihāre prativasatāraṇyapravaṇacittena bhavitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4808: eṣa eva tasyāraṇyavāso yat sarvavastuṣv araṇyasaṃjñā dharmaparyeṣṭyā cātṛpteti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4810: yadi punar asya tatrāraṇyāyatane viharato 'prāptaphalapṛthagjanasya vyāḍamṛgā āgaccheyuḥ
T04sanssr_pu:4811: tena tatra na bhayaṃ na trāsa utpādayitavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4816: api tu maitrīm utpādayitvā doṣaṃ vivarjayiṣyāmi bhayam apanayiṣyāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:4817: yady evam api kṛtvā te vyāḍamṛgā māṃ jīvitād vyaparopya bhuñjīran |
T04sanssr_pu:4819: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me 'sārāt kāyāt sāram ādattaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:4820: na punar ime vyāḍamṛgāḥ śakyā mayāmiṣeṇa toṣayituṃ mama māṃsaṃ bhakṣayitvā sukhasparśaṃ vihariṣyanti
T04sanssr_pu:4822: yadi punas tatrāraṇyāyatane viharato 'manuṣyā upasaṃkramiṣyanti suvarṇā vā
T04sanssr_pu:4825: yadi pūrvabuddhadarśinyo devatā āraṇyakaṃ bhikṣum upasaṃkramya praśnaṃ paripṛccheyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4826: tatra tenāraṇyakena bhikṣuṇā yathāśakti yathābalaṃ yathādharmādhigamāya tāsāṃ devatānāṃ dharmo deśayitavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4827: yadi punas tāvaṅ gambhīrān praśnān paripṛccheyur yān sa āraṇyako bhikṣur na śaknuyād visarjayituṃ
T04sanssr_pu:4828: tena nirmānena bhūtvā vāg bhāṣitavyāśikṣito na paribhavitavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4830: bhaviṣyati sa kālaḥ sa samayo yadādhigatān dharmān śrutvā sarvakathāṃ visarjayiṣyāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:4833: tena tatrāraṇyāyatane prativasatā tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaḥpatīnāṃ nimittaṃ grahītavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4835: yathaiṣāṃ bhāvanām asvāmikānām amamānām aparigrahāṇām evaṃ niśceṣṭānāṃ nirvyāpārāṇāṃ bhavaty utpādo bhaṅgaś ca |
T04sanssr_pu:4838: evam evāyaṃ kāyas tṛṇakāṣṭhakuḍyapratibhāsopamo 'svāmiko 'mamo 'parigraho niśceṣṭo nirvyāpāro hetupratyayayuktyā utpadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:4840: na punar atra kaścid dharmaḥ paramārthata utpadyate vā nirudhyate veti
T04sanssr_pu:4842: tena tatrāraṇyāyatane viharatā evaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4843: yady apy aham araṇyam āgata eko 'dvitīyo |
T04sanssr_pu:4844: na me kaścit sahāyo yo māṃ sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vā codayet |
T04sanssr_pu:4845: api tu khalu punaḥ santīme devanāgayakṣā buddhāś ca bhagavanto ye mama cittāśayaṃ jānanti
T04sanssr_pu:4849: yadi punar aham iyaddūram āgata eko 'dvitīyo 'saṃstabdho 'mamo 'parigrahaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:4851: vyāpaādaṃ vihinsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayeyam anyaṃ vākuśalavitarkaṃ vitarkayeyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:4853: te ca me devanāgayakṣā visaṃvāditāḥ buddhāś ca bhagavanto 'nnabhirāddhā bhaviṣyantīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:4857: tad evam araṇye vasan samādhānāya yujyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:4859: sa teṣām eva satvānām arthāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carann avikṣiptacitto bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:4862: laukikī dhyānopapattir api tāvad vikṣiptacittasya durlabhā |
T04sanssr_pu:4867: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dhyānaṃ samāpadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:4868: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyañjanagrāhī |
T04sanssr_pu:4871: 'bhidhyādaurmanasye anye vā pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anuprāpnuyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4878: manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:4884: sa gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi bhāṣamāṇo
T04sanssr_pu:4891: rahasy arahasi vā kalpiteryāpathaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4909: tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān asaṃbhūtān aniṣpannān annabhinirvṛttān sarvadharmān paśyatīti vistaraḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4910: tatra līne manasi muditā bhāvanayottejanaṃ kuryāt |
T04sanssr_pu:4913: bahu kalpakoṭībhi kadāci buddho utpadyate lokahito maharṣi |
T04sanssr_pu:4914: labdho 'dhunā sa pravaraḥ kṣaṇo 'dya tyajati pramādaṃ yadi moktukāma |
T04sanssr_pu:4917: mayopamaṃ vitatham etat svapnopamaṃ ca saṃskṛtam avekṣya na cirād bhaviṣyati viyogaḥ sarvapriyaiḥ
T04sanssr_pu:4919: udyujya yathā ghaṭata nityaṃ pāramitāsu bhūmiṣu baleṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:4920: mā jātu sraṃsaya vīryaṃ yāvan na budhyathā pravarabodhim |
T04sanssr_pu:4923: jvalitaṃ tribhuvaṃ jaravyādhidukhair maraṇāgnipradīptam anātham idam |
T04sanssr_pu:4924: bhavaniḥśaraṇe sada mūḍha jagad bhramati bhramaro yathā kumbhagataḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4925: adhruvaṃ tribhuvaṃ śaradabhranibhaṃ naṭaraṅgasamā jagi janmacyutiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4926: girinadyasamaṃ laghuśīghrajavaṃ vrajatāyu jage yatha vidyu nabhe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4928: parivarttiṣu pañcagatiṣv abudhā yatha kumbhakarasya hi cakra bhramī ||
T04sanssr_pu:4930: pariṣiktam idaṃ kalipāśa jagat mṛgalubdhakapāśi yathaiva kapi ||
T04sanssr_pu:4931: sabhayāḥ saraṇāḥ sada vairakarāḥ bahuśokopadrava kāmaguṇāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4934: bhavatṛṣṇalatāya vivṛddhikarāḥ sabhayāḥ saraṇā sada kāmaguṇāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4935: yatha agnikhadāḥ jvalitāḥ sabhayāḥ tatha kāma ime viditāryajanaiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4937: yatha sarpaśiro yatha mīḍhaghaṭaḥ tatha kāma ime viditā viduṣām |
T04sanssr_pu:4938: tatha śūlasāmā dvijapeśisamā yatha śvānakaraṃ kiśavaira tathodakacandranibhā imi kāmaguṇāḥ pratibimba ivā girighoṣa yathā |
T04sanssr_pu:4940: kṣaṇikāvasikā imi kāmaguṇāḥ tatha māyamarīcisamā alikodakabudbudaphenasamā vitathāḥ parikalpasamutthita buddha budhaiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4941: prathame vayase vararūpadharaḥ priya iṣṭamato iya bālacārī |
T04sanssr_pu:4942: jaravyādhidukhair hatatejavapuṃ vijahanti mṛgā iva śuṣkanadīm ||
T04sanssr_pu:4943: dhanadhānyavaro bahudravyabalī priya iṣṭamato iya bālacārī |
T04sanssr_pu:4944: parihīṇadhanaṃ puna kṛcchragataṃ vijahanti narā iva śūnyaṭavīm ||
T04sanssr_pu:4945: yatha puṣpadrumo saphalo va drumo narudānarataḥ tatha prītikaraḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4946: dhanahīnu jarārditu yācanako bhavate tada apriyagṛdhrasamaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:4949: jarayā jaritaḥ samatītavayo druma vidyuhato va yathā bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:4950: jarajīrṇa agāra yathā sabhayo jaraniḥśaraṇaṃ laghu brūhi mune ||
T04sanssr_pu:4951: jara śoṣayate naranārigaṇaṃ yatha mālulatā ghana śālavanam |
T04sanssr_pu:4952: jara vīryaparākramavegaharī jara paṅkanimagna yathā puruṣo ||
T04sanssr_pu:4953: jara rūpa surūpavirūpakarī jara tejaharī balasthāmaharī |
T04sanssr_pu:4954: sada saukhyaharī paribhāvakarī jara mṛtyukarī jara ojaharī ||
T04sanssr_pu:4955: bahurogaśatair ghanavyādhidukhaiḥ upasṛṣṭu jagaj jvalaneva mṛgāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4956: jara vyādhigataṃ prasamīkṣya jagat dukhaniḥśaraṇaṃ laghu deśaya hī ||
T04sanssr_pu:4957: śiśirehi yathā himadhātu mahaṃ tṛṇagulmavanauṣadhi ojaharo |
T04sanssr_pu:4958: tatha ojaharo 'yu vyādhi jage parihīyati indriyarūpabalam ||
T04sanssr_pu:4960: pratighātakaraḥ priyadveṣakaraḥ paridāhakaro yatha sūryu nabhe ||
T04sanssr_pu:4961: maraṇaṃ cyavanaṃ cyuti kālakriyā priyadravyajanena viyogu sadā |
T04sanssr_pu:4962: apunāgamanaṃ ca asaṃgamanaṃ drumapattraphalā nadiśrotu yathā ||
T04sanssr_pu:4963: maraṇaṃ vaśitān avaśīkurute maraṇaṃ harate nadi dāru yathā |
T04sanssr_pu:4965: maraṇaṃ grasate bahu prāṇiśatān makaro va jalākari bhūtagaṇān |
T04sanssr_pu:4966: garuḍo uragaṃ mṛgarāja gaja jvalano va tṛṇauṣadhibhūtagaṇam |
T04sanssr_pu:4969: tad yathā mahārāja catasṛbhyo digbhyaś catvāraḥ parvatā āgaccheyur dṛḍhāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:4970: sāravanto 'khaṇḍā acchidrā asuṣirāḥ susaṃvṛtā ekaghanā nabhaḥ spṛśantaḥ pṛthivīṃ collikhantaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:4971: sarvatṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāparṇapalāśādi sarvasatvaprāṇibhūtāni nirmathnantas tebhyo na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ balena vā dravyamantrauṣadhibhir vā nivartayitum |
T04sanssr_pu:4972: evam eva mahārāja catvārīmāni mahābhayāny āgacchanti yeṣāṃ na sukaraṃ javena vā palāyituṃ balena dravyamantrauṣadhair vā nivartanaṃ kartum |
T04sanssr_pu:4980: tad yathā mahārāja siṃho mṛgarājo rūpasaṃpanno javasaṃpannaḥ sujātanakhadaṃṣṭrākarālo mṛgagaṇam anupraviśya mṛgaṃ gṛhītvā yathākāmakaraṇīyaṃ karoti |
T04sanssr_pu:4981: sa ca mṛgo 'tibalaṃ vyāḍamukham āsādya vivaśo
T04sanssr_pu:4983: evam eva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyenāpagatamadasyāparāyaṇasya marmasu chidyamāneṣu mucyamāneṣu sandhiṣu māṃsaśoṇite pariśuṣyamāṇe paritaptatṛṣitavihvalavadanasya karacaraṇavikṣepābhiyuktasyākarmaṇyasyāsamarthasya lālāsiṅghāṇakapūyamūtrapurīṣopaliptasya īṣajjīvitāvaśeṣasya karmabhavāt punar bhavam ālambānasya yamapuruṣabhayabhītasya kālarātrivaśagatasya caramāśvāsapraśvāseṣūparudhyamāneṣu e kākino 'dvitīyasyāsahāyasyemaṃ lokaṃ jahataḥ paralokam ākrāmato mahāpathaṃ vrajato mahākāntāraṃ praviśato mahāgahanaṃ samavagāhamānasya mahāndhakāraṃ pratipadyamānasya mahārṇavenorjyamānasya karmavāyunāhriyamāṇasyānimittīkṛtāṃ diśaṃ gacchato nānyat trāṇaṃ nānyac charaṇaṃ nānyat parāyaṇam ṛte dharmāt |
T04sanssr_pu:4984: dharmo hi mahārāja tasmin samaye trāṇaṃ layanaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:4994: evam eva mahārāja viddhasya mṛtyuśalyenāpagatamadasyātrāṇasyāśaraṇasyāparāyaṇasya nānyat trāṇaṃ nānyat parāyaṇam anyatra dharmāt |
T04sanssr_pu:4995: tasmāt tarhi te mahārājānityatānudarśinā bhavitavyaṃ kṣayavyayānudarśinā bhavitavyaṃ maraṇabhayabhītena
T04sanssr_pu:4996: dharmeṇaiva te mahārāja rājyaṃ kārayitavyaṃ nādharmeṇa |
T04sanssr_pu:4998: asyāpi te mahārājātmabhāvasyaivaṃ suciram api parirakṣitasya suciram api śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyāsvādanīyena saṃtarpitasya saṃpravāritasya |
T04sanssr_pu:5000: evaṃ kāśikauśeyadūkūlapattrorṇākṣaumādibhir vastraviśeṣair ācchāditasya caramaśayanāvasthitasya vividhasvedāmbuklinnamalinavasanāvṛtasya kālakriyā bhaviṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:5001: evam api te mahārāja snānānulepanavāsadhūpapuṣpasurabhigandhasyātmabhāvasya na cireṇa durgandhatā bhaviṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:5002: evaṃ stryāgāramadhyagatasyāpi te strīgaṇaparivṛtasya nānāvādyagītatūryanādyair upagīyamānasya sumanasaḥ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato maraṇabhayabhītasyātīva duṣkhadaurmanasyābhyāṃ kālakriyā bhaviṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:5003: evam api te mahārāja gṛheṣūpalepanopalipteṣu susthāpitārgaleṣu supihitavātāyaneṣu bahugandhadhūpapuṣpatailavartiprajvāliteṣv āsaktapaṭṭadāmakalāpeṣu muktakusumāvakīrṇeṣu gandhaghaṭikānirdhūpiteṣu anyastapādapīṭhapaṭikāstaraṇagoṇikāstaraṇakācalindikaprāvaraṇasāntarochadapaṭikobhayakṛtopadhāneṣu paryaṅkeṣu śayitvā |
T04sanssr_pu:5004: punaś ca śṛgālakākagṛdhramṛtakaḍevaramāṃsāsthikeśarudhiravaśākule paramabībhatse śmaśāne gataceṣṭasyātmabhāvaḥ pṛthivyām avaśaḥ śeṣyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5005: evam api te mahārāja gajaskandhāśvapṛṣṭharathābhirūḍhasya śaṅkhapaṭaheṣv āhanyamāneṣu chatreṇa dhāryamāṇena bālavyajanena vījayamānasyānnekahastyaśvarathapadātibhir anuyātasyāñjaliśatasahasrair namaḥkriyamāṇasya |
T04sanssr_pu:5006: nirgamanam anubhūya na cirān niśceṣṭasya mṛtaśayanābhirūḍhasya caturbhiḥ puruṣair utkṣiptasya dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa nirṇītasya mātāpitṛbhrātṛbhaginībhāryāputraduhitṛvayasyadāsīdāsakarmakarapauruṣeyaiḥ śokagatahṛdayair vikṣiptakeśair utkṣiptabhujaiḥ sorastāḍaṃ paramakaruṇaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5007: hā putra hā nātha hā tāta hā svāminn ity ākrandamānaiḥ paurajānapadaiḥ saparibhāvadṛśyamānasya śmaśānaṃ nītasya punaḥ kākagṛdhraśvaśṛgālādibhir bhakṣitasya tāny asthīny agninā vā dagdhāni pṛthivyāṃ vā nikhānitāni
T04sanssr_pu:5008: adbhir vā klinnāni vātātāpavarṣair vā cūrṇīkṛtāni digvidikṣu prakṣiptāni tatraiva pūtabhavam āyāsyanti |
T04sanssr_pu:5009: evam anityāḥ sarvasaṃskārā evam adhruvā iti vistaraḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5010: tatra kleśāḥ prādhānyena rāgadveṣamohā yasyaiṣām ekatarasya tāvat pratipakṣam ādau bhāvayet tannidānaṃ ca varjayet ||
T04sanssr_pu:5019: yad uta santy asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā rajo malaṃ tvak māṃsāsthi snāyuḥ śirā vṛkkā hṛdayaṃ plīhakaḥ klomakaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5021: audaryakaṃ yakṛt purīṣam aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṅghāṇakaṃ vasā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleśmā pūyaṃ śoṇitaṃ mastakaṃ mastakaluṅgaṃ prasrāvaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5022: eṣu ca vastuṣu bodhisatva upaparīkṣaṇajātīyo bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:5024: yo 'pi tāvat syād bālo mūḍhaḥ abhavyo 'kuśalaḥ so 'pi tāvad etāni vastūni jñātvā rāgacittaṃ notpādayet |
T04sanssr_pu:5029: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imam evaṃ kāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
T04sanssr_pu:5030: tad yathāpi nāma subhūte goghātako vā goghātakāntevāsī vā gāṃ hatvā tīkṣṇena śastreṇa catvāri phalakāni kṛtvā pratyavekṣate sthito 'thavā niṣaṇṇaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5031: evam eva subhūte bodhisatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imam eva kāyaṃ dhātuśo yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti
T04sanssr_pu:5032: asty asmin kāye pṛthivīdhātur abdhātur api tejodhātur api vāyudhātur apīti |
T04sanssr_pu:5035: tad yathāpi subhūte karṣakasya mūtoḍī pūrṇā nānādhānyānāṃ śālīnāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ tilānāṃ taṇḍulānāṃ mudrānāṃ māṣāṇāṃ yavānāṃ godhūmānāṃ maśūrāṇāṃ sarṣapāṇāṃ |tān etān cakṣuṣmān puruṣaḥ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ evaṃjātīyād ayaṃ śālir ayaṃ vrīhir amī tilā amī taṇḍulā amī mudrā amī māṣā yavā amī godhūmā amī maśūrā amī sarṣapā iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:5036: evam eva bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann imam eva kāyam ūrddhvaṃ pādatalād adhaḥ keśamastakanakharomatvak romaparyantaṃ pūrṇaṃ nānāprakārasyāśucer yathābhūtaṃ pratyavekṣate santy asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā yāvan mastakaṃ mastakaluṅgam akṣigūthaṃ karṇagūtham iti || pe
T04sanssr_pu:5037: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvaḥ śmaśānagataḥ paśyati nānārūpāṇi mṛtaśarīrāṇi śmaśāne 'paviddhāni śavaśayane ujjhitāni ekāhamṛtāni vā dvyahamṛtāni vā tryahamṛtāni vā caturahamṛtāni vā pañcāhamṛtāni vā
T04sanssr_pu:5042: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:5043: punar aparaṃ yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi śmaśāne utsṛṣṭāni paśyati |
T04sanssr_pu:5044: ṣaḍrātramṛtāni kākair vā khādyamānāni kurarair vā gṛdhrair vā śvabhir vā śṛgālair vā tato
T04sanssr_pu:5045: 'nyair vā nānāvidhaiḥ prāṇakajātaiḥ khādyamānāni sa imam eva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati |
T04sanssr_pu:5048: punar aparaṃ yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi paśyati śmaśāne utsṛṣṭāni vikhāditāny aśucīni durgandhāni |
T04sanssr_pu:5049: sa imam eva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharatīti pūrvavat || pe
T04sanssr_pu:5050: punar aparaṃ yadā paśyati mṛtaśarīrāṇi śivapathikāyām asthisaṃkalikāṃ māṃsaśoṇitamrakṣitāṃ snāyuvinibaddhāṃ |sa tatremam eva kāyam iti pūrvavat ||
T04sanssr_pu:5051: punar aparaṃ yadā mṛtaśarīrāṇi paśyati śivapathikāyām asthisaṃkalībhūtāni apagatamāṃsaśoṇitasnāyubandhanāni
T04sanssr_pu:5052: sa imam eva kāyam iti pūrvavat ||
T04sanssr_pu:5053: punar aparaṃ yadā paśyati śivapathikāyām asthīni digvidikṣu kṣiptāni |
T04sanssr_pu:5061: sa imam eva kāyam upasaṃharatīti pūrvavat || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:5062: punar aparaṃ yadā paśyati śivapathikāyām asthīny annekavārṣikāṇi vātānupariśoṣitāni śaṅkhasannibhāni
T04sanssr_pu:5064: ayam api kāya evaṃdharmā evaṃsvabhāva etāṃ dharmatāṃ na vyativṛttae iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:5065: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yadā paśyati śivapathikāyām asthīny annekavārṣikāṇi tirobhūtāni nīlāni kapotavarṇāni pūtīni cūrṇakajātāni pṛthivyāṃ pāṃsunā asamasamībhūtāni sa imam eva kāyaṃ tatropasaṃharati ayam api kāya evaṃdharmā evaṃsvabhāvaḥ etāṃ dharmatāṃ na vyativṛttae iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:5069: tena vā saha bhojanādyekārthatayāprītyutpādanaṃ tatra parasukhasyāśaṃsā prārthanā tṛṣṇābhinandanaṃ maitrī |
T04sanssr_pu:5075: punar buddhārambaṇā bodhisatvārambaṇā śrāvakapratyekabuddhārambaṇā satvārambaṇā ca |
T04sanssr_pu:5076: tatra satvārambaṇāyāḥ pūrvaṃ priye satve hitasukhopasaṃhārān na dhyānam abhyasya |
T04sanssr_pu:5083: evaṃ yāvad ekāṃ diśam adhimucya spharitvopasaṃpadya viharati |
T04sanssr_pu:5087: sa bodhisatvacaryāyāṃ caran yāvanti kānicid dṛśyante rūpāṇi manojñāni vā pratikūlāni vā |
T04sanssr_pu:5088: evaṃ śabdā gandhā rasā spraṣṭavyā dharmā manojñā vā pratikūlā vā |
T04sanssr_pu:5089: annavadyā viśuddhāḥ kalyāṇodāraprabhāsvarā vā yena saumanasyaṃ jāyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5101: sarvabuddhānām etayā pariṇāmanayā bhūyasyā mātrayā te buddhā bhagavanto 'cintyena
T04sanssr_pu:5102: buddhavihārasukhena samanvāgatā bhavantv atulyena buddhasamādhisukhena susaṃgṛhītā bhavantv annantasukhena bhūyasyā mātrayopastabdhā bhavantu |
T04sanssr_pu:5110: evaṃ bodhisatvas tatkuśalamūlaṃ tathāgateṣu pariṇamayya bodhisatveṣu pariṇamayati |
T04sanssr_pu:5111: yad idam aparipūrṇānām abhiprāyāṇāṃ paripūrṇāya pariṇamayati |
T04sanssr_pu:5121: sa evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ bodhisatvānām arthāya pariṇamayya buddhaśāsanāvacareṣu sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddheṣu tatkuśalamūlam evaṃ pariṇāmayati |
T04sanssr_pu:5122: te kecit satvā ekācchaṭāsaṃhātamātram api buddhaśabdaṃ sṛṇvati |
T04sanssr_pu:5123: dharmaśabdaṃ vāryasaṃghaparyupāsanaṃ vā kurvanti teṣāṃ tatkuśalamūlam annuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati buddhānusmṛtiparipūryai pariṇāmayati |
T04sanssr_pu:5133: śrāvakapratyekabuddheṣu ca tathā bodhisatvaḥ sarvasatveṣu tatkuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayati ||
T04sanssr_pu:5145: tasya yat kiñcic cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyagamanāgamanaśarīropasthānaniṣadyādiniṣevaṇāyatanānāṃ pravartanakarma īryāpathādhiṣṭhānam īryāpathasyāvikopanaṃ kāyakarma vākkarma manaḥkarma sacuritaṃ ṣaṇṇām indriyāṇāṃ saṃvaraḥ svaśarīrāchādanamardanasnānakarma |
T04sanssr_pu:5146: aśitapītakhāditaṃ saṃmiñjitaprasāritāvalokitavilokitasuptajāgaritasvaśarīragatopasthānaṃ sarvam etad bodhisatvasya sarvajñatālambanaprayuktasya na kiñcid apariṇāmitaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ sarvasatvahitasukhacittasya || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:5152: antaśaḥ śvasv api tad anyeṣv api tiryagyonigateṣv ekaudanonmiñjitam ekālopaṃ vā parityajati
T04sanssr_pu:5153: sugatāv upapattiṣu tat sarvaṃ teṣām eva hitāya teṣām eva parimocanāya pariṇāmayati |
T04sanssr_pu:5154: tasyās tiryagyones tasmād duṣkhārṇavāt tasmād duṣkhopādānāt tasmād duṣkhaskandhāt tasmād duṣkhāvedanāyāḥ
T04sanssr_pu:5155: tasmād duṣkhopacayāt tasmād duṣkhābhisaṃskārāt tasmād duṣkhanidānāt tato duṣkhamūlāt tasmād duṣkhāyatanāt teṣāṃ satvānāṃ vinivartanāya pariṇāmayati tadārambaṇena ca sarvasatvārambaṇīkaroti manasikaroti |
T04sanssr_pu:5164: imāś ca suvarṇabhāsoktā maitrīkaruṇāgarbhā gāthāḥ sarvā ādarataḥ samanvāhṛtya bhāvayitavyā antaśo vacasāpi ||
T04sanssr_pu:5166: apāyaduṣkhā yamalokaduṣkhā dāridryaduṣkhāś ca iha triloke ||
T04sanssr_pu:5167: anena co dundubhighoṣanādinā śāmyantu sarvavyasanāni loke |
T04sanssr_pu:5168: bhavantu satvā hy abhayāhatā tathā yathābhayāḥ śāntabhayāḥ munīndrāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5170: tathaiva bhontū guṇasāgarāḥ prajāḥ samādhibodhyaṅgaguṇair upetāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5171: anena co dundubhighoṣanādinā bhavantu brahmasvara sarvasatvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5173: tiṣṭhantu kalpāni acintiyāni deśentu dharmaṃ jagato hitāya |
T04sanssr_pu:5174: hanantu kleśān vidhamantu duṣkhān samentu rāgaṃ tatha doṣa moham ||
T04sanssr_pu:5176: śṛṇvantu te dundubhisaṃpravāditaṃ namo 'stu buddhāya bhaṇantu vācam ||
T04sanssr_pu:5177: jātismarāḥ satvā bhavantu sarve jātīśataṃ jātisahasrakoṭyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5178: anusmarantū satataṃ munīndrān śṛṇvantu teṣāṃ vacanaṃ hy udāraṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5179: anena co dundubhighoṣanādinā labhantu buddhehi samāgamaṃ sadā |
T04sanssr_pu:5180: vivarjayantū khalu pāpakarma carantu kuśalāni śubhakriyāṇi ||
T04sanssr_pu:5181: sarvatra kṣetreṣu ca sarvaprāṇināṃ sarve ca duṣkhāḥ praśamantu loke |
T04sanssr_pu:5182: ye satva vikalendriya aṅgahīnāḥ te sarvi sakalendriya bhontu sāṃpratam ||
T04sanssr_pu:5183: ye vyādhitā durbalakṣīṇagātrā nistrāṇabhūtāḥ śayitā diśāsu |
T04sanssr_pu:5184: te sarvi mucyantu ca vyādhito laghu labhantu cārogya balendriyāṇi ||
T04sanssr_pu:5185: ye rājacaurabhaṭa tarjita vadhyaprāptā nānāvidhair bhayaśatair vyasanopapannāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5186: te sarvi satva vyasanāgataduṣkhitā hi mucyantu tair bhayaśataiḥ paramaiḥ sughoraiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5187: ye tāḍitā bandhanabaddhapīḍitā vividheṣu vyasaneṣu ca saṃsthitāhi |
T04sanssr_pu:5189: te sarvi mucyantv iha bandhanebhyaḥ saṃtāḍitā mucyiṣu tāḍanebhyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5190: vadhyāś ca saṃyujyiṣu jīvitena vyasanāgatā nirbhaya bhontu sarve ||
T04sanssr_pu:5191: ye satva kṣuttarṣapipāsapīḍitā labhantu te bhojanapānacitram |
T04sanssr_pu:5192: andhāś ca paśyantu vicitrarūpāṃ badhirāś ca śṛṇvantu manojñaghoṣān ||
T04sanssr_pu:5193: nagnāś ca vastrāṇi labhantu citrāṃ daridrasatvāś ca nidhiṃ labhantu |
T04sanssr_pu:5194: prabhūtadhanadhānyavicitraratnaiḥ sarve ca satvāḥ sukhino bhavantu ||
T04sanssr_pu:5195: mā kasyacid bhāvatu duṣkhavedanāḥ saukhyānvitāḥ satva bhavantu sarve |
T04sanssr_pu:5196: abhirūpaprāsādikasaumyarūpā anneka sukha saṃcita nitya bhontu ||
T04sanssr_pu:5197: manasānnapānāḥ susamṛddhapuṇyāḥ saha cittamātreṇa bhavantu teṣāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5198: vīṇā mṛdaṅgāḥ paṇavāḥ sughoṣakāḥ utsā sarāḥ puṣkariṇī taḍāgāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5199: suvarṇapadmotpalapadminīś ca saha cittamātreṇa bhavantu teṣām |
T04sanssr_pu:5200: gandhaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ ca vāsaś ca cūrṇaṃ kusumaṃ vicitram ||
T04sanssr_pu:5201: triṣkālavṛkṣebhi pravarṣayantu gṛhṇantu te satva bhavantu hṛṣṭāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5202: kurvantu pūjāṃ daśasū diśāsu acintiyāṃ sarvatathāgatānām ||
T04sanssr_pu:5203: sa bodhisatvān atha śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmasya bodhi pratisṛṣṭi tasya |
T04sanssr_pu:5204: nīcāṃ gatiṃ satva vivarjayantu bhavantu aṣṭākṣaṇavītivṛttāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5205: āsādayantū jinarājam uttamaṃ labhantu buddhehi samāgamaṃ sadā |
T04sanssr_pu:5206: sarvā striyo nitya narā bhavantu śūrāś ca vīrā vidupaṇḍitāś ca ||
T04sanssr_pu:5207: te sarvi bodhāya carantu nityaṃ carantu te pāramitāsu ṣaṭsu |
T04sanssr_pu:5208: paśyantu buddhān daśasū diśāsu ratnadrumendreṣu sukhopaviṣṭān |
T04sanssr_pu:5216: yad idam avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvaj jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:5217: avidyā cen nābhaviṣyan naiva saṃskārāḥ prājñāsyanta |
T04sanssr_pu:5218: evaṃ yāvad yadi jātir nābhaviṣyan na jarāmaraṇaṃ prājñāsyata |
T04sanssr_pu:5219: atha satyām avidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:5220: evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyābhinirvṛttir bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:5228: ahaṃ jātyā nirvṛtta iti |atha ca satyām avidyāyāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:5229: evaṃ yāvaj jātyāṃ satyāṃ jarāmaraṇasyābhinirvṛttir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5231: katham ādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavya iti
T04sanssr_pu:5234: yad idaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātūnāṃ samavāyād ādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5237: kāyasya saṃśleṣataḥ kaṭhinabhāvam abhinirvartayaty ayam ucyate pṛthivīdhātuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5238: yaḥ kāyasyānuparigrahaṃ kṛtyaṃ karoti ayam ucyate 'bdhātuḥ
T04sanssr_pu:5239: | yaḥ kāyasyāśitapītabhakṣitaṃ paripācayati ayam ucyate tejodhātuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5240: yaḥ kāyasyāśvāsapraśvāsakṛtyaṃ karoty ayam ucyate vāyudhātuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5241: yaḥ kāyasyāntaḥsauṣiryabhāvam abhinirvartayaty ayam ucyate ākāśadhātuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5242: yo nāmarūpam abhinirvartayati naḍakalāpayogena pañcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktaṃ sāsravaṃ ca manovijñānam ayam ucyate vijñānadhātuḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5244: yadādhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhātur avikalo bhavaty evam aptejovāyvākāśavijñānadhātavaś cāvikalā bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:5258: atha ca satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu kāyasyotpattir bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:5259: tatra pṛthivīdhātur nātmā na satvo na jīvo na jantur na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5263: evam abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātur na satvo na jīvo na jantur na manujo na mānavo na strī na pumān na napuṃsakaṃ na cāhaṃ na mama na cāpy anyasya kasyacit tatrāvidyā katamā |
T04sanssr_pu:5264: yā eṣv eva ṣaṭsu dhātuṣv ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā satvajīvamanujamānavasaṃjñā |
T04sanssr_pu:5267: evam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante |
T04sanssr_pu:5268: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohā viṣayeṣv amī ucyante saṃskārā iti |
T04sanssr_pu:5271: catvāri ca mahābhūtāni copādāya upādāya r ūpam aikadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya tan nāmarūpaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5285: ye cānyae evamādaya upakleśās tae upāyāsāḥ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:5286: punar aparaṃ tatve 'pratipattiḥ mithyā pratipattiḥ ajñānam avidyā |
T04sanssr_pu:5287: evam avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārāḥ abhinirvartante |
T04sanssr_pu:5288: puṇyopagā apuṇyopagā āniñjyopagāś cemae ucyante 'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti |
T04sanssr_pu:5289: puṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ puṇyopagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:5290: apuṇyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām apuṇyopagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:5291: āniñjyopagānāṃ saṃskārāṇām āniñjyopagam eva vijñānaṃ bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:5296: ṣaḍbhya āyatanebhyaḥ ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ pravartante 'yaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśa ity ucyate
T04sanssr_pu:5297: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate
T04sanssr_pu:5303: mā me priyarūpaśātarūpair viyogo bhavatv iti |
T04sanssr_pu:5306: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayati kāyena vācā manasā |
T04sanssr_pu:5308: yā karmanirjātānāṃ skandhānām abhinirvṛttiḥ sā bhavapratyayā jātir ity ucyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5309: yo jātyabhinirvṛttānāṃ skandhānām upacayaparipākād vināśo bhavati
T04sanssr_pu:5310: | tad idaṃ jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇam ucyate || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:5319: atha cemāny asya dvādaśāṅgasya pratītyasamutpādasya catvāri aṅgāni saṃghātakriyāyai hetutvena pravartante |
T04sanssr_pu:5330: asatāṃ yeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ bījasyābhinirvṛttir na bhavati ||
T04sanssr_pu:5333: tṛṣṇāyā api naivaṃ bhavati |ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti |
T04sanssr_pu:5336: vijñānabījasyāpi naivaṃ bhavaty aham ebhiḥ pratyayair janita iti |
T04sanssr_pu:5337: api tu vijñānabīje karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhite tṛṣṇāsnehābhiṣyandite 'vidyāvakīrṇe tatra tatrotpattyāyatanasandhau mātuḥ kukṣau virohati |
T04sanssr_pu:5339: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvarādinirmito na kālapariṇāmito na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpy ahetusamutpannaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5340: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogād ṛtusamavāyād anyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyād āsvādānupraviddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkurabījam abhinirvartayati |
T04sanssr_pu:5341: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt ||
T04sanssr_pu:5342: tad yathā pañcabhiḥ kāraṇaiś cakṣurvijñānam utpadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5344: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpaṃ cālokaṃ cākāśaṃ tajjaṃ ca manasikāraṃ ca pratītyotpadyate cakṣurvijñānaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:5351: yadā cakṣur ādhyātmikam āyatanam avikalaṃ bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:5366: atha ca punaḥ satsv eṣu pratyayeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyotpattir bhavati prādurbhāvaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5368: tatra na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ saṃkrāmati |
T04sanssr_pu:5372: evam eva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatra tatrotpattyāyatanapratisandhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuram abhinirvartayati |
T04sanssr_pu:5373: asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣv amameṣv aparigraheṣv apratyarthikeṣv ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānām avaikalyāt ||
T04sanssr_pu:5374: tan nādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pañcabhiḥ kāraṇair draṣṭavyaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5379: yasmād anye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā anyae aupapattyaṃśikāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5380: na tu yae eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhās tae evaupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhā |
T04sanssr_pu:5381: api tu māraṇāntikāś ca skandhā nirudhyamānā aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāś ca prādurbhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:5384: na ca niruddheṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti nāpy aniruddheṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:5385: api tu māraṇāntikāś ca skandhā nirudhyante aupapattyaṃśikāś ca prādurbhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:5389: visadṛśāt satvanikāyād dhi sabhāgāḥ skandhā jātyantare 'bhinirvartante |
T04sanssr_pu:5391: kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ parīttaṃ karma kriyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5398: yaḥ kaścid bhadanta śāriputremaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ bhagavatā samyakpraṇītam evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā satatasamitam ajīvaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvad aviparītam ajātam abhūtam akṛtam asaṃskṛtam apratigham annāvaraṇaṃ śivam abhayam ahāryam avyayam avyupaśamam asvabhāvaṃ paśyati |
T04sanssr_pu:5399: asatyatas tucchata ṛktato 'sārato 'ghato 'nityato duṣkhataḥ śūnyato 'nnātmanaś ca samanupaśyati
T04sanssr_pu:5401: kim aham abhūvam atīte 'dhvany āho svin nābhūvam atīte 'dhvani |
T04sanssr_pu:5404: kiṃ nu bhaviṣyāmy annāgate 'dhvany āho svin na bhaviṣyāmy annāgate 'dhvani |
T04sanssr_pu:5407: kiṃ svid idaṃ kathaṃ svid idaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5414: api tu khalu punar yad ucyate
T04sanssr_pu:5420: eṣāparāntiky apekṣāta ūrddhvam asy pravṛttir iti || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:5426: hanta vayam evaṃ bahudoṣaduṣṭaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ viditvāsya saṃyogasyāsyāś ca sāmagryā vyavacchedaṃ kariṣyāmo |
T04sanssr_pu:5436: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatva evaṃ kāye smṛtim upasthāpayati |
T04sanssr_pu:5447: tasya kāyaparijñānahetor na bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati |
T04sanssr_pu:5452: na parānte saṃkrānto na pūrvāntāparāntāvasthito 'nyatrāsadviparyāsasaṃbhūtaḥ kārakavedakarahito nādyantamadhye pratiṣṭhitamūlaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5456: āgantukair vyavahārair vyavahriyate kāya iti deha iti bhoga iti āśraya iti śarīram iti kuṇapa iti āyatanam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:5462: maraṇaparyavasāna iti jñātvā na kāyahetor viṣamayā jīvati |
T04sanssr_pu:5466: so 'nityaḥ kāya iti sarvasatvānāṃ dāsatvaśiṣyatvam abhyupagamya kiṅkaraṇīyatāyai utsuko bhavati
T04sanssr_pu:5467: anityaḥ kāya iti sarvakāya doṣavaṅkaśāṭhyakuhanāṃ na karoti |
T04sanssr_pu:5468: anityaḥ kāya iti jīvitenāśvāsaprāpto jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti |
T04sanssr_pu:5469: anityaḥ kāya iti bhogeṣu tṛṣṇādhyavasānaṃ na karoti |
T04sanssr_pu:5471: punar aparaṃ kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kāye kāyānudarśanasmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan sarvasatvakāyāṃs tatra svakāyae upanibadhnāti |
T04sanssr_pu:5474: | yathā ca tathāgatakāye nāśravas tathā svakāyadharmatāṃ pratyavekṣate |
T04sanssr_pu:5475: so nāśravadharmatākuśalaḥ sarvasatvakāyān api tallakṣaṇān eva prajānātīty ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:5512: prajñāyamānaḥ sa hi bālabuddhiḥ viṣṭhāghaṭaṃ yāti vahan vicetāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5519: yāti kṣayaṃ naiva tu śuklabhāvaṃ bālasya buddhir vitathābhimānā ||
T04sanssr_pu:5520: evaṃ hi yaḥ caukṣamatir manuṣyaḥ caukṣaṃ kariṣye 'ham idaṃ śarīram |
T04sanssr_pu:5521: sūdvartitaṃ tīrthaśatābhiṣiktaṃ yāti kṣayaṃ mṛtyuvaśād acaukṣam ||
T04sanssr_pu:5523: prasravan bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyo nava vraṇamukhair yāvat |
T04sanssr_pu:5530: asvādhīno bodhisatvena kāyaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ annapānasaṃbhūta iti vistaraḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5532: vedanā smṛtyupasthānaṃ tu yathā tāvad āryaratnacūḍasūtre
T04sanssr_pu:5533: | iha kulaputra bodhisatvo vedanāsu vedanānupaśyanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayan veditasukhāśriteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate |
T04sanssr_pu:5535: tat sukhaṃ yatra veditaṃ nāsti sa sarvasatvaveditaprahāṇāya vedanāsu vedanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ bhāvayati |
T04sanssr_pu:5538: sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayate tāṃ sarvāṃ mahākaruṇāparigṛhītāṃ vedayate |
T04sanssr_pu:5539: sa yadā sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā rāgacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca rāgānuśayaṃ pratijahāti |
T04sanssr_pu:5540: yadā duṣkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadā dveṣacariteṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate ātmanaś ca doṣānuśayaṃ prajahāti |
T04sanssr_pu:5541: yadāduṣkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ mohacariteṣu satyeṣu mahākaruṇāṃ pratilabhate |
T04sanssr_pu:5545: duṣkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ na pratihanyate pratighasamudghātaṃ cārjayati |
T04sanssr_pu:5548: sa yāṃ kāñcid vedanāṃ vetti sarvāṃ tām anityaveditāṃ vetti |
T04sanssr_pu:5554: iti hi yat sukhaṃ tad anityaṃ yad duṣkhaṃ sukham eva tat |
T04sanssr_pu:5555: yad aduṣkhāsukhaṃ tad annātmakam ity ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:5557: duṣkhayā vedanayā spṛṣṭaḥ sarvapāpākṣaṇopapanneṣu satveṣu mahākaruṇām utpādayati || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:5558: api tu khalu punar abhiniveśo vedanā parigraho vedanopādānaṃ vedanopalambho vedanā viparyāso vedanā vikalpo vedanety ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:5562: vedako vedanād anyaḥ pṛthagbhūto na vidyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:5564: yathā bodhis tathā hy eṣā śāntā śuddhā prabhāsvarā ||
T04sanssr_pu:5569: rajyati vā duṣyati vā muhyati vā |
T04sanssr_pu:5574: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nādhyātmaṃ na bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇopalabhyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5575: cittaṃ hi kāśyapārūpam anidarśanam apratigham avijñaptikam apratiṣṭham aniketaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5576: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5577: na paśyanti na drakṣyanti yat sarvabuddhair na dṛṣṭaṃ |na paśyanti na drakṣyanti |
T04sanssr_pu:5580: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa māyāsadṛśam abhūtaparikalpanayā vividhām upapattiṃ parigṛhṇāti || pe
T04sanssr_pu:5581: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa nadīsrotaḥsadṛśam annavasthitam utpannabhagnavilīnaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5582: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa dīpārcciḥsadṛśaṃ hetupratyayatayā pravartate |
T04sanssr_pu:5584: cittaṃ hi kāśyapākāśasadṛśam āgantukaiḥ kleśair upakliśyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5588: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa matsyabaḍiśasadṛśaṃ duṣkhe sukhasaṃjñayā |
T04sanssr_pu:5595: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa gandhārāmaṃ varāha ivāśucimadhye |
T04sanssr_pu:5597: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa sparśārāmaṃ makṣikeva tailapātre |
T04sanssr_pu:5598: cittaṃ hi kāśyapa parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ na labhyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5600: yan nopalabhyate tan naivātītaṃ nānnāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5601: yan naivātītaṃ nānnāgataṃ na pratyutpannaṃ tat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5602: yat tryadhvasamatikrāntaṃ tan nevāsti na nāstīty ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:5604: sa cittaṃ parigaveṣamāṇo nādhyātmaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyati |
T04sanssr_pu:5605: na bahirdhā cittaṃ samanupaśyati |na skandheṣu cittaṃ samanupaśyati |
T04sanssr_pu:5610: tasyaivaṃ bhavati ālambane sati cittam utpadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5612: atha yad evālambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5613: yadi tāvad anyad ālambanam anyac cittaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5615: atha yad evālambanaṃ tad eva cittaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5618: tad yathā na tayaivāsidhārayā saivāsidhārā śakyate chettum |
T04sanssr_pu:5619: na tenaivāṅgulyagreṇa tad evāṅgulyagraṃ spraṣṭuṃ śakyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5620: naiva cittena tad eva cittaṃ śakyate draṣṭum || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:5621: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yad upadrutapradrutānavasthitapracārasya vānaramārutasadṛśasya |
T04sanssr_pu:5623: dūraṃgamacāriṇo 'śarīrasya laghuparivartino viṣayalolasya ṣaḍāyatanagocarasyāparāparasaṃprayuktasya cittasyāvasthānām ekāgratāśaraṇam aviśaraṇaṃ śamathaikāgratāvikṣepa ity ucyate cittasya smṛtir iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:5629: yat punaḥ sarvasvaṃ parityajya sarvabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye pariṇāmayatītīyam ucyate viṭhapanety ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:5632: dharme dharmānudarśī viharan bodhisatvo na kañcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati |
T04sanssr_pu:5633: yato na buddhadharmā yato na bodhiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5634: yato na mārgo yato na niḥsaraṇaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5635: sa sarvadharmāniḥsaraṇam iti viditvānnāvaraṇaṃ nāma mahākaruṇāsamādhiṃ samāpadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5636: sa sarvadharmeṣu sarvakleśeṣu ca kṛtrimasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate |
T04sanssr_pu:5643: na rāgabhāvo na dveṣabhāvo na mohabhāva |
T04sanssr_pu:5645: yat svabhāvāś ca kleśās tat svabhāvā bodhir ity evaṃ smṛtim upasthāpayatīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:5647: iha kulaputra bodhisatvasya dharme dharmānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānena viharata evaṃ bhavati
T04sanssr_pu:5650: na punar atra kaścid ātmabhāve satvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poṣo vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā manujo vā yo jāyate vā jīryate vā cyavate votpadyate vā |
T04sanssr_pu:5655: yādṛśāḥ samudānīyante tādṛśāḥ samudāgacchanti kuśalā vākuśalā vā aniñjyā vā |
T04sanssr_pu:5657: | na cāhetukānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kācid utpattir ity ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:5659: sa kiyadgambhīrān api dharmān pratyavekṣamāṇas tāṃ sarvajñatābodhicittānusmṛtiṃ na vijahāti
T04sanssr_pu:5663: saṃskāra pralopa dharmime varṣakāli calitaṃ vilepanaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5669: hetūbhi ca pratyayebhi vā sarva saṃskāragataṃ pravartate |
T04sanssr_pu:5670: anyonyapratītyahetutaḥ tad idaṃ bālajano na budhyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:5671: yathā muñja pratītya balbajaṃ rajju vyāyāmabalena vartitā |
T04sanssr_pu:5672: ghaṭiyantra sacakra vartate teṣv ekaikaśu nāsti vartanā ||
T04sanssr_pu:5675: bījasya sato yathāṅkuro na ca yo bīja sa caiva aṅkuro |
T04sanssr_pu:5676: na ca anya tato na caiva tat |
T04sanssr_pu:5678: saṃskāra avidyapratyayāḥ te ca saṃskāra na santi tatvataḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5679: saṃskāra avidya caiva hi śūnya ete prakṛtī nirīhakāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5680: mudrāt pratimudra dṛśyate mudrasaṃkrānti na copalabhyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5681: na ca tatra na caiva sānyato evaṃ saṃskārannucchedaśāśvatāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5682: cakṣuś ca pratītya rūpataḥ cakṣu vijñānam ihopajāyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5683: na ca cakṣuṣi rūpaniśritaṃ rūpasaṃkrānti na caiva cakṣuṣi ||
T04sanssr_pu:5684: nairātmyaśubhāś ca dharmime te punar ātmeti śubhāś ca kalpitāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5687: akahiñci gatam annāgataṃ śūnya māyopama yogi paśyati ||
T04sanssr_pu:5689: iti pratyayato 'gni jāyate jātu kṛtukāryu laghū nirudhyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:5690: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuta yam āgatu kutra yāti vā |
T04sanssr_pu:5691: vidiśo diśi sarva mārgato na gatir nāpy agatiś ca labhyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:5692: skandhāyatanāni dhātavaḥ tṛṣṇa avidyā iti karmapratyayāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5693: sāmagri tu satvasūcanā sā ca paramārthatu nopalabhyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:5694: kaṇṭhauṣṭha pratītya tālukaṃ jihva parivartir avarti akṣarā |
T04sanssr_pu:5695: na ca kaṇṭhagatā na tālukaiḥ akṣaraikaika tu nopalabhyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:5696: sāmagripratītyaś ca sā vācam anubudhivaśena niścarī |
T04sanssr_pu:5699: kṣaṇikāṃ vaśikāṃ tad īdṛśīṃ sarvavācaḥ pratiśrutakopamāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5700: yatha tantri pratītya dāru ca hastavyāyāmatrayebhi saṃgatim |
T04sanssr_pu:5702: atha paṇḍitu kaści mārgate kuto 'yam āgatu kutra yāti vā |
T04sanssr_pu:5703: vidiśo diśa sarvamārgataḥ śabdam annāgamanaṃ na labhyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:5704: tatha hetubhi pratyayebhi ca sarvasaṃskāragataṃ pravartate |
T04sanssr_pu:5705: yogī puna bhūtadarśanāt śūnya saṃskāra nirīha paśyati ||
T04sanssr_pu:5709: śūnyā anāmakā dharmāḥ nāma kiṃ paripṛcchasi |
T04sanssr_pu:5710: śūnyatā na kvacid devā na nāgā nāpi rākṣasāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5711: manuṣyā vāmanuṣyā vā sarve tu eṣa vidyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5712: nāmnā hi nāmatā śūnyā nāmni nāma na vidyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:5713: anāmakāḥ sarve dharmāḥ nāmnā tu paridīpitāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5714: yo hi svabhāvo nāmno vai na sa dṛṣṭo na ca śrutaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5715: na cotpanno niruddho vā kasya nāmeha pṛcchasi ||
T04sanssr_pu:5717: ratnacitro hy ayaṃ nāmnā ratnottamapara iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:5722: evaṃ yogyacitto daśasu dikṣu śeṣasya jagato duṣkhasāgaroddharaṇābhisaṃbodhyupāyo vyomaparyantatraikālyasarvadharmavaśavartitvāyaiva tu punaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatām avataret |
T04sanssr_pu:5724: tataś ca chinnamūlatvāt kleśā na samudācaranti ||
T04sanssr_pu:5726: tad yathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūlachinnasya sarvaśākhā patrapalāśāḥ śuṣyanti |
T04sanssr_pu:5727: evam eva śāntamate satkāyadṛṣṭyupaśamāt sarvakleśā upaśāmyantīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:5730: so 'sau śikṣa na jātu traśatī sugatānāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5731: so 'sau śūru na jātu istriṇāṃ vaśam etī |
T04sanssr_pu:5742: so 'sau chidyati aṅgam aṅgaśo na ca kṣubhyo |
T04sanssr_pu:5747: pañcyo tasya abhijña bhāvitā ima nityaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5748: purataḥ so sugatāna sthāsyatī sa ca śūra |
T04sanssr_pu:5751: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena buddhakāyaṃ niṣpādayitukāmena dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny aśītiṃ cānuvyañjanāni pratilabdhukāmena sarvatra jātau jātismaratāṃ bodhicittāvipraṇāśatāṃ bodhisatvacaryāsaṃpramoṣatāṃ pratilabdhukāmena sarvapāpamitrapāpasahāyān vivarjayitukāmena sarvabuddhabodhisatvakalyāṇamitrāṇy ārāgayitukāmena sarvamāramārakāyikadevatānirjetukāmena sarvāvaraṇī yāni śodhayitukāmena sarvadharmānāvaraṇatāṃ pratilabdhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5752: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena ye daśasu dikṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti te me varṇaṃ bhāṣerann iti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5753: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenaikacittotpādena pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn samatikramitukāmena |
T04sanssr_pu:5755: evaṃ sarvadikṣu prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam ity ādy iti [doubtful] vistaraḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:5757: karmaphalasaṃbandhāvirodhaś ca niḥsvabhāvatā ca yathādṛṣṭasarvadharmāvirodhaś ca |
T04sanssr_pu:5763: kiṃ vaitad pratītyoktaṃ ṣaḍ ime mahārāja dhātavaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5765: tad yathā pṛthivīdhātur abdhātus tejodhātur vāyudhātur ākāśadhātur vijñānadhātuś ca |
T04sanssr_pu:5775: imāni ca mahārāja ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:5781: tena pratyekam indriyaṣaṭkena saumanasyāditrayāṇāṃ bhedād aṣṭādaśa manopavicārā bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:5784: yat kiñcid asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ kharagatam upāttaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5787: keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā ity ādi
T04sanssr_pu:5790: yat kiñcid bāhyaṃ kakkhaṭvaṃ kharagatam anupāttam ayam ucyate bāhyaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5791: tatra mahārājādhyātmikaḥ pṛthivīdhātur utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacit saṃnicayaṃ gacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:5792: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat strī adhyātmam ahaṃ strīti kalpayati |
T04sanssr_pu:5793: sādhyātmam ahaṃ strīti kalpayitvā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayati |
T04sanssr_pu:5794: sā bahirdhā puruṣaṃ puruṣa iti kalpayitvā saṃraktā satī bahirdhā puruṣeṇa sārdhaṃ saṃyogam ākāṅkṣate |
T04sanssr_pu:5798: tatra mahārāja yaś ca saṃkalpo yaś ca saṃkalpayitā |
T04sanssr_pu:5802: iti hy asann asadbhūtaḥ saṃkalpo jātaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5804: yathā saṃkalpas tathā saṃyogo 'pi kalalam api svabhāvena na saṃvidyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5805: yaś ca svabhāvato na saṃvidyate tat kathaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ janayiṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:5806: iti hi mahārāja saṃkalpaṃ jñātvā kakkhaṭatvaṃ veditavyaṃ yathā kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:5808: bhavati mahārāja samayo yad ayaṃ kāyaḥ śmaśānaparyavasāno bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:5809: tasya tat kakkhaṭatvaṃ saṃklidyamānaṃ nirudhyamānaṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ gacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:5817: | bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadākāśībhūte lokasaṃniveśe brāhmaṃ vimānaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate mahāratnamayaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:5818: tan mahārāja kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:5819: cakravāḍamahācakravāḍāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante dṛḍhāḥ sārā ekaghanā vajramayās teṣām api kakkhaṭatvam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:5820: sumeravaḥ parvatarājāno yugaṃdharā nimiṃdharā īśādharā yāvat kālaparvatāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante |
T04sanssr_pu:5824: tad api mahārāja kakkhaṭatvaṃ samudāgacchat kutaścid āgacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:5825: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadāyaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate |
T04sanssr_pu:5826: tadeyaṃ mahāpṛthivī agninā vā dahyate 'dbhir vā klidyate vāyunā vā vikīryate |
T04sanssr_pu:5827: tasyā agninā dahyamānāyā maṣir api na prajāyate tad yathāpi nāma sarpiṣo vā tailasya vāgninā dahyamānasya na maṣir na chāyikā prajñāyate evam evāsyās trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyā lokadhātor agninā dahyamānāyā naiva maṣir na chāyikāvaśiṣṭā prajñāyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5828: evam adbhir lavaṇavilayavad vāyunā vairambhavātābhihataśakuntavat pṛthivyāṃ na kiñcid avaśiṣṭaṃ prajñāyatae iti paṭhyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5829: tatra mahārāja pṛthivīdhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ vyayo 'pi śūnya utpanno 'pi pṛthivīdhātuḥ svabhāvaśūnya
T04sanssr_pu:5830: iti hi mahārāja pṛthivīdhātuḥ pṛthivīdhātutvena nopalabhyate 'nyatra vyavahārāt |
T04sanssr_pu:5831: so 'pi vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5832: evam evaitan mahārāja yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5834: yad idam asmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ pratyātmam āpaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5840: aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṅghāṇakaṃ vaśā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śleṣmā pūyaḥ śoṇitaṃ kṣīraṃ prasrāva ity ādir ayam ucyante ādhyātmiko 'bdhātuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5842: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat priyaṃ dṛṣṭvāśru pravartate |
T04sanssr_pu:5845: | yāvat sa mahārājābdhātur na kutaścid āgacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:5846: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yadādhyātmiko 'bdhātuḥ pariśuṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:5847: sa pariśuṣyan nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:5849: vivartamāne khalu punar loke samantād dvātriṃśat paṭalā abhraghanāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante saṃsthāya sarvāvantaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5854: tata iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī yāvad brahmalokād udakena sphuṭā bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:5855: sa mahārāja tāvan mahān abdhātur utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:5856: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yad ayaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate |
T04sanssr_pu:5857: saṃvartamāne khalu punar loke dvitīyasya sūryasya prādurbhāvo bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:5858: dvitīyasya sūryasa loke prādurbhāvād utsāḥ sarāṃsi kunadyaś ca śuṣyanti |
T04sanssr_pu:5861: caturthasya sūryasya prādurbhāvān mahāsamudrasya yojanikam apy udakaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:5862: dviyojanikam api tricatuḥpañcadaśaviṃśatitriṃśaccatvāriṃśatpañcāśadyojanikam api yāvac catvāriṃśadyojanasahasram udakam avaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:5865: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāsamudre pṛthitapṛthitāny avaśiṣṭāni bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:5867: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāsamudre 'ṅgulisnehamātram apy udakaṃ nāvaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati
T04sanssr_pu:5868: sa mahārāja tāvān abdhātur nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:5870: tasya khalu punar mahārājābdhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5871: vyayo 'pi śūnyaḥ tiṣṭhann api so 'bdhātuḥ svabhāvaśūnya iti hi
T04sanssr_pu:5874: vyavahāro na strī na puruṣaḥ pūrvavat ||
T04sanssr_pu:5876: yat kiñcid asmin kāye tejas tejogatam ūṣmagatam upagatam upāttaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5880: yasya cotsadatvāj jvarito jvarita iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:5882: yad bāhyaṃ tejas tejogatam ūṣmagatam upagatam upāttaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5884: yan manuṣyā araṇīsahagatebhyo garbhalasahagatebhyo vā gomayacūrṇena vā kārpāsapicunāvāsam anveṣante yad utpannaṃ grāmam api dahati grāmapradeśam api dahati yāvad dvīpaṃ vā kakṣaṃ tṛṇānāṃ vā dāvaṃ vā kāṣṭhaṃ vā yāvad dahan paraitīty ādi |tatra
T04sanssr_pu:5885: mahārājādhyātmikas tejodhātur utpadyate na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacit saṃnicayaṃ gacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:5886: iti hy abhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca prativigacchati svabhāvarahitatvāt ||
T04sanssr_pu:5887: evaṃ yat kiñcid asmin kāye vāyur vāyugataṃ laghutvaṃ samudīraṇatvaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5889: tad yathā ūrdhvagamā vāyavo 'dhogamāḥ pārśvāśrayāḥ pṛṣṭhāśrayāḥ kukṣigamāḥ śastrakāḥ kṣurakāḥ sūcakāḥ pippalakā vātāṣṭhīlā vātagulmā āśvāsapraśvāsā aṅgānusāriṇo vāyava ity ādi |
T04sanssr_pu:5890: santi bahirdhā pūrve vāyavo dakṣiṇāḥ paścimā uttarā vāyavaḥ sarajasaḥ arajasaḥ parīttā mahadgatā vāyava iti |
T04sanssr_pu:5891: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yan mahāvāyuskandhaḥ samudāgataḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5895: yaṃ satvāś cīvarakarṇikena vā vidhamanakena vātānuvṛttena vā paryeṣyante |
T04sanssr_pu:5903: yad asmin kāye cakṣuḥ suṣiram iti vā yāvan mukhaṃ vā mukhadvāraṃ vā kaṇṭhaṃ vā kaṇṭhanāḍyā vā yena cābhyavaharati yatra cāvatiṣṭhate |
T04sanssr_pu:5909: bhavati mahārāja sa samayo yat karmapratyayād āyatanāni prādurbhavanti tāny ākāśadhātuṃ paricārayanti
T04sanssr_pu:5910: tatra saṃkhyā bhavaty ādhyātmika ākāśadhātur iti |
T04sanssr_pu:5912: bhavati samayo yad rūpaṃ bibharti sarvam ākāśībhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:5917: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣa utthale deśe udapānaṃ vā kuṭakaṃ vā kūpaṃ vā puṣkariṇīṃ vā khānayet |
T04sanssr_pu:5918: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja yat tatrākāśaḥ kutas tad āgatam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:5922: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja sa puruṣaḥ punar eva tad udapānaṃ vā yāvat puṣkariṇīṃ vā pūrayet
T04sanssr_pu:5923: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja yat tad ākāśaṃ kvacid gatam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:5927: na hy ākāśadhātur gamane vā āgamane vā pratyupasthitaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5930: iti hi mahārāja bāhyākāśadhātur acalaḥ |avikāraḥ |tat kasya hetoḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5937: yāvad iti hi mahārāja yā kācid varṇasaṃsthānaprativijñaptir ayam ucyate cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ
T04sanssr_pu:5939: iti hi yā ṣaḍindriyādhipateyā ṣaḍviṣayārambaṇā viṣayavijñaptir ayam ucyate vijñānadhātuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5940: sa khalu punar ayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhātur nendriyaniśrito na viṣayebhya āgato na madhye 'ntarasthāyī sa nādhyātma bahirdhā nobhayam antareṇa |
T04sanssr_pu:5941: sa khalu punar ayaṃ mahārāja vijñānadhātur vastu prativijñapya niruddhaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5942: sa utpadyamāno na kutaścid āgacchati nirudhyamāno na kvacid gacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:5943: tasya khalu punar vijñānadhātor utpādo 'pi śūnyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5947: iti mahārāja vijñānadhātur vijñānadhātutvena śūnyo nopalabhyate 'nyatra vyavahārāt |
T04sanssr_pu:5953: | tad yathā pṛthivīdhātor abdhātos tejodhātor vāyudhātor yāvat |
T04sanssr_pu:5954: tatra pṛthivīdhātuprasādaś cakṣurāyatanaṃ nābdhātuprasādo na tejodhātuprasādo na vāyudhātuprasādaś cakṣurāyatanaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:5956: na hi pṛthivīdhātuprasādaḥ kasyacid dharmāyatanaṃ vā āyatanapratilambhena vā pratyupasthitaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:5957: evaṃ yāvan na vāyudhātuprasādaḥ kasyacid dharmasyāyatanaṃ vā āyatanapratilambhena vā pratyupasthitaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:5959: niśceṣṭā hy ete dharmā niṣṭhāpārā nirvāṇasamā |
T04sanssr_pu:5960: iti hi mahārāja ekaikato dharmān mṛgyamāṇān cakṣurāyatanaṃ nopalabhate 'nyatra vyavahārāt
T04sanssr_pu:5964: ye ca dharmāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ kas teṣāṃ prasādo vā kṣobho vā |
T04sanssr_pu:5965: yeṣāṃ na prasādo na kṣobha upalabhyate |
T04sanssr_pu:5967: iti hy atyantatayā cakṣurāyatanaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurāyatanasvabhāvena tat pūrvāntato nopalabhyate
T04sanssr_pu:5969: annāgamanatāṃ gamanatāṃ copādāya sthānam apy asya nopalabhyate svabhāvavirahitatvāt |
T04sanssr_pu:5980: yāvad iti hi mahārāja sarvadharmā vimokṣābhimukhā dharmadhātuniyatā ākāśadhātuparyavasānā aprāptikā avyavahārā annabhilāpyā annabhilapanīyāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5981: yatra mahārāja indriyāṇi pratihanyante te viṣayā ity ucyante |
T04sanssr_pu:5982: cakṣur hi rūpe pratihanyate tasmād rūpāṇi cakṣurviṣayā ity ucyante |
T04sanssr_pu:5984: tatra cakṣū rūpe pratihanyata iti nipātaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:5986: tathā hi cakṣū rūpeṣu trividhaṃ nipatatīti |
T04sanssr_pu:5991: tae ime viṣayā manogocarā ity ucyante |
T04sanssr_pu:5995: yad etan mahārāja mano 'pratikūleṣu rūpeṣv anunītaṃ carati |
T04sanssr_pu:5997: pratikūleṣu rūpeṣu pratihataṃ carati tenāsya dveṣa utpadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:6000: evaṃ śabdādiṣv api trividham ārambaṇam anubhavati pūrvavat ||
T04sanssr_pu:6003: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā striyā sārdhaṃ paricaret
T04sanssr_pu:6005: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī strī |
T04sanssr_pu:6009: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājāpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:6015: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate |
T04sanssr_pu:6017: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya bhāgī syāt |
T04sanssr_pu:6020: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi
T04sanssr_pu:6024: trividhaṃ kāyena caturvidhaṃ vācā trividhaṃ manasā |
T04sanssr_pu:6025: tac ca karmābhisaṃskṛtam ādita eva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati |
T04sanssr_pu:6026: na dakṣiṇāṃ na paścimāṃ nottarāṃ nordhvaṃ nādho nānuvidiśaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6030: jīvitendriyanirodhe āyuṣaḥ parikṣayāt tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣīṇatvāc caramavijñānasya nirudhyamānasya manasa ārambaṇībhavati
T04sanssr_pu:6031: | tad yathāpi nāma śayitavibuddhasya janapadakalyāṇīti manasa ārambaṇaṃ bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:6032: iti hi mahārāja caramavijñānenādhipatinā tena ca karmaṇā ārambaṇenaupapattyaṃśikadvayapratyayaṃ prathamavijñānam utpadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:6033: yadi vā narakeṣu yadi vā tiryagyonau yadi vā yamaloke yadi vā āsure kāye yadi vā manuṣyeṣu yadi vā deveṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:6034: tasya ca prathamavijñānasya aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasyānnantarasabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate |
T04sanssr_pu:6036: tatra yaś caramavijñānasya nirodhas tatra cyutir iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:6038: iti hi mahārāja na kaścid dharmo 'smāl lokāt paraṃ lokaṃ gacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:6040: tatra mahārāja caramavijñānam utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati ||
T04sanssr_pu:6044: prathamavijñānam apy utpadyamānaṃ na kutaścid āgacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:6053: karmaṇāṃ cābandhyatā prajāyate vipākasya ca pratisaṃvedanā na cātra kaścit kartā na bhoktānyatra nāmasaṃketāt |
T04sanssr_pu:6054: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare śatruṇā sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmayet |
T04sanssr_pu:6057: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyate svapnāntare śatruḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6062: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājāpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:6069: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapne śatrur na saṃvidyate kutaḥ punas tena sārdhaṃ saṃgrāmaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6070: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt yas tam abhiniviśet |
T04sanssr_pu:6072: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā daurmanasyāsthānīyāny abhiniviśate 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ san pratihanyate |
T04sanssr_pu:6075: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣah suptaḥ svapnāntare piśācena paripātyamāno bhītaḥ saṃoham āpadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:6076: sa śayitavibuddhas taṃ piśācaṃ taṃ ca saṃmoham anusmaret |
T04sanssr_pu:6077: tat kiṃ manyase mahārāja saṃvidyante svapne piśācaḥ saṃmoho vā
T04sanssr_pu:6078: | yāvad evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaś cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā upekṣāsthānīyāny abhiniviśate 'bhiniviṣṭaḥ san muhyati mūḍho mohajaṃ karmābhisaṃskarotīti pūrvavat |
T04sanssr_pu:6079: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā gāyantyā madhuraṃ gītasvaraṃ madhuraṃ ca tantrīsvaraṃ ca śṛṇuyāt |
T04sanssr_pu:6081: sa śayitavibuddhas tad eva gītavāditam anusmaret |
T04sanssr_pu:6082: tat kiṃ manyase mahārājāpi nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyaḥ svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇyā gītavāditam abhiniviśet |
T04sanssr_pu:6087: atyantatayā hi bhagavan svapnāntare janapadakalyāṇī strī na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate |
T04sanssr_pu:6089: anyatra yāvad eva sa puruṣo vighātasya klamathasya ca bhāgī syāt |
T04sanssr_pu:6092: evam eva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaḥ śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā saumanasyasthānīyāny abhiniviśate
T04sanssr_pu:6094: evaṃ gandhādiṣu tridhā tridhā veditavyam || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:6096: kim ity ahaṃ sadevakasya lokasya cakṣur bhaveyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6101: mukto mocayeyam āśvasta āśvāsayeyaṃ parinirvṛttaḥ parinirvāpayeyam iti |
T04sanssr_pu:6102: pūrvā hi koṭir mahārāja na prajñāyate aiśvaryādhipatyānām anubhūya mānānāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6103: iti hi mahārāja māyopamānīndriyāṇy atṛptāny atarṣaṇīyāni |
T04sanssr_pu:6105: atrānnantayaśaścakravartinaḥ kathā svargāc ca patite tasmin sarājakaiḥ pauraiḥ parivṛta evaṃ paṭhyate |
T04sanssr_pu:6106: tad yathāpi nāma mahārāja sarpirmaṇḍo vā navanītamaṇḍo vā taptāyāṃ vālukāyām upanikṣipto 'vasīdati
T04sanssr_pu:6108: evam eva mahārājānnantayaśā avasīdati na saṃtiṣṭhate |
T04sanssr_pu:6109: atha rājā priyaṃkaro rājānam annantayaśasaṃ tathāvasīdantaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6116: mahārājānantayaśāś caturdvīpeṣu rājyaiśvaryaṃ kārayitvābandhyamanorathatām anubhūya sarvadrumākālaphalatāṃ sarvopadravaprasrabdhisarvasatvābandhyamanorathatāṃ gandhodakavarṣaṃ hiraṇyavarṣaṃ suvarṇavarṣaṃ sarvopakaraṇavarṣaṃ cānubhūya caturo mahādvīpān adhyāvasitvā śakrasyārdhāsanam ākramyātīcchayā na mukto 'tṛpta
T04sanssr_pu:6118: evaṃ tvaṃ mahārāja vyākuryā ity evam uktvā ca rājānnantayaśāḥ kālam akārṣīt |
T04sanssr_pu:6120: tasmāt tarhi te mahārāja marīcikāyām udakasvabhāvo nābhūn na bhaviṣyati na caitarhi vidyate
T04sanssr_pu:6121: evam eva mahārāja rūpavedanāsaṃjñā saṃskāravijñanāṃ svabhāvo nābhūn na bhaviṣyati na caitarhi vidyatae ity ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:6125: tac ca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6130: 'prakāśito yāvad akriyo yāvan na lābho nālābho na sukhaṃ na duṣkhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6132: tatra jinena jagasya kṛtena saṃvṛti deśita lokahitāya |
T04sanssr_pu:6133: yena jagat sugatasya sakāśe saṃjanayīha prasādasukhārthe ||
T04sanssr_pu:6134: saṃvṛti prajñamayī narasiṃhaḥ ṣaḍgatayo bhaṇi satvagaṇānāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6135: narakatiraś ca tathaiva ca pretān āsurakāya narāṃś ca marūṃś ca ||
T04sanssr_pu:6136: nīcakulāṃs tatha uccakulāṃś ca āḍhyakulāṃś ca daridrakulāṃś cety ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:6138: katama eṣa dharmo yo bhagavatā vyākṛto 'nnuttarāyāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:6140: kiṃ rūpam uta vedanā āho śvit saṃjñā utāho saṃskārā atha vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv iti |
T04sanssr_pu:6142: na rūpaṃ yāvan na vijñānaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛtam annuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau |
T04sanssr_pu:6148: tad evam annupalabhyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo 'tra buddhaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6152: śūnyaṃ hi rūpaṃ rūpeṇa yāvad vijñānaṃ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:6155: nālam atra paṇḍitair abhiniveśa utpādayitavya iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6159: sarvadharmā bhūtakoṭir annantakoṭir annāvaraṇakoṭir apratiṣṭhitakoṭir ity ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:6164: aprakṛtikā hi bhagavan bodhir aprakṛtikāni ca pañcānantaryāṇi |
T04sanssr_pu:6166: tathā vihasyante bhagavan ye kecit parinirvātukāmāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6171: bhūtakoṭir iti bhagavan yad uktaṃ nirmāṇaratibhir devais tatra vayaṃ bhūtam api nopalabhāmahe
T04sanssr_pu:6174: yo hi kaścid bhagavan bhūtam upalabhate |
T04sanssr_pu:6175: koṭim api sa tasyopalabhate dvaye cāsau caratīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6177: supiti yatha naraḥ kṣudhābhibhūtaḥ śatarasabhojanabhuñjino ca tṛptaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6178: na pi ca kṣudha na bhojanaṃ na satvaḥ supina yathaiva nidṛṣṭa sarvadharmāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6179: bhaṇi naru paṭhane manojñavācaṃ priyu bhavatī na ca saṃkramo 'sti vācaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6180: na ca vacana cāsya rakta vācām upalabhase na ca tatra saṃśayo 'sti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6181: śruṇati yatha manojña vīṇaśabdaṃ madhura na cāsti svabhāvataḥ sa śabdaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6182: tatha imi vidu skandha prekṣamāṇo na labhati bhāvu svabhāvataḥ sumedhāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6184: yatha naru iha śaṅkhaśabda śrutvā vimṛśati vidva kuto ya prādubhūtaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6185: na ca labhati svabhāva śūnyabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6186: yatha naru iha bhojanaṃ praṇītaṃ vimṛśati aṅgaśu siddham asvabhāvam |
T04sanssr_pu:6187: yatha rasu tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi
T04sanssr_pu:6189: yatha naru iha indrayaṣṭi dṛṣṭvā vimṛśati aṅgaśu niḥsvabhāva śūnyam |
T04sanssr_pu:6190: vimṛśatu yatha yaṣṭi te 'ṅga śūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi
T04sanssr_pu:6192: puravara yatha aṅgaśo vibhajya nagaru svabhāvatu nāmato na labdham |
T04sanssr_pu:6193: yatha nagara tathāṅga sarvaśūnyās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6194: mudita yatha narāga mukta bherī harṣa janeti svabhāvaśūnyaśabdā |
T04sanssr_pu:6195: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvaṃ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi sarvadharmāḥ
T04sanssr_pu:6196: ... ... hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ pratighu na vidyati nāpi snehadhātuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6197: vimṛśatu bherīva te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra sarvadharmāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6198: hanatu yatha narasya tāṃ hi bherīṃ svaru na sa manyati rāmayāmi lokam |
T04sanssr_pu:6199: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvāḥ tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa narendra
T04sanssr_pu:6201: hanatu yatha narasya tasya bheryāṃ na pi svaru aṅgaśu nāpi sa svatantraḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6202: svaru yatha tatha te 'ṅga tatsvabhāvās tatha tv aya dṛṣṭa maharṣi
T04sanssr_pu:6206: satvaś cāsya vibhāvitaḥ suviditaṃ niḥsatva sarvaṃ jagat |
T04sanssr_pu:6208: tena tvā sugataṃ vibhāvitamatiṃ pūjema pūjāriham ||
T04sanssr_pu:6209: duṣkhaṃ cā sugatā [doubtful] daśaddiśigataṃ naivaṃ parīdṛśyate |
T04sanssr_pu:6210: satveṣū karuṇā ca nāma bhaṇitā devātideva tvayā |
T04sanssr_pu:6211: evaṃ bho jinapuṅgavā jinamataṃ ajñāta yathāvataḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6212: tena tvāṃ dvipadottamā naravarāḥ pūjema pūjāriham ||
T04sanssr_pu:6213: satvānaiva na duṣkhaṃ śākyamuninā yasyāpanītaṃ dukhaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6214: jātās te muditāś ca hṛṣṭamanaso 'ratīś ca tair noditāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6216: tasmāt pūjiya tvāṃ narāṇa pravaraṃ prāyema prāptaṃ phalaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6218: naivaṃ te smṛtināyakā na bhaṇitā naiva pramuṣṭā smṛtiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6219: uktaṃ co sugatena bhāvapathimāḥ kāyaṃ gatā bhāvanāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6220: evaṃ buddhanayaṃ viditva sugatā pūjā kṛtā tāyinaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6221: bhāvethaḥ śamathaṃ vipaśyanam ayaṃ mārgaṃ dukhā śāntaye |
T04sanssr_pu:6222: śāntās te bhagavan savāsanamalā yehī jagat kliṣyate ||
