T04sanssr_pu:6223: śamathaś cātha vipaśyanā na ca malā sarve 'ti śūnyā mune |
T04sanssr_pu:6224: asmin devagaṇā na kāṅkṣa kvacanā pūjentu tvāṃ nāyakaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6228: yasya ca dharmasya svabhāvo na vidyate so 'vastukaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6232: yat triṣv apy adhvasu nopalabhyate na tac cakṣur nendriyaṃ kathaṃ tasya vyavahāro jñeyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6234: yāvad eva nāmamātraṃ no tu khalu paramārthato riktam upalabhyate na muṣṭiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6235: evaṃ cakṣuś cendriyaṃ ca rikte muṣṭisadṛśam alīkam asadbhūtaṃ tucchaṃ mṛṣāmoṣadharme bālopalāpanaṃ mūrkhasaṃmohanam yāvad eva nāmamātram ||
T04sanssr_pu:6239: svapne yathā śiraśchedo dṛṣṭas te āsravakṣayaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6241: atraiva ca drumeṇa kinnararājena bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ pratyāha |
T04sanssr_pu:6244: syād yadi kiṃcid aśūnyaṃ na bhavej jinenāsya vyākaraṇam ||
T04sanssr_pu:6251: yat svabhāvaśūnyam ādarśamaṇḍale supariśuddhe saṃdṛśyate pratibimbam |
T04sanssr_pu:6253: avikāraṃ dharmadhātum imāṃ ca pūjāṃ drumāṅgaśo vicārayasi |
T04sanssr_pu:6257: yad api ca nirīhakatvaṃ kriyāṃ ca na jānase mayā proktaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6258: śakaṭāṅga saṃnipātaṃ nirīkṣva śakaṭasya caiva kriyāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6259: karma ca me ākhyātaṃ kartā na vidyate daśasu dikṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:6260: vāteritād iva taror yathā hi nivartate vahniḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6261: na ca māruto na ca taruś cetayati hutāśanaṃ ca yajane |
T04sanssr_pu:6262: na nivartate vahnis tathaiva karmasya kartāraḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6263: yad api vadase na ca saṃcaya puṇyasya hi vidyate |
T04sanssr_pu:6266: yathā bhaṇasi manuṣyāṇām āyuḥparimāṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvin |
T04sanssr_pu:6270: kiṃ punar āyuṣman subhūte utpanno dharma utpadyate utānnutpannaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6272: nāham āyuṣman śāriputra utpannasya dharmasyotpattim icchāmi na cānnutpannasyeti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6274: tathatā tathateti kulaputra śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6275: sā ca śūnyatā notpadyate na nirudhyate |
T04sanssr_pu:6277: yady evaṃ dharmāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā tasmāt sarvadharmā notpatsyante na nirotsyante |
T04sanssr_pu:6280: evam eva kulaputra tathā yathābhisaṃbudhyase sarvadharmā notpadyante na nirudhyante |
T04sanssr_pu:6283: saṃskṛtā dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante cety asya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko 'bhiprāyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6286: tatra tathāgato mahākāruṇiko lokasyottrāsapadaparihārārthaṃ vyavahāravaśād uktavān utpadyante nirudhyante ceti |
T04sanssr_pu:6287: na cātra kasyacid dharmasyotpādo na nirodha iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6289: tatra bhagavaṃś cakṣūrūpeṣu na raṇati śrotraṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6297: yan na saṃsṛjyate tan na raṇati |
T04sanssr_pu:6299: advitīyāś ca bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ paraḥparaṃ na jānanti na vijānanti |
T04sanssr_pu:6305: na saṃsaranti na parinirvānti naite kasyacit |
T04sanssr_pu:6307: naite bhagavan dharmā udvijante na saṃkliśyante na vyavadāyante |
T04sanssr_pu:6308: evam ahaṃ bhagavan jānāmy evam avabudhye |
T04sanssr_pu:6311: evam ahaṃ jānāmy evam ahaṃ budhyāmīti |
T04sanssr_pu:6313: na ca bhagavann āyatanānām evaṃ bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:6315: yo hy evaṃ jānāti sa na kenacit sārddhaṃ vivadati |
T04sanssr_pu:6316: yan na vivadati tac chramaṇadharmam anusaratīti |
T04sanssr_pu:6317: tathā dharmadarśanaṃ buddhadarśanaṃ sarvasatvadarśanaṃ sarvasatvahetupratyayadarśanaṃ śūnyatādarśanaṃ śūnyatādarśanam adarśanaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6318: adarśanaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ darśanaṃ samyagdarśanam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6322: kasya punaḥ śūnyatāvādinaḥ paramārthataḥ sthāṇuḥ siddho yadāśrayāt puruṣabhrāntiḥ syād |
T04sanssr_pu:6323: amūlā eva ca sarvadharmās tatvato mūlānupapatteḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6334: yan mañjuśrīr apratiṣṭhānaṃ na tasya kiñcin mūlam iti hy apratiṣṭhānamūlapratiṣṭhitāḥ sarvadharmā iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6346: sukhena na rajyate duṣkhena na virajyate |
T04sanssr_pu:6347: yo hy evaṃ lokadharmair na saṃhriyate sa śūnyatāṃ jānītae iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6348: tathā śūnyatāvādino na kvacid anurāgo na virāgaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6349: yasmin rajyeta tac chūnyam eva jānīte |
T04sanssr_pu:6351: nāsau śūnyatāṃ jānīte yaḥ kvacid dharme rajyate vā virajyate vā tathā nāsau śūnyatāṃ jānīte yaḥ kenacit sārddhaṃ vigrahaṃ vivādaṃ vā kuryāc chūnyam eva jānīte tac chūnyam eva paśyatīty ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:6354: iha pañcakaṣāyasaṃkliṣṭasya kalyāṇamitrāvasāditasya vā saṃkṣepeṇa tāvat kutra yatnaṃ kṛtvā śīghraṃ cittaśuddhir bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:6357: sā caitadabhyāsāt sukaraṃ prahīyatae iti paragauravam ātmāvajñā caivaṃ bhāvanīyā ||
T04sanssr_pu:6358: yadi satvo yadi skandhāḥ kṣamatā sarvathā sthitā |
T04sanssr_pu:6359: ekasya hi parātmatvaṃ viruddhaṃ saṃbhavet kathaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6360: vinālambanam apy etad ācaranty eva dehinaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6365: na tu me gauravāt saukhyam ihāpi janadurbhagāt ||
T04sanssr_pu:6370: śabdas tāvad acittatvān māṃ stautīti na saṃbhavaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6371: paraḥ kila mayi prīta ity ayaṃ me matibhramaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6372: tattuṣṭyaiva mama prītiḥ sāmānye na sadāstu sā |
T04sanssr_pu:6373: tatsukhena na cet kāryaṃ tena tuṣṭena kiṃ mama ||
T04sanssr_pu:6374: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā |
T04sanssr_pu:6375: na me pareṇa tuṣṭena kāye saukhyam ihāṇv api ||
T04sanssr_pu:6377: akīrtinindā satkārā evaṃ jñeyāś ca niṣphalāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6378: na dharmo nāyur ārogyaṃ na balaṃ vandanādibhiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6389: lābhādikāmatā nāma ity ādy āvartate bahu |
T04sanssr_pu:6391: sādṛśyād anyad apy etad vārisrotovad īkṣyate |
T04sanssr_pu:6392: tad evedam iti bhrāntyā tatve tiṣṭhāmy ato balāt ||
T04sanssr_pu:6393: avastu caitat sādṛśyaṃ duṣkhaṃ ca janayiṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:6394: ahaṃ caitac ca sarvaṃ ca na cirān na bhaviṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:6403: iha gṛhapate gṛhī bodhisatvo dharmeṇa bhogān paryeṣate nādharmeṇa |
T04sanssr_pu:6407: na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭveryāpatham āracayati |
T04sanssr_pu:6409: na śanair mandaṃ mandaṃ kramān utkṣipati na nikṣipati yugamātraprekṣikayā saviśvastaprekṣikayānnābhogaprekṣikayā
T04sanssr_pu:6412: na bodhisatvo lābhahetor lābhanidānaṃ mandabhāṇī mṛdubhāṇī na priyabhāṇī bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:6416: bodhisatvo dāyakena dānapatinā vā lābhena pravāryamāṇo vā cālpecchatāṃ darśayati |
T04sanssr_pu:6418: antardāha eṣa kulaputra yad vācālpecchatā cittena lābhakāmatā |
T04sanssr_pu:6419: evaṃ hi kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kuhanalapanalābhāpagato bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:6421: na bodhisatvo dānapatiṃ vā dṛṣṭvā nimittaṃ karoti |
T04sanssr_pu:6425: na ca taṃ dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ vā kiṃcit prārthayate |
T04sanssr_pu:6428: yāvan na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ vācaṃ niścārayati |
T04sanssr_pu:6429: amukenāmukena vā me dānapatināmukaṃ vastu pratipāditaṃ tasya ca mayāmuka upakāraḥ kṛtaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6430: tena me śīlavān ayam iti kṛtvā idaṃ cedaṃ ca dattaṃ bahuśruta iti |
T04sanssr_pu:6432: mayā ca tasya kāruṇyacittam upasthāpya parigṛhītaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6434: tatra kāyakṣatir yad uta lābhahetor lābhanidānam ādhāvanaparidhāvanaṃ dauḥśīlyasamudācaraṇaṃ ca |
T04sanssr_pu:6439: iha bodhisatvo na tulākūṭena na mānakūṭena na visraṃbhaghātikayā na dhūrtatayā lābham upārjayati
T04sanssr_pu:6443: ye te lābhā staupikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā dhārmikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā sāṃghikasaṃsṛṣṭā vādattā vānnanujñātā vā |
T04sanssr_pu:6450: mātāpitṛmitrāmātyajñātisālohitebhyaḥ kālānukālam ātmanā paribhuṅkte paribhuñjānaś cāraktaḥ paribhuṅkte |
T04sanssr_pu:6451: svanadhyavasito na cālabhyamāne lābhe khedacittam utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:6452: na paritapyati na ca dāyakadānapatīnām antike 'prasādacittam utpādayatīty ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:6453: tatraiṣāpy asya bodhisatvasya bhogaśuddhir ātmabhāvaśuddhivat parahitāya bhavet ||
T04sanssr_pu:6455: punar aparaṃ bhadanta śāriputra ye praviśantīdaṃ gṛhaṃ teṣāṃ samanantarapraviṣṭānāṃ sarvakleśā na bādhante
T04sanssr_pu:6458: atha tato bhojanāt sarvāvatī sā parṣat tṛptā bhūtā |
T04sanssr_pu:6460: yaiś ca bodhisatvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālais tad anyaiś ca satvais tad bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ tādṛśaṃ sukhaṃ kāye 'vakrāntaṃ yādṛśaṃ sarvasukhamaṇḍitāyāṃ lokadhātau
T04sanssr_pu:6462: sarvaromakūpebhyaś ca teṣāṃ tādṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti
T04sanssr_pu:6463: | tad yathāpi nāma tasyām eva sarvagandhasugandhāyāṃ lokadhātau vṛkṣāṇāṃ gandhaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6465: yaiś ca bhadantānanda bhikṣubhir annavakrāntaniyāmair etad bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣām evāvakrāntaniyamānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati |
T04sanssr_pu:6467: yair annutpāditabodhicittaiḥ satvaiḥ paribhuktaṃ teṣām utpāditabodhicittānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati
T04sanssr_pu:6468: yair utpāditabodhicittair bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ nāpratilabdhakṣāntikānāṃ pariṇaṃsyatīti vistaraḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6478: yathā gaganaṃ samaviśuddhaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6480: yathā gaganam aparyantam evam aparyantīkṛtena cittena tad dānaṃ dadāti |
T04sanssr_pu:6481: yathā gaganaṃ vistīrṇam annāvaraṇam evaṃ bodhipariṇāmitaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti |
T04sanssr_pu:6482: yathā gaganam arūpi evaṃ sarvarūpāniśritaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti |
T04sanssr_pu:6485: | evam asaṃjñi asaṃskṛtam avijñaptilakṣaṇam evam apratijñānaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti |
T04sanssr_pu:6486: yathā gaganaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetraspharaṇam evaṃ sarvasatvamaitrīspharaṇaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti |
T04sanssr_pu:6488: yathā gaganaṃ sadāprakāśam evaṃ cittaprakṛtiviśuddhaṃ tad dānaṃ dadati |
T04sanssr_pu:6489: yathā gaganaṃ sarvasatvāvakāśaṃ evaṃ sarvasatvopajīvyaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti |
T04sanssr_pu:6490: yāvad yathā nirmito nirmitāya dadāti nirvikalpo 'nnābhogaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6492: evaṃ dvayavigamatayā māyālakṣaṇasvabhāvaviśuddhaṃ bodhisatvas tad dānaṃ dadāti |
T04sanssr_pu:6495: evaṃ tyāgacittaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvo gaganasamadāno bhavati ||
T04sanssr_pu:6501: | nāsti nikrandadānaṃ yāvan nāsti yācanakeṣūpataptadānaṃ nāsty uccagghana ullāpanadānaṃ nāsti parāṅmukhadānaṃ nāsty apaviddhadānaṃ nāsty asvahastadānaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6504: nāsty akāladānaṃ nāsti viṣaśastradānaṃ nāsti satvaviheṭhanādānam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6510: madyapānād api nairāśyakṛte bodhisatve pratigho garīyān |
T04sanssr_pu:6513: śastrādiṣv api yady anubadhagurulādyavavicārād dānam āpadyeta
T04sanssr_pu:6518: avirahitabodhicittatā cittaviśuddhyai apagataśrāvakapratyekabuddhacittatā prāmāṇikaviśuddhyai ity ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:6525: yāvad achedyābhedyaṃ gaganam achedyābhedyaṃ tacchīlam ity ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:6527: samaprayogaṃ gaganaṃ sarvasatvasamacittasya kṣāntipariśuddhir ity ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:6533: na kalpo na vikalpo na parikalpaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6534: yaivaṃ kṣāntir iyaṃ bodhisatvasya paramā gaganasamā kṣāntir |
T04sanssr_pu:6566: yāvad iyaṃ kulaputra dhyānapāramitā caryāpariśuddhir iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6570: |saddharmacakrapravartanamahāparinirvāṇasaṃdarśanagocaraś ca bodhisatvacaryātyajanagocaraś cāyam api bodhisatvasya gocara |
T04sanssr_pu:6577: grahītāraḥ subahavaḥ svalpaṃ cedam anena kiṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6580: tan na śrāvakasādhāraṇena śuddhimātreṇa satvānāṃ janyatae ity arthaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6582: tatrāryaratnameghe balam uktaṃ |na sa satvaḥ satvanikāye saṃvidyate yo bodhisatvasya balena balaṃ mardayed ity ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:6584: yad uktam āryatathāgataguhyasūtre āryavajrapāṇer baladarśanavismitājātaśatrupṛṣṭena bhagavatā
T04sanssr_pu:6585: daśabhir mahārāja dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisatva evaṃrūpāṃ balavattāṃ pratilabhate |katamair
T04sanssr_pu:6587: iha mahārāja bodhisatvaḥ kāyaṃ jīvitaṃ ca parityajati |
T04sanssr_pu:6589: sarvasatvānāṃ cāvanamati na ca punar mānaṃ bṛṃhayati |
T04sanssr_pu:6592: jighatsitānāṃ ca satvānām agraṃ varabhojanaṃ dadāti |
T04sanssr_pu:6594: glānānāṃ ca satvānāṃ bhūtacikitsāyai utsuko bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:6604: ārabdhavīryeṇa sāgaramate bodhisatvena bhavitavyaṃ sadā dṛḍhaparākrameṇa |
T04sanssr_pu:6606: ārabdhavīryāṇāṃ hi sāgaramate bodhisatvānāṃ na durlabhā bhavaty annuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ
T04sanssr_pu:6610: nāsti kusīdasya dānaṃ yāvan nāsti prajñā nāsti kusīdasya parārtha iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6618: tasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukaraṃ pramāṇam udgrahītum iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6620: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvenālpam api dānaṃ dadatā sarvasatveṣu sarvākārajñatāyām upāyakauśalyapariṇāmanatāyām aprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ kartukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam tathā sarvasatvānāṃ manorathān paripūrayitukāmena |
T04sanssr_pu:6621: yāvaj jātarūparajatodyānarājyādibhir upakaraṇaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6622: vinā ca karuṇayā na bodhisatvānāṃ kiṃcic ceṣṭitam iti vakṣyāmaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6624: puṇyavṛddhiḥ sarvavṛddhīnāṃ mūlam iti tadarthaṃ parikarabandha ucyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:6627: cittaśuddhikālabhāvitānāṃ vyavasāyādīnāṃ prayogārambhe punar āmukhīkaraṇena dṛḍhatāpādanārthaḥ ślokaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6629: āsannayuddhakālānāṃ astrakauśalyādaravat prayogasamakālaṃ dṛḍhīkariṣyāmīti śaithilyanivāraṇārtham ādigrahaṇam |
T04sanssr_pu:6644: sarvabuddhadharmotthāpakasarvajagadupajīvyasarvakalyāṇamitrārāgaṇasamarthyātmabhāvaparigrahaṇatayā vipulaprītiprāmodyavegān vivardhayamānaḥ pratyutpannajanmābhinirvṛttaṃ jarāvyādhimaraṇaśokākarabhūtaṃ saṃyogaviyoganidhānabhūtaṃ samucchrayaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6653: yat kiñcit sarvasatvānāṃ pariprāpayitavyaṃ bhaviṣyati tad ahaṃ pariprāpayiṣyāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:6654: yat sarvāryāḥ sarvanavayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisatvā na pariprāpayiṣyanti tad ahaṃ pariprāpayiṣyāmi
T04sanssr_pu:6655: na mama dānaṃ sahāyakaṃ |ahaṃ punar dānasya sahāyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6658: nāhaṃ pāramitābhir upasthātavyo mayā punaḥ pāramitā upasthātavyāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6660: yāvad ekākinā mayādvitīyenāsahāyena vajramaye mahīmaṇḍale sthitena sabalaṃ savāhanaṃ māraṃ dharṣayitvā ekacittakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayānnuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhavyeti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6662: tad yathāpi nāma sūryo devaputra udayamāno na tiṣṭhati |
T04sanssr_pu:6671: evam eva bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ smṛtisaṃprajanyavipulagambhīracetā adīnasatvo guṇacaryājñānacaryāvasānaṃ yāvan na vivartate satvadrauhilyadoṣaiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6676: sarvajagatparitrāṇapraṇidhānasya satvakalikaluṣair na sraṃsanāṃ karoti yāvad bālajanasamavadhānena
T04sanssr_pu:6682: yaś ca teṣāṃ sarvasatvānāṃ duṣkhaskandho vividhaṃ cāvaraṇīyaṃ karma samutthitaṃ yena te āvaraṇīyena karmaṇā buddhān na paśyanti |
T04sanssr_pu:6685: tad ahaṃ teṣāṃ trividham āvaraṇīyaṃ karmopacitaṃ duṣkhaskandhena svakena śarīreṇopādadāmi tāsu tāsu narakopapattiṣv apāyabhūmiṣu saṃvāseṣu ca |
T04sanssr_pu:6687: ahaṃ ca duṣkhopādānam upādadāmi vyavasyāmy utsahe |
T04sanssr_pu:6688: na nivarte na palāyāmi nottrasyāmi na saṃtrasyāmi na bibhemi na pratyudāvarte na viṣīdāmi
T04sanssr_pu:6695: jātikāntārāj jarākāntārād vyādhikāntārāc cyutyupapatikāntārāt sarvāpattikāntārāt sarvāpāyakāntārāt sarvasaṃsārakāntārāt sarvadṛṣṭigahanakāntārāt kuśaladharmapraṇāśakāntārād ajñānasamutthitakāntārāt tad ete mayā sarvasatvāḥ sarvakāntārebhyaḥ parimocayitavyāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6696: tṛṣṇājālasaktā avidyānivaraṇāvṛtā bhavatṛṣṇāsaṃprayuktāḥ praṇāśaparyavasānā duṣkhapañjaraprakṣiptāś cārakasaṃniśritā |
T04sanssr_pu:6702: sarvasatvā hy ete mayā sarvajñatācittaplavena saṃsāradurgād dhartavyā |
T04sanssr_pu:6708: na ca mayā sarvasatvāḥ kuśalamūlair vañcitavyāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6709: vyavasyāmy aham ekaikasminn apāye 'parāntakoṭīgatān kalpān saṃvasayituṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6710: yathā ca ekāpāye tathā sarvāpāyaniravaśeṣasarvalokadhātuparyāpanneṣu sarvasatvaparimocananidānaṃ |tat kasya hetoḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6711: varaṃ khalu punar aham eko duṣkhitaḥ syāṃ na ceme sarvasatvāḥ apāyabhūmiprapatitāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6713: sarvajagac ca niḥkretavyaṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokakāntārād ahaṃ ca sarvasatvānām arthāya sarvaduṣkhavedanāskandham anena svakena śarīreṇānubhaveyam |
T04sanssr_pu:6714: sarvasatvanidānam ahaṃ ca sarvasatvānāṃ prātibhāvyam utsahe satyavādī pratyayito 'visaṃvādakaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:6717: sarvasatvārambaṇo mama sarvajñatācittotpāda utpanno yad uta sarvajagatparimocanāya |
T04sanssr_pu:6718: na cāhaṃ ratikāmatayānnuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthito nāpi pañcakāmaguṇaratyanubhavanāya nāpi kāmaviṣayaniṣevaṇāya
T04sanssr_pu:6723: durbuddhisevito hy eṣa mārgaḥ |sarvabuddhivivarṇito hy ayam upadeśaḥ yad uta kāmaniṣevaṇaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:6724: caiṣa sarvaduṣkhaskandhasyotpāda eva niṣevaṇaṃ ata eva ca narakatiryagyoniyamalokānām utpādaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:6725: kalahabhaṇḍanavivādakṣobhāś ca satvānām ata eva prādurbhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:6726: ete ca satvāḥ kāmān niṣevamāṇāḥ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sakāśād dūrībhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:6727: svargopapatter apy ete kāmā antarāyāya saṃvartante |
T04sanssr_pu:6729: so 'ham evam apramāṇadoṣān kāmānāṃ paśyan parīttān ādīptāṃs tasmād aham etan nidānam acaraṇatāyāṃ pratipatsye || pe
T04sanssr_pu:6730: tathā tathaiva mayā kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā yathaiva sarvasatvā atyantasukham aveditasukhaṃ yāvat sarvajñatāsukhaṃ pratilabheran |
T04sanssr_pu:6731: mayā sārathinā mayā pariṇāyakena mayolkādhāriṇā mayā kṣemagatidarśakena mayā kṣaṇagatipratilabdhena mayopāyajñena mayārthaviduṣā mayā saṃsārasāgare sarvajñajñānayānapātramahādeśasthitena mayā pariṇāmanakuśalena mayā pāradarśakena || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:6732: na khalu punar asmiṃś cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau yāvantaḥ satvās tāvanta eva sūryā udāgacchanti cāturdvīpakalokadhātvavabhāsanāya |
T04sanssr_pu:6733: atha ca punar eka evaiṣāṃ sūrya udāgacchati caturdvīpāvabhāsanāya |
T04sanssr_pu:6734: na ca teṣāṃ satvānāṃ caturdvīpopapannānāṃ svakasvakaiḥ śarīrair avabhāsaḥ prādurbhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:6738: ahar ahar vā udyānanagareṣu ratikrīḍāparibhogam anubhaveyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6742: atha ca punaḥ sūryasya devaputrasyodayata ekasya sūryamaṇḍalasyādvitīyasya cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sarvasatvānām avabhāsaḥ prādurbhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:6743: evam eva bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya kuśalamūlāny upārpayamānasya kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayamānasyaivaṃ cittam utpadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:6744: naiteṣāṃ satvānāṃ tat kuśalamūlaṃ vidyate yena te ātmānaṃ paritrāyeran |
T04sanssr_pu:6746: ahaṃ punaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ kuśalamūlāni samudānayāmi kuśalamūlaṃ pariṇāmayāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:6748: sarvasatvānām avabhāsanāya sarvasatvānāṃ jñāpanāya saravsatvānām avatāraṇāya sarvasatvānāṃ parigrahaṇāya sarvasatvānāṃ pariniṣpādanāya sarvasatvānāṃ prasādanāya sarvasatvānāṃ prahlādanāya sarvasatvānāṃ saṃśayacchedanāya ādityamaṇḍalakalpair asmābhir bhavitavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6750: na parasyāvakāśam utpādya satveṣu saṃnāha utsraṣṭavyaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:6751: | na ca sarvasatvānām antikāt sarvasatvatrāṇavyavaśāyo nivartayitavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6754: na parīttayā pariṇāmanayā tuṣṭir mantavyā ity ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:6759: api tu khalv acintyam eva saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyati |
T04sanssr_pu:6760: yāvatī pūrvākoṭiḥ saṃsārasya yady etāvad ekaṃ rātriṃdivaṃ bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:6761: evaṃrūpai rātriṃdivaiḥ pañcadaśadaivasikena pakṣeṇa triṃśaddaivasikena māsena dvādaśamāsikena saṃvatsareṇa anayā varṣagaṇanayā yāvad varṣaśatasahasreṇaikaṃ bodhicittam utpādayeyam ekaṃ ca tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyeyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6762: anena praveśenānayā gaṇanayā gaṅgānadīvālukāsamaiś cittotpādais tathāgatadarśanaiś ca ekaikasyāpi satvasya cittacaritaṃ jānīyāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6763: anenaiva praveśenānayā gaṇanayā sarvasatvānāṃ tāvadbhiś cittotpādais tathāgatadarśanaiḥ svacittacaritāni prajanīyām ity annavalīnaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6764: saṃnāho 'yaṃ bodhisatvasyākṣayaḥ saṃnāhaḥ |evaṃ dānādiṣu bodhipākṣikamahāpuruṣalakṣaṇeṣu ca nayaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6767: alam ebhiḥ satvair evaṃ khaṭuṅkair evaṃ durdāntair iti |
T04sanssr_pu:6771: na ca satvārthavaimukhyasya bodhisatvapariśuddhāyāṃ lokadhātāv upapattir bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:6772: tatra prājño bodhisatva evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:6773: tasmāt satvadhātor ye satvāḥ syuḥ pratyavarā dhajaḍaiḍamūkajātīyāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6774: aparinirvāṇadharmakāḥ kṛtsnā satvadhātau na cikitsitāḥ sarvabuddhaiḥ sarvabodhisatvaiś ca
T04sanssr_pu:6776: tān ahaṃ sarvān bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdyānnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhayeyaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6777: evaṃ hi bodhisatvasya cintayataś cittotpāde cittotpāde sarvamārabhavanāni prakampante |
T04sanssr_pu:6782: vimarṣanirāsāya dharmasaṃgītisūtre gaditaṃ |āśaye samyag bhagavan buddhadharmāṇāṃ mūlaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:6783: yasya punar āśayo nāsti sarve buddhadharmās tasya dūre ||
T04sanssr_pu:6784: āśayasaṃpannasya punar bhagavan yadi buddhā na bhavanti gaganatalād dharmaśabdo niścarati kuḍmavṛkṣebhyaś ca |
T04sanssr_pu:6785: āśayaśuddhasya bodhisatvasya svamanojalpād eva sarvāvavādānuśāsanyo niścaranti |
T04sanssr_pu:6787: tad yathā bhagavan yasya pādau tasya gamanaṃ evaṃ bhagavan yasyāśayas tasya buddhadharmāḥ |tad yathā bhagavan yasyottamāṅgaṃ tasya jīvitaṃ evam
T04sanssr_pu:6789: tad yathā bhagavan yasya jīvitaṃ tasya lābhaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6790: evam eva bhagavan yasyāśayas tasya buddhatvalābhaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:6793: evam eva bhagavann āśaye sati bodhisatvasya sarvabuddhadharmā jvalanti |
T04sanssr_pu:6795: tad yathā bhagavan satsv abhramegheṣu varṣaṃ varṣaty asatsu na varṣati |
T04sanssr_pu:6796: evam eva bhagavann āśaye sati buddhadharmāḥ pravartante |
T04sanssr_pu:6797: tad yathā bhagavan yasya vṛkṣasya mūlaṃ vipannaṃ tasya puṣpaphalāni na bhūyaḥ prarohanti |
T04sanssr_pu:6798: evam eva bhagavan yasyāśayo vipannas tasya sarve kuśalā dharmā na bhūyaḥ saṃbhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:6799: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan bodhisatvena buddhabodhyarthikena svāśayaḥ sūdgṛhītaḥ svārakṣitaḥ suśodhitaḥ svadhiṣṭhitaḥ kartavya iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6847: tad evaṃ vyavasāyāśayau dṛḍhīkṛtya kāruṇyaṃ puraḥkṛtya yate śubhavṛddhaye ||
T04sanssr_pu:6849: atha khalv avalokiteśvaro bodhisatvo mahāsatvo bhagavantam etad avocat |
T04sanssr_pu:6851: eko dharmo bhagavan bodhisatvena svārādhitaḥ supratividdhaḥ kartavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6855: mahākaruṇayā bhagavan bodhisatvānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmāḥ karatalagatā bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:6856: tad yathā bhagavan yena rājñaś cakravartinaś cakraratnaṃ gacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:6858: evam eva bhagavan yena bodhisatvasya mahākaruṇā gacchati |
T04sanssr_pu:6860: tad yathā bhagavann āditye udite satvāḥ karmakriyāsu pracurā bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:6861: evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇā yatroditā bhavati tatrānyabodhikarā dharmāḥ kriyāsu pracurā bhavanti
T04sanssr_pu:6862: tad yathā bhagavan sarveṣām indriyāṇāṃ manasādhiṣṭhitānāṃ svasvaviṣaye grahaṇaprācuryaṃ bhavati
T04sanssr_pu:6863: evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇādhiṣṭhitānām anyeṣāṃ bodhikarāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svasmin svasmin karaṇīye prācuryaṃ bhavati
T04sanssr_pu:6864: | tad yathā bhagavan jīvitendriye saty anyeṣām indriyāṇāṃ pravṛttir bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:6865: evam eva bhagavan mahākaruṇāyāṃ satyām anyeṣāṃ bodhikarāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttir bhavatīti
T04sanssr_pu:6867: tad yathāpi nāma bhadanta sāradvatīputra puruṣasya jīvitendriyasyāśvāsāḥ praśvāsāḥ pūrvaṃgamāḥ
T04sanssr_pu:6868: evam eva bhadanta sāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāyānasamudāgatasya mahākaruṇā pūrvaṃgamāḥ || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:6869: syād yathāpi nāma śreṣṭhino vā gṛhapater vā ekaputrake guṇavati majjāgataṃ prema |
T04sanssr_pu:6870: evam eva mahākaruṇāpratilabdhasya bodhisatvasya sarvasatveṣu majjāgataṃ premeti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6872: svakam annekavidhaṃ pūrvānubhūtam anubhūyamānaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ bhayaṃ ca svātmany atyantam anniṣṭaṃ bhāvayitvā |
T04sanssr_pu:6873: priyādiṣu maitrī maitrīvatā bhāvayitavyā pratyutpannaduṣkhavyādhiṣu mahāduṣkhasāgarānavadhidīrghasaṃsāravyasanānunīteṣu vā ||
T04sanssr_pu:6875: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty āścaryaṃ yāvad ajñānasaṃmūḍhā vateme bālapṛthagjanāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6876: yeṣām asaṃkhyeyā ātmabhāvā niruddhā nirudhyante nirotsyante ca |
T04sanssr_pu:6877: evaṃ ca kṣīyamāṇā kāye na nirvedam utpādayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:6891: apratiśaraṇāḥ tathā saṃvegam āpadyante bahūni duṣkhāni pratyanubhavantaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6893: hantāham eṣāṃ satvānāṃ duṣkhārtānām anāthānām atrāṇānām aśaraṇānām alayanānām āparāyaṇānām andhānām avidyāṇḍakoṣapaṭalaparyavanaddhānāṃ tamo'bhibhūtānām
T04sanssr_pu:6895: yathārūpeṇa puṇyajñānasaṃbhāropacayena saṃbhṛtena ime sarvasatvā abhyantaviśuddhim anuprāpnuyur iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6897: saṃsārāṭavīkāntāramārgaprapannā vateme satvā nirayatiryagyoniyamalokaprapātābhimukhāḥ kudṛṣṭiviṣamajālānuprāptāḥ mohagahanasaṃchannā mithyāmārgavitathaprayātā |
T04sanssr_pu:6911: ruddhā vateme satvā bahuduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsabahulānunayapratighapriyāpriyavinibandhane saśokaparidevānucarite tṛṣṇānigaḍabandhane māyāśāṭhyāvidyāgahanasaṃchanne traidhātukacārake te asmābhiḥ sarvatraidhātukaviveke abhayapure sarvaduṣkhopaśame [doubtful] annāvaraṇanirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā ity ādi
T04sanssr_pu:6912: evam ebhiḥ paraḥparadṛḍhīkṛtyair vyavasāyāśayakāruṇyaiḥ puṇyavṛddhim ārabhet |
T04sanssr_pu:6913: tatra tāvad bhadrācāryāvidhiḥ kāryā vandanādiḥ sadādarāt ||
T04sanssr_pu:6914: āryogradattaparipṛcchāyāṃ hi trirātre trir divasasya ca śuceḥ śucivastraprāvṛtasya ca triskandhakapravartanam uktaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6928: iha bodhisatvo yānīmāni bhavanti puṣpajātāni vā phalajātāni vā amamāny aparigrahāṇi |
T04sanssr_pu:6929: tāni triṣkṛtvā rātrau triṣkṛtvā divase buddhabodhisatvebhyo niryātayati || pe ||
T04sanssr_pu:6930: sayathīme [doubtful] dhūpavṛkṣā vā gandhavṛkṣā vā ratnavṛkṣā vā kalpavṛkṣā vā amamā aparigrahās tān api triṣkṛtvā rātrau triṣkṛtvā divase buddhabodhisatvebhyo niryātayatīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:6934: anayā ca diśā sarvabhaiṣajyāni sarvarasāyanāni sarvasalilāni annavadyāni ammaṇḍalāni |
T04sanssr_pu:6936: vivṛtteṣu vā lokadhātuṣu ye paramarasasparśasaṃpannā bhūparpaṭakāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:6940: pariśuddheṣu ca lokadhātuṣu ye ramaṇīyatarāḥ paribhogāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:6975: yad uta niravaśeṣasarvasatvadhāturūpyarūpisaṃjñāsaṃjñi naiva saṃjñi nāsaṃjñy aṇḍajajarāyujasaṃsvedajaupapādukatraidhātukaparyāpannaṣaḍgatisamavasṛtasarvopapattiparyāpannanāmarūpasaṃgṛhītāśeṣasarvasatvadhātuparipācanāya sarvabuddhadharmāvatāraṇāya |
T04sanssr_pu:7032: etac ca bhāvayan sarvatra pariṇāmayāmīti yojyaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7033: āryāvalokiteśvaravimokṣe ca yad uktaṃ tad apy evaṃ yojyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7054: saṃkṣepataḥ punar iyam annuttarā pariṇāmanā yeyam āryabhadracaryāgāthāyāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:7055: | mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantata bhadra tathaiva |
T04sanssr_pu:7056: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7057: sarvatriyadhva gatebhi jinebhir yā pariṇāmana varṇita agrā |
T04sanssr_pu:7058: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī varabhadracarīye |
T04sanssr_pu:7060: iti śikṣāsamuccaye bhadracaryāvidhiḥ ṣoḍaśamaḥ paricchedaḥ samāptaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7067: varjayaty akṣaṇāny aṣṭau yae ime deśitā mayā |
T04sanssr_pu:7069: varṇavān rūpasaṃpanno lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ sthāmnā balena copeto nāsau kausīdyam ṛcchati [doubtful] ||
T04sanssr_pu:7070: āḍhyo mahādhanaś cāsau adhṛṣyaḥ puṇyavān api |
T04sanssr_pu:7073: bhaved dānapatiḥ śūro muktatyāgo hy amatsarī ||
T04sanssr_pu:7077: rājye pratiṣṭhito buddhān satkaroti punaḥ punaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7078: ścyuta/ cāsmād gataḥ svargaṃ prasanno jinaśāsane |
T04sanssr_pu:7080: na śakyaṃ bhāṣatā varṇaṃ kṣapayituṃ kalpakoṭibhiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7081: ya stūpaṃ lokanāthasya naraḥ kuryāt pradakṣiṇam ||
T04sanssr_pu:7082: na jātu so 'ndhaḥ khañjo vā kalpānām api koṭibhiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7083: utpādya bodhicittaṃ yaḥ śāstu stūpaṃ hi vandate ||
T04sanssr_pu:7086: yo buddhakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrān kalpān koṭī ca tuliya satkarayā |
T04sanssr_pu:7087: yaś ceha kalpe caramaka ghorakāle vandeya stūpaṃ bahutara tasya puṇyam ||
T04sanssr_pu:7088: agro hi buddho 'tuliya dakṣiṇīyo 'grāṃ caritvā cariyaviśeṣa prāptaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7089: tasyeha pūjāṃ karia narariṣabhasya vipāka śreṣṭho bhavati atulyarūpaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7091: vimānaṃ labhate tatra vicitraṃ ratanām ayam ||
T04sanssr_pu:7096: bhuktvā ca tāṃ ratiṃ divyāṃ āyuḥ saṃpūrya paṇḍitaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7097: cyutvā ca devalokāt sa manuṣyo bhavati bhogavān ||
T04sanssr_pu:7099: satkṛtaḥ syāc ca sarvatra caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca ||
T04sanssr_pu:7100: cakravartī ca rājāsau śakraś ca bhavatīśvaraḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7101: brahmā ca brahmalokasmin caitye mālāṃ pradāya ca ||
T04sanssr_pu:7103: sarve 'syārthāḥ samṛdhyanti ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7104: tyajed dhīnān akuśalān na sa tatropapadyate |
T04sanssr_pu:7107: priyaḥ sadayitaś cāsau satkṛtaś ca praśaṃsitaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7108: davānām atha nāgānāṃ ye lokesmiṃś ca paṇḍitāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7110: te kulāḥ satkṛtā bhonti rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca ||
T04sanssr_pu:7111: yaḥ sarṣapāt sūkṣmataraṃ gṛhītvā dhūpeya dhūpaṃ bhagavati caityakeṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:7112: tasyānuśaṃsān śṛṇuta prabhāṣato me prasannacittā jahiya khilāṃ malāṃś ca
T04sanssr_pu:7113: sa puṇyavāṃś carati diśaḥ samantād ārogyaprāpto dṛḍhamatir apramattaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7114: vineti śokaṃ vicarati cārikāyāṃ priyo manāpo bhavati mahājanasya ||
T04sanssr_pu:7115: rājyaṃ ca labdhvā jina varu satkarotī mahānubhāvo vidu cakravartī |
T04sanssr_pu:7116: suvarṇavarṇo vicitralakṣaṇaiḥ sa manojñagandhān labhi sarvaloke ||
T04sanssr_pu:7119: yaś cīvareṇa caityeṣu kuryāt pūjām atulāṃ nāyakānāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7120: tasyeha bhotī asadṛśu ātmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7121: pāṇītaleṣu suruciru muktahārāḥ prādurbhavantī vividha annantakalpāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7122: siṃhalatāḥ suruciravarṇasūtrā veṭhitva stūpaṃ bhagavata cīvarebhiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7123: datvā patākāṃ bhagavata cetikeṣū chandaṃ janitvā tatha siya buddhaloke |
T04sanssr_pu:7124: sa pūjanīyo bhavati mahājanasya carantu śreṣṭho jinacārikāye ||
T04sanssr_pu:7125: suvarṇavarṇo bhavati si ātmabhāvo lābhī sa bhotī suruciracīvarāṇāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7126: karpāsikānāṃ susahita kambalānāṃ dukūlakānāṃ tatha varakauśakānāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7127: dhvajaṃ daditvā hataraji satvasāre dhanaṃ prabhūtaṃ pratilabhi na cireṇa |
T04sanssr_pu:7128: prabhūtakoṣo bhavati annantaprajño paricāru tasya bhavaty adīnacittaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7129: na cittaśūlaṃ janayati so parasya prasādacittaḥ sada apramattaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7130: na tasya agniḥ kramati viṣannaśastraṃ udvīkṣaṇīyo bhavati mahājanasya ||
T04sanssr_pu:7131: adho upādāya ca vibhavāgru yāvat jāmbūnadaṃ tena bhavati buddhakṣetraṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7132: śakyaṃ kṣayetuṃ āyuśriya evarūpā na buddhastūpe dharayata eka dīpam ||
T04sanssr_pu:7133: na tasya kāyo bhavati avarṇitāṅgo dṛḍhāsu bhotī parighabhujo 'chambhī |
T04sanssr_pu:7134: ālokaprāpto [doubtful] vicarati sarvaloke daditva dīpaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu
T04sanssr_pu:7135: yadi buddhakṣetrā niyutaśatā sahasrā bhaveyu pūrṇā śikhagatasarṣapebhiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7136: śakyaṃ gaṇetuṃ tulayitu bhāṣituṃ vā na tathāgateṣū dharayitu ekadīpam ||
T04sanssr_pu:7137: alaṅkaritvā suruciradarśanīyaṃ yo deti chatraṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:7138: tasyeha bhoty asadṛśa ātmabhāvo dvātriṃśatībhiḥ kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7139: yebhir jinasya pratapata ātmabhāvo rūpaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ yathariva [doubtful]
T04sanssr_pu:7141: jāmbūnado vā suruciradarśanīyā abhikīrṇa ... kusumita lakṣaṇebhiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7143: na bhogahānir bhavati kadācid asya devāna bhoti gurukṛta pūjitaś ca ||
T04sanssr_pu:7144: na kāmabhogau ramati kadāci dhīro viśuddhaśīlaḥ sakuśalabrahmacaryaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:7146: na jñānahānir bhavati kadācid asya na bodhicittaṃ vijahati so kathañcit |
T04sanssr_pu:7147: maitrīvihārī bhavati adīnacitto datveha chattraṃ bhagavatacetikeṣu ||
T04sanssr_pu:7148: vādyena pūjāṃ naravṛṣabhasya kṛtvā na śoka śalyavaśa jātu bhoti |
T04sanssr_pu:7149: manojñaghoṣo bhavati manuṣyaloke svarāṅgu tasyāvikala viśuddha bhoti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7150: viśuddhacakṣur bhavati sa saṃprajanyo viśuddhaśrotro bhavati udagracittaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:7151: | ghraṇendriyaṃ parama uttapta bhoti vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu ||
T04sanssr_pu:7152: jihvāsya bhoti surucira darśanīyā susūkṣma mṛdvī rucira manojña ghoṣā |
T04sanssr_pu:7153: raktā pravālā yathariva [doubtful] devatānāṃ svarāṅga koṭīvara sṛjate
T04sanssr_pu:7155: na jātu bhotī uragu ajihvako vā na khañjakubjo nāpi ca nāmitāṅgaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7156: viśiṣṭa bhotī surucira ātmabhāvo vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu ||
T04sanssr_pu:7157: na jātu kaścij janaye prasādaṃ devo ca nāgo manuja mahorago vā |
T04sanssr_pu:7158: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati sarvaloke vāditva vādyaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu ||
T04sanssr_pu:7159: kalpāna koṭīniyutaśatā sahasraṃ viśiṣṭakāyo bhavati aninditāṅgaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7160: prāsādiko 'sau kavacita lakṣaṇebhiḥ saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya
T04sanssr_pu:7161: vimānaśreṣṭhaṃ labhati manojñagandhaṃ divyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ suruciracandanasya |
T04sanssr_pu:7162: na jātu tṛṣṇāṃ janayati so kadācit saṃśodhya stūpaṃ bhagavata nirvṛtasya
T04sanssr_pu:7163: pralopakāle jinavaraśāsanasmin na jātu bhotī upagata jambudvīpe |
T04sanssr_pu:7164: svarge sa bhoti pratiṣṭhita tasmi kāle gandhānulepaṃ dadiya jinasya stūpe ||
T04sanssr_pu:7165: durgandhikāmān aśucijugupsanīyān varjeti nityaṃ pratiṣṭhita śīlaskandhe |
T04sanssr_pu:7166: carī sa nityam imu vara brahmacaryaṃ gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe ||
T04sanssr_pu:7167: itaś cyuto 'sau marupati svargaloke arthaṃ sahasrā tulayati no cireṇa |
T04sanssr_pu:7168: karoti cārthaṃ suvipuladevatānāṃ gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe ||
T04sanssr_pu:7169: viśiṣṭavākyo bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ priyo manāpo bahujanasatkṛtaś ca |
T04sanssr_pu:7170: sukhaṃ ca tasya bhavati sadā prasannaṃ gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe
T04sanssr_pu:7171: apāyabhūmiṃ ... vijahāty aśeṣāṃ āsannako bhavati tathāgatānāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7172: prasādalabdhaḥ sada sukhi premaṇīyo gandhānulepaṃ kariya jinasya stūpe ||
T04sanssr_pu:7173: so 'kṣaṇaṃ vai vijahāti sarvaṃ aṣṭa kṣaṇāś cāsya viśiṣṭa bhonti |
T04sanssr_pu:7174: buddhāna pūjām atuliya so karoti choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu ||
T04sanssr_pu:7175: śūraś ca bhoti dṛḍhamatir apramatto na kāmabhoge 'bhiratiṃ janeti |
T04sanssr_pu:7176: naiṣkramyaprāptau ca adīnacittaḥ choritva jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu ||
T04sanssr_pu:7177: na bodhicittaṃ pramuṣyati tasya jātu akhaṇḍaśīlo 'sti susaṃvṛtaś ca |
T04sanssr_pu:7178: dharmaṃ virāgaṃ labhate viśuddhaṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu ||
T04sanssr_pu:7179: durvācatāṃ vijahati sarvakālaṃ prajñābhāvaṃ ca jahāty aśeṣam |viśālaprajño
T04sanssr_pu:7180: viharati cārikāyāṃ upanīya jālaṃ bhagavata cetikeṣu ||
T04sanssr_pu:7181: lābhī ca bhotī śucibhojanānāṃ vastrān viśiṣṭān labhate suvarṇān |
T04sanssr_pu:7186: na tasya rājāpi praduṣṭacittaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneya caitye ||
T04sanssr_pu:7187: kumārga sarvaṃ pithita apāyabhūmiḥ sa śīlaskandhe sthita bodhisatvaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7188: avatārayitvā jinacetikebhyaḥ puṣpaṃ ca prāg anyanaraiḥ pradattaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7189: śokāṃś ca doṣān vijahāty amatto rogān aśeṣān vijahāty annekān |
T04sanssr_pu:7190: āśvāsaprāptaś ca annantakalpān yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye ||
T04sanssr_pu:7192: alaṃkṛto bhavati viśuddhakāyaḥ yo jīrṇapuṣpān apaneti caitye ||
T04sanssr_pu:7193: dadyāc ca yaḥ suruciradivya puṣpaṃ māndāravān apy atha pāṭalaṃ vā |
T04sanssr_pu:7194: nirmālyakaṃ yo 'panayeta caitye vipāka śreṣṭho 'sya bhaved atulyaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7195: yaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇamati nāthastūpaṃ chandaṃ janitvā ca sabuddhaloke |
T04sanssr_pu:7196: so bhoti loke gurukṛtu satkṛtaś ca prāsādiko bhavati sudarśanīyaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7197: tasyeha rājyaṃ nipatati sarvaloko devāsurā nāgamanuṣyakāś ca |
T04sanssr_pu:7198: sarvāḥ sahasrāḥ kusumita lokadhātuḥ praśāsti rājño vaśa īśvarāṃś ca ||
T04sanssr_pu:7199: ye tasya rājye sthita bhonti satvāḥ sthāpeya sarvān akaluṣabuddhajñāne |
T04sanssr_pu:7200: apāyabhūmyas tyaktā bhavanti karoti caiṣāṃ paramasuśreṣṭham artham ||
T04sanssr_pu:7201: paricāro 'sya bhavati manojñaghoṣaḥ puṇyair upetaḥ smṛtimatipūjanīyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7202: āśvāsaprāpto vicarati jīvaloke sadābhiprāyaṃ janayati śreṣṭhaprītiṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7203: paricāra bhoty asya svarāṅga śuddhaḥ jñāyeta satvair madhurapraśāntavākyo |
T04sanssr_pu:7204: na tasya kaścij janayati ceśvaratvaṃ vilokanīyo bhavati mahājanasya |
T04sanssr_pu:7206: ākruṣṭaḥ san nājanayeta roṣaṃ yaḥ prāñjaliḥ praṇamati buddhastūpaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7207: devendra bhoty upagatasvargaloke manuṣyako bhavati narasya rājā |
T04sanssr_pu:7208: na pārihāṇir bhavati kadācid asya yo 'ñjalībhir namatīha stūpaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7209: nāsāv apāye prapateta jātu hīnāṃś ca varjeta sa kāma loke |
T04sanssr_pu:7210: āḍhyo dhanī bhoti prabhūtakoṣo yo 'ñjalībhir namati buddhastūpam ||
T04sanssr_pu:7211: sūtrāntacaryā na kadācid asya nāsthānakopaṃ kurute nṛloke |
T04sanssr_pu:7212: satvāś ca tṛptā muditāsya bhonti yaḥ saṃpramuñcī guṇavati ekavācaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7214: sa puṇyavān bhavati manuṣyaloke rākṣe ca sthitvā jina satkaroti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7215: śokā na doṣāḥ khilamala nāsya bhonti atulyatāptaś ca susaṃsthitāṅgaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7216: ālokanīyaś ca mahājanasya vrajeta kāmāna bhayakaravairaghorān |
T04sanssr_pu:7218: āryamahākaruṇāpuṇḍarīkasūtre 'py uktaṃ |tiṣṭhatu tāvad ānanda yo māṃ saṃmukhaṃ satkuryāt |
T04sanssr_pu:7219: tiṣṭhatu me śarīrasya pūjā sarṣapaphalamatreṣu dhātuṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:7220: tiṣṭhatu mām uddiśya kṛteṣu stūpeṣu satkāraḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7221: ye kecid ānanda buddham ālambyāntaśa ekapuṣpam apy ākāśe kṣepsyanti |
T04sanssr_pu:7222: tasya puṇyaskandhasya yo vipākaḥ saced yāvān annādiḥ saṃsāro yasya pūrvā koṭir na prajñāyate
T04sanssr_pu:7223: tāvataḥ kalpān saṃsaratāṃ teṣāṃ śakratvaṃ brahmatvaṃ cakravartitvaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7226: saced antaśaḥ svapnāntaragatā api satvā buddham ālambyākāśe ekapuṣpam api kṣepsyanti tad apy ahaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ nirvāṇaparyavasānaṃ vadāmīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7228: aṣṭābhir bhujagādhipate dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvāḥ satatasamitaṃ buddhasamavadhānaṃ pratilabhante |
T04sanssr_pu:7235: yatra ca buddhakṣetre tathāgataśravaṃ śṛṇvanti tatra praṇidhānam utpādayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:7245: mahat puṇyam ayaṃ kṣetraṃ muditaṃ jñānamaṇḍalaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7248: na durgatibhayaṃ teṣāṃ yair ihārāgito jinaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7259: varaṃ tatra ciraṃ vāso buddhānām aśrutir na ca ||
T04sanssr_pu:7260: kiṃ kāraṇam apāyeṣu nivāsaś ciram iṣyate |
T04sanssr_pu:7264: kṣapayaty āvṛtīḥ sarvā dṛṣṭvā buddhaṃ narottamam |
T04sanssr_pu:7265: vardhayaty amitaṃ puṇyaṃ yena bodhir avāpyatae |
T04sanssr_pu:7267: tad evam asti puṇyavṛddhau buddhasamavadhānena prayojanaṃ |api ca pratimāmātradarśanam api tāvad aparimitaphalaṃ tathāgatānāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7270: yaḥ kaścin mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā sarvalokadhāturajopamānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ dine dine śatarasam āhāraṃ dadyāt divyāni ca vastrāṇi |
T04sanssr_pu:7272: yaś cānyo mañjuśrīḥ kulaputraḥ kuladuhitā vā citrakarmalikhitaṃ vā pustakakarmakṛtaṃ vā buddhaṃ paśyed |
T04sanssr_pu:7275: 'ñjalipragrahaṃ vā kuryāt puṣpaṃ vā dadyāt dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dīpaṃ vā dadyād |
T04sanssr_pu:7278: yas tathāgatacaityaṃ śodhayati sa catasro 'grāḥ praṇidhānaviśuddhīr anuprāpnoti |
T04sanssr_pu:7285: tathāgatacaityeṣu puṣpāvaropaṇaṃ gandhānulepanaṃ kṛtvāṣṭāv avikalatā anuprāpnoti |
T04sanssr_pu:7292: na śrutavikalo na prajñāvikalo na praṇidhānavikala iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7294: ye tribhavaparyāpannāḥ satvās te sarve pratyekaṃ tathāgatastūpān kārayeyur evaṃrūpān uccaistvena
T04sanssr_pu:7296: tāṃś ca gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān pratyekaṃ sarvasatkāraiḥ satkuryuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7299: ayaṃ tasmāt pūrvakāt puṇyaskandhād bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet ||
T04sanssr_pu:7301: ye khalu punas trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve mahāyānasaṃprasthitā bhaveyuḥ
T04sanssr_pu:7302: sarve ca cakravartirājyasamanvāgatā bhaveyur ekaikaś ca rājā cakravartī mahāsamudrapramāṇadīpasthālīṃ kṛtvā |
T04sanssr_pu:7303: sumerumātrāṃ vartīm ādīpya pratyekam evaṃrūpāṃ dīpapūjāṃ tathāgatacaityeṣu pravartayet |
T04sanssr_pu:7304: yaś cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvas tailaprakṣiptāṃ vartīṃ kṛtvādīpya tathāgatacaitye dhārayet
T04sanssr_pu:7305: asyās tailaprakṣiptāyā varter etat pūrvakaṃ pradīpadānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti |
T04sanssr_pu:7306: yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamatae iti |
T04sanssr_pu:7308: ye ca khalu punas te rājānaś cakravartino buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ satkuryuḥ yaś cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvaḥ piṇḍapātraṃ caritvā pātraparyāpannaṃ pareṣāṃ saṃvibhajya paribhuñjīta |
T04sanssr_pu:7309: idaṃ tato bahutaraṃ ca mahārghataraṃ ca |
T04sanssr_pu:7310: yac ca te rājānaś cakravartinaḥ sumerumātraṃ cīvararāśiṃ buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya dadyuḥ
T04sanssr_pu:7311: yac cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvas tricīvaraṃ bahirdhā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāya buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya vā tathāgatacaitye vā dadyād |
T04sanssr_pu:7312: idaṃ bhikṣoś cīvaradānam etat pūrvakacīvararāśim abhibhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:7313: yac ca te rājānaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvaṃ jambūdvīpaṃ puṣpasaṃstṛtaṃ kṛtvā tathāgatacaitye niryātayet
T04sanssr_pu:7314: yac cābhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāso bodhisatvaḥ antaśa ekapuṣpam api tathāgatacaitye āropayet |
T04sanssr_pu:7315: asya dānasyaitat pūrvakaṃ dānaṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti |
T04sanssr_pu:7318: catura imān bhadrānuśaṃsān paśyan bodhisatvas tathāgatapūjāyām utsuko bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:7320: agraś ca me dakṣiṇīyaḥ pūjito bhaviṣyati māṃ ca dṛṣṭvānye 'pi tathā śikṣiṣyanti |
T04sanssr_pu:7321: tathāgataṃ ca pūjayitvā bodhicittaṃ dṛḍhaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:7322: dvātriṃśatāṃ ca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānāṃ saṃmukhadarśanena kuśalamūlam upacitaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:7332: daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisatvā annanuliptā garbhamalena jāyante |
T04sanssr_pu:7342: tac ca nirāmiṣeṇa cittena na sāmiṣeṇa |
T04sanssr_pu:7344: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasatvā nirupaliptā garbhamalena jāyantām iti |
T04sanssr_pu:7348: yaḥ prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodate |caratām api bodhisatvacaryāṃ tāṃś cittotpādān anumodate |
T04sanssr_pu:7349: avinivartanīyām api avinivartanīyadharmatām anumodate bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7350: kiyantaṃ sa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati ||
T04sanssr_pu:7351: evam ukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānām indram etad avocat |
T04sanssr_pu:7353: syāt khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātoḥ palāgreṇa tulyamānasasya pramāṇam udgrahītuṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7354: na tv eva kauśika bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya teṣām anumodanāsahagatānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītuṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7355: evam ukte śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat |
T04sanssr_pu:7357: ye bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhānām evam aprameyam anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyam iti na śṛṇvanti na jānanti |
T04sanssr_pu:7362: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiś ceme cittotpādā anumoditā bodhisatvayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā śrāvakayānikair vā |
T04sanssr_pu:7363: te kṣipraṃ tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayiṣyanti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7365: evaṃ tair anumodanāsahagataiś cittotpādakuśalamūlair yatra yatropapatsyante tatra tatra satkṛtāś ca bhaviṣyanti gurukṛtāś ca mānitāś ca pūjitāś ca arcitāś ca apacāyitāś ca bhaviṣyanti |
T04sanssr_pu:7369: evaṃ na gandhān na rasān na spraṣṭavyān sprakṣyanti na ca teṣām apāyeṣūpapattiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā svargopapattis teṣāṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyā |
T04sanssr_pu:7371: tathā hi taiḥ satvaiḥ sarvasatvasukhāvahanāni asaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāṃ kuśalamūlāny anumoditāni yāvad annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyān satvān parinirvāpayiṣyantīti punar atraivāha |
T04sanssr_pu:7372: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālikopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasatvās te sarve 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratitiṣṭheyur annuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ pratiṣṭhāya gaṅgānadīvālikāsamān kalpān upalambhasaṃjñinaś catvāri dhyānāni samāpadyeran |
T04sanssr_pu:7373: yaś ca bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca
T04sanssr_pu:7375: śrāvakānāṃ pratyekabuddhānām api śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ sarvam ekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣam
T04sanssr_pu:7376: anumodetāgrayānumodanayā jyeṣṭhayā śreṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttarayā niruttarayā uttarottarayā asamayāsamasamayāpratisamayānumodanayānumodyānumodanāsahagataṃ [doubtful]
T04sanssr_pu:7378: asya subhūte 'numodanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastuno 'sau pūrvaka aupalambhikānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ caturdhyānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:7379: nopaiti yāvad upaniṣadam api na kṣamatae iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7381: athavāgrapariṇāmanayā pariṇāmitatvāt sarvapuṇyānām asya buddhatvāya satkṛtapraṇidhibuddhatvam eva syāt |
T04sanssr_pu:7384: adhyeṣaṇāyās tv anuśaṃsā āryograparipṛcchāyām uktā dharmagrāhyatām upādāyāprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣv āyuḥ parirakṣaṇāyeti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7393: catvāra ime mahārāja dharmā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ viśeṣagāmitāyai saṃvartante 'parihāṇāya ca |
T04sanssr_pu:7400: yena gauraveṇa subhāṣitaṃ śṛṇoti śuśrūṣate 'virahitaśrotraś ca dharmaṃ śṛṇoti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7402: yayā nirmānatayā āryāṇām abhinamati praṇamati namasyati ||
T04sanssr_pu:7404: yena vīryeṇa kāyalaghutāṃ cittalaghutāṃ ca pratilabhate sarvakāryāṇi cottārayati ||
T04sanssr_pu:7410: śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam iti
T04sanssr_pu:7416: yad yat karma kariṣyāmi tasya tasya karmaṇaḥ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyāmīti |
T04sanssr_pu:7417: sa jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karoti |
T04sanssr_pu:7421: sarvadṛṣṭikṛtāni ca nānuśete sarvabuddhadharmān balavaiśāradyaprabhṛtīṃś ca śraddadhāti |
T04sanssr_pu:7422: śraddhāya ca vigatakathaṃkathas tān buddhadharmān samudānayati |
T04sanssr_pu:7425: yān dharmān śraddhendriyeṇa śraddadhāti tān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayatīdam ucyate vīryendriyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:7427: yān dharmān vīryendriyeṇa samudānayati tān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati |
T04sanssr_pu:7430: yān dharmān smṛtīndriyeṇa na vipraṇāśayati tān samādhīndriyeṇaikāgrīkarotīdam ucyate samādhīndriyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:7431: tatra katamat prajñendriyam |yān dharmān samādhīndriyeṇaikāgrīkaroti tān
T04sanssr_pu:7433: yad eteṣu dharmeṣu pratyātmajñānam aparapratyayajñānam idam ucyate prajñendriyaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7434: evam imāni pañcendriyāṇi sahitāny anuprabaddhāni sarvabuddhadharmān paripūrayanti |
T04sanssr_pu:7439: yad ebhir evendriyair upastabdho 'nnavamardyo bhavati sarvamāraiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7452: yāvanti pūjā bahuvidha aprameyā yā kṣetrakoṭīn ayutabimbareṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:7453: tāṃ pūjakṛtvā puruṣavareṣu nityaṃ saṃkhyākalāpo na bhavati maitracitta |
T04sanssr_pu:7458: vandāmi te asamajñānaparā sadṛśo na te 'sti tribhave virajā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7459: mṛdu cāru snigdha śubha keśa nakhā girirājatulya tava coṣṇir iha |
T04sanssr_pu:7460: noṣnīṣam īkṣitu tavāsti samo vibhrājate bhruvi tavorṇa mune ||
T04sanssr_pu:7462: kṛpayekṣase jagad idaṃ hi yayā vandāmi te vimalanetra jina ||
T04sanssr_pu:7463: jihvā prabhūta tanu tāmranibhā vadanaṃ ca chādayasi yena svakaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7464: dharmaṃ vadan vinayase ca jagat vandāmi te madhurasnigdhagirā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7465: daśanāḥ śubhāḥ sudṛḍha vajranibhāḥ triṃśaddaśāpy aviralāḥ sahitāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7466: kurvan smitaṃ vinayase ca jagat vandāmi te madhurasatyakathā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7467: rūpeṇa cāpratisamo 'si jinaḥ prabhayā ca bhāsayasi kṣetraśatān |
T04sanssr_pu:7468: brahmendrapālajagato bhagavan jihmībhavanti tava te prabhayā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7470: īkṣan vrajasy api yugaṃ bhagavan saṃkampayan dharaṇiśailataṭān ||
T04sanssr_pu:7471: kāyaś ca lakṣaṇacito bhagavan sūkṣma chavī kanakavarṇanibhā |
T04sanssr_pu:7472: nekṣañ jagad vrajati tṛptim idaṃ rūpaṃ tavāpratimarūpadhara ||
T04sanssr_pu:7475: tvaṃ dānaśīlanirataḥ satataṃ tvaṃ kṣāntivīryanirataḥ sudṛḍhaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7477: tvaṃ vādisūra kugaṇapramathī tvaṃ siṃhavan nadasi parṣadi ca |
T04sanssr_pu:7478: tvaṃ vaidyarāja trimalāntakaro vandāmi te paramaprītikara ||
T04sanssr_pu:7481: māyopamaṃ jagad imaṃ bhavatā naṭaraṅgasvapnasadṛśaṃ viditaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7482: nātmā na satva na ca jīvagatī dharmā marīcidakacandrasamāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7483: śūnyāś ca śānta annutpādanayaṃ avijānad eva jagad udbhramati |
T04sanssr_pu:7485: rāgādibhiś ca bahurāgaśataiḥ saṃbhrāmitaṃ satata vīkṣya jagat |
T04sanssr_pu:7488: satatāturaṃ jagad avekṣya mune parimocayan vicarase kṛpayā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7489: rathacakravad bhramati sarvajagat tiryakṣu pretaniraye sugatau |
T04sanssr_pu:7490: mūḍhā adeśika anāthagatāḥ tasya pradarśayasi mārgavaraṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7491: ye te babhūvu purimāś ca jināḥ dharmeśvarā jagati cārthakarāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7492: ayam eva taiḥ prakathitāryapatho yad deśayasy api vibho 'pratimaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7493: snigdhaṃ hy akarkaśa manojña varaṃ brahmādhikaṃ paramaprītikaraṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7496: śrutvā hi yāṃ niyutasatvaśatāḥ yānatrayeṇa janayanti śamam ||
T04sanssr_pu:7497: tava pūjayā sukham annekavidham divyaṃ labhanti manujeṣu tathā |
T04sanssr_pu:7498: āḍhyo mahādhana mahāvibhavo bhavate jagaddhitakaro nṛpatiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7499: balacakravarty api ca dvīpapatiḥ jagad āvṛṇoti daśabhiḥ kuśalaiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7500: ratnāni sapta labhate suśubhā tvayi saṃprasādajanako 'pratimaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7501: brahmāpi śakra api lokapatiḥ bhavate ca saṃtuṣiṭa devapatiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7503: 'pi ca sa yāmapatiḥ tvatpūjayā bhavati cāpi jinaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7504: evaṃ hy amogha tava pūjā kṛtā saṃdarśanaṃ śravaṇam apy asamaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7505: bhavate jagad vividhaduḥkhaharaṃ spṛśate padaṃ ca paramaṃ virajaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7506: mārgajña mārgakuśalā bhagavan kupathān nivārayasi lokam imaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7507: kṣeme śive viraji āryapathe pratiṣṭhāpayasi jagad bhagavan ||
T04sanssr_pu:7508: puṇyārthikasya tava puṇyanidhe satatākṣayā bhavati puṇyakriyā |
T04sanssr_pu:7509: bahukalpakoṭiṣu na yāti kṣayaṃ yāvad dhi na spṛśati bodhi varāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7510: pariśuddhakṣetra labhate ruciraṃ parinirmitābha sada prītikaraṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7511: śuddhāś ca kāyavacasā manasā satvā bhavanty api ca kṣetravare ||
T04sanssr_pu:7512: ity evam ādiguṇa naikavidhān labhate jinārcanakṛtān manujaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7513: svargāpavarga manujeṣu sukhaṃ labhate ca puṇyanidhi sarvajage ||
T04sanssr_pu:7514: kīrtiyaśaś ca prasṛtaṃ vipulaṃ tava sarvadikṣu bahukṣetraśatān |
T04sanssr_pu:7515: saṃkīrtayanti sugatāḥ satataṃ tava varṇamāla pariṣatsu jināḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7517: śāntendriyā śamaratā bhagavan vandāmi te naravarapravara ||
T04sanssr_pu:7518: labdhā abhijña jina pañca mayā gagane sthitena te niśamya giram |
T04sanssr_pu:7519: bhavitāsmi vīra sugatapratimo vibhajiṣya dharmam amalaṃ jagataḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7521: puṇyaṃ yad arjitam idaṃ vipulaṃ jagad āpnuyād api ca buddhapadam |iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7523: punar aparaṃ buddhā bhagavanto mahāpuṇyajñānasaṃbhārā mahāmaitrīmahākaruṇāgocarā mahāsatvarāśeḥ trāṇabhūtā mahābhaiṣajyaśalyahartāraḥ sarvasatvasamacittānityasamādhigocarāḥ saṃsāranirvāṇavimuktā yāvat satvānāṃ mātāpitṛkalpāḥ samānamaitracittāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7525: sarvalokānabhibhūtāḥ sarvalokasyālokabhūtā mahāyogayogino mahātmāno mahājanaparivārā viśiṣṭajanaparivārā anivāritadarśanaśravaṇaparyupāsanāḥ svasukhanirapekṣāḥ paraduṣkhapraśamanapriyā dharmapriyā dharmadharā dharmāhārā dharmabhiṣajo dharmeśvarā dharmasvāmino dharmadānapatayo nityatyāgābhiratā nityāpramattā nityavivekābhiratāḥ sarvatra tīrthasetubhūtā mahārājamārgaprakhyā yāvad asecanakadarśanā buddhā
T04sanssr_pu:7528: evaṃ ca tān anusmṛtya tadguṇapariniṣpattyarthaṃ smṛtim upasthāpayatīti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7532: yae ete buddhā bhagavanto 'nnantāparyantaguṇā ete dharmajā dharmapadā
T04sanssr_pu:7533: dharmanirmitā dharmādhipateyā dharmaprabhā dharmagocarā dharmapratiśaraṇā dharmaniṣpannāḥ
T04sanssr_pu:7535: yāny api laukikāni lokottarāṇi ca sukhāni santi |
T04sanssr_pu:7538: dharmagauraveṇa dharmapratiśaraṇena dharmaparāyaṇena dharmasāreṇa dharmānva ... dharmapratipannena
T04sanssr_pu:7541: samo hi dharmaḥ samaḥ satveṣu pravartate |
T04sanssr_pu:7547: dharmaḥ kālam apekṣya pravartate |ākāliko hi dharmaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7549: pratyātmavedanīyaḥ |tathā mayā dharmasadṛśacittena bhavitavyaṃ |na dharma udāre pravartate hīneṣu na pravartate |
T04sanssr_pu:7551: mayā dharmasadṛśacittena bhavitavyaṃ |na dharmaḥ śuddheṣu pravartate
T04sanssr_pu:7553: utkarṣāpakarṣāpagato hi dharmas tathā mayā dharmasadṛśacittena bhavitavyaṃ |na dharma āryeṣu pravartate pṛthagjaneṣu na pravartate |
T04sanssr_pu:7556: na dharmo divā pravartate rātrau na pravartate |
T04sanssr_pu:7557: rātryāṃ vā pravartate divā na pravartate |
T04sanssr_pu:7563: na dharmasyonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvam aprameyāsaṃkhyeyo hi dharma ākāśavan na kṣīyate na vardhate
T04sanssr_pu:7567: tathā mayā dharmasadṛśacittena bhavitavyaṃ |na dharmaḥ śaraṇaṃ paryeṣate |dharmaḥ sarvalokasya śaraṇaṃ |tathā mayā dharmasadṛśacittena bhavitavyaṃ |na dharmasya kvacit pratighāto |
T04sanssr_pu:7568: apratihatalakṣaṇo hi dharmaḥ |tathā mayā dharmasadṛśacittena bhavitavyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:7570: niranuśayo hi dharmaḥ |tathā mayā dharmasadṛśacittena bhavitavyam |
T04sanssr_pu:7572: sadā nirvikalpo hi dharmaḥ |tathā mayā dharmasadṛśacittena bhavitavyam |evaṃ bodhisatvo dharmavad dharme smṛtim upasthāpayati |
T04sanssr_pu:7575: saṃgho hi dharmavādī dharmacaraṇo dharmacintako dharmakṣetraṃ dharmadharo dharmapratiśaraṇo dharmapūjako dharmakṛtyakārī dharmagocaro dharmacāritrasaṃpannaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7576: svabhāvarjukaḥ svabhāvaśuddhaḥ sānukrośo dharmānukāruṇikaḥ sadā vivekagocaraḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7578: tatra bodhisatvasya saṃgham anusmarataḥ evaṃ bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:7579: yae ete saṃghasya bhūtā guṇā ete mayātmanaḥ sarvasatvānāṃ ca niṣpādayitavyā iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7580: yathāryavimalakīrtinirdeśe bodhisatvaguṇā uktās tathā saṃghānusmṛtir bhāvyā |
T04sanssr_pu:7581: sarvasatvāna ye rūpā rutaghoṣāś ca īritāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7583: te jīrṇavyādhitā bhonti bodhisatvā mṛtam ātmāna darśayī |satvānāṃ
T04sanssr_pu:7588: sarveṣāṃ gṛha bhuñjanti sarvān nāmanti bodhaye ||
T04sanssr_pu:7589: ye kecin mantravidyā vā śilpasthānā bahuvidhāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7591: yāvanto loka pāṣaṇḍāḥ sarvatra pravrajanti te |
T04sanssr_pu:7593: candrā vā bhonti sūryā vā śakrabrahmaprajeśvarāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7594: bhavanti āpas tejaś ca pṛthivī mārutas tathā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7596: yena te satva mucyante sukhī bhonti annāmayāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7597: durbhikṣāntarakalpeṣu bhavantī pānabhojanam |kṣudhāpipāsām apanīya dharmaṃ deśenti prāṇinām
T04sanssr_pu:7602: ye cāpi nirayāḥ kecid buddhakṣetreṣv acintiṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:7605: sarvatra dharmaṃ deśenti tena ucyanti nāyakāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7606: kāmabhogāṃś ca darśenti dhyānaṃ ca dhyāyināṃ tathā |
T04sanssr_pu:7607: vidhvasta māraṃ kurvanti avatāraṃ na denti te ||
T04sanssr_pu:7608: agnimadhye yathā padmam abhūtaṃ taṃ vinirdiśet |
T04sanssr_pu:7609: evaṃ kāmāṃś ca dhyānaṃ ca abhūtaṃ te vidarśayī ||
T04sanssr_pu:7610: saṃcintya gaṇikāṃ bhonti puṃsām ākarṣaṇāya te |
T04sanssr_pu:7612: grāmikāś ca sadā bhonti sārthavāhāḥ purohitāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7614: daridrāṇāṃ ca satvānāṃ nidhānā bhonti akṣayāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7615: teṣāṃ dānāni datvā ca bodhicittaṃ janenti te ||
T04sanssr_pu:7619: abhayaṃ teṣu datvā ca paripācenti bodhaye ||
T04sanssr_pu:7620: pañcābhijñāś ca te bhūtvā ṛṣayo brahmacāriṇaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7623: ceṭā bhavanti dāsā vā śiṣyatvam upayānti ca ||
T04sanssr_pu:7624: yena yenaiva cāṅgena satvo dharmarato bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:7626: yeṣām annantā śikṣā hi annantaś cāpi gocaraḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7629: buddhair api vadadbhis tu guṇāntaḥ suvaco bhaved |
T04sanssr_pu:7632: raśmi pramuñciya mālyaviyūhā mālyavataṃsaka mālya vitānāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7635: cūrṇavicitravikīrṇa samantān te jinapūja karonti mahaātmā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7640: raśmi pramuñciya dhvajāgraviyūhā te dhvaja pāṇḍuralohitapītāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7643: paṭṭa patāka pralambita dāmā kiṅkiṇijāla jinasvaraghoṣān ||
T04sanssr_pu:7644: chatra dharenti tathāgatamūrdhne te yatha ekajinasya karonti |
T04sanssr_pu:7646: eṣa samādhi vikurva ṛṣīṇāṃ te jagasaṃgrahajñānavikurvā |
T04sanssr_pu:7660: satva vinenti yathāśaya loke ye tu samantavimokṣamukhena |
T04sanssr_pu:7661: satva vinenti yathāśaya loke teṣa nimitta na śakya grahītuṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7662: kenacid eṣa samādhivikurvāḥ tena tivyūhata [doubtful] agrasamādhiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7664: cintiya darśayi sarva vinenti yatra durbhikṣa sudurlabha sarvaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7665: ye pariṣkāra sukhāvaha loke tatra ca sarvabhiprāyakriyābhiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7666: dātu dadanti karonti jagārthaṃ te varabhojanapānarasāgraiḥ
T04sanssr_pu:7670: rūpa vidarśiya satva vinenti darśana prītipraharṣaratānāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7672: rūpadhimukti jagad vinayanti te madhuraiḥ kalaviṅkarutebhī |
T04sanssr_pu:7674: ye catur eva aśīti sahasrā yebhi jinā jagato 'rtha karonti |
T04sanssr_pu:7675: tebhita dharmaprabhedamukhebhiḥ satva vinenti yathāśaya loke ||
T04sanssr_pu:7677: sarvakriyāsu sahāya bhavitvā satva vinenti sahāyamukhena ||
T04sanssr_pu:7679: tebhi sahāya sahantiya pīḍāṃ sarvajagasya hitāya sukhāya ||
T04sanssr_pu:7680: yatra na niṣkramaṇaṃ na ca dharmo jñāyati raṇyagato na ca mokṣaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7684: te daśa carya prabhāvayamānā ācari dharma mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7685: sarvam aśeṣata carya ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvayamāna karonti jagārthaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7687: tatra jarārdita vyādhinapṛṣṭā darśayi mṛtyuvaśaṃ avaśātmā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7689: prajvalitaṃ jaravyādhitamṛtyu loka nidarśayi satva vinenti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7691: buddhamahātma tu sūcayamānāḥ buddhaguṇebhi karonti jagārtham ||
T04sanssr_pu:7692: te ca adeśa ṛddhyanuśāstī rūpadhiṣṭhānabalena samantāt |
T04sanssr_pu:7693: darśayamāna tathāgata ṛddhī ṛddhivikurvita satva vinenti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7694: te vividhehi upāyanayehi lokavicāri karonti jagārthaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7695: loki alipta jale yatha padmaṃ prītiprasādakarā vicaranti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7696: kāvyakarāḥ kavirāja bhavantī te naṭanartaka jhallakamallāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7698: grāmika nāyaka sārathi bhontī sārthika śreṣṭhika gṛhapati bhonti |
T04sanssr_pu:7700: te aṭavīṣu mahādruma bhontī auṣadha akṣayaratnanidhānāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7701: cintamaṇi druma kāmadadāś ca deśika utpathamārgagatānāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7702: arcciya santu tu loka viditvā karmavidhīṣu ajānaka satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7705: vidyabalauṣadhi śāstravicitrāḥ sarva prabhāvita tebhi ṛṣībhiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7706: ye ṛṣiṇāṃ caraṇāḥ paramāgrā yatrādhimukta sadevaku lokaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7707: ye vrataduṣkara ye tapaśreṣṭhāḥ sarvi prabhāvita tebhi vidūbhiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7709: nagna acelaguruśramaṇānāṃ tīrthika ācaryā hi bhavanti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7710: te tu ajīvika dharmacarāṇāṃ uttarikāṇa annuttarikāṇāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7711: dīrghajaṭāna kumāravratānāṃ teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7713: cārika tīrthya daśa tritayānāṃ teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7715: mūlaphalāmbucarā api bhūtvā dharma acintiya te paramāgrāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7717: ye muṣaleśaya [doubtful] yuktivihārī teṣv api ācaryā hi bhavanti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7718: yāvata bāhirakāḥ pṛthutīrthyā āśaya teṣv adhimukti samīkṣya |
T04sanssr_pu:7721: sūkṣmapadebhir upāyana yebhī satyaprakāśana teṣu karonti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7731: te yathasatya niruktividhijñā evam aśeṣata ye jinadharmā |
T04sanssr_pu:7732: dharmam acintiya vākyapathajñā deśayi eṣa samādhivikurvā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7734: raśmim acintiyam utsṛjamānā raśmi pramuñciya satva vinenti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7735: raśmi pramuñciya darśayamānā yāvata satva vijānita raśmi |
T04sanssr_pu:7736: teṣu sudarśana bhoti amogham hetu annuttari jñānavarasya ||
T04sanssr_pu:7737: darśayi buddha vidarśayi dharmaṃ saṃgha nidarśayi mārga narāṇām |
T04sanssr_pu:7738: darśayi cetika te jinabimbā tena sudarśanaraśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7739: raśmi pramuñci prabhaṃkara nāmā yā prabha jihma karoti marūṇāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7740: sarvarajaṃ ca tamaṃ ca hanitvā so prabha bhāsati lokahitānāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7741: tāya prabhāsaya codita satvās te jinapūjapradīpa dharentī |
T04sanssr_pu:7742: te jinapūjapradīpa dharitvā lokapradīpakarā jina bhonti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7743: tailapradīpa ghṛtasya pradīpā dāru tṛṇā naḍaveṇu pradīpān |
T04sanssr_pu:7745: raśmi pramuñciya pratāraṇi nāmā tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7747: dūṣita saṃskṛta varṇita śāntī tena pratāraṇi raśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7748: raśmi pipāsavinodani nāmā tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7753: kāma vivarṇita varṇitadhyānā tṛṣṇavinodani tena nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7754: prītikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7755: prītiphuṭā varabodhinidānaṃ cinta janenti bhaviṣya svayaṃbhū ||
T04sanssr_pu:7757: bhāṣita buddhaguṇāḥ sada kālaṃ prītikarī prabha tena nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7758: raśmi pramuñci ratiṃkara nāmā tāya prabhāsaya bodhita satvā |
T04sanssr_pu:7759: buddharatīrata dharmaratīrata saṃgharatīrata te sada bhonti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7761: labdhanupattikakṣānti labhanti codita smārita ye bahu satvā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7764: puṇyasamuccayaraśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā |
T04sanssr_pu:7765: dānu dadanti vicitram annekaṃ prārthayamānu annuttaru bodhiṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7766: āśaya pūritu yācanakānāṃ yajña nirargaḍa tair yajamānaiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7767: sarvabhiprāyata dānu daditvā puṇyasamuccaya raśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7768: jñānavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7769: eka tu dharma mukhātu annekā dharmamukhān avabuddhi kṣaṇena ||
T04sanssr_pu:7770: dharmaprabheda ... grāhita satvān arthaviniścaya jñāna vibhaktī |
T04sanssr_pu:7771: dharmapadārthavibhāṣaṇa kṛtvā jñānavatī prabha tena nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7772: prajñapradīpaya osari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7773: śūnya nisatva ajātavipannān otari dharma abhāvasvabhāvān |
T04sanssr_pu:7775: dharma asvāmika śūnya nirīhān bhāṣati prajñapradīpa nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7776: dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvā |
T04sanssr_pu:7778: dharmadharāṇu parigrahu kṛtvā dhārmikarakṣa karitva ṛṣīṇāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7779: dharma anugraha kṛtva jagasya dharmavikurvaṇi raśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7780: tyāgavatī yada raśmi vimuñcī tāya ya matsara codita satvā |
T04sanssr_pu:7781: jñātvā anitya aśāśvatabhogān tyāgaratīrata te sada bhonti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7782: matsaradurdama satva adāntā jñātva dhanaṃ supinābhrasvabhāvaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7783: bṛṃhita tyāga prasannam anena tyāgavatīprabha tena nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7784: niṣparidāha ya osari raśmiḥ tāya duḥśīlaya codita satvā |
T04sanssr_pu:7785: śīlaviśuddhi pratiṣṭhita bhūtvā cinta janenti bhaveya svayaṃbhūḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7786: karmapathe kuśale pariśuddhe śīla samādayi yad bahusatvān |
T04sanssr_pu:7787: bodhayi citta samādayanena raśmi nivṛtta sa niṣparidāhaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7788: kṣāntiviyūha ya osari raśmi tāya ya akṣama codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7789: krodhakhilaṃ adhimāna jahitvā kṣāntiratīrata te sada bhonti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7790: duḥkṛta kṣānti apāyamatīnāṃ citta akṣobhita bodhinidānaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7791: varṇita kṣāntiguṇāḥ sadakālaṃ tena nivṛtta sa kṣāntiviyūhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7792: raśmi uttaptavatī yada muñcī tāya kuśīdaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7793: yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karonti akhinnaprayogāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7794: yukta prayukta triṣū rataneṣu pūja karitva akhinnaprayogāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7795: te catu mārapathā atikrāntāḥ kṣipra spṛśanti annuttara bodhiṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7796: vīrya samādayi yad bahusatvān pūja karitva triṣū rataneṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:7797: dharma dharitva kṣayaṃgata kāle tena utaptavatī prabha labdhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7798: śāntikarī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya vibhrāntaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7799: teṣu na rāgu na dveṣa na mohāḥ bodhita bhonti samāhita cittāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7800: pāpa kumitra kiliṣṭa carīye saṃgaṇikāvinivartana kṛtvā |varṇita dhyāna praśānta araṇye śāntikarī prabha tena nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7801: prajñaviyūha ya osari raśmī tāya duḥprajña saṃcodita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7802: satyapratītya vimokṣanaye asmin nidriya jñānagatiṃ gata bhonti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7805: rājyadhanātmapriyaiḥ parityāgaiḥ dharma ya mārgita bodhinidānaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7806: taṃ ca satkṛtya prakāśiya dharmaṃ raśmi nivṛtta sa prajñaviyūhāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7807: buddhavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7808: buddha sahasra anneka acintyān paśyiṣu padmavaneṣu niṣaṇṇān ||
T04sanssr_pu:7810: buddhabalāviprabhāvana kṛtvā buddhavatī prabha tena nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7811: te 'bhayaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāyābhayārdita satva saspṛṣṭāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7813: ye abhayena nimantrita satvāḥ prāṇibadhāt tu nivārita bhonti |
T04sanssr_pu:7814: trāyita yaccharaṇāgata bhītās tena bhayaṃdada raśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7815: sarvasukhāvaha osari raśmī tāya gilānaya ātura spṛṣṭāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7817: rogavinodani mūla phaloṣadha ratna rasāyana gandhanulepān |
T04sanssr_pu:7818: phāṇita kṣīra madhū ghṛta telān bhojana pāna daditvaya labdhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7819: buddhanidarśani raśmi pramuñcī tāya sacodita āyu kṣayānte |
T04sanssr_pu:7820: buddha anusmari paśyiṣu buddham te cyuta gacchi sabuddhakkṣetraṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7821: kāla karonti ca smārita buddhā darśitaprītakarā jinabimbān |
T04sanssr_pu:7822: buddhagatāḥ śaraṇaṃ maraṇānte bhāsiya buddhanidarśani labdhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7823: dharmaprabhāvani raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāya saṃcodita satvā |
T04sanssr_pu:7824: dharma paṭhanti śṛṇvanti likhantī dharmaratī rata te sada bhonti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7826: chanda janitva prayujyatha dharme bhāṣata dharmaprabhāvani labdhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7827: ghoṣavatī yada raśmi pramuñcī buddhasutā paricodanatāyāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7828: yātuka śabdapracāru triloke sarva tathāgataghoṣa śṛṇvanti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7831: te 'mṛtaṃdada raśmi pramuñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7832: sarva pramāda ciraṃ prajahitvā sarvaguṇaiḥ pratipadyati yogaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7833: duṣkha anneka upadravapūrṇaṃ bhāṣita saṃskṛta nityam akṣemaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7834: śāntinirodhasukhaṃ sada kṣemaṃ bhāṣayatā amṛtaṃdada labdhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7835: raśmi viśeṣavatī yada muñcī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7837: śīlata agra samādhita agro prajñata agra mahāmunirājā |
T04sanssr_pu:7838: ya stuta varṇita bodhinidānaṃ tena viśeṣavatī prabha labdhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7839: ratnaviyūha ya osari raśmi tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7840: akṣara ratnanidhāna labhitvā pūjayi ratnavarebhi maharṣīn ||
T04sanssr_pu:7841: ratnavisarga jine jinastūpe saṃgrahi kṛtsnajanaṃ ratanebhiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7842: ratnapradāna karitva jinānāṃ raśmi nivṛtta ya ratnaviyūhāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7843: gandhaprabhāsa ya osari raśmī tāya prabhāsaya codita satvāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7844: ghrātvā amānuṣa gandha manojñān buddhaguṇe niyutāni bhavanti ||
T04sanssr_pu:7851: raśmi prasādakarī yada muñcī pāṇitalopama saṃsthihi bhūmiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7852: śodhayato ṛṣi āśramastūpān tena prasādakarī prabha labdhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7853: muñcati meghavatī yada raśmiṃ saṃsthihi gandha pravarṣati meghaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7855: bhūṣaṇavyūha pramuñcatu raśmīn nagna acela subhūṣaṇa bhontī |
T04sanssr_pu:7857: raśmi rasāgravatī yada muñcī bhukṣita bhojya rasāgra labhantī |
T04sanssr_pu:7858: bhojana pāna vicitra rasāgrān datva rasāgravatī prabha labdhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7859: arthanidarśani muñcati raśmīn ratnanidhāna labhanti daridrāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7860: akṣayaratnanidhiṃ tribhi ratnair dānata arthanidarśani labdhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7861: cakṣuviśodhani muñcati raśmīn andha tadā dṛśi rūpa vicitram |
T04sanssr_pu:7862: dīpapradāna jine jinastūpe cakṣuviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7863: śrotraviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śrotravihīna śruṇī pṛthuśabdān |
T04sanssr_pu:7865: ghrāṇaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn ghrāyi aghrāyitapūrva sugandhān |
T04sanssr_pu:7866: gandhapradāna jine jinastūpe ghrāṇaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7867: jihvaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn snigdhamanojñarutai stuti buddhān |
T04sanssr_pu:7868: vāca durukta vivarjita rukṣā ślakṣṇa udīrita raśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7869: kāyaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn indriyahīna svindriya bhonti |
T04sanssr_pu:7870: kāyapraṇāma jine jinastūpe kurvata kāyaviśodhani labdhvā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7871: cittaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn unmatu sarva sacita bhavanti |
T04sanssr_pu:7872: citta samādhivaśānuga kṛtvā cittaviśodhani raśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7873: rūpaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn paśyiya cintiya rūpanarendrān |
T04sanssr_pu:7875: śabdaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn śabda aśabdata śūnya vijānī |
T04sanssr_pu:7876: pratyaya jāta pratiśrutatulyaṃ śabdaprakāśana raśmi nivṛttā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7877: gandhaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarva dugandha sugandha bhavantī |
T04sanssr_pu:7878: gandhavarāgra janair jinastūpān snāpanabodhidruma prabha eṣā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7879: te rasaśodhani muñcati raśmīn sadviṣa nirviṣa bhonti rasāgrāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7881: sparśaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn kakkhaṭa sparśa mṛdū sukha bhontī |
T04sanssr_pu:7882: śaktitriśūlāsi [doubtful] tomaravarṣā mālya mṛdū padumotpala bhontī ||
T04sanssr_pu:7883: duṣya anneka mṛdū sukhasparśā saṃstari mārgi vrajanti jinānāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7885: dharmaviśodhani muñcati raśmīn sarvata romata cintiya dharmān |
T04sanssr_pu:7887: pratyaya jāta ajāta svabhāvā dharmaśarīra ajātaśarīrāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7888: dharmata nityasthitā gaganasthā sūcata dharmaviśodhani labdhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7889: raśmi sukhāpramukhā iti kṛtvā ekatu romamukhāt tu ṛṣīṇāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7891: te yatha ekata romamukhāto osari gaṅgarajopama raśmī |
T04sanssr_pu:7892: evam aśeṣata sarvatu romā deśa samādhivikurva ṛṣīṇāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7893: yena guṇena ya raśmi nivṛttā tasmi guṇeṣu sahāyaka pūrve |
T04sanssr_pu:7894: teṣu tam eva pramuñcati raśmiṃ jñānavikurvaṇa eṣa ṛṣīṇāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7895: teṣa ya puṇya sahāyaka pūrve yair anumodita yācita yebhiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7896: yebhi ca dṛṣṭa śubhopacitaṃ vā te ima raśmi prajānati teṣāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7897: ye ca śubhopacitāḥ kṛtapuṇyāḥ pūjita yebhi punaḥ punaḥ buddhāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7898: arthika chandika buddhaguṇebhiḥ codana teṣa karotiya raśmiḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7899: sūrya yathā jātyandha na paśyī no ca sa nāsti udeti sa loke |
T04sanssr_pu:7900: cakṣusameta udāgamu jñātvā sarva prayujya svaka svaka dharme ||
T04sanssr_pu:7901: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī |
T04sanssr_pu:7902: mithyahatā adhimuktivihīnāḥ durlabha te ca udāramatīnāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7903: ābharaṇāni nipāna vimānāḥ ratna rasāyana gandhanulepāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7904: te pi tu asti mahātmajanasya te ca sudurlabha kṛcchragatānāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7905: evata raśmi mahāpuruṣāṇāṃ asti ca te itare ca na paśyī |
T04sanssr_pu:7906: mithyahatā adhimuktivihīnāḥ durlabha te ca udāramatīnāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7907: yasy imu [doubtful] raśmiprabheda śruṇitvā bheṣyanti śraddadhimukti
T04sanssr_pu:7909: tena na kāṅkṣa na saṃśaya kāryo nāṅga na bheṣyi mahāguṇaketuḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7914: te daśakṣetrarajopama anye padmam adhiṣṭhihi saṃparivāraṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7915: sarva parīvṛta buddhasutebhī ye ca samādhyasamādhivihārī ||
T04sanssr_pu:7916: ye paripācita tena ṛṣīṇāṃ satva niṣpadita buddhaguṇeṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:7917: te parivāri ataṃ mahapadmaṃ sarva udikṣiṣu prāñjalibhūtāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7918: te ca samāhita bālaśarīre vyutthihi yauvanavegasthitebhyaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7919: yauvanavegasthiteṣu samāhita vyutthihi jīrṇaka vṛddha śarīrāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7925: pratyaya buddha śarīri samāhita vyutthihi buddhavarāgraśarīrā |
T04sanssr_pu:7931: ekatu romamukhasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata romamukheṣu |
T04sanssr_pu:7932: sarviṣu romamukheṣu samāhita vyutthihi ekatu vālapathātaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7933: ekatu vālapathasmi samāhita vyutthihi sarvata vālapathebhyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7934: sarviṣu vālapatheṣu samāhita vyutthihi te paramāṇurajātaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7935: ekarajasmi samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvarajebhya aśeṣam |
T04sanssr_pu:7938: vṛkṣaphaleṣu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi raśmimukhebhi jinānāṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7942: vāyupathe tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi bhūmitalānu mahātmā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7943: bhūmitale tu samāhita bhūtvā vyutthihi sarvatu devavimānāt |
T04sanssr_pu:7944: sarvi tu devabalāna samāhita vyutthihi te gaganānusmṛtīmān ||
T04sanssr_pu:7945: eti samādhi vimokṣa acintyās teṣa acintyaguṇopacitānāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7946: kalpa acintya prabhāṣiyamāṇāḥ sarvajinebhi na śakya kṣayītum ||
T04sanssr_pu:7947: sarvajinebhi ca bhāṣita ete karmavipāku jagasya acintyo |
T04sanssr_pu:7948: nāgavikurvita buddhavikurvā dhyāyina dhyāna acintya vikurvā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7949: te ca vaśe sthita aṣṭa vimokṣāḥ śrāvaka eka bhavībahu bhontī |
T04sanssr_pu:7950: bhūtva bahuḥ puna eka bhavitvā dhyāyati prajvalate gaganasmin ||
T04sanssr_pu:7951: te hi mahākaruṇāya vihīnā bodhi annarthiku loka upekṣī |
T04sanssr_pu:7952: darśayi kāyavikurva acintyā kasya na darśayi loka hitaiṣī ||
T04sanssr_pu:7953: candra sa sūrya nabhe vicarantau darśayi sarvadiśi pratibhāsaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7955: evam acintiya darśiyi rūpaṃ sarvadaśaddiśi te naravīrāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7957: sāgaradeva rutāvatināmā yāvat satva samudry utpannā |
T04sanssr_pu:7958: teṣu svarāṅgaruteṣu vidhijñā toṣayi sarvarutān svarutena ||
T04sanssr_pu:7959: sā hi sarāga sadoṣa rutāvati sarvarute pratighoṣa vidhijñā |
T04sanssr_pu:7960: dhāraṇidharmabalaṃ vaśiprāptā kaḥ sa na toṣi sadevakalokam ||
T04sanssr_pu:7961: māyakaro yatha vidyavidhijño darśayi rūpa vicitra annantān |
T04sanssr_pu:7963: māyakaro hi sarāgu sadoṣo toṣayi māyavikurvita lokaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7964: dhyāna abhijña vimokṣasuśikṣita kasya na toṣayi caryavidhijñaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7965: rāhu yatheṣa ya nirmaṇi kāyaṃ kurvati vajra pade talabandhaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7966: darśana sāgaru nābhipramāṇaṃ bhoti sumerutale sama śīrṣaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7967: so 'pi sarāgu sadoṣa samoho rāhu nidarśayi īdṛśa ṛddhī |
T04sanssr_pu:7968: mārapramardana lokapradīpa kasya na darśayi ṛddhi annantā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7970: yātuka bimbarannekasurāṇāṃ tātuka nirmaṇi śakru svakāyān ||
T04sanssr_pu:7971: sarvasurendrasurāś ca vijānī śakrama ... purato gata svāyum |eṣa gṛhyeta vajradharāṇāṃ saṃbhramu gacchisu sarvasurendrāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7972: netra sahasra bhayaṅkara darśī jvālapramuñcana vajra gṛhītaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:7973: varmita kāya durāsada teja śakram udīkṣya palātv asurendrāḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:7974: so hita itvarapuṇyabalenā śakra vikurvati devajayārthī |
T04sanssr_pu:7975: sarvajagasya aśeṣata trāṇāṃ akṣayapuṇya kuto na vikurvī ||
T04sanssr_pu:7976: ... vāyuta saṃbhuta meghapravarṣī vāyuta megha punaḥ prasamentī |
T04sanssr_pu:7977: vāyuta sasya virohati loke vāyu sukhāvaha sarvajagasya ||
T04sanssr_pu:7978: so hi aśikṣita pāramitāsu buddhaguṇeṣu aśikṣita vāyuḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:7979: darśayi lokavipāka acintyā kasya na darśayi te varalabdhā ||
T04sanssr_pu:7986: sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalāpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca
T04sanssr_pu:7990: sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati |
T04sanssr_pu:7991: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:7995: sa labhanadvāram udghāṭayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:8001: sa dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:8003: | sa tato vyuttiṣṭhann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:8005: sa śarīragatyā gacchann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:8009: sa śaucaṃ kurvann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:8010: sarvasatvānāṃ kleśamalāt prakṣālayeyaṃ |sa hastau prakṣālayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:8011: sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśavāsanām apanayeyaṃ |sa pādau prakṣālayann evaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:8012: cittam utpādayati sarvasatvānām annekaprakārāṇi kleśarajāṃsy apanayeyaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:8015: sa dantakāṣṭhaṃ bhakṣayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati |
T04sanssr_pu:8021: punar aparaṃ śāriputra vyāḍakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyam na saṃtrāsam āpattavyam |
T04sanssr_pu:8023: tathā hi tena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sarvasatvānām arthāya |
T04sanssr_pu:8025: |sacen māṃ vyāḍā bhakṣayeyus tebhya eva tad dānaṃ dattaṃ bhavatu |
T04sanssr_pu:8028: tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisambuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre tiryagyonigatāḥ satvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na
T04sanssr_pu:8030: corakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ |tat kasmād dhetoḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8031: sarvasvaparityāgakuśalā hi te bodhisatvā mahāsatvā utsṛṣṭakāyenāpi ca bodhisatvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktapariṣkāropakaraṇena ca |
T04sanssr_pu:8032: tenaivaṃ cittam utpādayitavyaṃ |te cen me satvāḥ pariṣkāropakaraṇāni haranti tebhya
T04sanssr_pu:8034: sacen māṃ kecij jīvitād vyaparopayeyuḥ tatra mayā na dveṣo na krodha utpādayitavyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8035: teṣām api mayā na kāyena na vacasā na manasāparāddhavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:8036: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati
T04sanssr_pu:8037: annuttarā ca me samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāsannā bhaviṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:8038: tathā ca kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya
T04sanssr_pu:8040: ete cānye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante ||
T04sanssr_pu:8041: pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena śāriputra bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ |tat kasmād dhetoḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8045: | na bodhisatvena mahāsatvena saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ |saced ahaṃ tṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kariṣyāmi
T04sanssr_pu:8046: api tu khalu punaḥ satvānām antike mahākaruṇācittam utpādayiṣyāmi |
T04sanssr_pu:8047: aho vatālpapuṇyā amī satvā yad eteṣāṃ loke evaṃrūpāṇi pānīyakāntārāṇi prajñāyante |
T04sanssr_pu:8048: tathā punar ahaṃ kariṣyāmi tathā pratipatsye yathā me 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na prajñāsyante tathā ca sarvasatvān puṇyaiḥ saṃyojayiṣyāmi yathāṣṭāṅgopetapānīyalābhino bhaviṣyanti |
T04sanssr_pu:8049: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye sarvasatvānāṃ kṛtaśo yathā vīryapāramitā tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti ||
T04sanssr_pu:8050: punar aparaṃ śāriputra bubhukṣākāntāramadhyagatena bodhisatvena mahāsatvena nottrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsam āpattavyaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:8052: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye tathā ca svaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhayiṣyāmi yathā me 'nnuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya satas tatra buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ
T04sanssr_pu:8053: evaṃrūpāṇi bubhukṣākāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti na prajñāsyante |
T04sanssr_pu:8054: sukhitā eva te satvā bhaviṣyanti sukhasamaṅginaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8055: sarvasukhasamarpitās tathā ca kariṣyāmi yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ yo ya evābhiprāyo bhaviṣyati yad yad evākāṅkṣiṣyanti manasā tat tad eva prādurbhaviṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:8056: tad yathāpi nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasā sarvaṃ prādurbhavati manasā sarvam utpadyate
T04sanssr_pu:8057: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryam ārapsye yathā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti
T04sanssr_pu:8058: avaikalyaṃ ca jīvitapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasatvānāṃ bhaviṣyati sarveṣāṃ sarvataḥ sarvadeti ||
T04sanssr_pu:8069: smṛtimāṃś ca bhavati matimāṃś ca bhavati buddhimāṃś ca bhavati gatimāṃś ca bhavati dhṛtimāṃś ca bhavati prajñāvāṃś ca bhavati
T04sanssr_pu:8087: sacet tvam ānanda śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvakabhūmau dharmaṃ deśeyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8088: tasyāṃ ca dharmadeśanāyāṃ ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhatvaṃ sākṣāt kuryus tad adyāpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na kṛtaṃ syāt |
T04sanssr_pu:8089: sacet punaḥ tvam ānanda bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyaikam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ deśayeḥ prakāśayer evam ahaṃ tvayā śrāvakeṇārādhitaḥ syāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:8090: tayā ca pūrvikayā dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve 'rhatvaṃ prāpnuyus teṣāṃ cārhatāṃ yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu
T04sanssr_pu:8092: tat kiṃ manyase ānandāpi tu sa bahu puṇyaskandhaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8096: ataḥ sa ānanda śrāvakayānikapudgalo bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati |
T04sanssr_pu:8097: ato 'py ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo
T04sanssr_pu:8106: idam ānanda tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmadānaṃ sarvaśrāvakayānikānām api sarvapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ kuśalamūlam abhibhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:8108: | evaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ samanvāharann asthānam ānandānnavakāśo yat sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vivartetānnuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8112: kālena co cintayamānu paṇḍitaḥ praviśya layanaṃ tatha ghaṭṭayitvā |
T04sanssr_pu:8113: vipaśya dharmaṃ imi sarva yoniśo utthāya deśeta alīnacittaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:8114: sukhasthito bhoti sadā vicakṣaṇo sukhaṃ niṣaṇṇas tatha dharma bhāsate |
T04sanssr_pu:8115: udāraprajñapta karitva āsanaṃ caukṣe manojñe pṛthivīpradeśe ||
T04sanssr_pu:8116: caukṣaṃ ca so cīvara prāvaritvā suraktaraṅgaṃ ca prasannaraṅgaiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8117: āsevakaṃ kṛṣṇa tathā daditvā mahāpramāṇaṃ ca nivāsayitvā ||
T04sanssr_pu:8119: sudhautapādaś ca upāruhitvā snigdhena śīrṣeṇa mukhena cāpi ||
T04sanssr_pu:8120: dharmāsane tatra niṣīdiyānaḥ ekāgra satveṣu samaṃ vipaśyan |
T04sanssr_pu:8121: upasaṃharec citrakathā bahūś ca bhikṣūnaś co bhikṣunikās tathaiva ||
T04sanssr_pu:8122: kilāsitāś cāpi vivarjayīta na cāpi utpādayi khedasaṃjñāṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:8123: aratiṃ ca sarvāṃ vijahīta paṇḍitaḥ maitrībalaṃ parṣadi bhāvayec ca ||
T04sanssr_pu:8124: bhāṣec ca rātriṃdivam agradharmān dṛṣṭāntakoṭīniyutaiḥ sa paṇḍitaḥ |
