T04sanssr_pu:8125: saṃharṣayet tāṃ ca tathaiva toṣayet na cāpi kiñcit tatra jātu prārthayet ||
T04sanssr_pu:8126: khādyaṃ ca bhojyaṃ ca tathānnapānaṃ vastrāṇi śayyāsanacīvarāṇi |
T04sanssr_pu:8127: gilānabhaiṣajya na cintayet saḥ na vijñapet parṣadi kiñcid anyat ||
T04sanssr_pu:8128: anyatra cinteya sadā vicakṣaṇaḥ bhaveya buddho 'ham ime ca satvā |
T04sanssr_pu:8129: etac ca me sarvasukhopadhānaṃ yaṃ dharma śrāvemi hitāya loke ||
T04sanssr_pu:8131: na kasyacid antaśo dharmapremṇāpy adhikataram anugrahaṃ karoti ||
T04sanssr_pu:8133: adhyeṣayeyur yadi tvāṃ te dharmadānasya kāraṇāt |
T04sanssr_pu:8135: evaṃ tvaṃ vāca bhāṣeyā yuṣme vā vijñapaṇḍitāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8136: kathaṃ mahātmanāṃ śakyaṃ purato bhāṣituṃ mayā ||
T04sanssr_pu:8137: sahasaiṣāṃ na jalpeta tulayitvā tu bhājanaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:8139: yadi duḥśīlān paśyesi pariṣāyāṃ bahūn sthitān |
T04sanssr_pu:8140: saṃlekhaṃ mā prabhāṣe tvaṃ varṇaṃ dānasya kīrtayeḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:8141: bhaveyur yadi cālpecchāḥ śuddhāḥ śīle pratiṣṭhitāḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8142: maitraṃ cittaṃ janitvā tvaṃ kuryāḥ saṃlekhikīṃ kathām ||
T04sanssr_pu:8144: labdhapakṣas tadā bhūtvā varṇaṃ śīlasya kīrtayeḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8171: imāni sāgaramate mantrapadāni dharmabhāṇakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmāsanakena supravṛttāni kṛtvā dharmāsananiṣaṇṇena sarvāṃ parṣadaṃ bodhyākārābhinirhṛtayā maitryā spharitvā |
T04sanssr_pu:8172: ātmani vaidyasaṃjñām utpādya dharme bhaiṣajyasaṃjñāṃ dharmaśravaṇikeṣv āturasaṃjñāṃ tathāgate satpuruṣasaṃjñāṃ dharmanetryāṃ cirasthitikasaṃjñām utpādyemāni mantrapadāny āmukhīkṛtya dharmasaṃkathā karaṇīyā |
T04sanssr_pu:8173: tasya samantād yo janaśate na māro na mārakāyikā vā devatā upasaṃkramayiṣyanti vicakṣuḥkaraṇe
T04sanssr_pu:8174: ye 'py enam upasaṃkramiṣyanti te 'py asya na śakṣyanty
T04sanssr_pu:8177: dharmabhāṇakena caukṣeṇa śucisamudācāreṇa susnātena śucinivāsitena bhavitavyam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:8181: tad yathāpi nāma mañjuśrīr nānāgandhavṛkṣāś ca caturdhātusaṃgṛhītā vivardhante |
T04sanssr_pu:8182: evam eva mañjuśrīr nānāsaṃbhāropacitaṃ bodhisatvasya kuśalamūlaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:8185: eṣādikā ādikarmikāṇāṃ sahasā bodhisatvaśikṣā smaraṇārtham upadarśitā |
T04sanssr_pu:8190: tatrānnutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām annutpādāyaiva chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchati vīryam ārabhate cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyakpraṇidadhātīty anena rakṣā ||
T04sanssr_pu:8191: utpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayatīty anena śuddhiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8192: annutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayati |
T04sanssr_pu:8193: yāvad utpannānāṃ ca sthitaye bhūyobhāvāya chandaṃ janayatīty ādi |
T04sanssr_pu:8195: etāni ca nityam apramādādhiṣṭhitāni kāryāṇi sarvakuśalamūlānāṃ tanmūlatvāt ||
T04sanssr_pu:8197: yāvanta dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ prakīrtitāḥ śīlaśrutaṃ tyāgu tathaiva kṣāntiḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8198: sarveṣu mūlaṃ hy ayam apramādo nidhānalambhaḥ sugatena deśita |
T04sanssr_pu:8202: tad yathā tīvrakopaprasādasya rājño bhaiṣajyatailaparipūrṇabhājanaṃ gṛhītvā picchilasaṃkrameṇa bhṛtyasya gacchataḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:8205: sa cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:8207: evaṃ yāvan manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati |
T04sanssr_pu:8209: sarvadharmeṣv āsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥśaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti |
T04sanssr_pu:8211: punar aparam apramādo yat svacittasya damanaṃ paracittasyārakṣā kleśarater aparikarmaṇā dharmarater anuvartanaṃ yāvad ayam ucyate 'pramādaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8212: yasya guhyakādhipate śraddhā cāpramādaś ca tasyānulomikena vīryeṇa kāryaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:8213: yena tān apramādakāraṇān śraddhākāraṇāṃś ca dharmān samudānayati |
T04sanssr_pu:8214: yasya guhyakādhipate śraddhā cāpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca tena smṛtisaṃprajanye yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ
T04sanssr_pu:8215: yena smṛtisaṃprajanyena sarvān bodhipakṣān dharmān na vipraṇāśayati |
T04sanssr_pu:8216: yasya guhyakādhipate śraddhā cāpramādaś ca vīryaṃ ca smṛtisaṃprajanyaṃ ca tena yoniśaḥ prayoge yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8217: yoniśaḥ prayukto hi guhyakādhipate bodhisatvo yad asti tad astīti prajānāti |
T04sanssr_pu:8219: yāvad asti saṃvṛtyā cakṣur ity ādi ||
T04sanssr_pu:8221: sadāpramādo hy amṛtasya mūlaṃ satvārthayuktasya ca bodhicittaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:8222: yad yoniśaś caiva vivekacittam aparigrahaḥ sarvasukhasya mūlam iti ||
T04sanssr_pu:8226: tatkūlaṃ na svataḥ pāraṃ kim apekṣyāstv apāratā |
T04sanssr_pu:8227: ātmatvaṃ na svataḥ siddhaṃ kim apekṣya paro bhavet ||
T04sanssr_pu:8228: tadduṣkhena na me bādhety ato yadi na rakṣasi |
T04sanssr_pu:8229: nāgāmikāyaduṣkhāt te bādhā tat kena rakṣasi ||
T04sanssr_pu:8231: anya eva mṛto yasmād anyas tatra prajāyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:8232: anyaś cej jāyate tatra kiṃ puṇyena prayojanaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:8234: mṛte garbhagate tāvad anyo bālaḥ prajāyate |
T04sanssr_pu:8242: kāyaś cet pratimākāraḥ pesībhasmasu nāsti saḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:8243: sūkṣmabhāvena cet tatra sthaulyaṃ tyaktvā vyavasthitaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8246: tatra cintaiva me nāsti dṛśyakāyas tu nāśavān |
T04sanssr_pu:8247: avasthābhiś ca saṃbandhaḥ saṃvṛtyā caiva dṛśyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:8250: na ca trīṇi pradhānāni tathā sattā guṇā api |
T04sanssr_pu:8254: sukhāder na paṭṭotpattiḥ paṭṭādes tu sukhādayaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8256: tasmād āgamayuktibhyāṃ anityaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtaṃ |tad dhetuphalasaṃbandhaḥ pratyakṣatvān na sādhyate
T04sanssr_pu:8257: svasaṃtāne ca dṛṣṭo 'sau nityeṣu ca kathaṃ yathā |
T04sanssr_pu:8260: dīpatailaṃ kṣayaṃ yāti kṣīyamānaṃ na lakṣyate |
T04sanssr_pu:8261: evaṃ bhāvā na lakṣyante kṣīyamānāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:8263: tatrābhyāsād ahaṃkāraḥ parasmin kiṃ na jāyate ||
T04sanssr_pu:8265: aprāptam eva tad duṣkhaṃ pratikāryaṃ parātmanoḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:8266: ayuktam api ced etat svātmany astītaratra na |
T04sanssr_pu:8267: yad ayuktaṃ nivartyaṃ tat svam anyad vā yathābalaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:8268: kṛpayā bahu duṣkhaṃ cet kasmād utpādyate balāt |
T04sanssr_pu:8273: tair eva nanu paryāptaṃ mokṣeṇāpy arasena kim ||
T04sanssr_pu:8274: evaṃ parārthaṃ kṛtvāpi na mado na ca vismayaḥ |
T04sanssr_pu:8291: tṛṣṇā parigraho yasya tasya duṣkhaṃ na śāmyati |
T04sanssr_pu:8293: loke duṣkhāgnitapte ca kā ratiḥ susukhe bhavet |
T04sanssr_pu:8295: ātmatṛṣṇā ca sarveṣāṃ duṣkhāṇāṃ mūlam uttamaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:8296: tasmān nihanmi tām eva satvebhyaḥ svārtham utsṛjan ||
T04sanssr_pu:8299: yad bhayān notsṛjāmy etat tad evādadato bhayaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:8300: pratikṣaṇaṃ hi yāty eva kāyaś cittaṃ ca me yataḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:8302: bodhiḥ kāyena labhyeta nanu labdhā mayaiva sā ||
T04sanssr_pu:8306: yuktyā saṃrakṣya tu dravyaṃ satveṣu vopayojayet ||
T04sanssr_pu:8307: svakāye parakāye vā yad duṣkhaṃ neha duṣkhakṛt |
T04sanssr_pu:8314: kopaḥ kasyārtham adyāpi mṛṣā vā tan mayoditam ||
T04sanssr_pu:8315: svārthaghneṣu yadi dveṣaḥ kṛpā kutra bhaviṣyati |
T04sanssr_pu:8316: nirdayasyāpi kaḥ kopaḥ parārtho yadi naśyati ||
T04sanssr_pu:8320: nāpi saṃcodayaty enaṃ bhogārthaṃ nopayāti ca ||
T04sanssr_pu:8326: yāvat satvāḥ sthitās tāvat sarveṣām arthakāriṇaḥ ||
T04sanssr_pu:8328: evam etān karomy eṣa dhātūn ṣaḍ api nirvyathān ||
T04sanssr_pu:8333: ka eva mama duṣkhena duṣkhī syān me bhayād bhayī |
T04sanssr_pu:8338: skhalan pade pade śocyaḥ para ātmā ca sarvadā ||
T04sanssr_pu:8340: na yuktaṃ yujyate tv atra guṇān dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ mahat ||
T04sanssr_pu:8345: vākyaṃ mūrdhnā pratīcchāmi sarvaśiṣyo bhavāmy ahaṃ ||
T04sanssr_pu:8347: tatraikena raṇāsaktam anye nighnanti māṃ sukham ||
T04sanssr_pu:8348: tatra yaḥ pṛṣṭhato bhītiṃ śrāvayed anyato 'pi vā |
T04sanssr_pu:8349: pradviṣṭo vā prasanno vā same prāṇapradaḥ suhṛt ||
T04sanssr_pu:8358: mañjuśrī saṃjñakaṃ yat tat piṇḍībhūtaṃ jagaddhitaṃ |
T04sanssr_pu:8368: iti jinatanayānāṃ sarvathātyadbhutānāṃ caritam upanibdhyopārjitaṃ yac chubhaṃ me |
T04sanssr_pu:8369: bhavatu sukham annantaṃ dehināṃ tena yāvat sugatapadam annantavyomasīmādhipatyaṃ ||
